“Dawn in, na kalaohte ading zong kong tawisak ding hi,” hong ci nu pen, ka topa’ tapa adinginTopain a sehsa numei hisak in,’ ka ci hi.Topa

“Ka lungsim sungah thu ka nget khit ma-in, a liangko tungah a tuibeel pua-in Rebekah hong pai khia ka mu hi. Amah tuikhukah paisukin tui hong tawi hi. Keimah in ama kiangah, ‘Tui hong dawnsak in,’ ka ci hi.
Amah in a liangko panin a beel hong khiasuk pahin, ‘Dawn in, na kalaohte zong tui ka pia ding hi,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin keimah in ka dawn a, amah in kalaohte zong tui a pia hi.

Tua ciangin, ‘Kua’ tanu na hi hiam?’ ci-in ka dong hi. Amah in, ‘Nahor le a zi Milkah’ tapa Bethuel’ tanu ka hi hi,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a nak tungah nakbah ka batsak a, a khut tungah taute ka butsak hi.
Tua ciangin ka lu kuninTopaka bia a, a tapa adingin ka topa’ behpa’ tanu a la dingin lampi manah kei a hong paipih, ka topa Abraham’ Pasian,Topaka phat hi.TopaTopa
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, ka gamtat nading zia ka theih nadingin ka topa’ tungah hoihtak le thuman takin na gamtat ding uh le na gamtat loh ding uh hong gen un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Laban le Bethuel in dawng a, “Hih thu penTopa’kiang panin hong pai thu ahi hi. A sia ahi zongin a pha ahi zongin nang tungah kong gen ding dang uh om lo hi.Topa’
En in, Rebekah na mai-ah om hi. Amah la inla pai un.Topa’gensa bangin na topa’ tapa’ zi hisak un,” a ci uh hi.Topa’
Abraham’ nasem pa in amau’ kammalte a zak cianginTopa’mai leilakah a kunsuk hi.Topa’
Nasempa in ngun le kham kizepnate le puante hong suah khia-in Rebekah a pia hi. A sanggampa le a nu zong a manpha kizepnate a pia hi.
Tua ciangin amah le a nungzuite in an ne tui dawnin, tua lai-ah tua zan a giak uh hi. Amaute zingsangin a thawh uh ciangin amah in, “Ka topa’ kiangah hong ciahsakkik un,” a ci hi.
Ahi zongin a sanggampa le a nu in, “A tawm penin ni sawm bang, ko tawh numei hong omsak lai in; tua khit ciangin amah hong pai thei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Topain ka maa hong vangsak khin ahih nungsang kei hong zekaisak nawn kei un. Ka topa kiangah ka ciah theih nadingin hong paisak un,” a ci hi.Topa
Amaute in, “A numei samin amah i dong ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amaute in Rebekah samin ama kiangah, “Hih mipa na zui pah ding hiam?” a ci uh hi. Amah in, “Ka zui ding hi,” ci pah hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a sanggamnu uh Rebekah le a cingnu, Abraham’ nasem pa le a nungzuite tawh ciah khiasak uh hi.
Amaute in Rebekah thupha pia-in ama kiangah, “Kote’ sanggamnu aw, a tultul a thenthente’ nu hi ta in. Na suanlekhakte in amau a mudahte’ khuapite luah ta uh hen!” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Rebekah le a numeite dingin, kalaohte tungah tuangin mipa a zui uh hi. Tua bangin nasem pa in Rebekah la-in a pai nading lamah a pai hi.
Tua kikalin, Isaac, Beerlahairoi panin hong pai-in Negeb gamah na teeng hi.
Isaac, thu a lung ngaingai dingin nitakin gamlakah a pai khia hi. Amah a khuadak leh kalaohte hong pai a mu hi.
Rebekah in Isaac a muh ciangin, kalaoh tung panin kumin
nasem pa kiangah, “Hua lai-a mipa, eite hong dawn dingin gamlak a hong pai kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Nasempa in, “Ka topa hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a kikhuhna puan la-in a kikhuh hi.
Nasempa in Isaac kiangah a gamtatnasa khempeuh a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Isaac in a puanbuk sungah Rebekah paipih a, amah pen a zi a suak hi. Amah in tua nu a it hi. Tua ahih manin a nu’ sih khit ciangin Isaac in hehnepna a ngah hi.
Abraham in Keturah min nei zi dang khat la hi.
Amah in tua nu tawh ta Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak le Shuah nei hi.
Jokshan pen Sheba le Dedan’ pa ahi hi. Dedan’ tate: Asshurim, Lethusim le Leummim ahi hi.
Midian’ tate: Efah, Efer, Hanok, Abida le Eldaah ahi hi. Hihte khempeuh, Keturah’ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
Abraham in a neih khempeuh Isaac a pia hi.
Ahih hangin Abraham in a zi dang tawh a tate tungah zong letsong pia a, ama nuntak lai mahin ama tapa Isaac kiang panin nisuahna lam gamah amaute a sawl khia hi.
Abraham, kum za le kum sawmsagih le kum nga a phak ciangin,
a hu tawpna sang a, a teek, kum tampi a pha, a khanghamin si a, ama mite tawh kivui khawm hi.

Ama tapa Isaac le Ishmael in, Abraham in Hit mite’ tung panin a lei, Mamre nisuahna lamah a om, Hit mi Zohar’ tapa Efron’ lo sung, Makpelah leihawm sungah amah a vui uh hi. Tua lai munah a zi Sarah kiangah Abraham kivui hi.
Abraham’ sih khit ciangin Pasian in a tapa Isaac thupha pia hi. Isaac, Beerlahairoi-ah a teeng hi.
Hihte pen, Abraham in Sarah’ sila numei ahi Egypt mi Hagar tawh a neih, Abraham’ tapa Ishmael’ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
Hihte pen a suahna tawh kizui-in Ishmael’ tate’ min ahi hi: Ishmael’ ta upa pen Nebaioth hi a, tua ciangin Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa,
Hadad, Tema, Jetur, Nafish le Kedemah ahi hi.
Hihte pen a khua, a phual, a behin ulian sawm le nihte ahi Ishmael’ tate le amaute’ min ahi hi.
(Ishmael kum za le kum sawmthum le kum sagih a phak ciangin a hu tawpna sang-in si a, a behte tawh kivui khawm hi.)
Amaute, Egypt nisuahna, Assiria lam Havilah panin Shur dongah teeng uh a, amau’ sanggamte khempeuh panin amau tuam ten uh hi.
Hihte pen Abraham’ tapa Isaac’ suanlekhakte ahi hi. Abraham pen Isaac’ pa hi a,
Aram mi Laban’ sanggamnu, Paddanaram gam a Aram mi Bethuel’ tanu Rebekah zi-in a lak lai-in Isaac kum sawmli pha hi.
Isaac inTopa’tungah a zi adingin thu ngen hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ciing hi.Topain ama thungetna pia a, a zi Rebekah gai hi.Topa’Topa
Ama sungah a naute kilaii gawp hi. Amah in, “Hih bang ahihleh bang hangin nungta se ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ahih cianginTopakiangah thukan dingin amah pai hi.Topa
Topain ama kiangah,Topa“Na gil sungah mi nam nih om a,nang’ sung pan a suak mihing nihtekikhen ding hi.Khat pen a khat sangin hat zaw dinga,a u zaw in a nau zaw’ na sem ding hi,”a ci hi.
Amah a suah hun a tun ciangin, a gil sungah tapeeng om hi.
A masa pen a sanin hong suak a, a pumpi khempeuh mul a nei puan tawh kibang hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min dingin Esau phuak uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin a sanggampa hong suak khia a, ama khut in Esau’ khetul len hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min dingin Jakob kiphuak hi. Amau’ suah ciangin Isaac kum sawmguk a pha hi.
Tua naupangte a khan ciangin, Esau pen gam sung mi sabet siam khat hi a, Jakob ahihleh inn-ah om hithiatin a cingkam khat ahi hi.
Isaac in Esau’ sa matsa nene ahih manin Esau mah it zaw a, ahi zongin Rebekah in Jakob it zaw hi.
Khatvei Jakob in meh huanin a om laitakin gamlak a sa betna panin phukhong vei-in Esau hong ciah hi.
Esau in Jakob kiangah, “Gilkialin phukhong vei ka hih manin tua na meh san tawmkhat hong nesak in,” a ci hi. (Tua ahih manin ama min Edom kici hi.)
Jakob in, “Na innluahza hong pia lecin ka meh kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Esau in, “A si ding ka hita hi; kei adingin innluahza bangin kimang ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jakob in, “Kei’ tungah hong kiciam masa in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama tungah Esau kiciam a, Jakob’ tungah a innluahza a zuak hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in an le bemeh Esau a pia hi. Esau in zong an ne-in tui a dawn khit ciangin a pai nading a zuan hi. Tua ahih manin Esau in a innluahza tua ciang bang bekin a ngaihsun ahi hi.
Abraham’ hun lai-a kialpi banah, tu-in tua gam sungah kialpi dang khat tung hi. Filistia mite’ kumpipa Abimelek’ omna Gerar-ah Isaac pai hi.
Ama tungahTopakilang a, “Egypt-ah paisuk kei inla, kong gen ding leitangah teeng in.Topa

Hih leitangah tawlkhat om in. Nang tawh kong omkhawm dinga, thupha kong pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang le na suanlekhakte tungah hih leitangte kong pia dinga, na pa Abraham’ tungah ka thuciam ka tungsak ding hi.

Na suanlekhakte vana aksi bangin tampi ka phasak dinga, na suanlekhakte tungah hih leitang khempeuh ka pia ding hi. Na suanlekhakte thupha ka piak bangin leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngah nadingun hong ngen ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Abraham in ka thu mangin, ka sawlna, ka thupiakna, ka ngeina kip le ka thu zui hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Isaac, Gerar-ah teeng hi.

Tua mun mite in ama zi tawh kisai thu a dot uh ciangin amah in, “Ka sanggamnu hi,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, “Rebekah’ hangin tua gam mite in hong that kha ding ahih ciangin,” ci-in ngaihsun ahih manin, “Ka zi hi,” a cih ding lau hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah ngaihbaang hi.
Tua lai-ah amah sauveipi a om khit ciangin, Filistia mite’ kumpipa Abimelek a tawlet panin khuadak a, Isaac in a zi Rebekah a noh laitak mu kha hi.

Tua ahih manin Abimelek in Isaac samin, “En in, amah na zi ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin bangci-in nang in, ‘Amah ka sanggamnu hi,’ ci thei na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Isaac in ama kiangah, “‘Ama hangin si kha ding ka hih ciangin,’ ci-in ngaihsun ka hihna hang hi,” a ci hi.
Abimelek in, “Ko tungah bangci-a hih bangin hong gamta na hi hiam? Mite khat peuhpeuh na zi tawh lumkhawm pak kha thei dinga, kote’ tungah mawhna hong tun na hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Abimelek in mi khempeuh thu zasak a, “Hih mipa ahi zongin a zi ahi zongin a sukha peuhmah kithat ding hi,” a ci hi.
Isaac in tua leitangah khai tuh a, tua kum mahin a zah zakhat la hi.Topain amah thupha pia a,Topa
a neihsa kibehlaplap ahih manin a hau mahmah khat a suak hi.
Amah in tuuhon le bawnghon le innkuan mi tampi nei a, Filistia mite in amah eng uh hi.
(Ama pa Abraham’ hun lai-a a pa’ nasemte in a tawh tuikhuk khempeuh tu-in Filistia mite in hucipin lei vuk uh hi.)
Abimelek in Isaac kiangah, “Kote’ kiang panin pai khia in. Bang hang hiam cih leh kote sangin nang na vanglian zaw hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua mun panin Isaac pai khia a, Gerar kuam sungah phual satin tua munah a teeng hi.
Isaac in a pa Abraham’ hun lai-a a kitosa tuikhukte to phakik hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Abraham’ sih khit ciangin Filistia mite in tuate vukcip uh hi. Amah in a pa’ phuahsa minte mah phuakkik hi.
Ahih hangin Isaac’ nasemte in tua kuam sung to-in tuikhuk a muh uh ciangin,
Gerar’ gancingte le Isaac’ gancingte kitawng uh a, “Tui, ko a’ hi,” ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua tuikhuk Esek ci-in min a phuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute le amah kitawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in tuikhuk dang khat to uh a, tua tungtangah zong amaute kitawng leuleu uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua pen Sitnah ci-in min a phuak hi.

Tua mun panin amah kinin tuikhuk dang khat to leuleu hi. Tua tungtangah amaute kitawng nawn lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Rehoboth ci-in min a phuak hi. “Bang hang hiam cih leh tu-inTopain eite adingin omna hong bawlsak khin a, eite hih gamah i pung ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua lai mun panin amah Beersheba-ah paito hi.

Tua zan mahin ama tungahTopakilang a, “Kei pen na pa Abraham’ Pasian ka hi hi. Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh ka nasem pa Abraham’ huhau-in nang tawh kong om a, nang le na suanlekhakte thupha hong pia-in kong pungsak ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua lai munah biakna tau khat laminTopabia a, tua munah puanbuk a lam hi. Tua lai-ah Isaac’ nasemte in tuikhuk khat a to uh hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Gerar panin Abimelek a thu lamlak pa Ahuzzath le a galkap mangpa Fikol tawh Isaac kiangah hong pai hi.
Isaac in amaute’ kiangah, “Note in kei hong mudahin note’ kiang panin hong hawl khia na hih uh ciangin bang hangin kei’ kiangah hong hawh na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Amaute in, “Nang tawhTopaa omna teltakin ka mu uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin, kote in nang hong sukha loin, nang’ tungah bangmah hong hih loin, a hoihin gamta-in lungnuam takin kong sawl khiat mah bangun kote’ tungah nang in siatna nong bawl loh nadingin nang le kote’ kikalah kiciamna khat om henla, nang tawh thuciamna khat bawl ni, a ci hi ung. Nang pen tu-inTopa’thupha piak na hi hi,” a ci uh hi.TopaTopa’
Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute adingin pawi khat bawl a, amaute in pawi an ne-in a dawn uh hi.
Zingsangin amaute tho baih uh a, khatlekhat kiciamna a bawl uh hi. Isaac in amaute a lampi ding uhah kha a, ama kiang panin amaute lungnuam takin a pai khia uh hi.
Tua ni mahin Isaac’ nasemte hong pai-in amau’ tawhsa tuikhuk thu ama kiangah hong gen uh a, “Tui ka mu zo uh hi,” hong ci uh hi.
Amah in tua pen Shibah ci-in min phuak hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua khuapi min pen tuni dongin Beersheba kici hi.
Esau kum sawmli a phak ciangin, Hit mi Beeri’ tanu Judith le Hit mi Elon’ tanu Basemath zi-in la hi.
A zi tegel in Isaac le Rebekah’ nuntakna haksasak uh hi.
Isaac teekin a mitte maangin khua a muh theih nawn loh ciangin a ta upa zaw Esau samin ama kiangah, “Ka tapa aw,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Hiah om ing,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “En in, kei ka teek hi. Ka sih ding hun ka thei kei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, na hiamte ahi na thallawng le na thal la inla, gamlakah pai-in kei adingin sa va beng in.
Ka sih ma-in nang thupha kong piak theih nadingin kei’ duh bangin an lim hong bawl inla, ka nek dingin hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
Isaac in a tapa Esau a hopih laitakin Rebekah in na ngaisim hi. Sa bengin a ciahpih dingin Esau gamlakah a kuan ciangin,
Rebekah in a tapa Jakob kiangah, “Na sanggampa Esau’ tungah na pa’ thugen ka za a,
‘Ka sih ma-inTopa’mai-ah nang thupha kong piak theih nadingin ka nek dingin na sa matsa hong paipih inla, kei adingin an lim hong bawl in,’ ci hi.Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka ta aw, kong thupiak bangin gamta in.
Ama duh bangin na pa adingin an lim ka bawl theih nadingin keelhon lakah va pai inla keelno a hoih nih hong paipih in.
Na pa in a sih ma-in nang thupha hong piak theih nadingin a nek dingin na pa kiangah na va paipih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Jakob in a nu Rebekah kiangah, “En in, ka sanggampa Esau pen mulnei mi hi a, kei pen cineel mi ka hi hi.
Ka pa in kei hong lawngkha leh, amah in ka khemna hong thei dinga, kei’ tungah thupha hi loin samsiatna hong tung zawsop ding hi,” a ci hi.
A nu in ama kiangah, “Nangma thuak ding samsiatna kei tungah hong tung tahen, ka ta aw; ka thu hong mang peuh inla, pai-in keelnote kei’ kiangah hong puak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah pai-in keelnote va la-in a nu kiangah paipih a, a pa’ duh bangin a nu in an lim a bawl hi.
Tua ciangin Rebekah in inn-a a kep, ama ta upa zaw Esau’ puan hoih pente la-in a ta nau zaw Jakob a silhsak hi.
Amah in keelnote’ vun ama khut tung le a neelna mun a ngawng sanah silhsak a,
a bawlsa meh lim le an a tapa Jakob a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a pa’ kiangah amah pai a, “Ka pa aw,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing, ka ta aw; kua na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jakob in a pa kiangah, “Na ta upa zaw Esau ka hi hi. Nong gen bangin ka hih khin hi. Kei thupha nong piak theih nadingin tu-in tuto inla, ka sa matsa ne in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Isaac in a tapa’ kiangah, “Ka ta aw, bangci-a hong hici manlan pak na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Topanangma Pasian in kei hong tuahphasak hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Isaac in Jakob kiangah,Topa
“Ka ta aw, ka ta Esau taktak na hi hiam, na hi kei hiam kong lawn theih nadingin ka nai-ah hong pai in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a pa Isaac’ kiangah Jakob pai a, amah lawngin, “A aw, Jakob’ aw hi, ahih hangin a khutte, Esau’ khut hi,” a ci hi.
A khutte in a sanggampa Esau’ khut bangin mul nei ahih manin amah in thei lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in thupha pia dingin kithawi a,
“Ka ta Esau taktak na hi hiam?” ci-in dongkik hi. Amah in dawngin, “Ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Ka tapa nangma sa matsa ne-in thupha kong piak theih nadingin ka kiangah hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a kiangah paipih a, amah in a ne hi. Amah in leenggahzu paipihin, amah in a dawn hi.
Tua ciangin a pa Isaac in ama kiangah, “Ka kiangah hong pai inla hong nam in, ka ta aw,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah a nai-ah hong pai-in a pa a nam hi. Amah in a puan gimnamte nam a, amah thupha pia-in,“En in, ka tapa’ gimnam penTopain thupha a piakTopagamlak gimnam tawh kibang!
Pasian in na tungahvantung daitui hong pia henla,na lote hoihsak tahen.An le leenggahzutampi hong pia tahen.

Mite in nangma na hong sem henla,minamte na mai-ah hong kun ta uh hen.Na sanggamte’ tungah topa hi inla,na sanggamte’ suanlekhakte,na mai-ah hong kun uh hen.Nang hong samsia peuhmah insamsiatna ngah henla,thupha hong pia peuhmah inthupha ngah tahen,”a ci hi.
Isaac in Jakob thupha a piak a man khit, a pa Isaac’ omna panin Jakob a pai khiat khit phetin, a sa betna panin a sanggampa Esau hong tung hi.
Amah in zong an lim bawlin a pa’ kiangah hong paipih hi. Amah in a pa’ kiangah, “Thupha nong piak theih nadingin na tapa’ sa matsa a ne dingin ka pa hong tho in,” a ci hi.
A pa Isaac in ama kiangah, “Kua na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Kei pen na tapa, a suak masa Esau ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Isaac nakpitakin liingin, “Tua ahihleh, nang’ hong pai ma-in sa matsa hong paipihin, a vekin ka nek khit, amah thupha ka piakpa kua ahi hiam? Thupha pia khin ka hih manin amah in thupha ngah ding hi” a ci hi.
Esau in a pa’ kammalte a zak ciangin nakpi tak le nasia takin kiko khia-in a pa’ kiangah, “Kei thupha hong pia in, kei zong, aw ka pa!” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Khemna tawh na sanggampa hong pai-in amah in na thupha la khia khinta hi,” a ci hi.

Esau in, “Amah Jakob kici mah hi lo ahi hiam? Amah in kei nihvei hong suan khia khin hi. Amah in ka innluahza hong sut hi. En in, tu-in amah in ka thupha hong sut leuleu hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei adingin thupha siit lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Isaac in Esau dawngin, “En in, amah nangma’ topa-in ka bawl khin a, a sanggamte khempeuh ama tungah nasemin ka pia khin a, an le leenggahzu tawh amah ka hingsak hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka ta aw, nang adingin bang hih thei nawn ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Esau in a pa’ kiangah, “Pa aw, thupha khat beek nei nawn lo na hi hiam? Kei thupha hong pia in, kei zong, ka pa aw,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Esau a kap hi.
Tua ciangin a pa Isaac in,“En in, leitung pan a piangan le leenggahzu na nei kei dinga,na lo adingin vantung daituitena ngah kei ding hi.
Na namsau tawh na nungta dinga,na sanggampa’ na na sem ding hi.Ahih hangin amah na langpan cianginama khutnuai paninna leeng khia ding hi,”a ci hi.

A pa in amah thupha pia khin ahih manin tua thupha hangin tu-in Esau in Jakob mudah a, Esau in, “Ka pa’ sihna hangin dah nading hun hong nai ta hi. Tua khit ciangin ka sanggampa Jakob ka that ding hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.

Ahih hangin a tapa upa zaw Esau’ ngimna, Rebekah’ tungah kigen hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a ta nau zaw Jakob samin ama kiangah, “En in, na sanggampa Esau in nangmah thah ding vaihawmna tawh amah kihehnem hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka ta aw, ka thu hong mang in. Haran-a ka sanggampa Laban’ kiangah va tai inla,
na sanggampa’ hehna a dam mateng tua lai ama kiangah tawlkhat sung va om in.

Na sanggampa’ sinsona a daih mateng, ama tunga na gamtatna a mangngilh mateng va om in. Tua ciangin mi hong sawlin hih lai munah nang kong lasak ding hi. Bang hangin no tegel tawh nikhat thu-in kei kikhen ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Rebekah in Isaac kiangah, “Esau’ zi Hit numeite’ hangin ka lung gimin ka cimtak hi. Jakob in hih gam numeite khat ahi Hit numeite khat teenpih leh kei adingin bang nuntak tham nawn ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Isaac in Jakob sam a, amah thupha pia-in thuhilh a, “Nang in Kanaan numeite na teenpih kei ding hi.
Kithawi inla, na nu’ pa Bethuel’ inn, Paddanaram-ah pai in. Tua lai munah na nu’ sanggampa Laban’ tanute khat na zi dingin la in.
Nang, mihonpi khat na suah theih nadingin Vanglian Pasian in nang thupha hong pia-in, hong pungsakin, tampi hong phasak hen.
Pasian in Abraham’ tunga a piak, tawlkhat sung na omna leitang na neih theih nadingin nang le na suanlekhakte tungah amah in Abraham’ thupha hong pia tahen!” a ci hi.
Tua bangin Isaac in Jakob sawl khia hi. Jakob le Esau’ nu Rebekah’ sanggampa, Aram mi Bethuel’ tapa Laban’ omna Paddanaram-ah amah a pai hi.
Isaac in Jakob thupha pia-in, zi la dingin Paddanaram-ah sawl a, thupha a piak kawmin amah thuhilhin, “Kanaan numeite na teenpih kei ding hi,” a cihna le,
Jakob in a nu le a pa’ thu mangin Paddanaram-ah a paina thu tu-in Esau in thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Kanaan numeite in a pa lungkimsak lo cih Esau in a theih ciangin,
Ishmael’ kiangah Esau pai-in, ama zi neihsa banah, Nebaioth’ sanggamnu, Abraham’ tapa Ishmael’ tanu Mahalath zi-in a la hi.
Jakob in Beersheba khua nusia-in Haran lamah a pai hi.
Amah mun khat tungin, ni tum khin ahih manin tua lai-ah tua zan a giak hi. Tua mun a suangte khat la-in, amah in lukhamin zang a, a ihmu dingin tua munah a lumsuk hi.
Amah in mang man a, leitungah kahlei khat kiphutin, a kahlei dawn in van ban hi. Pasian’ vantung mite tua kahlei tungah kah to-in a kum suk a mu hi.
En in, tua sanahTopadinga, “Kei pen na pa Abraham’ Pasian le Isaac’ Pasian,Topaka hi hi. Nang le na suanlekhakte’ tungah tu-a na lupna leitang kong pia ding hi.TopaTopa

Na suanlekhakte leilak leivui zah pha dinga, nitumna lam le nisuahna lam, leilu lam le leitaw lamah na kizelthang ding uh hi. Nang le na suanlekhakte thupha kong piak bangin leitung minam khempeuh in thupha a ngah nadingun hong ngen ding uh hi.

En in, keimah in nang hong ompihin na paina peuhah kong kem dinga, hih leitangah nang kong paipihkik ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang’ tunga kong gensa thute ka hih khit matengin nang kong nusia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a ihmutna panin Jakob khang lo a, “Hih lai munahTopaom taktak hi; keimah in tua thu ka thei kei hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Amah lau a, “Hih mun bangzahin lauhuai ahi hiam! Hih pen Pasian’ inn lo adang hi lo a, hih pen vantung lutna kongpi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin Jakob tho baih a, amah in lukhamin a zat suang la-in khuamin phut a, a tungah sathau a sung hi.
Amah in tua mun Bethel ci hi. Ahih hangin a masa-in tua khua min pen Luz ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in thuciamna khat bawlin, “Pasian in kei hong ompih a, hih ka paina lampi-ah kei hong kep a, nek ding an le silh ding puan hong piak a,
lungnuam takin ka pa’ inn-ah ka ciahkik leh,Topapen keima Pasian hi dinga,Topa
khuamin ka phuhsa hih suang pen Pasian’ inn hi ding hi. Keima tungah nangmah in nong piak khempeuh sawm-ah-khat nang’ tungah kong piakik ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in a khualzinna zom a, nisuahna lam mite’ gam a tung hi.
A khuadak leh gamlakah tuikhuk khat a mu hi. Tua gei-ah tuuhon thum na lum hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua tuikhuk panin tuuhonte tui kipia hi. Tuikhuk gong hukna suang lian hi.
Tua lai munah tuuhonte khempeuh a kikaihkhop khit ciangin, tuucingte in tuikhuk gong panin a suang khuk khia uh a, tuute tui pia-in, tuikhuk gong ama omna ngei-ah a suang koihkik uh hi.
Jakob in amaute kiangah, “Sanggamte aw, koi pan a hong pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Haran pan hi ung,” ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Nahor’ tapa Laban na thei uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Thei mah ung,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Amah a cidam hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Dam hi; en in, a tanu Rachel zong a tuuhon tawh hong pai!” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “En un, ni sang lai a, gan kaihkhop hun nai lo hi. Tuute tui pia unla, pai-in an nesak lai un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in, “Tuute kikaikhawm a, tuikhuk gong panin a suang a kikhuk khiat mateng tui ka pia thei kei uh hi. A kikhuk khiat khit ciang bekin tuute tui ka pia thei pan uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua bangin amaute tawh a kiho laitakin, Rachel a pa’ tuute tawh hong tung hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in tuate kem hi.
Tu-in Jakob in a nu’ sanggampa Laban’ tanu Rachel le a nu’ sanggampa Laban’ tuute a muh ciangin paito-in tuikhuk gong panin a suang khuk khia a, a nu’ sanggampa Laban’ tuute tui a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in Rachel nam a, a gingin kap khia hi.
Jakob in Rachel’ kiangah amah pen a pa’ behte hi a, Rebekah’ tapa ahihna zong a kigen hi. Tua ciangin Rachel tai-in a pa’ kiangah a gen hi.
Laban in a sanggamnu’ tapa Jakob’ thu a zak ciangin amah a dawn dingin hong tai a, amah kawi-in nam a, a inn-ah a ciahpih hi. Jakob in Laban’ tungah a thute khempeuh gen a,
Laban in ama kiangah, “Nang pen keima si keima sa na hi takpi hi,” a ci hi. Tua hi a, amah tawh kha khat a omkhawm hi.
Tua ciangin Laban in Jakob’ kiangah, “Nang pen keima beh na hih ciangin, a man nei lopi-in kei’ na hong sem ding na hi hiam? Hong gen in; na thaman ding bang hi ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Tu-in Laban in tanu nih nei hi. A u zaw’ min Leah hi a, a nau zaw’ min Rachel ahi hi.
Leah’ mit-hah nem a, ahih hangin Rachel melhoihin ngaihbaang hi.
Jakob in Rachel ngai hi. Amah in, “Na tanu a nau zaw Rachel thalawh nadingin nangma na kum sagih kong sem ding hi,” a ci hi.
Laban in, “Midang tungah amah ka piak ding sangin nang’ tungah amah kong piak ding hoih zaw hi; kei kiangah om in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in Rachel a ngah nadingin kum sagih sung na sem a, amah a itna hangin tua hunte ni tawmno khat tawh kibang a sa hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in Laban kiangah, “Ka hun cingta ahih ciangin amah tawh ka lupkhop theih nadingin ka zi hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Laban in tua mun a mi khempeuh kaikhawmin pawi khat a bawl hi.
Ahih hangin a nitak ciangin amah in a tanu Leah la-in Jakob kiangah paipih hi. Amah in tua nu luppih hi.
(Laban in ama numei nasem Zilpah a tanu Leah tungah a nasem numei dingin a pia hi.)

A zingsang ciangin, Leah na hi mawk hi. Jakob in Laban kiangah, “Bangci a kei hong hici bawl na hi hiam? Rachel ngah nadingin na na hong sem hi lo ka hi hiam? Tua ahihleh bang hangin kei hong khem na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Laban in, “A u’ ma-in a nau zaw piak ding ko’ gamah ngeina hi lo hi.
Hih nu adingin nipikal khat sung pawi beisak phot inla, adang kum sagih ka na nong sepsak thamanin a khat pen zong kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jakob zong tua bangmahin gamta a, tua nu’ pawi hun sung beisak phot hi. Tua ciangin Laban in a tanu Rachel zong a zi dingin a pia hi.
(Laban in ama nasem numei Bilhah a tanu Rachel’ tungah a nasem numei dingin a pia hi.)
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in Rachel zong luppih a, amah in Leah sangin Rachel it zaw hi. Laban’ na adang kum sagih sung a semlai hi.
Topain Leah a kimuhdahna a theih ciangin, amah in a naubu honsak hi; ahih hangin Rachel ciing hi.Topa
Leah gai-in tapa khat nei a, amah in a min Reuben a phuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Topain ka thuakna hong mu zo hi; tu-in ka pasal in kei hong it taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Amah gaikikin tapa khat nei a, amah in, “Keimah hong kimuhdahna thuTopain za khin ahih manin, amah in hih tapa zong hong pia hi,” ci hi. Amah in a min Simeon a phuak hi.Topa
Amah gai leuleu-in tapa khat nei a, “Amah tawh tapa thum nei ta ka hih manin tu-in ka pasal in kei hong pawl ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Levi a phuak hi.
Amah gai leuleu-in tapa khat nei a, “TuhuninTopaka phat ding hi,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a min Judah a phuak hi. Tua ciangin a ta neih a tawp hi.Topa
Rachel in Jakob tawh ta a neih lohna a kimuh ciangin, amah in a sanggamnu eng hi. Amah in Jakob kiangah, “Ta hong pia in, tua ahih kei leh si ning!” a ci hi.
Rachel’ tungah Jakob heh mahmah a, amah in, “Nang’ tungah ta hong pia lo Pasian’ munah om ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Hih lai-ah ka nasem numei Bilhah om hi. Ka phei tungah ka tawi ding ta hong neih nading le ama sung panin suanlekhak ka neih theih nadingin amah tawh lumkhawm in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a nasem numei Bilhah ama tungah zi-in a pia hi. Jakob in tua nu luppih hi.
Bilhah gai-in Jakob tawh tapa khat nei hi.
Tua ciangin Rachel in, “Pasian in kei’ thu a hoihin hong khen zo a, amah in ka aw zong za zo-in tapa khat hong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a min Dan a phuak hi.
Rachel’ nasem numei Bilhah gaikikin Jakob tawh tapa a nihna nei hi.
Tua ciangin Rachel in, “Nakpi takin hanciamna tawh ka sanggamnu ka zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Naftali a phuak hi.
Leah in ta neih a tawplam a kimuh ciangin, amah in a nasem numei Zilpah la-in Jakob’ tungah zi-in a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Leah’ nasem numei Zilpah in Jakob tawh tapa khat nei hi.
Leah in, “Kaam pha!” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Gad a phuak hi.
Leah’ nasem numei Zilpah in Jakob tawh tapa a nihna nei hi.
Leah in, “Kei lungdam ing! Bang hang hiam cih leh numei dangte in kei a lungdam hong ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Asher a phuak hi.

Mangbuh lak hun laitakin gamlakah Reuben pai-in zawl-ai kungte va mu a, tuate a nu Leah’ kiangah a ciahpih hi. Tua ciangin Rachel in Leah kiangah, “Na tapa’ zawl-ai kungte kimkhat kei hong hawm in, hong thum ing,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Leah in, “Ka pasal nong suh thuneu sa na hi hiam? Ka tapa’ zawl-ai kungte zong hong sut lai ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Rachel in, “Tua ahihleh na tapa’ zawl-ai man dingin tuzanin amah, nang tawh hong lumkhawm thei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Nitakin lo panin Jakob hong ciah ciangin, amah a dawn dingin Leah pai khia a, “Kei’ kiangah hong lum in. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka tapa’ zawl-ai kungte tawh nang kong cial zo hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua zan amah tawh a lumkhawm hi.
Pasian in Leah’ thu ngai a, amah gai-in Jakob tawh tapa a ngana a nei hi.
Leah in, “Ka nasem numei ka pasal tungah pia ka hih manin Pasian in ka thacial hong pia hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Issakhar a phuak hi.
Leah gaikik a, Jakob tawh tapa a gukna a nei hi.

Tua ciangin Leah in, “Pasian in moken hoih kei hong guan hi. Tu-in ka pasal in kei hong pahtawi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah tawh tapa guk ka nei khin hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Zebulun a phuak hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in tanu khat nei a, a min Dinah a phuak hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in Rachel phawk a, Pasian in ama thu ngai-in a naubu honsak hi.
Amah gai-in tapa khat nei a, “Pasian in kei hong kikona teng la khia khinta hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in a min Josef phuak a, “Topain tapa khat hong pia beh hen!” a ci hi.Topa
Rachel in Josef a neih khit ciangin, Jakob in Laban’ kiangah, “Keima inn le ka gamah ka ciahkik theih nadingin kei hong sawl in.
Nang’ tunga kong thalawhsa ka zite le ka tate hong pia inla, hong paisak in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma na kong sepsaksa na thei hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Laban in ama kiangah, “Kei, thu hong gensak dih in.Topain nangma hangin kei thupha hong piakna ka thei hi.Topa
Na thaman ding hong gen lecin kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Jakob in ama kiangah, “Nangma na kong sepsak khitna le keima kep sungin na ganhingte tampi a phakna nang mahmah in na thei hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh kei kong pai ma-in nang in tawm bek na nei a, tu-in tampi takin a khang hi. Ka sepna peuhahTopain nang thupha hong pia hi. Ahih hangin tu-in keima innkuan ading cik ciangin ke’n vaihawm ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.Topa
Amah in, “Nang bang hong pia ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Jakob in, “Bangmah dang nong pia kei ding hi. Hih bangin nong hih nakleh na tuuhonte vakkikin ka kem ding hi.

Tuni-in na tuuhonte khempeuh lakah hong paisak inla, tua sung panin tuu a puang le a gial khempeuh le tuuno a vom khempeuh le keel lak panin a gial le a puang khempeuh hong khen khiasak in; tuate keima thaman hi ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin nang’ tung pan a ka thaman a en dingin nong pai ciangin ka thumanna na hong nung muh ding hi. Keel lakah a puang lo le a gial lo peuhmah le tuuno lakah a vom lo peuhmah, kei kiangah a kimuh zenzen leh, guk-in kiseh pah ding hi,” a ci hi.
Laban in, “Hoih hi! Na cihsa bangin hisak ni,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Laban in tua ni-in keeltal a dung gial le a bem gialte, keelpi a puang le a gialte, a tungah a kang mun a om khempeuh le tuuno a vom khempeuh la khia-in, ama tapate’ kep dingin tuate a koih hi.
Jakob’ kiang panin ni thum paina gamlapi-ah tua ganhonte a paipih hi. Jakob in Laban’ ganhon a omlai teng an a vak hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in poplar kung, almond kung le hiangpa kungte tung pan ciangkhut ding a thak satin la a, a ciangkhutte a kang mun a om dingin kheh a, a ciangkang kangte kidawksak hi.

Amah in a khehsa ciangkangte tuiluang, tuipiakna tuikuang, tuuhonte tui dawn dingin a hong paina mun, tuuhonte’ mai-ah a koih hi. Amaute tui dawn dingin hong pai uh ciangin a nu le a pa omkhawm uh ahih manin,
tuuhonte tua ciangkangte’ mai-ah omkhawm uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tuuhonte in a dung gial, a puang le a gial ta nei uh hi.

Jakob in tuunote khen khia a, tuuhonte’ maitang pen a dung gialte le Laban’ tuuhon sunga a vomte khempeuh’ lam ngasak hi. Amah in ama’ tuuhonte a tuamin koih khia-in, Laban’ tuuhonte tawh koihkhawm lo hi.
Tuuhon sung panin a thahat zawte a huk ciangin, amaute tua ciangkangte lakah a gai theih nadingin Jakob in tuuhonte’ muhna, tuiluang sungah a ciangkangte a koih hi.
Ahih hangin tuuhon a ginalote’ mai-ah tua ciangkangte koih lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin a ginalo zawte Laban a’ hi a, a thahat zawte Jakob-a’ ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob a hauhna nakpitakin khang a, tuuhon lianpi, nasem numei, nasem pasal, kalaoh le late a nei hi.
Laban’ tapate in, “Jakob in i pa-a’ khempeuh la khin a, i pa’ neihsa tung panin amah in hih hauhna ngah hi,” a cihna thu tu-in Jakob in za hi.
Laban in nidang bangin maipha tawh amah a don lohna Jakob in mu hi.
Tua cianginTopain Jakob’ kiangah, “Na pate le na behte’ gamah ciahkik in, nang kong ompih ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in mi sawlin ama tuuhon a omna gamlakah Rachel le Leah samsakin
amaute kiangah, “Na pa un nidang bangin maipha tawh kei hong don lohna ka mu hi. Ahih hangin ka pa’ Pasian in kei hong ompih hi.
Ka tha neih khempeuh tawh na pa’ na ka sepna na thei uh hi.
Ahi zongin na pa un kei hong khemin, ka thaman sawmvei khelkhin a, ahih hangin kei hong gimsak ding Pasian in phal lo hi.

Amah in, ‘A gialte na thaman hi ding hi,’ ci leh tua ciangin tuuhon khempeuh in a gial ta hong nei hi. Amah in, ‘A dung gialte na thaman hi ding hi,’ ci leh tua ciangin tuuhon khempeuh in a dung gial ta hong nei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in na pa’ ganhing khempeuh la khia-in tuate keima tungah hong pia zo hi.
“Ganhonte ta nei dingin a kikholh hunin ka khuadak to a, a honte’ tunga a diang keeltal khempeuh a dung gial, a bem gial, a puangin a omna ka mangin ka mu hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian’ vantungmi in ka mang sungah, ‘Jakob,’ hong ci a, ke’n, ‘Hiah om ing!’ ka ci hi.
Amah in, ‘Khuadak to inla en in, a honte’ tunga a diang keelte khempeuh dung gial, bem gialin puang uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Laban in nang’ tunga hong bawlna ka mu khin hi.

Kei pen, nang in khuam khat sathau nuhin kei’ tungah thuciamna nong bawlna mun Bethel Pasian ka hi hi. Tu-in kithawi inla, hih gam panin pai khia-in, na suahna gamah ciahkik in,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Rachel le Leah in amah dawngin, “I pa’ inn sungah ei’ tanh ding ahi a, ei’ luah ding ahi zongin bang om ahi hiam?
Amah in eite gamdangmi bangin hong ngaihsun hi lo ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in eite hong zuak khin a, eite ading hong kipia sum amah in zang mang khin hi.
I pa’ tung panin Pasian in a lak khiatsa neihsa khempeuh eite le i tate a’ ahi hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, nang’ tunga Pasian’ hong cih peuhpeuh hih in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob kithawi-in a tapate le a zite kalaohte tungah a tuangsak hi.
Amah in a ganhing khempeuh, a ngahsa a bawng khempeuh, Paddanaram gam sunga a ngah ama neihsa ganhing khempeuh, a pa Isaac’ omna Kanaan gamah a paipih dingin a hawl khia hi.
Laban a tuumul met dingin a pai khia hi a, Rachel in a pa’ inn sung pasian-te na gu hi.
Jakob in Aram mi Laban khem a, tai ding a sawmna amah in gen lo hi.
Amah a neihsa khempeuh tawh tai-in, Eufratis gun kantan a, Gilead gam mual tung lam a manawh hi.
Jakob tai hi, ci-in a ni thum ni-in Laban’ tungah a kigen ciangin,
amah in a behte zawnin ni sagih sung amah delh a, Gilead gam mualtungah amah pha dekdek uh hi.
Ahih hangin Aram mi Laban kiangah zanin mang sungah Pasian hong pai-in ama kiangah, “Jakob’ tungah a pha hitaleh a sia hitaleh kam khat beek na pau loh nadingin kidawm in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Laban in Jakob pha hi. Tu-in Jakob in mual tung khatah a puanbuk na lam a, Laban le a behte in Gilead gam mualtungah phual a sat uh hi.
Laban in Jakob kiangah, “Nang in kei hong khemin, galmat bangin ka tanute bang hangin pai khiatpih na hi hiam?
Bang hangin tai simin kei hong khem a, hong gen lo na hi hiam? Tuaci gamtat kei lecin, lungdamna le lasakna, khuang le laiza tawh kong kha ding hi.
Bang hangin ka tapate le ka tanute mangpha khakna hong namsak lo na hi hiam? Tu-in na hai gamtat khin hi.
Nang kong siatsak ding keima thu ahi hi. Ahih hangin na pa’ Pasian in zan zanin kei kiangah thu hong gen a, ‘Jakob tungah a pha hitaleh a sia hitaleh na gen ding kidawm in,’ hong ci hi.
Tu-in nang in na pa’ inn nakpitakin lunggulh na hih manin na pai khia khinta hi. Ahih hangin bang hangin ka pasian-te gu na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Jakob in Laban dawngin, “Kei’ kiang panin na tanute thahat thu-in nong suh khak ding ka launa hang ahi hi.

Na pasian-te na muhna mi peuhpeuh kithat tahen! I behte’ muhna-ah nang a’ ahi na khat peuhpeuh kei’ neihsa lakah a om leh kawk khia-in la in,” a ci hi. Rachel in Laban’ pasian-te a na guklam Jakob in thei kha lo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Laban, Jakob’ puanbuk, Leah’ puanbuk le nasem numei nihte’ puanbuk sungah pai a, ahih hangin amah in tuate mu lo hi. Leah’ puanbuk panin amah pai khia-in Rachel’ puanbuk sungah a lut hi.
Rachel in inn sung pasian-te na gu a, kalaoh tutphah sungah koihin, tuate’ tungah na tu hi. Laban in puanbuk sungteng khempeuh zawt a, ahih hangin tuate mu lo hi.

Amah in a pa kiangah, “Nang’ mai-ah hong ding thei lo ka hih manin ka topa heh kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh numei ngeina nin ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in mundang khempeuh zong a, ahih hangin a inn sung pasian-te mu zo lo hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob a heh suak a, Laban mawhsakin, “Ka mawhna bang ahi hiam? Nasia takin kei nong delh nadingin ka khialhna bang ahi hiam?
Ka van khempeuh na thawi khit hangin na inn sung nate mu na hi hiam? Ei tegel kikalah amaute in thu a khen theih nadingin keima behte le nangma behte’ mai-ah, na muh a om leh hong koih khia in.
Hih kum sawmnih sung nang kiangah kong om khin hi. Na tuupi le na keelpite tatolh nai lo a, na tuuhonte’ sung pan tuutal sa ka ne kei hi.
Gamlak ganhingte’ balzante, nang’ kiangah kong puak kei hi. Tua banga supnate kei mahmah in ka thuak hi. Sun-a kigu hitaleh zan a kigu hitaleh kei nong lohsak hi.
Kei pen tu-a bang ka hi hi. Sunin a sa in hong kaang a, zanin a vot in hong tawp a, ka ihmu ngei kei hi.
Hih kum sawmnih sung na inn sungah kong om khin hi. Na tanu nihte, kum sawm le kum li sung kong thalawh a, na tuuhonte, kum guk sung kong thalawh a, nangmah in ka thaman sawmvei na kheel hi.

Ka pa’ Pasian, Abraham’ Pasian le Isaac’ Zahtak pa in kei hong ompih lo hileh, tu-in nangmah in khut hawmguakin kei nong sawl khia taktak ding hi. Pasian in ka thuakna le ka nasepna mu a, zan zanin nang hong thuhilh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Laban in dawngin Jakob kiangah, “Tanute pen keima tanu hi; naupangte zong keima naupang hi; tuuhonte, keima tuuhon hi a, na muh khempeuh keima-a’ ahi hi. Ahih hangin tuni-in hih ka tanute hitaleh amau’ sung pan a piang naupangte’ tung hitaleh ke’n bang cih thei ding ka hi hiam?
Tu-in hong pai in, nang le kei in thuciamna khat bawl ni; suangcian khat bawlin nang le kei’ kikalah teci hisak ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in suang khat la-in khuamin a phut hi.
Jakob in a behte kiangah, “Suang khawm un,” ci a, amaute in suang la-in suangcian khat a bawl uh hi. Tua suangcian gei-ah amaute in an a ne khawm uh hi.
Laban in, Jegarsahadutha, ci hi. Ahih hangin Jakob in, Galeed, ci hi.
Laban in, “Hih suangcian pen tuni-in nang le kei’ kikalah teci ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in, Galeed, ci-in min phuak a,
a khuam pen Mizpah, ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Laban in, “Eite khatlekhat i tuam om cianginTopain nang le kei’ kikalah hong encik tahen.Topa
Ka tanute na bawl siat a, ka tanute’ banah zi na lak beh leh, eite tawh kuamah a om loh hangin nang le kei’ kikalah, Pasian, teci ahihna phawk in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Laban in Jakob’ kiangah, “Nang le kei’ kikalah ka phuhsa hih suangcian mu in.

Siatna a bawl dingin keimah in hih suangcian khengin nang kiangah kong pai loh nading, nang zong hih suangcian le khuam khengin kei kiangah nong pai loh nadingin hih suangcian le suangkhuam, teci ahi hi.
Abraham’ Pasian le Nahor’ Pasian, amau’ pate’ Pasian in eite’ kikalah thu khen tahen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in ama pa Isaac’ Zahtak pa tawh a kiciam hi.
Jakob in mualtungah biakpiakna pia-in an ne dingin a behte a sam hi. Amaute in an ne uh a, zan tawntung mualtungah a om uh hi.
Zingsang tungin Laban tho-in, a tute le a tanute namin amaute thupha a piak khit ciangin pai khia-in a inn-ah a ciahkik hi.
Jakob zong ama lampi-ah paisuak a, Pasian’ vantung mite in amah na dawn hi.
Jakob in amaute a muh ciangin amah in, “Hihte, Pasian’ galkapte!,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun pen Mahanaim, ci-in min a phuak hi.
Jakob in Edom gam, Seir leitangah a om a sanggampa Esau kiangah kamtaite ma sawl a,
amaute hilhin, “Note in ka topa Esau kiangah hih bangin na ci ding uh hi: Na nasem pa Jakob in, ‘Laban’ kiangah peemta-in tu ciang dong ka om hi.
Keimah in bawngtal, la, tuuhon, nasem pasal le nasem numeite ka nei hi. Na mai-ah maipha ka muh theih nadingin ka topa tungah a gen dingin kong sawl hi, ci hi’, ci un,” a ci hi.
Kamtaite, Jakob kiangah hong ciahkik uh a, “Na sanggampa Esau kiangah ka va pai uh hi. Nangmah a dawn dingin amah hong pai a, amah tawh mihing zali om hi,” ci-in hong gen uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob nakpitakin lau-in lungkham hi. Amah in ama kiang a om mite, tuuhonte, bawnghonte le kalaohte pawl nihin khen a,
“Pawlkhat ah Esau pai-in a suksiat leh a pawlkhat suakta ding hi,” ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
Jakob in, “Ka pu Abraham’ Pasian le ka pa Isaac’ Pasian, keima kiangah, ‘Na gam le na behte kiangah ciahkik in; nang’ tungah hoihna kong bawl ding hi,’ hong ciTopaaw,Topa

kei pen na itna kip khempeuh lak pan a neu pen le na nasem pa tunga nong lahsa na thumannate khempeuh tawh ka kilawm kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka ciangkhut guak tawh hih Jordan ka kantan a, ahi zongin tu-in pawl nih ka cing khinta hi.
Ka sanggampa Esau’ khut sung pan kei hong khah khia in, kong thum hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah hong pai-in kote khempeuh, numeite, naupangte tawh hong thah khit khak ding ka lau hi.
Ahih hangin nangmah in, ‘Na tungah hoihna kong bawl dinga, na suanlekhakte tuipi sehnel zahin a honpi a kisim thei loin ka bawl ding hi,’ nong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah tua zanin tua lai-ah giak a, ama neih sung panin a sanggampa Esau ading letsong
keelpi zanih le keeltal sawmnih, tuupi zanih le tuutal sawmnih,
kalaoh nawisuk sawmthum le a note, bawngpi sawmli le bawngtal sawm, lapi sawmnih le latal sawm a la hi.
Amah in hihte a nasemte’ khut sungah amau’ hon ciatin pia a, ama nasemte kiangah, “Ka mai-ah na paisuak unla, hon khat le hon khat kikal kihalsak un,” a ci hi.
Amah in a masa pente tungah thu hilh a, “Ka sanggampa Esau in note hong dawnin, ‘Kua-a’ na hi uh hiam? Koi pan a hong pai na hi uh hiam? Na mai uha om hihte kua-a’ ahi hiam?’ ci-in hong dot ciangin
note in, ‘Na nasem pa Jakob-a’ ahi hi. Hihte pen ka topa Esau’ tungah letsongin hong kipuak ahi hi. Tua tham loin amah ka nung uhah om hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.
Amah in tua mah bangin a nihna, a thumna le ganhing honte a zuite khempeuh kiangah, “Amah tawh na kituah uh ciangin Esau’ kiangah a kibang mahin na gen ding uh hi.

Note in, ‘Tua tham loin na nasem pa Jakob ka nung uhah om hi,’ na ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Ka mai-ah a pai letsong tawh amah ka lungdamsak zo kha dinga, tua khit ciangin ama maipha ka mu ding hi. Amah in kei hong sang kha ding hi,” ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
Tua ahih ciangin letsong a piak dingte, ama mai-ah paisak a, amah ahihleh tua zanin giahphual ah a giak lai hi.
Tua zan mahin amah tho-in a zi nihte, a nasem numei nihte le a ta sawm le khatte la-in, Jabbok ngahmun a kantan hi.
Amah in amaute la-in lui galkhat ah puak a, tua mah bangin a neih khempeuh zong a galkahsak hi.
Jakob amah guak bek omlai a, zingsang khuavak dong mi khat in amah a laii hi.
Tua mipa in Jakob a zawh lohna a theih ciangin amah in a khelkom sung suksak hi. Tua bangin amah tawh a kilaiina-in Jakob’ khelguh a kilawi hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Khua vak ta ahih ciangin hong khah in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin Jakob in, “Kei, thupha nong piak kei leh kong khah kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Na min bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Jakob,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Na min Jakob, kici nawn loin Israel, kici ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian le mite tawh na kilaii khinzo a, na zo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in amah dongin, “Na min hong gen in, hong thum ing,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “Bang hanga ka min hong dong na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua lai-ah amah in Jakob thupha a pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in tua mun pen Peniel, ci-in min a phuak hi. “Bang hang hiam cih leh maitang kituahin Pasian ka mu khin a, ahi zongin kei hong kihing khawi lai hi,” a ci hi.
A khelpi’ hangin amah bai kawmin Peniel a kantan laitakin ni hong suak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tuni dongin Israel mite in khelkom tunga a om khel thagui ne lo uh hi. Amah in Jakob’ khelkom, a khel thagui tung a sukna hang ahi hi.
Jakob khuadak a, Esau tawh mihing zali hong pai a mu hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Leah, Rachel le nasem numei nihte’ lakah a naupangte a khen hi.
Amah in nasem numeite le a tate masa sakin, tua ciangin Leah le a tate, tua ciangin Rachel le Josef a nunung penin a koih hi.
Amah ahihleh amaute’ mai-ah pai-in, a sanggampa’ kiang nai a tun matengin leilakah sagihvei a kun hi.
Ahih hangin amah a dawn dingin Esau hong tai-in, amah ngawng kawi a, pomcipin nam a, amaute a kap uh hi.
Esau khuadak to-in nupite le naupangte a muh ciangin amah in, “Nang tawh a om hihte kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Jakob in, “Pasian in hehpihna tawh na nasem pa a piak tate ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin nasem numeite in hong naih uh a, amau le a tate hong kun uh hi.
Leah le a tate in zong tua bangmahin hong naihin a kun uh hi. A nunung penin Josef le Rachel in hong naihin a kun uh hi.
Esau in, “Ka kituahpih hih a honte khempeuh bang na cihnopna ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Jakob in dawngin, “Ka topa’ maipha zon nading,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Esau in, “A kicing nei ing, sanggam aw; nang’ neihte nangma adingin kem in,” a ci hi.

Jakob in, “Hi lo hi, nang’ tungah hong thum ing. Na muhna-ah maipha ngah ka hih leh ka khut sung panin ka letsongte hong sang in. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih banga maipha tawh kei nong sanna, na maitang ka muh ding pen Pasian’ maitang muh tawh kibang taktak hi.

Nang’ kiang a hong kipaipih ka letsong nong san nadingin hong thum ing. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in kei hong hehpih mahmah a, a kicing ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Tua bangin amah in kun teitei ahih manin Esau in zong a sang hi.
Tua ciangin Esau in, “Tu-in paikhawm ni. Na mai-ah kei ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Jakob in ama kiangah, “Naupangte a hat lohna ka topa in na thei hi. Tuuhonte le bawngte, a nongek neite ka lungphamawh hi. Ni khat sung kinak hawl lua leh ganhonte khempeuh si ding uh hi.
Na nasem pa’ mai-ah ka topa na pai inla, Seir-ah ka topa’ kiang kong tun matengin ka mai-a om ganhingte’ thahatna le naupangte’ hatna tawh kituakin damdamin kong makaih ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Esau in, “Kei tawh a om mite pawlkhat, nang’ kiangah hong nusia ning,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in, “A kisapna bang om ahi hiam? Ka topa’ muhna-ah kei maipha hong ngahsak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Esau in tua ni-in ama lampi zui-in Seir-ah a ciahkik hi.
Ahih hangin Jakob, Sukkoth lamah pai a, ama ading inn le a ganhingte ading hampheng a lam hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun a min Sukkoth, kici hi.
Paddanaram panin hong pai lampi, Kanaan gam sunga om Shekhem khuapi-ah lungmuang takin Jakob hong tunga, a khuapi kiangah phual a sat hi.
Amah in Shekhem’ pa Hamor’ innkuante’ tung panin a puanbuk lamnasa leitang dangka zakhat tawh a lei hi.
Tua lai-ah amah in biakna tau khat bawl a, El-Elohe-Israel, ci-in min a phuak hi.
Ni khat, Jakob le Leah’ tanu Dinah tua gam numeite kiangah va hawh hi.
Hiv mi Hamor’ tapa Shekhem, tua gam ulianpa in amah a muh ciangin, amah manin luppih a, amah siasak hi.
Amah in Jakob’ tanu Dinah hoihsa mahmah ahih manin itin kamkhum takin hopih hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Shekhem in a pa Hamor’ kiangah, “Hih numei ka zi dingin hong laksak in,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Jakob in a tanu Dinah a kisiatsakna za hi. Ahih hangin a tate, a ganhingte tawh gamlakah om ahih manin amaute hong tun matengin Jakob in bangmah gen loin om hi.
Shekhem’ pa Hamor, Jakob tawh a kimu dingin ama kiangah va pai hi.

Jakob’ tapate in tua thu a zak uh ciangin gamlak panin hong ciah uh hi. Amaute lungkim loin heh mahmah uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Jakob’ tanu tawh a lupkhop manin amah in Israel mite’ sungah a kilawm lo hai gamtatna hong tun hi.
Ahih hangin Hamor in amaute tawh thu gen a, “Ka tapa Shekhem in na tanu ngai mahmah hi. A teenpih dingin nong piak nadingin kong thum hi.
Kote tawh kiteenna hong bawl un. Na tanute uh kote’ tungah hong pia unla, no adingin ka tanute uh la un.
Kote’ lakah nong teeng ding uh hi. No adingin leitang hong kipia ding hi. Ka gam sung uhah teengin sum bawl unla, neihsa lam un,” a ci hi.
Shekhem in a numei’ pa le a numei’ sanggamte’ kiangah, “Note’ mai-ah maipha hong musak unla, kei’ tunga nong cih peuhpeuh uh kong pia ding hi.
Kei kiang panin moman le letsong tampi hong ngen un. Kei’ tunga nong nget zahzah uh kong pia ding hi. Zi dingin a numei hong pia hoh un,” ci thuah lai hi.
Shekhem in a sanggamnu uh Dinah siasak khin ahih manin Jakob’ tapate in Shekhem le a pa Hamor khemna tawh dawng uh hi.
Amaute in amau kiangah, “Vun ki-at lopa’ tungah ka sanggamnu uh ka piak ding uh ka ngaihsun thei kei uh hi. Tua bangin pia le ung ko adingin mindaina hi ding hi.
Hih bangin nong gamtat uhleh ka thukim bek ding uh hi: Note’ sung panin pasal khempeuh vun ki-at le-uhcin kote mah bang na suak ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin ka tanute uh note’ tungah hong pia-in, na tanute uh kote adingin kong la ding uh a, note tawh kote hong teengin mikhat i suak ding hi.
Ahih hangin note in ka thu uh hong ngai loin, vun na ki-at kei uhleh, ka tanu uh ka la ding uh a, kote ka pai khia ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amau’ thugente in Hamor le Hamor’ tapa Shekhem lungdamsak hi.
Tangvalpa in Jakob’ tanu deih ahih manin tua banga a gamtat ding zekai lo hi. Amah pen, a kipahtawi a thupi pen khat ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Hamor le a tapa Shekhem, amau’ khua kulhpi kongpi-ah hong pai-in a khuapih mite uh kiangah thu gen a,

“Hih mite, eite’ tungah hong nop mahmah uh hi. I gam sungah teengsakin sum bawlsak ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh en un, amau ading a kicing dingin i leitang a zai hi. Amau’ tanute zi-in teenpih ni. Eite’ tanute zong amau pia ni.
Hih thu khat bek tawh eite tawh tenkhop ding, mikhat suah ding amau thukim uh hi. Amaute vun a ki-at bangin eite’ lakah pasal khempeuh vun ki-at ding ahi hi.
Amau’ bawngte, amaute’ neihsate le amau’ ganhingte khempeuh ei ading hi lo ahi hiam? Amaute tawh eite thukim hoh ni. Tua hileh amaute, eite tawh hong teeng khawm ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Khuapi kulhkongpi-ah a pai mi khempeuh in Hamor le a tapa Shekhem’ thu a mang uh hi. Khuapi kulhkongpi-ah a hong pai pasal khempeuh a vun ki-at uh hi.
A ni thum ni, amaute meima vei-in a om laitakun Jakob’ tapa nihte Simeon le Levi, Dinah’ sanggamte in amau’ namsau la-in theih kholh lohin khuapi va sim uh a, pasal khempeuh a that uh hi.
Amaute in Hamor le a tapa Shekhem, namsau tawh that uh a, Shekhem’ inn sung panin Dinah la khia-in a pai khia uh hi.
Jakob tapa dangte in a kithat mite’ tungtawnin khuapi susia uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a sanggamnu uh kisiasak hi.
Amaute in a tuuhonte le a bawnghonte, a late le khuapi sunga om peuhmah le lo sunga om peuhmah a laksak uh hi.
Amau’ neihsa khempeuh, a naupangte khempeuh, a zite khempeuh le inn sunga om na khempeuh laksak uh a, amau’ neihsa a suaksak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jakob in Simeon le Levi’ kiangah, “Hih leitangah a teeng, Kanaan mite le Perez mite tungah kei a muhdahhuai-in nong bawlna uh tawh kei’ tungah haksatna nong tun uh hi. Kei’ pawl mite tawm hi. Amaute kei’ langah hong kikaikhawmin kei hong sim leh, kei le ka innkuanpihte hong susia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in, “Amah in ka sanggamnu uh numei paktat bangin a bawl ding kilawm ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Pasian in Jakob kiangah, “Kithawi-in Bethel-ah paito inla, tua lai-ah teeng in. Na sanggampa Esau’ kiang panin na tai hun lai-a nang’ tungah a hong kilang Pasian adingin biakna tau khat bawl in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in a innkuanpihte le amah tawh a omte khempeuh kiangah, “Note lakah a om gamdang pasian-te koih khia unla, nomau kisiansuahin, na puante uh khek un.
Ka lungkham hunin hong huhin, ka paina khempeuh ah a hong ompih Pasian adingin biakna tau khat ka bawl theih nadingin eite kipanin Bethel-ah paito ni,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Jakob’ tungah amau’ neih gamdang pasian khempeuh le a bil uha om bilbahte a pia uh hi. Jakob in Shekhem khua gei-a tawsaw nuai-ah tuate a seel hi.
Jakob le a tapate khualzinin a pai laitakun amau’ kiima om khuapite’ tungah Pasian’ kiang panin lauhuaina lianpi khat tung ahih manin amaute in Jakob le a tapate delh lo uh hi.
Kanaan gam sunga om Luz (Bethel)-ah Jakob le amah tawh a om mi khempeuh tung uh a,
tua lai-ah amah in biakna tau khat lamin, tua mun Elbethel, ci-in min a phuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a sanggampa kiang panin a tai lai-in tua munah ama tungah Pasian mahmah kilang hi.
Tua ciangin Rebekah a cingnu Deborah si a, Bethel khang tawsaw nuai-ah amah kivui hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun min pen Allonbakuth, kici hi.
Paddanaram panin amah hong pai ciangin Jakob’ tungah Pasian kilangkik a, amah thupha a pia hi.
Pasian in ama kiangah, “Na min Jakob ahi hi. Ahi zongin tu-a kipanin nangma min pen Jakob kici nawn lo dinga, Israel, hong kici ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Israel, kici hi.
Pasian in ama kiangah, “Kei pen Vanglian Pasian ka hi hi: Pung inla, tampi pha in. Minam khat le minamte honkhat nang’ sung panin piang dinga, nang’ sung panin kumpite zong piang ding hi.
Abraham le Isaac tunga ka piak leitang nangma tungah kong pia dinga, nang’ khit cianga na suanlekhakte’ tungah tua leitang ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah tawh a kihona mun ama kiang panin Pasian pai khia to hi.
Jakob in amah tawh a kihona munah suang khuam khat phut a, amah in tua tungah leenggahzu tawh biakpiakna a sung khia hi. Tua tungah sathau zong a sung hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jakob in, Pasian in amah a hopihna mun, a min Bethel, a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Bethel panin amaute ding khia uh a, Efrath panin a gamla sim lai mun a tun laitakun Rachel a nausuah hun tunga, amah nakpi takin a gim hi.
Amah a gim mahmah laitakin naudom nu in ama kiangah, “Lunghimawh kei in. Tu-in tapa dang khat na nei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah a bei laitakin amah in a min dingin Benoni, a ci hi. Ahih hangin a pa in ama min Benjamin, ci-in a phuak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Rachel si-in, Efrath (Bethlehem) paina lampi-ah kivui a,
Jakob in ama han tungah mualsuang khat a phut hi. Tua pen tuni dongin tua lai mahah a om Rachel’ han mualsuang khuam ahi hi.
Israel in a khualzin zomlai a, Eder tausang galkhat ah a puanbuk a lam hi.
Tua gamah Israel a ten laitakin Reuben in a pa’ zineu Bilhah luppih hi. Israel in tua thu za-in heh mahmah hi. Tu-in Jakob’ tapate, sawm le nih ahi hi.
Leah’ tapate: Reuben (Jakob’ ta u pen), Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakhar le Zebulun ahi hi.
Rachel’ tapate: Josef le Benjamin ahi hi.
Rachel’ nasem numei Bilhah’ tapate: Dan le Naftali ahi hi.
Leah’ nasem numei Zilpah’ tapate: Gad le Asher ahi hi. Hihte pen Paddanaram gamah ama sunga suak Jakob’ tapa sawm le nihte ahi hi.
Abraham le Isaac tawlkhat a omna Mamre, ahih kei leh Kiriatharba (Hebron)-a a pa Isaac a omna-ah Jakob hong pai hi.
Tu-in Isaac’ khansung, kum za le kum sawmgiat ahi hi.
Isaac in a nunung pen a hu sang hi. Amah a teek, kum tampi a pha-in si a, ama mite’ kiangah kigawm hi. Ama tapa Esau le Jakob in amah a vui uh hi.
Hihte pen Esau (Edom) suanlekhakte ahi hi.
Esau in Kanaan numeite zi-in la hi. Hit mi Elon’ tanu Adah, Hiv mi Zibeon’ tapa Anah’ tanu Oholibamah,
le Nebaioth’ sanggamnu, Ishmael’ tanu Basemath ahi hi.
Adah in Esau tawh Elifaz nei a, Basemath in Reuel nei hi.
Oholibamah in Jeush, Jalam le Korah nei hi. Hihte pen Kanaan gam sunga a neih Esau’ tapate ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Esau in a zite, a tapate, a tanute le ama innkuan sunga mi khempeuh; a bawngte, a ganhingte khempeuh; le Kanaan gam sunga a lam a neihsa khempeuh la-in a sanggampa Jakob kiang panin gamdang khatah pai khia hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ten khop theih dingin amau’ neihsate tam lua a, a ganhingte uh hangin tawlkhat a omna uh leitang in amaute vak zo lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Seir mual tung gamah Esau teeng hi. Esau’ min dang khat pen Edom ahi hi.
Hihte pen Seir mual tung gam a Edom mite’ pupi Esau’ suanlekhakte ahi hi.
Esau’ tapate: Esau’ zi Adah’ tapa Elifaz, Esau’ zi Basemath’ tapa Reuel ahi hi.
Elifaz’ tapate: Teman, Omar, Zefo, Gatam le Kenaz ahi hi.
(Timna pen Esau’ tapa Elifaz’ zineu hi a, amah in Elifaz tawh Amalek nei hi.) Hihte pen Esau’ zi Adah’ tapate ahi hi.
Reuel’ tapate: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah le Mizzah ahi hi. Hihte pen Esau’ zi Basemath’ tapate ahi hi.
Esau’ zi, Zibeon’ tapa Anah’ tanu Oholibamah tapate: Jeush, Jalam le Korah ahi hi.
Esau’ suante hih bang ahi hi. Esau’ ta masa Elifaz’ tate: Teman, Omar, Zefo, Kenaz,
Korah, Gatam le Amalek ahi hi. Hihte pen Edom gam sungah Elifaz’ suante hi a, Esau’ zi Adah’ sunga piangte ahi hi.
Esau’ tapa Reuel’ tapate: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah le Mizzah hi a, Edom gam sungah a om Reuel’ suante ahi hi. Amaute pen Esau’ zi Basemath’ sung panin a piangte ahi hi.
Esau’ zi Oholibamah’ tapate: Jeush, Jalam le Korah ahi hi. Hihte pen Esau’ zi, Anah’ tanu Oholibamah’ sung panin a piangte ahi hi.
Hihte pen Esau (Edom) suante hi a, amaute’ sung pan beh lutangte ahi uh hi.
Tua gam a teeng Hori mi Seir’ tapate: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah,
Dishon, Ezer le Dishan hi a, Edom gam sunga Seir’ suante ahi Hori mite’ sung pan beh lutang ahi uh hi.
Lotan’ tapate: Hori le Heman ahi hi. Lotan’ sanggamnu Timna ahi hi.
Shobal’ tapate: Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Shefo le Onam ahi hi.
Zibeon’ tapate: Ai-ah le Anah ahi hi. Amah pen a pa Zibeon’ late a cin laitakin gamlakah a sa ciktui a mu pa Anah ahi hi.
Anah’ tate: Dishon le Anah’ tanu Oholibamah ahi hi.
Dishon’ tapate: Hemdan, Eshban, Ithran le Kheran ahi hi.
Ezer’ tapate: Bilhan, Zaavan le Akan ahi hi.
Dishan’ tapate: Uz le Aran ahi hi.
Hori mite’ beh lutangte: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah,
Dishon, Ezer le Dishan ahi hi. Hihte pen Seir gam sungah amau’ beh ciatin Hori mite’ sung pan beh lutang ahi uh hi.
Hihte pen Israel mite tungah kumpi khat beek in a uk ma-in Edom gam sunga kumpite ahi hi.
Beor’ tapa Bela in Edom gam sung uk a, ama khuapi min Dinhabah ahi hi.
Bela si a, Bozrah khua mi Zerah’ tapa Jobab in ama tangin a uk hi.
Jobab si a, Teman mite’ gammi Husham in ama tangin a uk hi.
Husham si a, Moab gam sungah Midian mite a zo Bedad’ tapa Hadad in ama tangin uk a, ama khuapi min Avith ahi hi.
Hadad si a, Masrekah khua mi Samlah in ama tangin uk hi.
Samlah si a, Eufratis gun gei-a Rehoboth khua mi Shaul in ama tangin a uk hi.
Shaul si a, Akbor’ tapa Baalhanan in ama tangin a uk hi.
Akbor’ tapa Baalhanan si a, Hadar in ama tangin uk a, ama khuapi min Pau ahi hi. Ama zi’ min Mehetabel hi a, Mezahab’ tanu Matred, Matred tanu Mehetabel ahi hi.
Amau’ innkuan le a tenna, amau’ min tawh kizui-in, Esau’ suan sung pan minamte’ min: Timna, Alvah, Jetheth,
Oholibamah, Elah, Pinon,
Kenaz, Teman, Mibzar,
Magdiel le Iram ahi hi. Hihte in amau’ neih, amau’ tenna leitang min dingin amau’ min mah vawh pah uh a, Esau’ suan, Edom mi a kicite ahi uh hi.
A pa tawlkhat a tenna Kanaan gamah Jakob teeng hi.

Jakob innkuante’ tangthu hih bang ahi hi. Josef kum sawm le kum sagih pha ahih manin a sanggamte tawh tuuhon cing hi. A pa’ zite Bilhah le Zilpah’ tapate tawh tangval ahi uh hi. Josef in a pa uh kiangah amaute’ siat gamtatnate a gen hi.
Tu-in Israel in a ta dangte khat peuhpeuh sangin Josef it zaw hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a teek khitin a neih a tapa ahi hi. Amah in ama adingin puantualpi bansau khat a bawlsak hi.
Ahih hangin a pa un a sanggamte khempeuh sangin amah a itzawkna a sanggamte in a muh uh ciangin, amaute in Josef mudah uh a, nuamtakin amah hopih thei lo uh hi.
Tu-in Josef in mang khat man a, amah in a sanggamte’ lakah a gen ciangin amaute in amah muhdah semsemna-in nei uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Keima mat hih mang ngai un:
Eite in lo lai-ah buhlom i hen a, keima buhlom tho-in ding tang hi. Tua kiimah note’ buhlom kikhawm a, keima buhlom mai-ah kun uh hi,” a ci hi.

A sanggamte in ama kiangah, “Kote’ tungah nang in hong uk dinga, kote’ tungah ukna aana nei ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in a mangte le a thugente’ hangin amah mudah semsem uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in mang dang khat man a, tua mang a sanggamte kiangah genin, “Mang dang khat ka man hi. Ni, kha le aksi sawm le khatte kei’ mai-ah hong kun uh hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amah in a pa le a sanggamte’ kiangah a gen ciangin a pa in amah taii-in, “Nangma mat hih mang a bangci mang ahi hiam? Kei le na nu le na sanggamte, nangma mai leilakah a kun dingin hong pai ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
A sanggamte in amah haza uh a, ahih hangin a pa in hih thute a ciamteh hi.
Khatvei a pa uh’ tuuhonte a cing dingin Shekhem gei-ah a sanggamte a pai hi.
Israel in Josef kiangah, “Na sanggamte in Shekhem-ah tuuhon cing uh hi lo ahi hiam? Hong pai in, amau’ kiangah hong sawl ning,” a ci hi. Amah in a kiangah, “Hiah om ing,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in, “Tu-in va pai inla, na sanggamte le tuuhonte a cidam hiam va thei inla, kei kiangah thu hong zasakkik in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in Hebron kuam panin Josef sawl a, Shekhem-ah amah va tung hi.
Gamlakah a vak kawikawina mi khat in mu a, “Bang zongzong na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
“Ka sanggamte a zong ka hi hi. Amaute in koi lai-ah tuuhon cing uh hiam, hong gen in, hong thum ing,” amah in ci hi.
Mipa in, “Amaute pai khia zo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, ‘Dothan-ah pai ni,’ a cih uh ka za hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a sanggamte’ nungah Josef pai a, Dothan-ah amaute a mu hi.
Amaute in gamlapi-ah amah na mu uh a, amaute’ nai-ah amah hong tun ma-in amaute in amah thah ding na vaihawm uh hi.
Amaute khatlekhat in, “Hih lai-ah mangman pa hong pai hi.
Tu-in hong pai un. Amah thatin dum sung khatah lawn ni. Tua ciangin gamsa khat in amah netum khin hi, i ci ding hi. A mangte bang a suak hiam i mu ding hi,” a kici uh hi.
Ahih hangin Reuben in tua thu a zak ciangin, “Amah that kei ni,” ci-in, amau’ khut sung panin amah hon khia hi.

A pa’ kiang a tunpihkik theih nadingin amau’ khut sung pan a hot khiat theih nadingin Reuben in amaute’ kiangah, “Amah that kei un. Hih gamlak dum sungah amah lawn un. Ahih hangin amah bangmah cih kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, a sanggamte’ kiangah Josef hong tun ciangin, ama silh lai a puantualpi bansau a hawk khiatsak uh hi.
Amaute in Josef la-in dum sung khatah a lawn uh hi. A dum pen a hawm hi a, a sungah tui om lo hi.
Tua ciangin amaute an ne dingin tu uh hi. A khuadak uhleh Gilead panin Ishmael mite a kalaohte uh tawh singnai, lingsi le myrrh paknamtui pua-in Egypt-ah puaksuk dingin a pai mu uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah in a sanggamte kiangah, “I sanggampa thatin amah i thahna im lehang bang meetna om ahi hiam?
Hong pai un, Ishmael mite kiangah amah zuak ni. Amah bangmah cih kei ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah i sanggampa, eima cilesa ahi hi,” a ci hi. A sanggamte in ama thu mang hi.

Tua ciangin Midian mi sumbawlte in hong nawk hi. Amaute in Josef kai to-in dum sung panin dom khia to uh a, Ishmael mite tungah ngun shekel sawmnihin amah zuak uh a, amaute in Egypt-ah Josef a paipih uh hi.
Reuben dumah paikikin dum sungah Josef a om lohna a muh ciangin amah in a puan balkek a,
a sanggamte kiangah ciahkikin, “Tangvalpa om nawn lo hi. Kei bangci ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Josef’ puan la-in, keel khat go uh a, a sisan sungah a puan diah uh hi.
Amaute in a puantualpi bansau a pa uh kiangah puak uh a, “Hih puan ka mu uh hi. Na tapa’ puan hi hiam, hi lo hiam tu-in thei in,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in Josef’ puan ahih lam thei a, “Ka tapa’ puan ahi hi. Gamsa khatpeuh in amah netum khinzo hi ding hi. Josef kibalnen gawp ahihna up loh nading om lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in ama puan balkekin, a kawngah puanhampi teeng a, a tapa’ hangin ni tampi sung a kap hi.
A tapate le a tanute khempeuh in amah hehnem uh a, ahih hangin amah hehnep zawhin om lo a, “Hi lo hi. A kapsa-in ka tapa kiang Leinuai-ah ka pai ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua bangin ama hangin a pa kap hi.
Tua kikal sungin Midian mite in Egypt gam sunga inncing mang, Faro’ nuai-ah ulian ahi Potifar’ tungah Josef na zuak uh hi.
Tua hun laitakin Judah a sanggamte kiang panin paisukin, Adullam mi Hirah min nei mi khat tawh omkhawm hi.
Tua lai-ah Judah in Kanaan mi Shua’ tanu mu hi. Amah in tua nu tenpihin luppih a,
tua nu gai-in tapa khat nei a, amah in a min Er a phuak hi.
Tua nu gai leuleu-in tapa khat nei a, tua nu in a min Onan a phuak hi.
Tua nu in tapa khat nei leuleu-in a min Shelah a phuak hi. Tua nu in amah tawh Shelah a neih laitakin Khezib-ah amah a om hi.
Judah in a tapa masa Er adingin zi khat la a, tua nu’ min Tamar ahi hi.
Ahih hangin Judah’ ta masa Er penTopa’muhna-ah hoih lo a,Topain amah that hi.Topa’Topa
Tua ciangin Judah in Onan kiangah, “Na sanggampa’ zi tawh lumkhawm inla, tua nu’ tungah pasal’ sanggamte’ tavuan sem inla, na sanggampa adingin ta nei in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Onan in tate pen ama a’ ahih loh ding thei hi. Tua ahih ciangin a sanggampa’ zi tawh a lupkhop ciangin a sanggampa’ tungah ta pia kha ding ahih manin a natui leilakah buasak hi.
Ama gamtatnaTopa’muhna-ah lungkimhuai lo a,Topain amah zong a that hi.Topa’Topa

Tua ciangin Judah in a monu Tamar’ tungah, “Ka tapa Shelah a gol mateng na pa’ inn-ah meigongnu-in va om in,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a sanggamte mah bangin amah zong si kha ding ci-in lau hi. Tua ahih ciangin Tamar pai-in a pa’ inn-ah a om hi.
Tua hun sungin Judah’ zi, Shua’ tanu si hi. Judah a dahna hun a ven ciangin a lawm Hirah tawh Timnah-a ama tuumul a mette kiangah paito hi.
“Na teekpa a tuute mul met dingin Timnah-ah paito hi,” ci-in Tamar’ kiangah a kigen ciangin,

a meigong numei puan suah khia-in, a kituamna silhin amah kituam a, Timnah paina lampi gei-a Enaim paina munah na tu hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Shelah a khang cing khin ahihna amah in thei a, ahi zongin amah tawh kiteengsak nai lo hi.
Judah in tua nu a muh ciangin amah in a mai tuam ahih manin numei paktat dingin ngaihsun hi.

Lampi gei-a tua nu’ kiangah amah pai a, “Hong pai in, lumkhawm ni,” a ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua nu pen a monu ahih lam thei lo hi. Tua nu in, “I lupkhop man dingin kei bang hong pia ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in dawngin, “Keelhon panin keelno khat hong puak ning,” a ci hi. Tua nu in, “Nong puak mateng khapna khat nong pia ding hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Bang khapna nang hong pia ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua nu in dawngin, “Na min gelhna, na khauhual le na khutsunga om na ciangkhut,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua nu tungah tuate pia-in, amah luppih a, tua nu a gai hi.
Tua ciangin amah dingin pai khia a, a kikhuhna puan suah khia-in meigong numei ahihna puan a silh hi.
Numei’ khut sung panin a khapna a lakik dingin Judah in Adullam mi a lawmpa a ganno tawh a sawl ciangin, amah in tua nu mu zo lo hi.
Amah in tua lai mun mite dong a, “Lam gei Enaim a om numei paktat nu koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Hih lai-ah numei paktat om ngei lo hi,” na ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Judah kiangah amah ciahkikin, “Amah ka mu kei hi. Tua lai a om mite in, ‘Hih lai-ah numei paktat om ngei lo hi,’ hong ci uh hi,” a ci hi.
Judah in dawngin, “Eite hong kinuihsan kha ding ahih ciangin a nate ama adingin kem mai hen. Hih ganno ka puak a, nang in tua nu na muh lohna na thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua zawh kha thum ciangin Judah tungah, “Na monu Tamar paktatin gamta hi. Tua tham loin paktatna tawh naupaii hi,” ci-in kigen hi. Judah in, “Amah pai khiatpih un; amah kihaltum hen,” a ci hi.

Amah a kipai khiatpih laitakin amah in a teekpa kiangah kam khak a, “Hih nate a nei pa tawh nau ka nei hi,” a ci hi. Tua nu in, “Ciamteh in, hong thum ing, min gelhna le khauhual le ciangkhut, hih nate kua-a’ ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judah in tua nate thei a, “Ka tapa Shelah tawh gawm lo ka hih ciangin, tua numei, kei sangin thuman zaw hi,” a ci hi. Tua nu tawh amah lumkhawmkik nawn lo hi.
Tua nu a suah hun a tun ciangin a naubu sungah nih om hi.
Nausuak dingin a nat ciangin, khat in a khut dawksak hi. Naudom nu in khausan khat la-in a khut tungah khih a, “Hih pen hong pai masa,” ci pah hi.
Ahih hangin a khut a dawh tumkik laitakin, en in, a sanggampa hong suak khia hi. Amah in, “Nang adingin a vang nang mahmah in bawltawm!” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama min Perez kiphuak hi.
Tua khit ciangin a khut tunga khausan tawh a sanggampa hong suak khia a, ama min Zerah kiphuak hi.
Tu-in Egypt-ah Josef kipaipih suk a, tua lai-a a paipih Ishmael mite tung panin Egypt mi, inncing mangpa, Faro’ nuai-a mangpa Potifar in amah na lei hi.
Topain Josef ompih a, amah nasep a zo mi khat suak hi. Amah, Egypt mi a topa’ inn sungah om a,Topa
Topain amah a ompihna leTopain ama khut sungah a hih khempeuh a mavansakna a topa in mu hi.TopaTopa
Tua ahih ciangin Josef in ama mai-ah maipha ngahin ama na sem a, amah in a inn sung ukpa-in bawlin a neih khempeuh a uk dingin a koih hi.

Amah in a inn sung uk leh a neih khempeuh a ukin a bawl a kipanTopain Josef’ hangin Egypt mipa’ innkuan thupha pia hi. Inn sung hitaleh lo sung hitaleh a neih khempeuh tungahTopa’thupha om hi.TopaTopa’

Tua ahih ciangin amah in a neih khempeuh Josef’ khut sungah ap hi. Josef nei khin ahih manin amau nupa sungthu lobuang thudangte lunghihmawh dingin ngaihsun lo hi.Tu-in Josef ngaihbaangin a mel hoih hi.
Tawlkhat khit ciangin a topa’ zi in Josef zawlmit a, “Kei tawh hong lumkhawm in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in nialin a topa’ zi kiangah, “En in, kei hong nei ahih manin ka topa in inn sungah bangmah lunghihmawhna nei lo a, ama neih khempeuh ka khut sungah hong koih khin hi.

Hih inn sungah kei sangin amah lian zaw lo hi. Nang, ama zi na hih manin, nang lobuang kei kiang panin amah in a kep tuam bangmah om lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin bangci-in hih gitlohna lianpi bawlin Pasian’ tungah khial ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Amah in ni khat khit ni khat Josef a zol hangin, amah tawh lupkhop ding hitaleh omkhop ding hitaleh amah in tua nu’ thu ngai lo hi.
Ahih hangin ni khat, amah a nasep sem dingin inn sungah pai a, inn sungah inn sung mite khat zong a om loh laitakin,
tua nu in a puan-in amah man a, “Kei tawh hong lumkhawm hoh in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah in tua nu’ khut sungah a puan nusia-in tai-in tua inn panin a pai khia hi.
Tua nu in, amah in a khut sungah puan nusia-in inn panin a tai khiatna a muh ciangin,
ama inn sung mite samin amaute kiangah, “En un, amah in eite hong no dingin Hebru mi khat eite’ lakah hong paipih hi. Kei tawh a lumkhawm dingin amah hong sungtang a, nakpitakin kei ka kiko hi.
Ka aw sangsakin ka kikona a zak ciangin amah in ka kiangah a puan nusia a, tai-in inn panin pai khia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef’ topa inn-ah hong ciah mateng amah in a kiangah a puan koih hi.
Tua nu in ama kiangah tua thu mah gen a, “Kote kiang a nong paipih Hebru mi nasem pa keimah a no dingin hong sungtang hi.
Ahih hangin ka aw sangsakin ka kiko phetin amah in a puan kei kiangah nusia-in inn panin tai khia hi,” a ci hi.
“Na nasem pa in kei hong bawlna dan hih bang hi,” ci-in a zi in ama kiang a a genna a topa in a zak ciangin heh mahmah hi.
Josef’ topa in amah manin kumpipa’ thongkiate a kikhumna thong sungah amah koih a, tua thong sungah amah om hi.
Ahih hanginTopain Josef ompihin ama tungah itna kip lak a, thong ukpa’ muhna-ah maipha a pia hi.Topa
Thong ukpa in thong sunga thongkia khempeuh Josef’ et dingin ap a, tua lai-a a kisem khempeuh ama sepsa vive ahi hi.
Topain amah ompih ahih manin Josef’ etna nuaia om peuhmah thong ukpa in donnawn lo hi. Ama hih peuhmahTopain daupaisak hi.TopaTopa
Tua zawh tawlkhat khit ciangin, Egypt kumpipa’ anpiapa le a anhuanpa in Egypt kumpipa ahi amau’ topa hehsak uh hi.
Anpia pipa le anhuan pipa ahi, ama nuai-a mangte nih tungah Faro heh a,
Josef a kikhumna thong sung, inncing mangpa’ inn sungah amah in amaute a koih hi.
Inncing mangpa in amaute Josef kemsak a, amah in amaute’ na sem hi. Kikhumna sungah amaute tawlkhat om uh hi.
Zan khat amau tegel in mang man uh hi. Thong sunga a om anpiapa le anhuanpa, amau’ mang a tuam tuak, a mang khiatna zong a tuam tuak mah ahi hi.
Zingsang ciangin amaute kiangah Josef pai-in amaute a muh ciangin, amaute na lungkham uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a topa’ inn sunga amah tawh a kikhumin a om Faro’ nuai-a mangte amah in dong a, “Bang hangin tuni-in maimial na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Amaute in ama kiangah, “Mang ka man uh a, tuate a khia thei ding om lo hi,” na ci uh hi. Josef in amaute kiangah, “Mang khiat theihnate Pasian’ hong piak hi lo ahi hiam? Kei kiangah hong gen un, hong thum ing,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin anpia pipa in Josef kiangah a mang gen a, “Ka mangin ka mai-ah leenggui khat om a,
tua leenggui tungah hiang thum om hi. A sel phetin pak khia pah a, a bomte leenggah suakin min pah hi.
Ka khut sungah Faro’ hai ka tawi hi. Keimah in leenggah loin Faro’ hai sungah ka suk a, Faro’ khut tungah a hai ka pia hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in ama kiangah, “A khiatna hih bang ahi hi. Hiang thumte, ni thum ahi hi.
Ni thum sungin Faro in nang hong khah dinga, na za-ah nang hong koihkik ding hi. Ama anpiapa na hih lai-a mah bangin ama khut tungah Faro’ hai na pia ding hi.
Ahih hangin kei hong phawk in. Nang tungah thu hong hoih ciangin kei tungah hehpihna hong bawl in, kong thum hi. Faro’ tungah kei’ thu genin, hih inn panin kei hong la khia in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Hebru mite’ gam panin kei hong kigu khia a, hih lai-ah zong amaute in thong mial sungah kei hong koih nadingin bangmah ka gamta kei hi,” a ci hi.
Anhuan pipa in a khiatna a hoihlam hi, ci-in a muh ciangin, amah in Josef kiangah, “Kei zong mang khat ka man hi: Ka lu tungah mohlawh thum om a,
a lawh tungnung pen sungah an huansa namkim Faro adingin om hi. Ahih hangin ka lu tunga lawh sung panin vasate in ne uh hi,” a ci hi.
Josef in dawngin, “A khiatna hih bang ahi hi: Lawh thumte, ni thum ahi hi.
Ni thum sungin Faro in nang hong la khia-in na lu hong tan dinga, sing tung khatah nang hong khai ding hi. Vasate in na sa ne ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
A ni thum ni, Faro’ suah ni hunin, amah in a nasemte khempeuh adingin pawi khat kham a, anpia pipa le anhuan pipa la khia hi.
Amah in anpia pipa an piak nasepah koihkik a, amah in Faro’ khut sungah a hai pia hi.
Ahih hangin Josef’ khiat mah bangin anhuan pipa a khailum hi.
Ahi zongin anpia pipa in Josef phawk nawn lo a, amah mangngilh ta hi.
Tua zawh kum nih bit khit ciangin Faro in mang man a, amah Nail gun gei-ah ding hi.
Nail gun sung panin bawngpi a zol a thau sagih hong pai khia a, amaute in phai lopate ne uh hi.
Amaute’ khit ciangin Nail gun sung pan mahin a gulhgawng bawngpi dang sagih hong pai khia a, Nail gun gei-a bawngpi dangte kiangah ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin a gulhgawng bawngpi sagihte in a zol a thau bawngpi sagihte netum uh hi. Tua ciangin Faro khang lo hi.
Tua ciangin ihmu-in a nih veina mang man hi. A taksa a hoih buhvui sagih kung khat tungah vui hi.
Tuate’ khit ciangin nisuahna huih in a theemsak a hawm vui sagih hong po khia hi.
A vui hawmte in a taksa a dim vui sagihte valhtum uh hi. Tua ciangin Faro khang lo a, tua pen a mang na hi hi.

Tua ahih ciangin zingsangin a lungkham hi. Amah in mi sawlin Egypt mitphial siamte khempeuh le a mipil khempeuh samsak hi. Faro in amaute’ kiangah a mang gen a, ahih hangin Faro’ tungah a khiatna a gen thei kuamah om lo hi.
Tua ciangin anpia pipa in Faro’ kiangah, “Tuni-in ka khialhnate ka phawkkik hi.
Faro, ama nasemte tungah heh a, kei le anhuan pipa, inncing mangpa’ inn sungah hong khum lai-in
amah le keimah in zan khat sungin mang ka man uh a, a mangte in a khiatna tuam ciat nei hi.
Inncing mangpa’ nasem ahi Hebru mi tangval khat tua lai-ah kote tawh om hi. Ama kiangah ka gen uh ciangin, amah in ka mangte uh hong khiatsak a, ka mang uh tawh a kizui tuakin a khiatna hong gen hi.
Amah in kote tungah a khiatna hong gen bangin hong tung hi. Kei pen ka za-ah hong kikoihkik a, anhuanpa kikhailum hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in mi sawlin Josef samsak a, amaute in manlang takin thongmial sung panin amah a pai khiatpih uh hi. Amah in a mul kiatin a puan a khek khit ciangin, Faro’ mai-ah hong pai hi.
Faro in Josef kiangah, “Mang khat ka man a, a khiatna a gen thei kuamah om lo hi. Nang in mang na zak ciangin a khiatna gen thei, ci-in hong kigenna ka za hi,” a ci hi.
Josef in Faro dawngin, “Kei’ pilna tawh mang a khiathei ka hi kei hi. Pasian in Faro’ tungah a hoih lamin dawnna hong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Josef kiangah, “Ka mangin Nail gun gei-ah ka ding hi.
A thau a zol bawngpi sagih Nail gun panin hong pai khia a, phai lopate ne uh hi.
Tuate’ khit ciangin a hehpihhuai a gulhgawng, Egypt gam sung khempeuh ah tua bang ka muh ngei loh bawngpi dang sagih hong pai hi.
A gawng a gulhgawng bawngpite in a masa a thau bawngpi sagihte netum uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in tuate a nek khit uh ciangin, a nek khit lam uh kuamah in thei lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute pen a tunga mah bangin gulhgawng lai veve uh hi. Tua ciangin ka khang lo hi.
Tua ciangin ka mang mahin kung khat tungah a dim a hoih buhvui sagih a vui khia zong ka mu hi.
Tuate’ khit ciangin nisuahna huihpi in a keusak a hawm, a theem vui sagih hong po a,
a vui hawmte in a vui hoih sagihte valhtum uh hi. Mitphial siamte kiangah ka gen a, ahih hangin kei kiangah hong gentel thei khat beek om lo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in Faro’ kiangah, “Faro’ mang tegel pen khat ahi hi. Pasian in ama bawl ding, Faro’ tungah hong kilangsak khin hi.
A hoih bawngpi sagihte, kum sagih hi a, a hoih buhvui sagihte zong kum sagih mah ahi hi. A mang khiatna a kibang ahi hi.
Tuate’ khit ciangin a hong pai khia, a gawng a gulhgawng bawngpi sagihte, kum sagih hi a, nisuahna huihpi in a theemsak buhvui sagihte zong kialpi kum sagih mah ahi hi.
Faro’ kiang a kong gen bangin Pasian in ama hih ding, Faro’ tungah hong lak khin ahi hi.
Egypt gam sung khempeuh ah kum sagih sung hauhna hong tung dinga,
ahih hangin tua khit ciangin kialpi kum sagih sung hong tungin, hauhna ngeisa khempeuh Egypt gam sungah kimangngilh ding hi. Kialpi in gam sung netum dinga,
nasia mahmah ding ahih manin, tua hong tung ding kialpi’ huhau-in gam sungah hauhna kithei lo ding hi.
Faro’ mang nih a phakna pen tua thu Pasian’ sehsa hi, a cihnopna hi a, Pasian in tomno sungin hong tungsak ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Faro in thu ngaihsun siam mipil khat teng khia inla, Egypt gam sung a uk dingin amah koih in.
Faro in gam sungah vaihawm ulian seh inla, a kihauh kum sagih sungin Egypt gam leitang pan a piang sung panin nga-ah khat la in.
Hong tung ding kum hoih sunga an khempeuh amaute khawmsak inla, khuapite sungah an nek dingin Faro’ ukna nuai-ah antangte kholin, amaute kemsak in.
Kialpi hangin gam sung a siat loh nadingin Egypt gam sungah a hong tung ding kum sagih kialpi dal nadingin a kikoihcing an hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih a thugen pen Faro le a nasemte khempeuh in hoihsa uh hi.
Faro in a nasemte kiangah, “Ama sungah Pasian Kha a omna, hih bang midang mu ding ihi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro in Josef kiangah, “Pasian in hihte khempeuh nang hong lak khin ahih manin, nang bangin thu ngaihsun siam le a pil midang om lo hi.
Nang pen ka inn sungah ulian na hi dinga, nangma thupiak bangin ka mite khempeuh gamta ding uh hi. Kumpi tokhom tawh kisai-in kei pen nang sangin ka lian zaw ding hi,” a ci hi.
Faro in Josef’ kiangah, “Egypt gam khempeuh a uk dingin nang kong koih khinzo hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in a min gelhna zungbuh ama khut tung panin suah khia-in Josef’ khutah bulh a, puan hoih mahmah tawh amah zemin, a ngawngah kham khainiang khat oksak hi.
Ama leeng nihna tungah Josef tuangsak a, ama mai-ah uliante kiko a, “Khukdin un!” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Egypt gam khempeuh a ukin amah koih hi.
