Tua tham loin Faro in Josef kiangah, “Kei pen Faro ka hi hi. Nangma thukim lohin Egypt gam sung khempeuh ah kuamah in a khut a khe nangawn uh liik lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Faro in Josef’ min Zafenath-paneah a phuak hi. Amah in On khua siampipa Potifera’ tanu Asenath tawh kiteengsak hi. Tua ahih ciangin Egypt gam sungah Josef zin kawikawi hi.
Egypt kumpipa Faro’ nasemin a tum hunin Josef kum sawmthum pha hi. Faro’ omna panin Josef pai khia a, Egypt gam sung khempeuh ah zin hi.
A kihauh kum sagih sungin leitang in tampi piangsak a,
Egypt gamah tampi a om laitakin amah in tua kum sagih sunga ante khempeuh khawm a, khuapite sungah an khol hi. A kiima lote panin khuapi simah amah in an khol hi.
A teh ding a khawl dong zahin Josef in tuipi gei sehnel zahin antang tampi khol hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kiteh khin zo lo hi.
Kialpi kum hong tun ma-in Josef in On khua siampipa Potifera’ tanu Asenath tawh tapa nih nei hi.
Josef in a ta masa Manasseh a phuak hi. Amah in, “Pasian in ka haksatna khempeuh le ka pa’ innkuan khempeuh a mangngilhin hong bawl hi,” ci hi.
A nihna pen amah in Efraim a phuak hi. “Ka thuakna gam sungah kei a pungin hong bawl hi,” ci hi.
Egypt gam sunga a om kum sagih sung hauhna hun bei ta hi.
Josef’ gensa bangin kum sagih kialpi hong kipan hi. Gamdang khempeuh ah kialpi tunga, ahih hangin Egypt gam sung tengah an om hi.
Egypt gam khempeuh a kial ciangin, an ngenin mite Faro’ tungah kiko uh hi. Faro in Egypt mite khempeuh tungah, “Josef’ kiangah pai un. Note’ tunga ama hong cih bangin gamta un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin gam khempeuh ah kialpi a tunkim ciangin Josef in ankholna innte khempeuh hongin, Egypt mite tungah a zuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt gamah kialpi nasia mahmah hi.
Tua tham loin, leitung khempeuh ah kialpi nasia ahih manin, antang lei dingin Josef’ kiangah leitung mi khempeuh hong pai uh hi.
Egypt-ah an a omna thu Jakob in a theih ciangin a tate kiangah, “Bang hangin khatlekhat ki-enen mawk na hi uh hiam?
Egypt-ah an om hi, ci-in ka za hi. Eite si loin i nuntak nadingin paisuk unla, ei ading an va lei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Egypt-ah an lei dingin Josef’ sanggamte sawm paisuk uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jakob in Josef’ sanggampa Benjamin, a sanggamte tawh paisak lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama tungah siatna tung kha ding, ci-in lau hi.
Kanaan gam sungah kial tung ahih manin a hong pai dangte tawh Israel’ tapate an lei dingin hong paikhawm uh hi.
Tu-in Josef pen tua gam a ukpa hi a, gammi khempeuh tungah an a zuakpa amah ahi hi. Josef’ sanggamte hong pai-in, a maitang uh leilam ngatin ama mai-ah hong kun uh hi.

Josef in a sanggamte a muh ciangin thei a, ahih hangin amah in midang bangin bawlin amaute tungah khauh pau hi. “Koi pan a hong pai na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “An lei dingin Kanaan gam panin hong pai hi ung,” ci uh hi.
Josef in a sanggamte thei a, ahih hangin a sanggamte in amah thei lo uh hi.
Josef in a mangin amaute a mat khitna a phawk hi. Amah in amaute kiangah, “Note, thukan na hi uh a, hih gam thaneemna a en dingin hong pai na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in Josef kiangah, “Hi lo hi, topa aw; an lei dingin na nasemte a hong pai hi ung.
Kote khempeuh mi khat’ ta ka hi uh hi. Kote, a thutak ka hi uh a, na nasemte thukan hi lo uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Hi lo hi, hih gam ginat lohna a en dingin hong pai na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Ko, nangma nasemte, sanggam pasal sawm le nih ka hi uh a, Kanaan gam sungah mi khat’ ta ka hi uh hi. A moi pen tu laitakin ka pa uh tawh om a, khat pen om nawn lo hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Josef in amaute kiangah, “Note’ tunga kong gen bangin a man mah ahi hi. Note, thukan na hi uh hi.
Hih thu tawh note hong kithei ding hi: Faro a nungta ahih mah bangin na sanggam moi pen uh hih lai-ah hong pai kei leh hih lai mun panin note na pai khia thei nawn kei ding uh hi.

Note’ sungah thuman om hiam, ci-in a kimuh nading, na thugente uh a kitel nadingin note thong sungah na om laitakun note khat kisawl unla, na sanggampa uh hong paipihsak un. Tua ahih kei leh Faro a nungta ahih mah bangin note, thukan na hi taktak uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in thong sungah ni thum sung amaute a koih hi.
A ni thum ni-in Josef in amaute kiangah, “Keimah in Pasian zahtak ka hih manin hih bangin gamta un. Tua hileh na nungta ding uh hi.
Note, thuman mi na hih uhleh thong sungah na sanggamte uh khat omsak lai unla, a dangte pai-in na innkuan uh a gilkialte adingin an pua unla,
na sanggam moi pen uh kei kiangah hong paipih un. Tua ciangin na kam gente uh kitel dinga, note na si kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Amaute tua bangmahin gamta uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute khatlekhat in, “A taktakin i sanggampa tawh kisai-in eite i mawh hi. Amah in eite kiangah hong thum napi-in eite in a thu i ngaih loh ciangin amah a lungkhamna i mu hi. Tua thu hangin hih bang lungkhamna eite tungah hong tung hi,” kici uh hi.

Reuben in amaute dawng a, “Tangvalpa tungah khial kei un, ci-in note tungah hong gen hi lo ka hi hiam? Ahih hangin ka thu nong mang kei uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ama sihna thaman eite’ tungah hong tung ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute’ kikalah kamphen khat om ahih manin Josef in amau’ paute a tellam amaute in thei lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute’ kiang panin Josef kihei-in a kap sim hi. Tua ciangin amaute kiangah hong paikikin amaute hopih hi. Amah in amau’ kiang panin Simeon la-in amau’ muhna-ah amah a hen hi.
Amau’ ipte antang tawh dipsakin, a van sung uhah amau’ sum ciat koihkikin, lampi-a a nek ding uh an a piak nading Josef in thu a pia hi. Tua bangmahin amau adingin kihihsak hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a late uh antang suanin a pai khia uh hi.
Amaute khat in a giahna panun a la gan-an pia dingin a van a suah leh, a van gongah a sum mu hi.

Amah in a sanggamte kiangah, “Ka sum kikoihkik hi. Hih lai-ah ka van gongah na om!” a ci hi. Hih thu hangin amaute lungsi uh a, liingin amaute khatlekhat ki-en uh a, “Pasian in eite hih bangin hong bawl a bangci thu ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Kanaan gamah a pa uh Jakob kiang a tun uh ciangin, amaute’ tunga thupiang khempeuh gen uh a,
“Mipa, tua gam topa kote’ tungah hong khauh pau-in, tua gam thukanin kote hong ngaihsun hi.
Ahih hangin kote in ama kiangah, ‘Kote thuman mi ka hi uh a, kote thukan ka hi kei uh hi.
Kote pen ka pa uh’ tapa, sanggam pasal sawm le nih ka hi uh hi. Khat pen om nawn lo a, tu laitakin a moi pen Kanaan gamah ka pa uh tawh om hi,’ ka ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua gam topa in kote kiangah, ‘Note thuman mi na hihna uh hih tawh ka thei ding hi: Na sanggamte uh khat kei kiangah nusia unla, na innkuan gilkialte adingin antang la unla, ciahkik un.

Na sanggam moi pen uh kei kiangah hong paipih un. Tua hileh note thukan hi loin thuman mi na hihna uh ka thei dinga, note kiangah na sanggampa uh hong khahin, hih gam sungah omin na na sem thei ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi,” ci-in a gen uh hi.
Amau’ vante a suah ciangun, a milip-un a sumte uh a van sung ciat uhah na om hi. Amaute le a pa un amaute’ sum kihente a muh uh ciangin, lungkham uh hi.

A pa uh Jakob in amaute kiangah, “Ka tate tawh kei nong kikhensak zo uh hi: Josef om nawn lo, Simeon om nawn lo, tu-in note in Benjamin na la ding uh hi. Hihte khempeuh kei’ tungah hong tung khin hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Reuben in a pa kiangah, “Na kiangah amah kong paipihkik kei leh ka tapa nihte that in. Kei hong ap in, nang kiangah amah kong ciahpihkik ding hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin amah in, “A sanggampa si a, amah bek om ahih manin ka tapa in note hong zuisuk lo ding hi. Note’ pai nading na khualzinna uhah ama tungah siatna tung kha zenzen leh, khangham khit nungin dahlua-in ka si ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in gam sungah kialpi hong nasia semsem hi.
Egypt gam panin a puak uh antang amaute in a gaih khit uh ciangin, a pa un amaute kiangah, “Paikik unla, eite ading an tawmkhat va lei un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Judah in ama kiangah, “Mipa in thupi takin kote hong hilh khol a, ‘Na sanggampa uh tawh nong ton kei uhleh ka mai na mu kei ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi.
Ka sanggampa uh hong zuisak lecin kote paisukin nang ading an ka va lei ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin amah nong zuihsak kei leh kote ka paisuk kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mipa in kote kiangah, ‘Na sanggampa uh tawh nong ton kei uhleh ka mai na mu kei ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci hi.
Israel in, “Mipa kiangah sanggam dang khat nei ung, ci-in genin bang hangin kei hong hici bawlsiat na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Amaute in dawngin, “Mipa in kote’ thu le ka sanggamte uh thu limtakin hong dong a, ‘Na pa uh a nungta lai hiam? Sanggam dang na nei uh hiam?’ hong ci hi. Hong dotnate ka dawnna-un ama kiangah a gen ka hi uh hi. ‘Na sanggampa uh hong tonpih suk un,’ amah in hong cih ding lam kote in bangci theih kholh ding ka hi uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Judah in a pa Israel kiangah, “Tangvalpa hong zuisak in; nang le kote le i tate si loin i nuntak theih nadingin kote ka va pai ding uh hi.

Kei pen ama adingin a kikham ka hi dinga, kei’ khut sung panin amah nong kal ding hi. Keimah in nang kiangah amah hong ciahpihkik loin na mai-ah kong koihkik kei leh, tua mawhna kei hong thuaksak tawntung in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh zekai lo hi lehang tu-in nihvei i tungkik khinta ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a pa uh Israel in amaute kiangah, “A tuaci bang ding ahihleh hih bangin gamta un: Gam sunga singgah limci pente pua unla, mipa’ tungah letsongin lingsi tawm, khuaizu tawm, singnai, myrrh paknamtui, pistakhio gah le almond gahte puak suk un.
Na sum uh a zah nih pua un. Na van gong uhah a kikoihkik sumte puakik un, a kikhial hi kha ding hi.
Na sanggampa uh zong samin ding unla, mipa kiangah paikik un.
Amah in na sanggampa uh le Benjamin hong ciahsakkik theih nadingin Vanglian Pasian in mipa’ mai-ah note hehpihna hong pia tahen. Ka tate tawh ka kikhen leh a kikhen ka hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in letsong la-in, sum a zah nih pua-in, Benjamin zong tonpih uh hi. Amaute dingin Egypt-ah paisuk uh a, Josef’ mai-ah a ding uh hi.

Josef in amaute tawh Benjamin a muh ciangin, amah in a inn sung nasem pa’ kiangah, “Mite inn sungah paipih inla, gan khat go-in bawl in. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite in sun ciangin kei tawh an ne ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Josef’ sawl bangin mipa in sem a, Josef’ inn-ah mite paipih hi.

Josef’ inn-ah kipaipih ahih manin lau uh a, amaute in, “Eite sila-in hong bawlin i late a mat theih nading, eite’ tungah thu hong zongin eite hong hih theih nadingin, a masa lai-a i van sunga sum kikoihte’ hangin eite hong kipaipih hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Josef’ inn sung nasem pa’ kiangah amaute paito uh a, inn kongkhak ah amah tawh kiho-in,
“Aw, topa aw, an lei dingin khatvei kong pai uh hi.
Ka giahna mun uh ka tun uh ciangin ka vante uh ka hong uh a, ka sumte uh a cingin ka van sung ciat uhah na omkik hi. Tua ahih ciangin kote in tua sumte kong puakik uh a,
an lei nadingin sum dang zong kong pua thuah uh hi. Ka van sung uhah kua in sum koih ahi hiam ka thei kei uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Amah in dawng a, “Nuam takin om unla lau kei un. Na Pasian uh, note’ pa’ Pasian in note adingin na van sung uhah sum koih hi ding hi. Keimah in note’ sum a cingin ka ngah khin hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute’ kiangah Simeon pai khiatpih hi.
Mipa in Josef’ inn-ah amaute paipihin, amaute tui pia-in, amaute in a khe uh sil khinin, amah in amaute’ late gan-an a piak khit ciangin,
amaute in tua lai-ah Josef tawh an ne ding uh ci-in za uh ahih manin sunin Josef hong pai ciangin a piak ding uh letsong bawl khol uh hi.
Inn-ah Josef hong pai ciangin amau’ puak letsongte inn sung ama kiangah paipih uh a, ama mai leilakah kun uh hi.
Amah in amau’ omzia dong a, “Na gen uh puteek, na pa uh a dam hiam? Amah a nungta lai hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Nangma nasem ka pa uh dam hi. Amah nungta lai hi,” a ci uh hi. Amaute in a lu uh kun uh a, zahtakna a bawl uh hi.
Amah khuadak to a, a nu’ tapa Benjamin mu a, “Hih pa, kei kiang a nong gen uh na sanggam moi pen uh ahi hiam? Pasian in nang hong hehpih hen, ka ta!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a lungsimah a sanggampa ngai lua ahih manin Josef manlangin pai khia a, a kah nading mun a zong hi. Amah a inndei sungah pai-in tua lai-ah va kap sim hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a mai phiatin hong pai khia hi. Amah ki-ip tawmin, “An hong pia un,” a ci hi.

Amaute in Josef amah guakin nesakin, amaute a tuam mahin nesak a, amah tawh a ne Egypt mite in a tuam mahin ne uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt mite in Hebru mite tawh an nekhawm lo uh hi. Tua banga nekkhawm ding pen Egypt mite adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Ama mai-ah amaute a suakmasa a suah hun tawh kizui le a moi pen a khangnona tawh kizui-in tu uh hi. Lamdangsakna tawh amaute khatlekhat ki-en uh hi.
Josef’ sabuai tung panin amau’ tanh ciat kipia-in, ahih hangin Benjamin’ tanh pen amaute-a’ zah nga pha hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in an ne tui dawnin amah tawh lungdam uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a inn sung nasem pa thu pia a, “Hih mite’ van sungah amau’ puak zawh zahzah an guang inla, amau’ sum ciat a van gong ciat uhah koih in.
Ka ngun hai pen an lei nadinga a sum tawh a moi pen’ van gongah koihsak in,” a ci hi. Amah in Josef’ gen bangin a hih hi.
Zingsang khuavak phetin a late uh tawh mite kisawlkhia hi.

Amaute a pai khit, ahih hangin khuapi panin a nai lai-in, Josef in ama inn sung nasem pa kiangah, “Kithawi inla, mite va delh in. Amaute na phak ciangin amaute kiangah, ‘Bang hangin a hoih pen a sia tawh hong thuk na hi uh hiam? Bang hangin ka topa’ ngun hai gu na hi uh hiam?
Ka topa in hih hai sung panin dawnin, hih tawh amah in thu thei hi lo ahi hiam? Hih bangin na gamtat manun na khial uh hi,’ va ci in,” a ci hi.
Amah in amaute a phak ciangin amaute kiangah hih thute a gen hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin ka topa in thu hih bang hong gen na hi hiam? Na nasemte, tua banga gamta ding hi dek peuhmah lo hi.
En in, ka van gong uha ka muh uh sumte, Kanaan gam panin nang kiangah kong puakkik uh hi. Tua ahih teh na topa’ inn panin ngun hitaleh kham hitaleh bangci guk ding ka hi uh hiam?
Na nasemte’ sung pan tua hai a kimuhna penpen kithat hen; kote zong ka topa’ sila ka hi ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Amah in, “Na cih bang uh hi tahen: A kimuhna penpen pa ka sila hi dinga, no adang teng mawh na baang kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a milipin a van uh leilakah ngasuk uh a, a milipin a van uh suah hi.
Amah in zong a, a ham pen panin kipanin a moi pen tawh tawp a, Benjamin’ van sungah a hai kimu hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a puan uh balkekin, a late uh a van suan ciatin, khuapi-ah hong kilehkik uh hi.
Judah le a sanggamte, Josef’ inn-ah a tun ciangin, amah tua lai mahah na omlai hi. Ama mai leilakah amaute kun uh hi.
Josef in amaute kiangah, “Note’ gamtatna a bangci gamtat ahi hiam? Kei bang ahi mi in thu ka theihna thei lo na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Judah in, “Ka topa tungah hong bangci gen ding ka hi uh hiam? Bang thu gen ding ka hi uh hiam? Tua ahih kei leh ko bangci kiphel theih ding ka hi uh hiam? Pasian in na nasemte’ mawhna mu khia hi. En in, kote le hai a kimuhna pa zong, ka topa’ sila ka hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Tua bangin hi dek lo ding hi. Hai a kimuhna mipa bek ka sila hi ding hi. No a dangte ahihleh, na pa’ kiang uhah nuamtakin ciah un,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin ama kiangah Judah hong paito-in, “Ka topa aw, hong thum ing. Na nasem pa, nang tungah kam khat thu hong gensak inla, na nasem pa tungah na hehna hong sosak kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang pen Faro mahmah tawh a kibang na hi hi.
Ka topa in a nasemte nong dong a, ‘Pa hitaleh sanggam pasal dang hitaleh na nei uh hiam?’ nong ci hi.

Kote in ka topa uh kiangah, ‘Kote in a teek pa khat le a teek zawhin a neih sanggam pasal moi lai khat ka nei uh hi. Ama sanggampa si a, a nu’ tate sung pan amah bek omlai hi. A pa in amah it mahmah hi,’ kong ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in na nasemte kiangah, ‘Ka mit tawh amah ka muh theih nadingin kei kiangah amah hong tonpih suk un,’ nong ci hi.
Kote in ka topa uh kiangah, ‘Tangvalpa in a pa nusia thei lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a pa nusia leh a pa si ding hi,’ kong ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin nangmah in na nasemte kiangah, ‘Note tawh na sanggam uh a moi pen hong paisuk khop kei leh ka mai nong mu nawn kei ding uh hi,’ nong ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin na nasem ka pa uh kiangah ka ciahkik uh ciangin ka topa’ thugente ama kiangah ka gen uh hi.
Ka pa un, ‘Paikikin eite ading an tawm va lei un,’ hong cih ciangin

kote in, ‘Ka paisuk kei ding uh hi. Ka sanggam moi pen uh ko tawh hong paikhawm leh ka paisuk bek ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka sanggam moi pen uh ko tawh hong pai kei leh mipa’ mai ka mu kei ding uh hi,’ ka ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin na nasem ka pa un kote kiangah, ‘Ka zi in kei tawh tapa nih a neih na thei uh hi.
Khat in kei hong nusia khin a, amah kibalzan khin taktak hi, ka ci hi. Tua hun a kipan amah ka mu nawn kei hi.
Hih a khat zong kei kiang panin na lak uh a, ama tungah siatna a tun leh, dahna tawh ka sam kangte Leinuai-ah na paipih suk ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin tu-in, na nasem ka pa uh kiangah ka ciah uh ciangin, tangvalpa kote tawh hong ciah kei leh, ama lungsim khempeuh tangvalpa’ tungah om ahih manin,
kote tawh tangvalpa a ciah lohna a muh ciangin amah si ding hi. Na nasemte in na nasem ka pa uh’ sam kangte dahna tawh Leinuai-ah ka paipih ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh na nasem keimah pen tangvalpa adingin ka pa’ tungah a kikham ka hi a, ‘Nang kiangah amah kong ciahpihkik kei leh tua mawhsakna nangma muhna-ah ka nuntak tawntungin ka thuak ding hi,’ ka ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kong thum hi. Ka topa’ sila dingin tangvalpa’ tangin na nasem pa hong omsak inla, a sanggamte tawh tangvalpa ciahkiksak in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tangvalpa kei tawh hong ton kei leh ka pa kiangah bangci ciahkik thei ding ka hi hiam? Ka pa’ tungah a tung ding siatna ka thuakzo kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin ama kiang a dingte khempeuh’ mai-ah Josef ki-ip zo nawn lo a, “Ka kiang panin mi khempeuh pai khia un,” ci-in a kiko hi. Tua ahih manin Josef a sanggamte tungah amah a kipulak ciangin kuamah dang om lo hi.
Amah a gingin kap khia ahih manin Egypt mite in za a, Faro’ innkuante in zong za uh hi.
Josef in a sanggamte kiangah, “Kei, Josef ka hi hi. I pa a nungta lai hiam?” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a sanggamte maizum uh ahih manin amah dawng thei lo uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Josef in a sanggamte kiangah, “Ka nai-ah hong pai un, hong thum ing,” a ci hi. Amaute a nai-ah hong pai uh hi. Amah in, “Kei pen Egypt-ah nong zuak uh na sanggampa uh Josef ka hi hi.
Hih lai-ah kei nong zuak manun tu-in lungkham kei un. Nomau tungah kiheh tawm kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh nuntakna a hu dingin note’ mai-ah Pasian in kei hong sawl hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh gam sungah kum nih sung kialpi tung zo hi. Lo khawh loh, an lak loh ding kum nga omlai hi.
Note adingin leitungah a omlai mi a hingsak ding le note adingin a suakta mi tampi a kem dingin note’ mai-ah Pasian in kei hong sawl hi.

Tua ahih ciangin hih lai-ah a hong sawl mi pen note na hi kei uh a, Pasian ahi hi. Amah in Faro’ khutnuai-ah a ulian penin kei hong bawlin, ama inn sung khempeuh’ topa le Egypt gam khempeuh a ukpa-in kei hong bawlkhin hi.
“Manlangin i pa kiangah va ciahto unla ama kiangah, ‘Na tapa Josef in hih bangin ci hi: Pasian in Egypt gam khempeuh’ topa-in kei hong bawl khin hi. Ka kiangah hong paisuk hen, zekai kei hen.
Goshen leitangah na teeng dinga, nang le na tate’ tate le na tuuhonte le na bawnghonte le na neih khempeuh tawh, nang pen kei tawh a kinai-in na om ding hi.
Hong tung ding kialpi kum nga omlai ahih manin tua lai-ah nang kong vak ding hi. Tua hi kei leh nang le na innkuanpihte le na neih khempeuh in zawnna na ngah ding uh hi, ci hi,’ va ci un.
“Note’ kiang a thu hong gen pen keima kam ahihna tu-in note’ mitin nong mu uh a, ka sanggampa Benjamin’ mit in zong hong mu hi.
Egypt-ah keima liatna khempeuh le note’ muhsa khempeuh, i pa’ kiangah na gen ding uh hi. Manlang unla, hih lai-ah i pa hong paisukpih un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggampa Benjamin ngawng kawi-in a kap hi. Benjamin in zong amah ngawng kawi-in a kap hi.
Tua ciangin a kah kawmin a sanggamte khempeuh ngawng kawi-in a nam hi. Tua khit ciangin a sanggamte in amah hopih uh hi.
“Josef’ sanggamte hong pai,” cihna thu Faro’ inn sungah a kizak ciangin, tua thu in Faro le a nasemte lungdamsak mahmah hi.
Faro in Josef kiangah, “Na sanggamte kiangah, ‘Hih bangin gamta un: Na ganhingte uh van suan unla, Kanaan gamah ciahkik un.
I pa le na innkuanpihte uh va la unla, kei kiangah hong pai un. Egypt gam a hoih pen mun note kong pia dinga, note in gam hoih sunga piangte na ne ding uh hi,’ ci in.
Amaute zong thu pia inla, ‘Hih bangin gamta un: Na tate le na zite uh adingin Egypt panin leeng la unla, i pa hong paipih un.
Egypt gam khempeuh a hoih penna nomau-a’ ahih ciangin na vante uh ngaihsutin nei kei un,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Israel’ tapate tua bangmahin gamta uh hi. Josef in Faro’ thupiak mah bangin amaute leeng pia a, lampi-a a nek ding uh an zong a pia hi.
Amah in amaute khempeuh tungah puan hoih silh khat ciat a pia hi. Ahih hangin Benjamin’ tungah ngun shekel zathum le puan hoih silh nga a pia hi.
Amah in a pa kiangah a nuai-ate a khak hi: Egypt na hoihte a pua la sawm; antang, anlum le lampi-a a pa’ nek ding an a pua lapi sawm a puak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a sanggamte sawl khia a, amaute a pai khiat ciangin amah in amaute kiangah, “Lampi-ah kitawng kei un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute Egypt panin paito uh a, a pa uh Jakob kiang Kanaan gamah ciah uh hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, “Josef nungta lai a, amah pen Egypt gam khempeuh a ukpa na hi hi,” hong ci uh hi. Amah in amaute’ thugen um lo ahih ciangin a lung si hi.
Ahih hangin amaute’ tunga Josef’ gen kammalte ama kiangah a gen ciang le Josef in amah puak nadinga a khak leengte a muh ciangin, a pa uh Jakob’ lungsim hingkik hi.
Israel in, “Pha zo hi. Ka tapa Josef nungta lai hi. Ka sih ma-in pai-in amah ka mu ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Israel, a neih khempeuh tawh a khualzin kipanin Beersheba tunga, a pa Isaac’ Pasian tungah biakpiakna a bawl hi.
Pasian in Israel tungah zanin thu gen a, “Jakob, Jakob,” ci hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing,” ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei pen na pa’ Pasian ahi, Pasian ka hi hi. Egypt-ah paisuk ding lau kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh minam lian khatin tua lai-ah nang kong bawl ding hi.
Egypt-ah nang tawh kong paisuk dinga, tua ciangin zong keimah in nang kong paipihtokik ding hi. Josef’ khut sungah na si ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Beersheba panin Jakob ding khia hi. Israel’ tapate in a pa uh Jakob, a tate uh le a zite uh, amah puak nadinga Faro in a khak leeng sungah a pua uh hi.
Amaute in zong Kanaan gam sunga a lam uh a ganhingte uh le a nate uh la-in, Jakob le ama suanlekhakte ahi,
a tapate, ama tapate’ tapate, a tanute, a tapate’ tanute tawh Egypt-ah a pai uh hi. Amah in a suanlekhakte khempeuh Egypt-ah a paipih hi.
Tu-in hihte pen Israel’ suanlekhak, Egypt-ah a pai Jakob le a tate’ min ahi hi. Jakob’ ta u pen Reuben
le Reuben’ tapate: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron le Karmi ahi hi.
Simeon’ tapate: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakhin, Zohar le Kanaan numei’ tapa Shaul ahi hi.
Levi’ tapate: Gershon, Kohath le Merari ahi hi.
Judah’ tapate: Er, Onan, Shelah, Perez le Zerah ahi hi. (Ahih hangin Er le Onan Kanaan gamah si hi.) Perez’ tapate: Hezron le Hamul ahi hi.
Issakhar’ tapate: Tola, Puvah, Job le Shimron ahi hi.
Zebulun’ tapate: Sered, Elon le Jahleel ahi hi.
(Hihte pen Paddanaram-ah Leah tawh a neih Jakob’ suante hi a, a tanu Dinah tawh zong ahi hi. Numei le pasal a vekpi-in sawmthum le thum ahi hi.)
Gad’ tapate: Zifion, Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arodi le Areli ahi hi.
Asher’ tapate: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah le a sanggamnu uh Serah ahi hi. Beriah’ tapate: Heber le Malkhiel ahi hi.
(Hihte pen Laban in a tanu Leah tungah a piak Zilpah’ tapate ahi hi. Amah in Jakob tawh hihte nei a, mi sawm le guk ahi hi.)
Jakob’ zi Rachel’ tapate: Josef le Benjamin ahi hi.
Josef in Egypt gamah On khua siampipa Potifera’ tanu Asenath tawh Manasseh le Efraim nei hi.
Benjamin’ tapate: Bela, Bekher, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim le Ard ahi hi.
(Hihte pen Rachel tawh a neih Jakob’ suante hi a, a vekpi-in mi sawm le li ahi hi.)
Dan’ tapa Hushim ahi hi.
Naftali’ tapate: Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer le Shillem ahi hi.
(Hihte pen Laban in a tanu Rachel’ tungah a piak Bilhah in Jakob tawh a neih tapate hi a, a vekpi-in mi sagih ahi hi.)
Egypt gamah a pai Jakob-a’ ahi ama suanlekhak, Jakob’ tate’ zite a kisim loin, a vekpi-in mi sawmguk le guk ahi hi.
Josef in Egypt gamah a neih a tapate nih ahi hi. Egypt gamah a pai Jakob’ innkuan khempeuh sawmsagih ahi hi.
Jakob in ama mai Goshen-ah amah lam a lak dingin Josef kiangah Judah ma sawl hi. Amaute Goshen gamah hong pai uh hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in a leengte kithawisakin Goshen-ah a pa Israel a dawn dingin a paito hi. A pa a muh phetin ngawng kawi-in tawlkhat sung a kap hi.
Israel in Josef kiangah, “Na maitang mu khinin nang na nuntak lai thei ka hih manin tu-in ka si zongin phamawh nawn lo hi,” a ci hi.
Josef in a sanggamte le a pa’ innkuanpihte kiangah, “Kei paito-in Faro’ kiangah ka va gen dinga, ama tungah, ‘Kanaan gam a om ka sanggamte le ka pa’ innkuanpihte kei kiangah hong pai hi.
Amaute pen tuucing ahih manin gan kemte ahi uh hi. Amaute in a tuuhonte uh le a bawnghonte uh le a neih khempeuh uh hong paipih uh hi,’ ka va ci ding hi.
Faro in note hong samin note kiangah, ‘Na nasep uh bang ahi hiam?’ hong cih ciangin,

Goshen leitangah na ten theih nadingun note in, ‘Kote hitaleh ka pate uh hitaleh ko na nasemte pen ka neu lai uh a kipan tuhun dongin gankemte ka hi uh hi,’ na ci ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt mite adingin tuucing peuhmah a kihhuai ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Josef pai-in Faro’ kiangah, “Ka pa le ka sanggamte a tuuhon uh le a bawnghon uh le a neih khempeuh uh tawh Kanaan gam panin hong pai uh a, amaute tu-in Goshen gamah om uh hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
A sanggamte’ lak panin amah in mi nga la-in Faro’ kiangah va paipih hi.
Faro in a sanggamte kiangah, “Na nasep uh bang ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in Faro’ kiangah, “Ka pate uh mah bangin na nasem kote pen gankemte ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.

Amaute in Faro kiangah, “Hih gamah tawlkhat a om dingin kong pai uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Kanaan gamah kialpi nasia lua ahih manin tua lai-ah na nasemte’ tuuhonte ading lonona om nawn lo hi. Tu-in kong thum uh hi. Goshen gamah na nasemte hong tengsak in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Josef kiangah, “Na pa le na sanggamte na kiangah hong tung khin hi.

Egypt leitang khempeuh nangma thu ahi hi. Na pa le na sanggamte lei hoih penna-ah tengsak in. Goshen leitangah amaute tengsak inla, amaute’ lakah a hih thei mi na muh leh ka ganhingte a kem dingin koih in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in a pa Jakob tumpihin Faro’ mai-ah koih a, Jakob in Faro thupha a pia hi.
Faro in Jakob kiangah, “Na nuntak kum bangzah pha ta ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Jakob in Faro kiangah, “Tawlkhat sung ka nuntak hun pen kum za le kum sawmthum ahi hi. Ka nuntak hun tom sungah siatna bekbek om a, ka pate tawlkhat a omsung uh a nuntak hunte ban nai lo hi,” a ci hi.
Jakob in Faro thupha pia-in tua lai panin a pai khia hi.
Tua ciangin Faro’ thupiaksa bangin Josef in leitang a hoih pen, Rameses leitang, Egypt gam sungah neihsa pia-in a pa le a sanggamte a tengsak hi.
Josef in a pa, a sanggamte le a pa’ innkuante khempeuh a ne ding zah tawh kizui-in an a pia hi.
Tu-in kialpi nasia mahmah ahih manin gam khempeuh ah an om nawn lo a, kialpi hangin Egypt mite le Kanaan mite vul gawp uh hi.
Amaute in antang a leina hangin, Egypt gam sung le Kanaan gam sunga sum khempeuh Josef in ngah khin hi. Josef in Faro’ inn-ah tua sumte paipih hi.

Egypt gam sung le Kanaan gam sunga sum a bei khit ciangin Egypt mite khempeuh Josef kiangah hong pai-in, “Kote an hong pia in. Bang hangin na muhna-ah si ding ka hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh ka sum uh beita hi,” a ci uh hi.
Josef in dawngin, “Na ganhingte uh hong pia un. Na sum uh bei ahihleh na ganhingte uh khekna-in an kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Josef kiangah a ganhingte uh paipih uh hi. Josef in sakolte, tuuhonte, bawnghonte le late a khekna-in amaute an a pia hi. A ganhingte uh khekna-in Josef in tua kum sung amaute an a pia hi.

Tua kum a bei, a kumkik ciangin amaute Josef kiangah hong pai-in, “Ka sum uh a bei khitna ka topa uh tungah kong im kei ding uh hi. Ganhing honte ka topa a’ ahi hi. Ka pumpi uh le ka leitang uh cih sim loh ka topa’ muhna-ah bangmah dang om nawn lo hi.

Bang hangin kote si-in ka leitang uh nangma muhna-ah maimawk ding ahi hiam? Kote le ka leitang uh an tawh hong lei in. Kote, Faro’ sila ka hi ding uh a, ka leitang uh zong ama a’ hi ding hi. Leitang mawkval loin, kote si loin ka hin theih nadingun khaici hong pia in,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Josef in Egypt gam khempeuh Faro adingin a lei hi. Kialpi nasia lua ahih manin Egypt mi khempeuh in a lote uh a zuak uh hi. Leitang khempeuh Faro-a’ suak khin hi.
Mihingte ahihleh, Egypt mongkhat panin a mongkhat dongin amah in sila-in bawl hi.

Siampite’ leitang bek amah in lei lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh siampite in Faro’ tung panin a kiciangtan zah an ngah uh a, amaute tungah Faro in a piak tawh amaute nungta zo uh ahih ciangin amaute in a leitang uh zuak lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in mite kiangah, “En un, tuni-in note le na leitang uh Faro adingin kong lei hi. Tu-in hih lai-ah no adingin khaici om a, note in leitang tungah na vawh ding uh hi.
Anlak ciangin Faro’ tungah nga-ah khat na pia ding uh a, nga-ah li pen lo ah khaici ding, note le na innkuanpihte uh le na tate uh’ an dingin na tang ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Nang in ka nuntakna uh nong hon khia khinzo hi. Ka topa uh lungdam hen; kote pen Faro’ sila ka hi ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro in nga-ah khat nei ding hi cihna, tuni donga a om, Egypt leitang tawh kisai-in Josef in ngeina kip khatin a bawl hi. Siampite’ leitang bek Faro-a’ suak lo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Egypt gam sung Goshen leitangah Israel-te teeng uh hi. Tua lai-ah amaute in neihsa ngah uh a, pungin tampi tak pha uh hi.
Egypt gamah Jakob kum sawm le kum sagih nungta lai ahih manin ama khan kum za le kum sawmli le kum sagih ahi hi.

Israel a sih ding hun a nai ciangin, amah in a tapa Josef samin ama kiangah, “Tu-in na muhna-ah maipha ka ngah leh, ka phei nuai-ah na khut hong koih inla, thumantak le citakin kei nong bawl ding thu hong ciam in. Egypt-ah kei hong vui kei inla,
ka pate tawh hong sial khawm in. Egypt panin kei hong pua khia inla, amau’ kivuina munah kei hong vui in,” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Na gen bangin ka gamta ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Kei’ tungah hong kiciam in,” a ci hi. Amah zong a pa’ tungah a kiciam hi. Tua ciangin Israel lungdamin a lupna lukhungah a mahmah a kunsuk hi.
Tua zawh a sawt loin, “Na pa a ci na hi,” ci-in Josef kiangah kigen ahih ciangin amah in a tapa nihte Manasseh le Efraim a paipih hi.
Jakob kiangah, “Na tapa Josef na kiangah hong pai hi,” ci-in kigen hi. Tua ciangin Israel in a tha sanin a lupna tungah a tu hi.
Jakob in Josef kiangah, “Kanaan gam Luz-ah Vanglian Pasian kei tungah hong kilangin kei thupha hong pia a,
kei kiangah, ‘En in, nang hong pungsakin, mihing hon khatin hong bawlin, nang’ khit cianga na suanlekhakte’ tungah a neih tawntung dingun hih leitang ka pia ding hi,’ hong ci hi.
“Tu-in, Egypt-ah nang kiangah kong pai ma-in Egypt gam sungah nang’ sung panin a suak na tapa nihte keima-a’ ahi hi. Reuben le Simeon-te mah bangin Efraim le Manasseh zong keima a’ hi ding hi.
Amaute’ khit cianga nang sung panin a suak tate pen nangma a’ hi ding hi. Amau’ gamh luahna-ah amau’ sanggamte’ min tawh amaute kilo khawm ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Paddan panin ka pai lai-in, Efrath tun ma diak, Kanaan gam lamkalah ka dah nadingin ka zi Rachel hong si hi. Efrath (Bethlehem) paina lampi-ah amah ka vui hi,” a ci hi.
Israel in Josef’ tapate a muh ciangin amah in, “Hihte kua ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Josef in a pa’ kiangah, “Pasian in hih lai-ah kei hong piak ka tapate ahi hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Kong thum hi; amaute thupha ka piak theih nadingin ka kiangah hong paipih in,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Israel’ mitte a khanghamna hangin maang a, amah in khua mu thei lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Josef in ama kiangah amaute paipih hi. Amah in amaute namin a kawi hi.
Israel in Josef kiangah, “Na maitang a hong mukik dingin ka kingaihsun kei hi. Tua hi napi, Pasian in na tate zong kei hong musak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in amaute a khuk panin la khia-in a mahmah lei lam nga-in a kun hi.
Josef in amau tegel la-in, Efraim’ taklam khut, Israel’ veilam khutah, Manasseh’ veilam khut, Israel’ taklam khutah a paipih hi.
Israel in a taklam khut zanin a nau zaw Efraim’ lu tungah nga a, Manasseh a ta upa ahih manin, a khut kipaihpehsakin Manasseh’ lu tungah a veilam khut a nga hi.
Amah in Josef thupha pia-in,“Ka pate Abraham le Isaac ina na a sep Pasian,tuni dongin ka nuntak tawntung ahlam hong pi Pasian,

siatna khempeuh paninkei hong tan khia vantungmi inhih tangvalte thupha pia henla,amaute sungah keima min leka pa Abraham le Isaac’ minkizomsak henla,leitungah amautemi honpi khatin khangsak tahen!” a ci hi.
A pa in a taklam khut Efraim’ lu tungah a koih Josef in a muh ciangin, tua in amah lungkimsak lo hi. Efraim’ lu panin Manasseh’ lu tungah koih dingin amah in a pa’ khut a la hi.
Josef in a pa kiangah, “Hi lo hi, pa aw; hih pen a suak masa ahi hi. Na taklam khut ama lu tungah koih in,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin a pa in nial a, “Ka thei hi, ka ta aw; ka thei hi. Amah zong mi khat suak dinga, amah zong lian ding hi. Ahi zongin amah sangin a naupa lian zaw dinga, a suanlekhakte, minam lianpi khat suak ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin amah in tua ni-in amaute thupha pia a,“Note, Israel sungahthupha na hi ding uh a,‘Pasian in Efraim le Manasseh banginnote hong bawl hen,’kici ding hi,” a ci hi.Tua bangin Jakob in Manasseh’ mai-ah Efraim a koih hi.
Tua ciangin Israel in Josef kiangah, “En in, kei a si ding ka hi ta hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in nang hong ompih dinga, na pate’ leitangah nang hong paipihkik ding hi.
Tua tham loin, ka namsau le ka thal tawh Amor mite’ khut tung panin ka lak mual pang khat, na sanggamte’ tung sangin nang’ tungah kong pia zaw hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jakob in a tapate sam a, “A hong tung ding hunte-ah note’ tunga hong tung ding thu kong gen theih nadingin note hong kikhawm un.
“Jakob’ tapate aw,hong kikhawmin za unla,na pa Israel’ thugen ngai un.
“Reuben, nang pen ka ta upa,ka vangliatna le ka tacil na hi a,a kiphasak pen,a vanglian pen na hi hi.
Tuihual bangin na kip kei dinga,na tungtuang kei ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh ka zi na luppih a,ka lupna na mindaisak hi.
“Simeon le Levi, unau hi a,a hiam uh ngongtat nadingin a zang uh hi.

Amau’ kikhopna-ah ka kihel kei dinga,amau’ pawl tawh ka kizom kei ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leha heh manun mi that uh a,kiphatsakna lungsim tawhamaute in mawlpih dinginbawngtalte’ zagui a sattat uh hi.
Amau’ sinsona lauhuai a,amau’ hehna kihtakhuai hi.Samsiatna ngah ta uh hen!Jakob suante sungahamaute ka khenthang dinga,Israel sungahamaute ka thehthang ding hi.
“Judah aw, na sanggamte innang hong phat ding hi.Na galte’ gawl na meek dinga,na sanggamte na mai-ahhong kun ding uh hi.
Judah pen humpinelkaitawh kibang a,a sa matsa a nek khit ciangina kua-ah a ciahkik tawh kibang hi.Humpinelkai banginkizia-in a lumsuk hi.Kua in amahphawng ngam ding hiam?
Judah in kumpi ciangkhutlen tawntung dinga,a suan a khakte in zongukna aana nei tawntung ding hi.Minam dangte inama tungah siah puak dinga,zahtakna tawhama mai-ah kun ding uh hi.
A sakolno leenggui-ah khih a,a lano leenggui limci pen ah khih hi.Amah in a puante leenggahzusungah sawp a,a puansilhte leenggahtui sansungah a sawp hi.
Leenggahzu a dawndawnna-ina mit san gega a,bawngnawi a dawndawnna-in a ha pak hi.
“Zebulun, tuipi gei-ah teeng ding hi. Amah,teembaw khawlna munsuak dinga,Sidon ciang dongaha gamgi om ding hi.
“Issakhar, a hat la tawh kibang a,vangik nih kikalah a lum hi.
A tawlngakna munhoihsa a,a leitang noptuak sa hi.Tua ahih ciangin van pua dingina liangko niamsak a,sila bangin na kisemsak hi.
“Dan in Israelminam dangte mah bangina mite thu khen ding hi.
Dan pen lampi-ah gulpi hi dinga,sul gei-ah gulgu nei hi ding hi.Sakol’ khetul petina tuang pa a nungkiat hi.
“Nong hotkhiat dingka ngak hi,Topa.Topa.
“Gad pen a buluhte inbuluh dinga,ahih hangin amah inamaute sulzuihkik ding hi.
“Asher’ lo ah an tampi piangdinga,amah in kumpi anlimtebawl ding hi.
“Naftali, a kikhah sakhipi hi a,sakhino suakkhiasak hi.
“Josef, a gah pha hiang ahi hi.Ciktui gei-a om a gah pha hiang hi a,a hiangte kulh tungah zaam hi.
Thal tawite in nakpitakin amah simin,amah thal tawh kap uh a,nasia takin gimsak uh hi.
Ahih hanginama thal liing loin om a,a khutte kizaptelsak hi.Jakob’ Vanglian Pa’ khut(Israel Suangpi, Tuucingpa’ min),
nang hong huh dingna pa’ Pasian intunga om vantung thuphate,nuai-a tuithukna sunga om thuphate,khawilevulh le tuletate,nangma tungah hong pia hi.
Na pa’ thuphate pentawntung mual liante’ thupha,tawntung mual neute sanginvanglian zaw hi.Tua thuphate Josef’ lu tungahhong tung henla,a sanggamte’ kiang panina kituam koihpa’ tungahhong tung tahen.
“Benjamin,a ne bakbak keivom hi a,zingsangin a sa matsa ne-in,nitakin a ngahsa teng hawm hi,”a ci hi.
Hihte khempeuh pen Israel minam sawm le nihte ahi hi. Hih thute pen amau tawh a kituak ciatin a pa in amaute thupha pia-in a gente ahi hi.

Tua ciangin Jakob in a tate thuhilhin amaute kiangah, “Kei, ka mipihte kiangah a kigawm ding ka hita hi. Kivui nading munin neih dingin Abraham in Hit mi Efron’ tung panin a lo tawh a leikhop, Kanaan gam, Mamre nisuahna lamah a om Makpelah lo-a leihawm, Hit mi Efron’ lo-a leihawm han sungah ka pate tawh hong vuikhawm un.
Tua lai munah amaute in Abraham le a zi Sarah vui uh hi. Tua lai munah amaute in Isaac le a zi Rebekah vui uh hi. Tua lai munah keimah in Leah ka vui hi.
Lo le tua sunga om leihawm Hit mite’ tung panin a kilei ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Jakob in a tapate thuhilh a man khit ciangin, a lupna tungah laitat a, a nunung pen a hu sang-in ama mipihte kiang a zuan ta hi.
Tua ciangin Josef a pa’ tungah pukin, ama tungah kap a, amah a nam hi.
A pa a muat loh nadingin a bawl dingin Josef in a nasem zatui siamte thu pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin zatui siamte in zatui tawh Israel a bawl uh hi.
Zatui tawh bawlna nasep hun tampi kisam a, ni sawmli sung sep ding kisam hi. Egypt mite ama hangin ni sawmsagih sung a kap uh hi.
Ama hangin kahna hun a bei ciangin Josef in Faro’ innkuante kiangah, “Tu-in note’ mai-ah maipha ka ngah leh Faro’ kiangah thu nong va gensak ding uh kong thum hi.

Ka pa in kei hong kiciamsak a, ‘Kei a si ding ka hi ta hi. Kanaan leitangah kei adingin ka khuatsa han sungah kei nong vui ding hi,’ hong ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kei hong paitosak inla, ka pa hong vuisak in, ci-in kong thum hi. Tua ciangin kei kong ciahkik ding hi, ci hi, va cihsak un,” a ci hi.
Faro in dawngin, “Paito inla, nang hong kiciamsak bangin na pa va vui in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a pa a vui dingin Josef paito hi. Amah tawh Faro’ nasemte khempeuh, a inn sung upate, Egypt gam upate khempeuh zong,
Josef’ innkuante khempeuh, a sanggamte, a pa’ innkuante bangmahin paito uh hi. A tate uh, a tuuhonte uh le a ganhing honte bek uh Goshen gamah kinusia hi.
Tua lai munah amah tawh leengte le sakol tuangte zong paikhawm to uh hi. Tua lai-a paite tam mahmah hi.
Amaute Jordan gun galkhat, Atad’ buhcilna phual a tun uh ciangin, nakpitakin dahna tawh a thuum uh hi. Amah in a pa’ hangin ni sagih sung dahna hun a bawl hi.

Tua gam a teeng Kanaan mite in, Atad’ buhcilna-ah tua banga kahna a muh ciangin amaute in, “Hih pen Egypt mite adingin a nasia mahmah thuumna ahi hi,” a ci uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun pen Abelmizraim, kici hi. Tua mun pen Jordan gun galkhat ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in amaute a thupiak bangin ama tapate in ama adingin bawlsak uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ama tapate in Kanaan gamah amah pua-in, kivui nading mun a neih dingin Abraham in Hit mi Efron’ tung panin a lo tawh a leikhop, Mamre nisuahna lamah a om, Makpelah mun lo sunga leihawm sungah a vui uh hi.
Josef in a pa a vui khit ciangin, a sanggamte le a pa a vui dingin amah a zui khempeuhte tawh Egypt-ah a ciahkik hi.
Josef’ sanggamte in a pa uh a sih khit ciangin, “Josef in eite hong mudahin ama tunga siatna i bawl khempeuh hong thukkik kha ding hi,” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Josef kiangah thu puak uh a, “I pa in a sih ma-in thu hong pia a,

‘Josef kiangah hih bangin ci un: Na sanggamte’ thupalsatna le a khialhna na maisak in, kong thum hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang’ tungah amaute in siatna hong bawl uh hi,’ ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang’ tungah kong thum uh hi. I pa’ Pasian’ nasemte’ thupalsatna hong maisak in,” a ci uh hi. Amaute in ama kiangah tua bangin thu a gen ciangun Josef a kap hi.
A sanggamte zong pai-in ama mai-ah puk uh a, “En in, kote, nangma nasemte ka hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin Josef in amaute kiangah, “Lau kei un. Kei, Pasian’ za-ah om ka hi hiam?
Note in ahihleh, kei’ tungah a sia dingin na ngaihsun uh hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in tuhuna mah bangin mi tampite a nuntak theihna a pian nadingin a hoih dingin a ngaihsut ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin lau kei un. Note le na tate uh adingin an kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi. Amah in tua bangin kip gen phakikin amaute a hehnem hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Josef, amah le a pa’ innkuante tawh Egypt-ah teeng uh a, Josef kum za le kum sawm nungta hi.
Josef in khang thumna ahi Efraim’ tate mu hi. Manasseh’ tapa Makhir’ tate zong Josef’ inn sung mahah suak uh hi.

Josef in a sanggamte kiangah, “Kei a si ding ka hi ta hi. Ahih hangin Pasian in note hong kem dinga, hih leitang panin amah in Abraham, Isaac le Jakob tunga a ciamsa leitangah note hong pai khiatpih to ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Josef in Israel tapate’ kiciamna bawlin, “Pasian in note hong kem dinga, note in hih lai panin ka guhte na pua to ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kum za le kum sawm a phakin Josef a si hi. Amaute in a muat loh nadingin zatui tawh amah bawl uh a, Egypt-ah hankuang sung khatah amah kikoih hi.
Jakob tawh Egypt-ah a hong pai, amau’ innkuan ciat tawh ahi Israel’ tapate’ minte:
Reuben, Simeon, Levi le Judah,
Issakhar, Zebulun le Benjamin,
Dan le Naftali, Gad le Asher ahi hi.
Jakob’ suanlekhakte khempeuh mi sawmsagih hi a, Josef pen Egypt-ah na om khinzo hi.
Tua ciangin Josef le a sanggamte le tua khangmi khempeuh si uh hi.
Ahih hangin Israel’ suanlekhakte pungin nakpitakin khang uh hi. Amaute tampi pha-in nakpitakin khang uh ahih manin Egypt gamah dim uh hi.
Tu-in Josef a thei lo kumpi thak khat Egypt gamah hong khang hi.
Amah in a mipihte kiangah, “En un, Israel mite eite adingin tam lua-in thahat lua uh hi.
Amaute hong tam kha ding uh ahih manin ngaihsut siamna tawh amaute hih ni. Eite tungah gal hong om leh amaute in i galte pawlin eite hong do-in hih gam panin tai khia kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nasepna tawh amaute a gimsak dingin amaute tungah nasem ukte koih uh hi. Israel mite in Faro adingin van koihna Pithom le Rameses khuapite lam uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute a kinenniam ciangin amaute tampi pha zaw-in kizelthang zaw uh hi. Egypt mite in Israel mite kihta uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Israel mite a gim mahmahin na semsak uh a,
buan le leiseek tawh nasepna le lo sungah nasep namkim khempeuh tawh amau’ nuntakna haksasak uh hi. Israel mite’ sepna khempeuh ah amaute in a gim mahmahin semsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Egypt kumpipa in Hebru mi nau a domsakte, khat’ min Shifrah, adang khat’ min Puah a kicite kiangah,
“Hebru numeite nau domin, nausuahna tutphah tungah a tut ciangun, tapa ahihleh a naungek na that ding uh a, ahi zongin tanu ahihleh na nungtasak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin naudomte in Pasian zahtak uh hi. Egypt kumpipa in amaute a thupiak bangin gamta lo uh a, nau pasalte nungtasak uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Egypt kumpipa in naudomte samin amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin hih bangin gamta a, nau pasalte nungtasak na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Naudomte in Faro’ kiangah, “Hebru numeite le Egypt numeite a kibat lohna hang ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute thadim uh a, amau’ kiangah naudomte a tun ma-in amaute na suak khin pahpah uh hi,” na ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Pasian in naudomte limbawl hi. Mite khangin pawl cing semsem uh hi.
Naudomte in Pasian zahtak uh ahih manin amah in amaute tungah suanlekhak a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in a mipihte khempeuh thu pia a, “Hebru mite sung panin tapa a suak khempeuh Nail gun sungah na khia ding uh a, ahi zongin tanu khempeuh na nungtasak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Levi’ suante khat in Levi numei khat mah zi-in la hi.
Tua numei gai-in tapa khat nei a, nau hoih khat hi, ci-in a muh ciangin, kha thum sung a seel hi.

Amah in naungek a seel zawh nawn loh ciangin ama adingin pumpeeng tawh kibawl lawh khat phansak a, tua lawh pen buan le kultal tui tawh a zut hi. Tua sungah naungek sialin gun gei-a phaikungte lakah a koih hi.
Amah bang a kicih hiam cih a thei dingin a gamla panin mun khatah a sanggamnu a ding hi.
Tu-in Faro’ tanu a kisil dingin gun-ah hong pai a, a nasem numeite gun gei-ah a vak lai takun amah in phaikungte lakah a lawh mu a, tua lawh a la dingin a nasem numei khat a sawl hi.
Amah in a hon ciangin naungek mu hi. Naungek kap ahih manin tua nu in hehpihhuai sa a, “Hih naungek, Hebru mite’ ta khat ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggamnu in Faro tanu kiangah, “Keimah pai-in Hebru numeite lak panin nang adingin naupang hong khoisak dingin naucing khat ka va sapsak ding hiam?” a ci hi.
Faro’ tanu in ama kiangah, “Va pai in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin numeino pai-in naupang’ nu va sam hi.
Faro’ tanu in ama kiangah, “Hih naupang la inla, kei adingin hong khoisak in; na thaman kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin nupi in naupang la-in a khoi hi.
Naupang khang a, amah in Faro tanu’ kiangah paipih a, amah pen tua nu’ tapa a suak hi. Amah in a min Moses a phuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Tui sung panin amah ka kai khia hi,” a ci hi.
Ni khat, Moses a khan khit ciangin, ama mipihte kiangah pai-in amau’ gimnate va mu hi. Egypt mi khat in ama mipih Hebru mi khat a sat zong a mu hi.
Amah khuadak kawikawi a, kuamah mu lo ahih manin Egypt mipa thatin sehnel sungah a seel hi.
A zing ciangin amah paikik a, Hebru mi nih na kilaii uh hi. Amah in a gamta khial mipa kiangah, “Bang hangin na lawm sat na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Amah in dawngin, “Kote a hong uk ding le thu a hong khen dingin kua in nang hong koih ahi hiam? Egypt mipa na thah bangin kei zong thah hong sawm na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Moses lau a, “A thu hong kithei taktak hi,” ci-in ngaihsun hi.
Faro in tua thu a zak ciangin Moses thah dingin a zong hi.Ahih hangin Faro kiang panin Moses tai-in Midian gam a tung hi. Ni khat amah tuikhuk gei khatah tu hi.
Tua laitakin Midian siampi Jethro in tanu sagih nei hi. Amaute hong pai-in tui tawi uh a, a pa uh’ tuuhonte tui pia dingin kuangzawn dim uh hi.
Tuucing dangte hong pai-in amaute hawl khia hi. Ahih hangin Moses dingto-in amaute huh a, a tuuhonte uh tui piaksak hi.
A pa uh kiangah amaute a tun ciangun amah in, “A bangci-a tuni-a hong hici ciah baih na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Egypt mi khat in tuucing dangte’ khut sung panin kote hong hon khia a, ko adingin tui nangawn hong tawisakin tuuhonte tui pia hi,” ci uh hi.
Amah in a tanute kiangah, “Amah koi lai-ah om ahi hiam? Bang hangin tua mipa nusia na hi uh hiam? Amah in an hong nek theih nadingin va sam un,” a ci hi.
Moses zong tua mipa kiangah om ding lungkim a, amah in Moses tungah a tanu Zipporah a pia hi.
Tua nu in tapa khat nei a, amah in a min Gershom a phuak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Gam dangah peemta ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua zawh kum tampi khit ciangin Egypt kumpipa si hi. Israel mite a salsuahna sung uhah amau’ kikona Pasian kiang tung hi.
Pasian in amau’ thumna za hi. Pasian in Abraham, Isaac le Jakob tawh a thuciamna a phawk hi.
Pasian in Israel mite mu a, amaute’ omzia zong a thei hi.
Tu-in Moses in Midian siampi ahi, a sungpa Jethro’ tuuhon kem hi. Amah in gamlak nisuahna lamah a tuuhon paipih a, Pasian’ mual ahi Horeb a tung hi.
Topa’vantungmi sawlpang kawm, meikuang sung panin ama tungah hong kilang hi. Amah khuadak a, sawlpang a kuang a mu hi. Ahi zongin kaangtum lo hi.Topa’
Moses in, “Bang hangin sawlpang kaangtum lo hiam, kei pai-in hih a lamdang ka muh va en dih ning,” ci hi.
Tua thu a thei dingin amah a painaTopain a muh ciangin, sawlpang kawm panin Pasian in amah sam a, “Moses, Moses!” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hiah om ing,” ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin amah in, “A nai-ah hong pai kei in. Na khe panin na khedapte suah khia in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma dinna mun, leitang siangtho ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Kei pen na pa’ Pasian, Abraham’ Pasian, Isaac’ Pasian le Jakob’ Pasian ka hi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Moses in Pasian a muh ding lau ahih manin a maitang a hum hi.
Tua cianginTopain, “Egypt-ah a om ka mite’ gimna mu khinin, amaute a uk nasem ukte’ hangin amau’ kikona ka za khin hi. Amau’ thuaknate ka thei a,Topa

Egypt mite’ khut sung panin amaute khahkhia-in, tua leitang panin amaute la khia-in a hoih a tanzau leitang, bawngnawi le khuaizu a luanna leitang, Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Amor mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite’ omna-ah amaute a paipih dingin kong paisuk hi.
Tu-in, en in, Israel mite’ kikona kei kiang hong tung khin a, Egypt mite in amaute a netniamna ka mu khin hi.
Hong pai in, nang in Egypt panin ka mi Israel-te na pai khiatpih theih nadingin Faro’ kiangah nang kong sawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in Pasian kiangah, “Faro’ kiangah pai-in Egypt panin Israel mite a pai khiatpih dingin kei, kua ka hi hiam?” ci hi.

Amah in, “Nang tawh kong om taktak ding hi. Hih pen nangma adingin nangmah kong sawlna lim hi ding hi: Nangmah in Egypt panin mihingte na pai khiatpih khit ciangin, nang in hih mualtungah Pasian na bia ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in Pasian kiangah, “Israel mite kiangah kei va pai-in amaute kiangah, ‘Na pate uh’ Pasian in note’ kiangah kei hong sawl hi,’ va ci leng, amaute in, ‘Ama min bang ahi hiam?’ ci-in hong dong leh, amaute’ tungah bang ci ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Pasian in Moses kiangah, “Keimahka hi hi,” ci hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Israel mite tungah hih thu genin, ‘Keimaha kici pa in note kiangah kei hong sawl hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.KeimahKeimah

Pasian in Moses kiangah, “Hih thu Israel mite tungah gen in: ‘Topa,na pate uh’ Pasian, Abraham’ Pasian, Isaac’ Pasian le Jakob’ Pasian in note kiangah kei hong sawl hi,’ ci in. Hih pen keima min hi tawntung ahih manin kei pen khang tawntungin phawk ding ka hi hi.Topa,

Pai in, Israel upate kaikhawmin amaute kiangah, ‘Topa,na pate uh’ Pasian, Abraham, Isaac le Jakob’ Pasian keima tungah hong kilang khinin, “Note le Egypt gam sungah note’ tungah hong kibawlna ka mu khin hi.Topa,

Egypt gam panin note hong la khia-in Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Amor mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite’ leitang, bawngnawi le khuaizu a luanna leitangah note kong paipih ding ka kiciam hi,” ci hi,’ va ci in.

“Amaute in nangma thu hong ngai ding uh hi. Nang le Israel upate, Egypt kumpipa kiangah pai-in ama tungah, ‘Topaahi Hebru mite’ Pasian, kote’ kiangah hong kilang zo hi. Tu-in kong thum uh hi,Topaka Pasian uh’ tungah biakna ka piak theih nadingun ni thum paina gamlakah kote hong paisak in,’ va ci un.TopaTopa
Thatanghat thu tawh a kisawl gawp kei buang leh Egypt kumpipa in note hong paisak loh ding zong ka thei hi.
Tua ahih ciangin keimah in ka khut zanin na lamdangte tawh Egypt ka vat gawp ding hi.
“Keimah in Egypt mite’ muhna-ah hih mihingte maipha ka pia ding hi. Note na pai khiat uh ciangin, a hawm guakin na pai kei ding uh hi.

Numei peuhmah in a veengte le ama inn sunga ompak mite’ kiang panin ngun le kham tawh kibawl kizepnate le puante ngen ding uh a, na tapate uh le na tanute uh tungah tuate na koih ding uh hi. Tua bangin note in Egypt mite’ na na sut ding uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in dawngin, “Ahih hangin amaute in kei hong um loin ka thu hong ngai lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, ‘Nang tungahTopahong kilang lo hi,’ hong ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain ama kiangah, “Na khut sungah bang om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Ciangkhut,” ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin amah in, “Lei-ah lawn in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in leilakah lawn a, gulpi khat a suak hi. Tua gulpi kiang panin Moses tai hi.
Ahih hanginTopain Moses kiangah, “Na khut zan inla a mei-in man in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut zanin man a, ama khut sungah ciangkhut a suakkik hi.Topa
Tua ciangin amah in, “Amaute in a up theih nadingunTopa, amaute’ Pasian, Abraham’ Pasian, Isaac’ Pasian le Jakob’ Pasian, nang’ tungah hong kilang khinzo hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua cianginTopain ama kiangah, “Na khut, na ang sungah koih in,” cikik hi. Amah in a khut a ang sungah koih hi. Amah in a lak khiatkik ciangin, a khut phak a, vuk bangin a pak hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Pasian in, “Na khut na ang sungah koihkik in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in a khut a ang sungah koihkik hi. Amah in a lak khiatkik ciangin ama cilesa dangte mah bangin damkik hi.
Pasian in, “Amaute in nang hong up kei a, lim masa a thudon kei uhleh zong, amaute in lim nunung um kha ding uh hi.

Amaute in hih lim nihte nangawn um loin na thu hong thudon kei leh, nangmah in Nail gun panin tui pawlkhat la-in lei keu tungah na sung dinga, Nail gun panin na lak tui pen lei keu tungah sisan suak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses inTopakiangah, “Oh, ka Topa aw, tumasiah hitaleh na nasem pa tungah thu na gen a kipan hitaleh, kei thugen a siam ka hi kei hi. Ka kampau ol-in, ka pau awk hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua cianginTopain ama kiangah, “Kua in mipa’ kam bawl ahi hiam? Kua in amah pau thei losak, bilngongsak, musak, mittawsak ahi hiam?Topaahi keimah hi lo ka hi hiam?TopaTopa
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in pai in. Keimah in na thugenna-ah kong huh dinga, na thugen ding nang kong hilh ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Oh, ka Topa aw, hong thum ing; midang khat sawl zaw in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Moses tungahTopaheh a, amah in, “Levi mi na sanggampa Aaron om hi lo ahi hiam? Amah in hoihtakin thu a gen theihna ka cian theih hi. En in, nangmah a dawn dingin amah hong pai khia a, amah in nang hong muh ciangin a lungsim sungah amah kipak ding hi.Topa
Nangmah in ama kiangah thu na gen dinga, thute amah na theisak ding hi. Keimah in na thugenna uhah kong huh dinga, na hih ding uh kong hilh ding hi.
Amah in nang’ tangin mite tungah thu gen ding hi. Amah in nang adingin thu hong gensak dinga, nang in Pasian bangin na gen ding teng amah na sawl ding hi.
Nangmah in limte na bawl nading ahi hih ciangkhut na khut sungah na tawi ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a sungpa Jethro’ kiangah Moses pai-in ama kiangah, “Hong thum ing; Egypt-ah ka sanggamte kiangah kei hong ciahkiksakin amaute a nungta lai uh hiam hong musak in,” a ci hi. Jethro in Moses kiangah, “Cidam takin va ciahkik in,” a ci hi.
Midian gam sungahTopain Moses kiangah, “Egypt-ah ciahkik in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang a hong that nuam mi khempeuh si khinta uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a zi le a tapate la a, la khat tungah amaute tuangsakin, Egypt gamah ciahkik hi. Pasian in a tawi dingin a gen ciangkhut, Moses in ama khut sungah a tawi hi.

Topain Moses kiangah, “Egypt-ah na ciahkik ciangin, nangma hih theih dingin vangliatna kong piaksa na lamdangte khempeuh Faro’ mai-ah na hih ding thei in. Ahih hangin keimah in ama lungsim ka khauhsak dinga, amah in mite paisak lo ding hi.Topa
Nangmah in Faro’ kiangah, ‘Topain hih bangin ci hi: Israel pen ka tapa a suak masa hi a,Topa
nangma kiangah, “Amah in kei hong biak theih nadingin ka tapa paisak in,” kong ci hi. Amah paisak ding na nial leh, en in, na tapa a suak masa ka that ding hi, ci hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Lampi-ah a giahna khatahTopain Moses dawntuahin thah a sawm hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Zipporah in meisuang khat la-in a tapa’ vun dawn at khiatsak a, tua tawh Moses lawngin, “Nang pen kei’ tungah sisan tawh ka pasal na hi taktak hi!” a ci hi.
Tua ahih cianginTopain Moses that lo hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in, vun atna hangin “Sisan tawh ka pasal na hi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua laitakinTopain Aaron kiangah, “Moses a dawn dingin sehnel gamah pai in,” ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah pai-in, Pasian’ mualah Moses dawnin a nam hi.Topa
Topain amah a sawlna thute khempeuh le ama sep dinga a sawl limte khempeuh Moses in Aaron’ tungah a gen hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Moses le Aaron pai-in Israel upate khempeuh a kaikhawm uh hi.
Topain Moses kiang a a gensa thute khempeuh Aaron in gen a, Moses in mite’ muhna-ah na lamdangte a lak hi.Topa
Mite in um uh hi. Israel mite kiangahTopahawhin, amau’ thuaknate amah in a muh khitna thu amaute in a zak uh ciangin, amaute in a lu uh kunin Pasian a bia uh hi.Topa

Tua khit ciangin Faro’ kiangah Moses le Aaron pai-in, “Israel PasianTopain hih bangin ci hi: ‘Amaute in sehnel gamah kei adingin pawi khat a kham theih nadingun ka mite paisak in,’ ci hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa
Ahih hangin Faro in, “Ama thu mangin Israel mite ka paisak nadinginTopana cih uh kua ahi hiam?Topana cih uh ka thei kei hi. Tua tham loin Israel-te ka paisak kei ding hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa

Tua ciangin amaute in, “Hebru-te’ Pasian ko kiangah hong kilang zo hi. Hong thum ung; amah in natna ahih kei leh namsau tawh kote hong hihkha ding ahih manin, ni thum paina sehnel gamah kote hong paisakin,Topaka Pasian uh’ tungah biakna hong piasak in,” a ci uh hi.Topa
Ahih hangin Egypt kumpipa in amaute kiangah, “Moses le Aaron aw, bang hangin amau’ nasepna panin mite pai khiasak ding na hi uh hiam? Na nasepnate uhah pai un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in, “En un, tu-in hih mite tam mahmah a, amau’ nasepnate panin amaute na tawlngasak uh hi,” ci lai hi.
Tua ni mahin Faro in nasem ukte le a nasem mapite thu pia a,
“Tumasiah-a bangin, leiseek bawl nadingin mite tungah buhtu na pia nawn kei ding uh hi. Amaute paisak unla, amau mah buhtu khawmsak tawm un.

Ahih hangin tumasiah-a a leiseek bawlzah mah uh amaute na bawlsak ding uh hi. Bangbang hitaleh na khiam kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute thadah uh hi. Tua ahih manin amaute kiko-in, ‘Kote hong paisakin ka Pasian uh tungah biakna hong piasak un’ ci uh hi.
Amaute in na semin zuau thute a don loh nadingin mihingte tungah nasep haksa zaw suan un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nasem ukte le nasem mapite pai khia-in mite tungah, “Faro in hih bangin ci hi: ‘Note buhtu kong pia kei ding hi.
Note pai unla, na muhna peuhpeuh uhah na buhtu ding uh va zong tawm un. Ahih hangin na nasep ngeizah uh themkhat zong hong kikhiam lo ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a buhtu dingun buhkung a kaikhawm dingin Egypt gam khempeuh ah mite kikhenthang uh hi.
Nasem ukte in kin ngaihsut uh a, “Buhtu hong kipiak hun mah bangin na nisim nasep zah uh zo un,” ci uh hi.

Israel mi nasem mapi, Faro’ nasem ukte in amaute a uk dingin a koih sawn mite kisatin, “Bang hangin tu ciang dong, leiseek bawl ding na nasep khempeuh uh hih khin nai lo na hi uh hiam?” ci-in kidong hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mi nasem mapite hong pai-in Faro’ kiangah, “Bang hangin na nasemte hih bangin hong bawl na hi hiam?
Na nasemte tungah buhtu hong kipia lo hi. Ahi zongin amaute in ko tungah, ‘Leiseek bawl un!’ hong ci hi. En in, na nasem kote hong kisat hi. Hih thu-ah nangma mite khial zaw hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin amah in, “Note na thadah uh hi, note na thadah uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin note in, ‘Hong paisak unla,Topa’tungah biakna hong piasak un,’ na ci uh hi.Topa’
Tu-in pai unla na sem un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note buhtu hong kipia lo dinga, ahi zongin leiseek a mal ngeina zah mah na pia khia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in, “Bangbang hitaleh nisimin leiseek na seek zah uh khiam lo ding,” a cih ciangin, amaute thu haksapi sungah om ahih lam uh Israel mi nasem mapite in mu uh hi.
Amaute Faro kiang panin a pai khiat ciangun, amaute a na ngak Moses le Aaron tawh kituak uh hi.

Amaute in, “Topain note hong enin thu hong khen hen. Bang hang hiam cih leh Faro le a nasemte’ muhna-ah kote a khial nong suaksak uh a, kote hong kithah theih nadingin thu a zong na hi uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa
Tua cianginTopa’lamah Moses kiheikikin, “Topaaw, bang hangin nangmah in hih mite tungah siatna bawl na hi hiam? Bang hangin kei hong sawl peuhmah na hi hiam?Topa’Topa
Bang hang hiam cih leh nangma min suangin Faro’ kiangah thugen dingin ka pai khit a kipan, amah in hih mite tungah siatna bawl napi-in nangmah in na mite na hon khia het kei hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hanginTopain Moses kiangah, “Tu-in Faro’ tungah ka bawl ding na mu ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ut lopipi-in amaute sawl khia ding hi. Amah in ut lopipi-in ama leitang panin amaute hawl khia taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Pasian in Moses kiangah, “Kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa
Abraham, Isaac le Jakob-te’ tungah Vanglian Pasian-in ka kilang a, ahih hanginTopaahi keima min tawh amaute’ tungah kei ka kitheisak kei hi.Topa
Amaute tawlkhat sung a tenna leitang ahi Kanaan gam amaute’ tungah piak dingin amaute tawh ka thuciamna zong ka kipsak hi.
Tua tham loin Egypt mite in salin a neih Israel mite’ thumna ka za zo a, ka thuciamna ka phawk zo hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite’ tungah, ‘Kei penTopaka hi hi. Egypt mite’ na na sepna uh panin note kong pai khiatpih ding hi. Amau’ sal hihna panin note kong khah khia dinga, a thahat ka khut zanin thukhenna nasep lian tawh note kong hon khia ding hi.Topa
Keima mi dingin note kong la dinga, kei pen note’ Pasian ka hi ding hi. Egypt mite’ sila hihna panin note a hong pai khiatpih pa,Topana Pasian uh ka hihna note in na thei ding uh hi.Topa
Abraham, Isaac le Jakob-te’ tunga ka ciam leitangah note kong paipih ding hi. Tua leitang na neih dingun note’ tungah kong pia ding hi. Kei penTopaka hi hi, ci hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.Topa
Moses in tua bangmahin Israel mite tungah a gen hi. Ahih hangin amau’ lungsim kitapna le a salsuahna sung uhah a gimna uh hangin amaute in Moses’ thu ngai lo uh hi.
Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Pai-in va tum inla, ama leitang panin Israel mite a pai khiatsak nading Egypt kumpipa Faro’ kiangah va gen in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses inTopakiangah, “En in, Israel mite nangawn in ka thu hong ngai lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin bangci-in thugen siam lo keima thu, Faro in hong ngai ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.Topa

Ahih hanginTopain Moses le Aaron tungah thu gen a, Egypt gam panin Israel mite a pai khiatpih dingin note ka hong sawlna thu, Israel mite le Egypt kumpipa Faro’ tungah va gen un, ci-in a hanthawn hi.Topa
Hihte pen amau’ beh lutangte ahi hi: Israel’ ta a suak masa Reuben’ tapate: Hanok, Pallu, Hezron le Karmi ahi hi. Hihte pen Reuben-te beh ahi hi.
Simeon’ tapate: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jakhin, Zohar le Kanaan numei’ tapa Shaul ahi hi. Hihte pen Simeon-te beh ahi hi.
Hihte pen amau’ khang tawh kizui-in Levi’ tapate’ min ahi hi: Gershon, Kohath le Merari hi a, Levi kum za le kum sawmthum le kum sagih nungta hi.
Gershon’ tapate: Amau’ innkuan tawh kizui-in Libni le Shimei ahi hi.
Kohath’ tapate: Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel hi a, Kohath kum za le kum sawmthum le kum thum nungta hi.
Merari’ tapate: Mahli le Mushi ahi hi. Hihte pen amau’ khang tawh kizui-in Levi-te beh ahi hi.
Amram in ama pa’ sanggamnu Jokhebed zi-in la a, tua nu in amah tawh Aaron le Moses nei hi. Amram kum za le kum sawmthum le kum sagih nungta hi.
Izhar’ tapate: Korah, Nefeg le Zikri ahi hi.
Uzziel’ tapate: Mishael, Elzafan le Sithri ahi hi.
Aaron in Amminadab’ tanu, Nahshon’ sanggamnu Elisheba zi-in la hi. Tua nu in amah tawh Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar nei hi.
Korah’ tapate: Assir, Elkanah le Abiasaf hi a, hihte pen Korah-te beh ahi hi.
Aaron’ tapa Eleazer in Putiel’ tanute khat zi-in la hi. Tua nu in amah tawh Finehas nei hi. Hihte pen a innkuan kuanin Levi mite’ beh lutangte ahi hi.
“Egypt gam panin Israel mite a honpi-in pai khiatpih in,”Topain a cihna mite pen hih Aaron le Moses ahi uh hi.Topa
Egypt gam panin Israel mite pai khiatpih nading thu Egypt kumpipa Faro’ tunga thu a gente pen hih Moses le Aaron ahi uh hi.Topa’
Egypt gamah Moses kiangahTopain thu a gen ni-in,Topa
Topain Moses kiangah, “Kei penTopaka hi hi. Na tunga kong gen khempeuh Egypt kumpipa Faro’ tungah gen in,” a ci hi.TopaTopa
Ahih hangin Moses inTopakiangah, “En in, kei pen thugen a siam lo mi ka hi hi. Tua ahih ciangin bangci-in Faro in ka thu hong ngai ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah, “Thei in, Faro’ tungah Pasian bangin nang kong bawl hi. Na sanggampa Aaron pen na kamsangpa hi ding hi.Topa
Nang kong thupiak khempeuh na gen ding hi. Ama leitang panin Israel mite a pai khiatsak nadingin Faro’ tungah na sanggampa Aaron in gen ding hi.
Ahih hangin keimah in Faro’ lungsim ka khauhsak dinga, Egypt gamah ka limte le ka na lamdangte tampi ka bawl khit hangin
Faro in nang’ thu hong ngai lo ding hi. Tua ciangin keimah in Egypt tungah gimna ka tungsak dinga, thukhen nasepna lianpite tawh Egypt gam panin Israel mi ahi ka mihonte ka pai khiatpih ding hi.
Keimah in Egypt tungah gimna tungsakin amaute’ lak panin Israel mite ka pai khiatpih ciangin Egypt mite inTopaka hihna hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Moses le Aaron zongTopa’sawl bangmahin gamta uh a,Topain amaute a thupiak bangin amaute in sem uh hi.Topa’Topa
Tu-in amaute in Faro’ tungah thu a gen laitakun Moses kum sawmgiat pha a, Aaron kum sawmgiat le kum thum a pha hi.
Topain Moses le Aaron’ kiangah,Topa

“Faro in note kiangah, ‘Note a thutak na hihna uh nalamdang khat tawh hong lak un,’ hong cih ciangin nangmah in Aaron kiangah, ‘Gulpi khat a suah theih nadingin na ciangkhut la inla, Faro’ mai-ah khia suk in,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro’ kiangah Moses le Aaron pai-inTopa’thupiak bangin gamta uh hi. Aaron in Faro le a uliante’ mai-ah a ciangkhut lawn suk a, gulpi khat a suak hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin Faro in a mipilte le a aisan siamte a sam hi. Egypt mitphial siamte in zong amau’ siamna tawh tua bang teek mahin a bawl thei uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a milip in a ciangkhut uh khia suk ciat uh a, tuate gulpi vive a suak hi. Ahih hangin Aaron’ ciangkhut in amau’ ciangkhutte a valhtum hi.
Topa’gensa bangin Faro’ lungsim khauh lai a, amah in amaute’ thu ngai lo hi.Topa’
Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “Faro’ lungsim khauh mahmah a, amah in mite paisak nuam lo hi.Topa
Tua ahih manin zingsangin Nail gun-ah a pai ciangin amah tawh a kimu dingin nang zong pai in. Gulpi a suak na ciangkhut pen mah tawi inla, gun gei-ah amah ngak in.

Amah tawh na kimuh ciangin ama kiangah, ‘Sehnel gam sungah ama mite in amah a biak theih nadingin a mite na paisak nading a gen dingin Hebru-te’ Pasian,Topain nang’ kiangah kei hong sawl khin hi. Ahi zongin tu ciang dong ama thu na mang kei hi.Topa
Tua ahih maninTopain, “Keima sep ding thute a muh ciangin kei kua ka hi hiam cih hong thei ding hi,” ci hi. En in, hih ka ciangkhut tawh gun tui ka sat dinga, tuite sisan hong suak ding hi.Topa
Ngasate si dinga, gun tui uih gawp ding ahih manin Egypt mite in dawn thei lo ding uh hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.

Topain Moses kiangah, “Aaron kiangah hih bangin gen in: ‘Na ciangkhut la inla, sisan a suah theih nadingin Egypt tuite, amau’ gunte, amau’ luite, amau’ bualte’ tung le amau’ tuili khempeuhte’ tungah na khut zan in. Egypt gam sunga sing beel le suang beel khempeuh sung nangawnah sisan om ding hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.Topa
Moses le Aaron inTopa’thupiak bangin hih uh hi. Faro le ama uliante’ muhin amah in ciangkhut vik to-in Nail gun sunga om tui sat a, Nail gun sunga om tui khempeuh sisan a suak hi.Topa’
Nail gun sunga ngasate si hi. Nail gun uih a, Egypt mite in Nail gun pan a tui dawn thei lo uh hi. Egypt gam sung khempeuh ah sisan om hi.
Ahih hangin Egypt mitphial siamte in amau’ siamna tawh tua bangmah bawl thei uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Faro’ lungsim a khauh ngei mahin khauh a,Topa’gensa bangin amah in amaute’ thu ngai lo hi.Topa’
Faro kihei-in a inn sungah pai a, amah in a lungsim nangawnah tua thu ngaihsutin nei nawn lo hi.
Amaute in Nail gun tui dawn thei lo uh ahih manin Egypt mite khempeuh in Nail gun kiim tengah tui dawn ding a to uh hi.
Topain gun a sat zawh ni sagih pha ta hi.Topa
Tua cianginTopain Moses tungah, “Faro’ kiangah pai-in ama tungah,Topain hih bangin ci hi: “Amaute in keimah hong biak theih nadingin ka mite paisak in.TopaTopa
Ahih hangin amaute na paisak kei leh, en in, na gam khempeuh uiphukte tawh ka gimsak ding hi.

Nail gun pen uiphukte tawh kidim dinga, tuate pen na inn sung, na lupna inndei sung, na lupna tung, na nasemte le na mipihte’ inn sung, na meikhukte le na annel mekna kuang sung uhah hong pai ding uh hi.
Uiphukte, nang’ tung le na nasemte khempeuh tungah hong pai ding hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses tungah, “Aaron kiangah hih bangin gen in: ‘Gunte, luite le tuilite tungah na ciangkhut zan inla, Egypt leitang tungah uiphukte paisak in,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Aaron in Egypt tuite tungah a khut zan a, uiphukte hong pai-in Egypt leitang a tuam hi.
Ahih hangin mitphial siamte in amau’ siamna tawh tua bangmah bawl thei uh a, Egypt leitang tungah uiphukte omsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Moses le Aaron samin, “Kei le ka mite’ kiang panin uiphukte a lakkhiat nadinginTopa’tungah thum in.Topa’tungah biakna a pia dingin mite ka paisak ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’Topa’

Tua ciangin Moses in Faro’ kiangah, “Nail gun sung cih sim loh, nangma kiang le na innte panin uiphukte a bei nadingin nang le na nasemte le na mite adingin ka thum theih nadingin a hun khat seh in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Zing ciang,” ci hi. Moses in, “Topaahi kote’ Pasian tawh a kibang kuamah om lo hi, ci-in na theih nadingin nangma cih bang hi tahen.Topa
Nang le na innte le na nasemte le na mite’ kiang panin uiphukte pai khia ding uh a, Nail gun sung bekah omlai ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Faro’ kiang panin Moses le Aaron a pai khia uh hi. Faro’ tungah a tunsak uiphukte a beisak nadinginTopa’tungah Moses in thu a ngen hi.Topa’
Topain Moses’ nget bangin hih a, innte le huang sung le lote panin uiphukte a si hi.Topa
Amaute in a lomlomin tuate khawm uh a, gam sungteng uih hi.
Ahih hangin nopna a omkik lam Faro in a muh ciangin, amah in a lungsim khauhsak a,Topa’gensa bangin amau’ thu ngai lo hi.Topa’
Tua cianginTopain Moses tungah, “Aaron’ kiangah hih bangin gen in: ‘Egypt gam sung khempeuh ah thokang a om nadingin na ciangkhut zanin leivui sat in,’ ci in,” a ci hi.Topa
Amaute in tua bangmahin hih uh hi. Aaron in a ciangkhut tawh leivui sat a, mihing tung le ganhing tungah thokang hong om hi. Egypt gam sung khempeuh ah leivui teng thokang suak hi.
Mitphial siamte in amau’ siamna tawh thokang piansak ding sin uh a, ahih hangin amaute in hih thei lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin mihing le ganhing tungah thokangte om hi.
Mitphial siamte in Faro’ kiangah, “Hih pen Pasian’ nasepna ahi hi,” ci uh hi. Ahih hangin Faro’ lungsim khauh a,Topa’gensa bangin amah in amaute’ thu ngai lo hi.Topa’
Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “Zingsangin tho baihin gun-ah Faro hong pai ding ngakin ama kiangah, ‘Topain hih bangin ci hi: “Amaute in keimah hong biak theih nadingun ka mite paisak in.TopaTopa

Tua bang hi loin, ka mite na paisak kei leh, en in, nang le na nasemte le na mite’ tung le na innte sungah tho honpite kong sawl ding hi. Egypt mite’ innte le tuate’ dinna leitang zong tho honpite tawh kidim ding hi.
Ahih hangin tua ni ciangin kei pen hih leitang tungahTopaka hihna na theih nadingin tho honpite a om loh nadingin ka mite a tenna Goshen leitang keimah in ka tuam koih ding hi.Topa
Tua bangin keima mite le nangma mite a kilamdanna khat ka bawl ding hi. Zing ciangin hih lim hong om ding hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Topain tua bangmahin hih ahih manin Faro’ inn sung le ama nasemte’ inn sungah tho honpi hong pai a, thote’ hangin Egypt gam sung khempeuh leitang kisia hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Faro in Moses le Aaron sam a, “Pai un; hih gam sungah na Pasian tung uhah biakna pia un,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Moses in, “Tua bangin hih ding kituak lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt mite adingin a deihhuai lo biaknate kote inTopaka Pasian uh tungah ka pia ding uh hi. Egypt mite adingin a deihhuai lo biaknate amau’ muhna-ah pia le ung, amaute in suang tawh kote hong deng ding uh hi lo ahi hiam?Topa
Kote, ni thum paina sehnel gamah pai-in ama hong thupiak ding banginTopaka Pasian uh tungah biakna ka va pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa

Tua ahih ciangin Faro in, “Sehnel gamahTopana Pasian uh tungah biakna a pia dingin note kong paisak ding hi. Ahi zongin gamlapi-ah na pai kei ding uh hi. Kei adingin zong hong thumsak un,” a ci hi.Topa

Tua ciangin Moses in, “En in, nang kiang panin kei pai khia-in Faro’ kiang pan, a nasemte’ kiang pan le a mite’ kiang panin tho honpite zing ciangin a pai khiat theih nadinginTopa’tungah thu ka ngen ding hi. Ahi zonginTopa’tungah biakna a pia dingin mite paisak lohna tawh Faro hong zuautatkik nawn kei in,” a ci hi.Topa’Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin Faro’ kiang panin Moses pai khia-inTopa’tungah thu a ngen hi.Topa’
Topain Moses’ nget bangin pia a, Faro’ kiang, a nasemte’ kiang le a mite’ kiang panin tho honpite la khia a, khat zong om nawn lo hi.Topa
Ahi zongin Faro in hih hunin zong a lungsim khauhsak lai a, mite paisak lo hi.
Tua cianginTopain Moses tungah, “Faro’ kiangah pai-in ama kiangah, ‘Topa,Hebru-te’ Pasian in hih bangin ci hi: “Amaute in keimah hong biak theih nadingin ka mite paisak in.TopaTopa,
Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in amaute paisak ding nialin amaute na let lai leh,
lo sunga om ganhing, sakolte, late, kalaohte, bawnghonte le tuuhonte tungah a nasia mahmah gimna ka tungsak ding hi.
Israel mite a’ khempeuh khat beek a sih loh nadingin Israel-te’ ganhingte le Egypt-te’ ganhingte’ kikalahTopain a kilamdanna khat ka bawl ding hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain a hun khat seh a, “Zing cianginTopain hih gam sungah hih na hong sem ding hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa
A zing cianginTopain hih na sem hi. Egypt mite’ ganhing khempeuh si a, ahih hangin Israel mite’ ganhing khat zong si lo hi.Topa
Faro in a en dingin mi sawl a, Israel-te’ ganhing khat zong na si lo hi. Ahih hangin Faro’ lungsim khauh lai a, amah in mite paisak lo hi.
Topain Moses le Aaron’ kiangah, “Meiphualpi panin khut dimin vut la unla, Faro’ muhin vantung lamah Moses in lawn hen.Topa
Tua vutte, Egypt gam khempeuh ah leivui neel bangin kithehthang dinga, Egypt gam sung khempeuh ah mihing le ganhing tungah meimatum suakin kilawh gawp ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in meiphualpi panin vutte la-in Faro’ mai-ah ding uh a, Moses in vantung lamah tuate lawn a, tuate in mihing le ganhing tungah meimatum piangsakin kilawh gawp hi.
Mitphial siamte in meimatum veina hangin Moses dem zo nawn lo uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mitphial siamte le Egypt mite khempeuh in meimatum vei uh hi.
Ahih hanginTopain Faro’ lungsim khauhsak a,Topain Moses’ tunga a gensa bangin amah in amaute’ thu ngai lo hi.TopaTopa

Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “Zingsangin tho baih inla, Faro’ mai-ah dingin ama kiangah, ‘Hebru mite’ Pasian,Topain hih bangin ci hi: “Amaute in keimah hong biak theih nadingun ka mite paisak in.TopaTopa

Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung khempeuh ah kei tawh a kibang khat beek om lo hi, ci-in na theih nadingin hih hunin na inn sungtawng dong le na nasemte le na mite’ tungah ka gimnate khempeuh kong tungsak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh tu-in keimah in ka khut zanin natna tawh nang le na mite hong vat gawpin, leitung panin note hong kibeisak thei hi.
Ahi zongin leitung khempeuh ah keima min a kipulak theih nadingin note tungah ka vangliatna lah ding deihna-in kong nungtasak lai hi.
Ka mite tungah nang kiliansak lai-in amaute na paisak kei hi.
En in, zing ciang tubang hunin Egypt gam a kisat a kipanin tuhun dongin tua bang a kimu ngei lo, a tam mahmah gialpi ka kiasak ding hi.

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in mi sawl inla, na ganhingte le gamlak a na neihte khempeuh a muanhuai bukna-ah koih in. Bang hang hiam cih leh inn-ah a kipaipih lo, gamlak a om mihing le ganhing tungah gialpi kia dinga, amaute si ding uh hi,” ci hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Faro’ nasemte’ lak paninTopa’thu a zahtak mi in ama silate le a ganhingte inn-ah taisak hi.Topa’
Ahi zonginTopa’thu a don lo mi in ama silate le a ganhingte gamlakah nusia hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah, “Egypt gam sung khempeuh a mihing le ganhing le gamlak kungte khempeuh tungah gialpi a kiat theih nadingin vantung lamah na khut zan in,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Moses in vantung lamah a ciangkhut a zan hi.Topain van gingsakin gialpi kiasak a, leitungah keek kia suk hi.Topain Egypt gam sungah gialpi zusak hi.TopaTopa
Egypt gam minam khat a suah khit a kipanin tua bang a om ngei lo, a tam mahmah gialpi le gialpi lakah khua phia-in keek ging om tawntung hi.
Gialpi in Egypt gam sunga a om mihing le ganhing, na khempeuh deng gawp hi. Gialpi in gamlak kung khempeuh deng gawp a, gamlak singkung khempeuh dengtan hi.
Israel mite a omna Goshen gam bekah gialpi kia lo hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in mi sawlin Moses le Aaron samsakin amaute kiangah, “Tutungin ka khial hi.Topaman hi. Kei le ka mite ka khial uh hi.Topa
Topa’tungah thum un. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih vanging le gialpi kicing zo hi. Note kong paisak dinga, note na khawl nawn kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Moses in ama kiangah, “Khuapi panin ka pai khiat khit phetinTopa’lamah ka khut ka zan ding hi. Leitung penTopaa’ hi, ci-in na theih nadingin vanging tawpin gialpi om nawn lo ding hi.Topa’Topa
Ahih hangin nang le na nasemte in ahihleh,TopaPasian na zahtak nai lohna uh ka thei hi,” a ci hi.Topa
(Anthul kungte le mangbuhham kisia hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mangbuhhamte a vuih laitak hi a, anthul kungte a pak laitak ahi hi.
Ahih hangin mangbuh le mangbuhmante sia lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate khangham nai lo hi.)
Tua ahih ciangin Faro’ kiang pan khuapi pualamah Moses pai khia a,Topa’lamah a khut zanin thu a ngen hi. Vanging le gialpi tawp pah a, leitungah guah bua nawn lo hi.Topa’
Ahih hangin guah le gialpi le vanging a khawlna Faro in a muh ciangin amah khial lai a, amah le a nasemte in a lungsim uh khauhsak uh hi.
Tua ahih cianginTopain Moses tungtawnin a gensa bangin Faro’ lungsim khauh lai a, amah in Israel mite paisak lo hi.Topa

Tua cianginTopain Moses tungah, “Faro’ kiangah pai in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute’ lakah hih keima limte ka lah theih nading le keimah in Egypt mite ka mawlpihna le amaute’ lakah bang limte bawl khin cihna thu na tate le na tute’ zakna-ah na gen theih nading le,Topaka hihna na theih nadingin ama lungsim le a nasemte’ lungsim ka khauhsak hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa

Tua ahih ciangin Faro’ kiangah Moses le Aaron pai-in ama kiangah, “Hebru mite’ Pasian,Topain hih bangin ci hi: ‘Ka mai-ah nang na kiniamkhiat nading bang tanvei nial ding na hi hiam? Amaute in keimah hong biak theih nadingin ka mite paisak in.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih leh ka mite paisak ding na nial leh, zing ciangin na gam sungah kauphete kong paipih dinga,

kuamah in leitang a muh theih loh nadingin tuate in lei maitang khempeuh tuam ding uh hi. Gialpi khit cianga nang a’ dinga a omlai sunte amaute in ne ding uh hi. Tuate in gamlak a a po nangma singkung khempeuh ne ding uh a,

nangma innte le na nasemte khempeuh le Egypt mite’ inn khempeuh ah dim ding uh hi. Na pu na pate uh leitang tungah a pian uh a kipan tuni donga tua bang a muh ngei lohte uh hi ding hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi. Tua ciangin amah kihei-in Faro’ kiang panin a pai khia hi.

Faro’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “Eite tungah hih mipa bang tanvei thangzak hong hi niloh ding ahi hiam? Amaute in amau’ Pasian,Topaa biak theih nadingun mite paisak in. Egypt a siatna theitel nai lo na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Faro kiangah Moses le Aaron kipaipihkik hi. Faro in amaute kiangah, “Pai un;Topa, na Pasian uh va bia un. Ahi zongin kua teng pai ding na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.Topa

Moses in, “Ka khangnote uh le ka khanghamte uh tawh ka paikhawm ding uh hi. Ka tapate uh, ka tanute uh, ka tuuhonte uh le ka bawnghonte uh tawh ka pai ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopaadingin pawi khat ka kham ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Faro in amaute kiangah, “Note tawh na naupangte uh kong paisak taak leh note tawhTopahong om ta ve! En un, note in ngimna hoih lo na nei uh hi.Topa
