Tua bang hi lo ding! Note’ lak panin pasalte pai unla,Topava bia un. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pen nomau’ ut ahi hi,” a ci hi. Faro’ omna panin amaute kihawl khia hi.Topa
Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “Egypt leitang tungah amaute hong omin, gialpi in a den baang kung khempeuh a ne ding kauphete sapna-in Egypt leitang tungah na khut zan khia in,” a ci hi.Topa

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Egypt leitang tungah a ciangkhut zan a,Topain tua sun tawntung le tua zan tawntung leitang tungah nisuahna huih a nungsak hi. Zingsang ciangin nisuahna huih in kauphete hong tun khin hi.Topa
Tua masiah kauphe hon tua banga a tam a om ngei lo, cikmah ciangin zong a omkik ngei lo ding, Egypt leitang tung khempeuh ah kauphe hong om a, Egypt gam buppi-ah a dim uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate in lei maitang khempeuh tuam uh a, leitang mial hi. Tuate in leitang tunga kung khempeuh le gialpi’ den baang singkung gah khempeuh ne uh hi. Egypt leitang tung khempeuh ah gamlak singkung hitaleh kungno hitaleh a hing khat beek om nawn lo hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Moses le Aaron nawh sap a, “Topana Pasian’ tung le nangma tungah ka khial khin hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka khialhna hong maisak in. Tu-a khatvei bek, kong thum hi; keima tung panin hih sihna a lakkhiat dingTopana Pasian’ tungah thum in,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Faro kiang panin amah pai khia-inTopa’tungah a thum hi.Topa’
Topain nitumna huihpi hat mahmah khat nungsak a, tua huih in kauphete laamto-in San Tuipi sung a denna hi. Egypt gam sungah kauphe khat zong om nawn lo hi.Topa
Ahih hanginTopain Faro’ lungsim khauhsak a, amah in Israel mite paisak lo hi.Topa
Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “Mite in khuamial sung a zawt nading, Egypt leitang tungah khuamial a om theih nadingin vantung lamah na khut zan in,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in vantung lamah a khut zan a, Egypt leitang tung khempeuh ni thum sung khua mial bikbek hi.
Ni thum sung amau khatlekhat kimu thei lo uh a, ama omna panin kuamah pai khia thei lo hi. Ahih hangin Israel mite in amau’ tenna-ah khuavak nei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Faro in Moses samin, “Pai un,Topava bia un; na tate uh zong note tawh hong pai thei ding hi. Na tuuhonte uh le na bawnghonte uh omsak lai un,” a ci hi.Topa
Ahih hangin Moses in, “Topaka Pasian uh tungah ka piak theih nadingun biakpiakna le meihal biakna kote nong neihsak kul hi.Topa

Ka ganhingte uh zong kote tawh a pai kul hi. Ganno khat zong kinusia lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopaka Pasian uh ka biak nadingun tuate ka paipih ding uh hi. A mun ka tun matengun bang pen tawhTopabia ding cih ka thei kei uh hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa
Ahih hanginTopain Faro’ lungsim khauhsak a, amah in amaute paisak lo hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Faro in ama kiangah, “Kei kiang panin kihem in. Nang kidawm in. Ka maitang hong mukik nawn kei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka maitang nong muh ni-in nang na si ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in, “Na cih bang hita hen! Na maitang kong mukik nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.

Topain Moses kiangah, “Faro le Egypt tungah gimna khat ka tungsak lai dinga, tua khit ciangin hih lai mun panin amah in note hong paisak ding hi. Amah in note hong paisak ciangin note hong hawl khia mang khin ding hi.Topa
Pasal peuhmah in a veengte kiang pan, numei peuhmah in zong a veengte’ kiang mah panin ngun le kham kizepnate a nget theih nadingun mite’ zakin thu gen in,” a ci hi.
Topain Egypt mite’ muhna-ah mite maipha pia hi. Tua tham loin, mipa Moses pen Egypt leitang tung, Faro’ nasemte’ muhna le mite’ muhna-ah lian mahmah hi.Topa
Moses in Faro’ kiangah, “Topain hih bangin ci hi: Zankim pawlin Egypt mite’ lakah ka pai ding hi.Topa
Kumpi tokhom tunga tu Faro’ tacil a kipanin an gawina nunga a om nasem numei tacil dong le ganhing tacil khempeuh, Egypt gam sungah tacil khempeuh si ding hi.
Cikmahin tua bang a om ngei lo, cikmah ciangin zong a omkik ngei lo ding kahna lianpi Egypt leitang tung khempeuh ah om ding hi.
Ahih hangin Egypt mite le Israel mite a kilamdanginTopain bawl hi, ci-in na theih nadingun Israel mite, mihing hitaleh ganhing hitaleh, ui khat nangawn zong tau lo ding hi, ci hi” a ci hi.Topa

Tua ciangin Moses in Faro’ kiangah, “Na uliante khempeuh keima kiangah hong paisukin, keima kiangah hong kun ding uh a, ‘Nang le nangmah hong zui khempeuh pai khia un,’ hong ci ding uh hi. Tua khit ciangin kei ka pai khia ding hi,” ci thuah lai hi. Tua ciangin Faro’ kiang panin amah a heh mahmahsa-in a pai khia hi.
Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “Egypt tungah nalamdang tam ka bawl theih nadingin Faro in na thu hong ngai lo lai ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Moses le Aaron in hih na lamdangte khempeuh Faro’ mai-ah a bawl uh hi.Topain Faro’ lungsim khauhsak a, amah in Israel mite a leitang panin pai khiasak lo hi.Topa
Egypt gam sungahTopain Moses le Aaron kiangah,Topa
“Tu kha pen note adingin kum kipatna hi dinga, note adingin kum khat sungah a kha masa hi ding hi.
Israel mihon khempeuhte tungah gen in. Tu kha ni sawm ni-in innkuan khat adingin tuuno ahih kei leh keelno khat, amau’ innkuan phazah tawh kituakin amaute in ganno khat ciat go ding uh hi.
Ganno khat a ne ding innkuanmi a tawmluat leh amau’ innzom a veengte tawh a mi tawh kituakin a sa hawm ding uh hi. A mi tamna le a nekzah uh tawh kizui-in ganno man pia ding uh hi.
Na ganno uh a sitbaang lo hi dinga, kum khat a pha a pa hi ding hi. Tua pen tuu ahi a, keel ahi zongin, khat peuhpeuh hi thei ding hi.
Tua gannote pen Israel mihonte khempeuh in a gawh ding hun nitak khuamui, tua kha ni sawm le li dong na kem ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a si kimkhat la-in a nekna uh inn kongkhak khuam nihte le a baang tung zawl nuh ding uh hi.
Amaute in tua zanin a sa hangkeu-in ne ding uh a, silngo sawh loh anlum le a kha mehteh tawh amaute in ne ding uh hi.
A sate mun khat peuhpeuh a sial ahi a, tui tawh huanin ahi zongin ne loin, a lu le a khete le a sungkuate tawh hangkeu-in, na ne ding uh hi.
Zingsang dong a khing na omsak kei ding uh a, zingsang cianga a khing omlai peuhmah na haltum ding uh hi.
Hih bang zia-in na ne ding uh hi: Na kawng uh gakin, na khedap uh na khe uhah bulhin, na ciangkhut uh na khut uhah na tawi ding uh a, na nawh nek ding uh hi. Tua penTopa’Paisan Pawi ahi hi.Topa’

“Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in tua zanin Egypt gam ka nawk dinga, Egypt leitang tungah mihing hitaleh ganhing hitaleh tacil khempeuh ka vatlum dinga, Egypt pasian-te khempeuh tungah thu ka khen ding hi. Kei penTopaka hi hi.Topa

Note’ omna inn tunga sisan pen note adingin lim hi ding hi. Sisan ka muh ciangin note kong paisan dinga, Egypt leitang ka vat gawp ciangin note hong susia ding gimna note’ tungah hong tung lo ding hi.
“Hih pen note adingin phawkna ni hi dinga, note inTopa’tungah pawi bawlna ni-in na nei ding uh hi. Na khang tawntungun note in biakna ngeina kip khatin na nei tawntung ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’

Topain, “Note in ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi. A ni masa ni-in note in na inn panun silngo na hem khia ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh khatpeuh in a ni masa ni panin a ni sagih ni dong silngo sawh a nek leh, Israel mi-in tua mipa kiseh nawn lo ding hi.Topa
A ni masa ni le a ni sagih ni-in a siangtho biak kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, tua ni nih sung na bangmah na sem kei ding uh hi. Ahi zongin na milipun an huanin na ne thei ding uh hi.

Note in silngo sawh loh anlum pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih ni teekteekin Egypt leitang panin na mihonte uh ka pai khiatpih hi. Tua ahih ciangin note in na khan tawntungun hih ni pen biakna ngeina kip khatin na nei tawntung ding uh hi.
Kha masa, tua kha sawm le li nitakin note in silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh a, tua kha ni sawmnih le khat nitak dong na ne ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh ni sagih sung na inn sung uhah silngo kimu lo ding hi. Mi khatpeuh, peemta hitaleh gammi hitaleh in silngo sawh a nek leh Israel mi-in tua mipa kiseh nawn lo ding hi.
Silngo a kisawh peuhmah na ne kei ding uh hi. Na omna khempeuh uhah silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Israel upate khempeuh samin amaute kiangah, “Nomau adingin na innkuan uh tawh a kituakin tuunote teel unla, Paisan Pawi bawl nading tuuno go un.

Puknah lomkhat la unla, kuang sunga om sisan sungah diahin, kuang sunga om sisan tawh baang tung zawl le kongkhak khuam nihte nuh un. Zingsang matengin a inn kongkhak pua-ah kuamah pai khia lo ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt mite a that dinginTopain hong nawk ding hi. Baang tung zawl le kongkhak khuam nih tunga sisan a muh cianginTopain kongkhak paisan dinga, a susia dingte pen note that dingin na inn sung uhah tumsak lo ding hi.TopaTopa
Note le na tapate un hih pen biakna ngeina kipin na nei tawntung ding uh hi.
Amah in hong ciamsa banginTopain note hong piak ding leitang na tun uh ciangin hih ngeina na zui ding uh hi.Topa
Na tate un note kiangah, ‘Hih banga hihna pen bang a cih nopna ahi hiam?’ hong cih ciangin,

note in, ‘Topa’Paisanna hangin biakpiakna ahi hi. Amah in eite’ innkuante hong khawi-in Egypt mite a thah lai-in Egypt gam sungah Israel innkuante paisan hi,’ na ci ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’Mite in a lu uh kunin Pasian a bia uh hi.
Tua cianginTopain Moses le Aaron a thupiak bangin mite a gamta uh hi.Topa
Ama kumpi tokhom tunga a tu Faro’ tacil a kipanin thongmial sunga a om a kiman mite’ tacil le ganhing tacil khempeuh, zankim laitakinTopain vat gawp hi.Topa
Tua zanin Faro le a nasemte khempeuh le Egypt mite khempeuh tho uh a, Egypt gam sungah kahna lianpi a om hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh khat beek a sih lohna inn khat zong om lo hi.
Faro in Moses le Aaron zan sap a, “Ding un; keima mite’ lak panin note le Israel mite pai khia unla, na gensa bangunTopava bia un.Topa
Na gensa bangun na tuuhonte uh le na bawnghonte uh la unla, pai un. Kei zong thupha hong pia un,” a ci hi.
Tua gam panin mite manlangin a sawlkhiat nading uhah Egypt mite nawh tat mahmah uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Eite khempeuh i si khin ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite in silngo sawh nai loh a annel lom uh la-in, annel mekna amau’ kuangte puan tawh tunin a liangko uhah pua uh hi.
Moses in amaute tunga a gen bangin Israel mite zong gamta uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Egypt mite’ tung panin ngun le kham kizepnate le puante ngen uh hi.
Amau’ ngette a piak nadingunTopain Egypt mite’ muhna-ah Israel mite maipha a pia hi. Tua bangin amaute in Egypt mite’ na a sut uh hi.Topa
Israel mite numei le naupang kisim loin pasal tul zaguk Rameses panin Sukkoth-ah khe-in pai uh hi.
Minamdang tampi le tuuhon le bawnghon, ganhing tampi zong amau tawh pai uh hi.

Egypt panin a ken uh annel lom panin amaute in silngo sawh loh moh em uh hi. Tuate silngo a kisawh lohna pen Egypt gam panin amaute kinotkhia a, ze-ol tat thei loin amau’ annek ding zong kiging man lo uh hi.
Israel mite Egypt-ah kum zali le kum sawmthum sung om uh hi.
Kum zali le kum sawmthum a cin ni teekteekin Egypt leitang paninTopa’mihonpite pai khia uh hi.Topa’

Egypt leitang panin amaute a pai khiatpih nadingin hih penTopa’zan vilna ahi hi. Tua mah bangin Israel mite khempeuh in zong amau’ khang tawntunginTopaadingin hih zan mah zan vilna-in a nei uh hi.Topa’Topa
Topain Moses le Aaron kiangah, “Hih Paisan Pawi pen biakna ngeina kip khat hi dinga, gamdangmi kuamah in ne lo ding hi.Topa
Ahih hangin sum tawh a kilei sila peuhmah in a vun na at khit uh ciangin ne thei ding hi.
Peemta hitaleh a kicial nasem hitaleh in ne thei lo ding hi.
Inn sungah kine dinga, inn pua-ah a sa na pai khiatpih kei ding uh hi. A guh na kuaitan kei ding uh hi.
Israel mihon khempeuh in hih ding uh hi.

Khualmi khat note kiangah hong peem a,Topaadingin Paisan Pawi a bawl leh, ama mipih pasal khempeuh a vun ki-atsak un. Tua khit ciangin amah a nai-ah hong pai-in bawl thei dinga, amah pen gammi khat tawh kibang ding hi. Ahih hangin vun ki-at lo mi kuamah in ne lo ding hi.Topa
Gammi le note’ lakah hong peem khualmi adingin ngeina khat bek om ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua bangin Israel mite khempeuh gamta uh a,Topain Moses le Aaron a thupiak bangin amaute in hih uh hi.Topa
Tua ni teekteekinTopain Israel mite a honpi-un Egypt gam panin a pai khiatpih hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Keima tungah tacil khempeuh hong ap in. Israel mite’ lakah, mihing hitaleh ganhing hitaleh, naubu a hong masa pen peuhpeuh keima-a’ ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Moses in mite tungah, “Salsuahna Egypt gam panin na pai khiat uh hih ni phawk un. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopain vangliatna tawh hih mun panin note hong pai khiatpih hi. Silngo sawh anlum kine lo ding hi.Topa
Abib kha, tuni-in note a pai khia na hi uh hi.

Amah in note tungah piak dinga na pate’ tungah a ciam, bawngnawi le khuaizu a luanna leitang, Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Amor mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite’ leitangahTopain note hong paipih ciangin hih kha sungin hih bangin na hih ding uh hi.Topa
Note in silngo sawh loh anlum ni sagih sung na ne ding uh a, a ni sagih ni-inTopapahtawina pawi khat om ding hi.Topa
Silngo sawh loh anlum ni sagih sung kine ding hi. Note’ tungah silngo sawh anlum kimu lo dinga, note’ huang sung khempeuh ah silngo kimu lo ding hi.
Tua ni-in na tate uh kiangah, ‘Egypt panin ka pai khiat lai-unTopain ko a’ dinga hong hihsakna hang hi,’ ci-in na gen ding uh hi.Topa

Na kam unTopa’Thukham a gen tawntung theih nadingin hih pen na khut tung uhah lim, na taltang tung uhah phawkna khat hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopain a vangliatna tawh hih mun panin note hong pai khiatpih hi.Topa’Topa
Tua ahih ciangin note in a kiseh hunin kum khat pan kum khat, hih biakna ngeina kip na zui ding uh hi.
“Amah in note le na pate uh tungah a ciam bangin,Topain Kanaan leitangah note hong paipih hun ciang le note tungah tua gam hong piak ciangin,Topa
note in naubu a hong masa khempeuhTopaadingin na tuam koih ding uh hi. Na ganhing uh a tacil a pa khempeuh zongTopaa’ hi ding hi.TopaTopa
La a tacil peuhmah tuuno khat tawh na tanh ding uh hi. Na tat kei ding uhleh a ngawng na kuaitan ding uh hi. Note’ tapate’ lak panin tacil peuhmah na tanh ding uh hi.
Hong pai ding hunah na tapa in, ‘Hih pen bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?’ ci-in nang hong dot ciangin, nangmah in ama kiangah, ‘Salsuahna, Egypt paninTopain vangliatna tawh kote hong pai khiatpih hi.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh Faro in kote paisak ding a nial tentan ciangin Egypt gam sunga tacil khempeuh, mihing tacil le ganhing tacil khempeuhTopain that hi. Tua ahih ciangin naubu a hong masa a pa khempeuhTopa’tungah biakna-in ka pia uh hi. Ahih hangin ka tapate uh sung pan tacil khempeuh ka tanh uh hi,’ na ci ding hi.TopaTopa’
Tua pen na khut tunga om ciaptehna lim ahih kei leh na mitte’ kikal-a talsuante bang hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopain a vangliatna tawh Egypt panin eite hong pai khiatpih hi,” a ci hi.Topa

Faro in mite a paisak ciangin, lampi tom pen hitaseleh, Pasian in Filistia gam tawnin amaute paipih lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in, “Amaute in gal a tuah ciangin mite kisikin Egypt-ah ciahkik kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Pasian in San Tuipi lam manawhin sehnel gam lamah mite kot paipih hi. Israel mite gal a do dingin a kithawisa-in Egypt leitang panin a paito uh ahi hi.

Moses in Josef’ guhte paipih hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ama guhte a puak ding uh Josef in Israel mite thupi takin kiciamna bawlsak khin hi. “Pasian in note hong hotkhiat ciangin note in hih lai panin keima guhte na pua ding uh hi,” na ci khin hi.
Sukkoth panin amaute pai lai uh a, sehnel gam nawl, Etham-ah giahphual sat uh hi.

Amaute, sun hitaleh zan hitaleh khualzinin a pai theih nadingun sunin amaute lam a lak dingin meii khuam khat tawh, zanin amaute khuavak a pia dingin mei khuam khat tawh, amaute’ mai-ahTopaa pai hi.Topa
Sunin meii khuam le zanin mei khuamte, mite’ mai-ah om tawntung hi.
Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite kiheikikin Migdol le tuipi kikal, Pihahiroth mai, Baalzefon nisuahna lamah giahphual a sat ding gen in. Tuipi gei, tua galkhat ah giahphual na sat ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Faro in Israel mite’ thu tawh kisai genin, ‘Sehnel gam sungah amaute tangciak uh hi. Sehnel gam in amaute khuhcip khin hi,’ ci ding hi.

Keimah in Faro’ lungsim khauhsakin, amah in Israel-te hong delh dinga, Faro le a mihonpite khempeuh ka zawhna hangin minthanna ka ngah ding hi. Kei,Topaka hihna thu Egypt mite in thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Amaute zong tua bangmahin gamta uh hi.Topa

Mite tai khinzo hi, ci-in Egypt kumpipa kiangah a kigen ciangin, Faro le ama nasemte’ ngaihsutna kikheel a, amaute in, “Eite’ na hong sep nading panin Israel mite i pai khiatsak, hih banga i gamtat bang hi mawk ahi hiam?” ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin amah in a leeng kithawisakin ama galkapte la-in,
a kiteng khia leeng zaguk le Egypt leeng khempeuh a ukte tawh kuan khawm hi.
Topain Egypt kumpipa Faro’ lungsim khauhsak a, Israel mite kithamuanna tawh a pai khiat lai takun a delh hi.Topa

Egypt mite ahi, Faro’ sakolte, leengte, ama sakol tung tuangte le a galkapte in amaute delh uh a, amaute giahphual satin tuipi gei-a a omna uh, Pihahiroth gei, Baalzefon nisuahna lam munah a pha uh hi.
Faro hong nai ciangin Israel mite khuadak to uh hi. En in, amaute’ nungah Egypt mite hong kuan hi. Amaute lau mahmah uh hi.Topa’tungah Israel mite kiko uh hi.Topa’
Amaute in Moses kiangah, “Egypt-ah han a om loh manin sehnel gam sungah a si dingin kote hong pai khiatpih na hi hiam? Egypt panin pai khiatpihna tawh kote’ tungah bang hong bawl na hi hiam?

‘Kote hong hici omsak inla, Egypt mite’ na hong semsak in,’ ci-in Egypt-ah nang’ tungah hong gen hi lo ka hi uh hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh sehnel gamah sih sangin Egypt mite’ na sep ding kote adingin hoih zaw ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Moses in mite tungah, “Lau kei un, kiptakin om un. Note-a’ dingin tuni-a hong sep dingTopa’hotkhiatna mu un. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuni-a na muh uh Egypt mite, note in na mukik nawn kei ding uh hi.Topa’
Topain note adingin hong dosak dinga, note na hih uhleh na om hithiat ding bek uh ahi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah, “Bang hangin kei’ tungah hong kiko na hi uh hiam? Israel mite mai nawtin a pai ding uh gen in.Topa
Israel mite in lei keu tungtawnin tuipi a kantan theih nadingin na ciangkhut laamto inla, tuipi tungah na khut zanin tuipi khenkham in.

Amau’ nungah Egypt mite hong pai-in, keimah in Faro le a mihonpite khempeuh, a leengte le a sakol tung tuangte ka zawhna hangin minthanna ka ngah nadingin keimah in Egypt mite’ lungsim ka khauhsak ding hi.
Faro le ama leengte le ama sakol tung tuangte ka zawhna hangin minthanna ka ngah khit cianginTopaka hihna thu Egypt mite in hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Israel mihonpite’ mai-ah a pai Pasian’ vantungmi kikhinin amaute’ nungah a pai hi. Amaute’ mai panin meii khuam kikhinin amaute’ nungah dinga,
Egypt honpite le Israel honpite’ kikalah a pai hi. Tua lai-ah meii le khuamial om a, zan tawntung khatlekhat kinai kha loin zingsang khua hong vak hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in tuipi tungah a khut zan hi.Topain zan tawntung nisuahna huihpi hat tawh tuipi mut gawpin, tuipi pen lei keu-in bawl a, tuite a kikhen hi.Topa
Israel mite, tuipi laizang lei keu tungah pai uh a, amau’ taklam le veilamah kawm bangin tuite om hi.
Egypt mite ahi, Faro’ sakol khempeuh, ama leengte le ama sakol tung tuangte in delhin tuipi laizang amaute’ nungah pai uh hi.
Zingsang cianginTopain mei le meii khuam sung panin Egypt mihonpite en sukin, Egypt mihonpite phial gawp a,Topa

amau’ leengpeite gumsak ahih manin man bekbakin hawl uh hi. Egypt mite in, “Israel mite’ kiang panin tai ni. Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt mite hong langpanginTopain amau adingin hong do hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa
Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “Egypt mite’ tung, amau’ leengte tung le amau’ sakol tung tuangte’ tungah tui hong luankik theih nadingin tuipi tungah na khut zan in,” a ci hi.Topa

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in tuipi tungah a khut zan a, a zingsang khuavak ciangin a luan ngei bangin tuipi hong luangkik hi. Tua tui sung panin Egypt mite taikhiat sawm uh a, ahi zonginTopain tuipi laizangah Egypt mite zo gawp hi.Topa
Tui hong paikikin leengte le sakol tung tuangte le tuipi sungah amaute a delh Faro’ mihonpite khempeuh tuum a, amaute khat zong suakta lo hi.
Ahih hangin tuipi kantanin lei keu tungah Israel mite pai uh a, amau’ taklam le veilamah kawm bangin tuite a om hi.
Topain tua bangin Egypt mite’ khut sung panin tua ni-in Israel-te hon khia a, tuipi gei-ah Egypt mi a site, Israel mite in mu uh hi.Topa
Israel mite in Egypt mite’ tungahTopa’bawl nasepna lianpi mu uh a, mite inTopaa zahtak uh hi. Amaute inTopale ama nasem Moses a um uh hi.Topa’TopaTopa
Tua ciangin Moses le Israel mite inTopa’tungah hih la sa uh a,Topa’“Topaphatna la ka sa ding hi.TopaAmah in minthangin zo khin a,amah in sakol le a tuang patuipi sungah a lawn hi.
Topa, kei a hong hupa hi a,Topakeimah hong hon khia pa ahi hi.Amah, keima Pasian hi a,amah ka phat ding hi.Ka pa’ Pasian hi a,amah ka liansak ding hi.
Topa, galhang pa hi a,TopaTopa,ama min ahi hi.Topa,
“Faro’ leengte le a mihonpitetuipi sungah lawn a,a kiteng khia ama ulianteSan Tuipi sungah tum hi.
Tui in amaute tuum a,suangtum bangina thukna sungahamaute kia suk uh hi.
“Topaaw, na taklam khut,Topathahatin minthang a,Topaaw, na taklam khut inTopagalte a thehthang hi.
Na vangliatna tawh nangmah inna langte na lawnthal hi.Na hehna na khah khia a,tua in amautebuhkung bangina kaangtum hi.
Na nak ging tawhtuite kiciangto-in,tuite a lomin dingto a,tuipi sungahtui thukpi a khal hi.
Galte in, ‘Ka delh dinga,ka pha ding hi.A nate uh ka hawm dinga,ka deih zahzahin,tuate ka tang ding hi.Ka namsau ka dok dinga,ka khut inamaute susia ding hi,’ ci hi.
Nang in na huih tawh na mut a,tuipi in amaute tuum hi.A kihtakhuai tui sungahhaknaw banginamaute tum uh hi.
“Topaaw, pasian-te’ lakahTopakua, nang tawh kibang ahi hiam?Kua, nang tawh kibangin,sianthona-ah lianin,minthang nasepna-ahkihtakhuai-in,nalamdang sem ahi hiam?
Na taklam khut na zan a,leitung in amaute nawmvalh hi.
Nangmah in na ciamsa zui-inna tatkhiatsa mite na paipih a,na hatna tawha siangtho na omna-ahamaute lam na lak hi.
Midangte inhih thu za khin uh a,amaute liing uh hi.Filistia-ah a teeng mitelau-in liingcip uh hi.
Tu-in Edom ukpite lungkia uh a,Moab makaite, liingcip uh hi.Kanaan-ah a teeng mi khempeuha hanna uh beita hi.

Launa le kihtaknaamaute’ tungah tunga,a thahat na vangliatna hanginamaute suangtum bangintaang loin om uh hi.Topaaw,Topanangma mite in a khen mateng,na leisa mite in a khen matengamaute khikcip uh hi.
Nang in amaute hong paipihinnangma mual tungahamaute na suan ding hi.Topaaw,Topana om nading muninna bawlsa munah,Topaaw,Topana khutte in a phuhsa na biakinn-ahna koih ding hi.
TopainTopauk tawntung ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Faro’ sakolte ama leengte tawh, a sakol tung tuangte tuipi sungah a pai ciangin,Topain tuipi tuite amaute tuumsakkik a, ahi zongin Israel mite tuipi laizang lei keu tungah a pai uh hi.Topa
Tua ahih manin Aaron’ sanggamnu Miriam in a khutah khuang khat tawi hi. Ama nungah numeite khempeuh laamin khuang tawh a zui uh hi.
Miriam in amaute la sak hi:“Topala sak un.TopaAmah in minthangin zo khin a,amah in sakol le a tung tuangte,tuipi sungah a lawn hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in San Tuipi panin Israel mite paipih suak a, Shur sehnel gamah a pai uh hi. Sehnel gamah ni thum sung pai uh a, tui mu lo uh hi.
Marah a tun uh ciangin a tui kha ahih manin Marah tui dawn thei lo uh hi. Tua ahih manin Marah ci-in min kiphuak hi.
Moses tungah mite phun uh a, “Bang dawn ding ihi hiam?” ci uh hi.

Topa’tungah amah kiko hi.Topain singkung khat amah lak a, amah in tui sungah tua sing lawn a, tui lim hong suak pah hi.Topa’TopaTopain tua lai munah amaute adingin thukham khat le ngeina kip khat bawl a, tua lai munah amah in amaute’ tungah laktel a,Topa

“Note inTopana Pasian uh thu limtakin na ngaih uh a, ama mai-ah a man nate hihin, ama thupiakte don a, ama ngeina kipte khempeuh na zuih uhleh, Egypt mite’ tungah ka tunsak natnate khat beek note’ tungah kong tungsak kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei penTopa, note hong damsak pa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa
Tua ciangin amaute ciktui sawm le nih le nisuh kung sawmsagih a omna mun Elim tung uh a, tui gei tua munah amaute in giahphual a sat uh hi.
Elim panin amaute ding khia uh a, Egypt leitang panin a pai khiat zawh uh a kha nihna ni sawm le nga ni-in Elim le Sinai kikal-a om Sin sehnel gamah Israel mihonte khempeuh tung uh hi.
Sehnel gamah Moses le Aaron’ tungah Israel mihon buppi phun uh a,

amaute tungah, “Kote, sabeel phungah tu-in ka kham takun an ka nek lai-un Egypt leitangahTopain hong that khin hi zaw taleh maw! Bang hang hiam cih leh mihon buppi a puksisak dingin note in sehnel gamah nong pai khiatpih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa

Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “En in, note adingin vantung panin an kong zusak ding hi. Keima thu a zuih uhleh a zuih loh uh ka theihtel nadingin mite pai khia-in nisimin ni khat khamkhop ding kaikhawm ding uh hi.Topa
A ni guk ni-in mite in ni simin a khop ngei zah nih uh khawmin bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses le Aaron in Israel mite tungah, “Nitak ciangin, Egypt gam panin note hong pai khiatpih pa penTopaahihna na thei ding uh hi.Topa

Topa’tungah na phunna uh amah in za khin ahih manin zingsang cianginTopa’vangliatna na mu ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kote’ tungah na phun uh, kote a bang hi mawk ka hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.Topa’Topa’

Moses in, “Ama tungah na phunnate uhTopain a zakna hangin,Topain note’ tungah nitak an nek ding sa, zingsangin na kham tak uha na nek ding uh an hong piak ciangin - kote pen a bang hi mawk ka hi uh hiam? Note’ phunnate pen kote’ tung hi loinTopa’tung ahi hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopaTopa’
Moses in Aaron’ kiangah, “Israel mihon buppi tungah, ‘Amah in note’ phunnate za khin ahih maninTopa’mai a nai-ah hong pai un,’ ci in,” a ci hi.Topa’
Israel mihon buppi tungah Aaron in thu a gen laitakin, amaute in sehnel gam lam en uh a, tua laitakin meii sungahTopa’vangliatna hong kilang hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Israel mite’ phunnate ka za khin hi. Amaute kiangah, ‘Khuamui ciangin note in sa na ne ding uh a, zingsang ciangin an na kham ding uh hi. Tua ciangin kei penTopana Pasian uh ka hihna na thei ding uh hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.Topa
Nitak ciangin vamimte hong leengin giahphual hong tuam hi. Zingsang ciangin giahphual kiimah daitui kia hi.
Daitui a kap ciangin gamlak lei maitang tungah a pum ciltel, a khal, vukkhal bangin a pak dikdek leitungah om hi.

Israel mite in a muh uh ciangin amaute khatlekhat in, “Bang ahi hiam?” kici uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in tua pen bang hiam cih thei lo uh hi. Moses in amaute’ kiangah, “Topain nek dinga note’ tungah hong piak an ahi hi.Topa
Topa’thupiak hih bang ahi hi: ‘Note in na milipun na khamzah ding uh khawm un. Na puanbuk sung uhah mi omzah tawh kituakin mi khat lawhta khat ciat na la ding uh hi,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.Topa’
Tua mah bangin Israel mite gamta uh hi. Amaute in kaikhawm uh a, pawlkhat in tam, pawlkhat in tawm, kaikhawm uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in lawhta khat tawh a teh uh ciangin a tam a kaikhawmte-a’ dimval lo a, a tawm a kaikhawmte-a’ dimlah tuan lo hi. A milipin a khamzah ding khawm uh hi.
Moses in amaute’ kiangah, “Kuamah in zingsang dong koih kei un,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amaute in Moses’ thu ngai lo uh hi. Mi pawlkhat in zingsang dong koih uh a, than omin ning hi. Amaute tungah Moses heh hi.
Zingsang simin amaute in a khamzah ding ciat uh khawm uh hi. Ahi zongin ni a sat ciangin leilak a omte tuisuak hi.
A ni guk ni-in amaute in an a zah nih, lawhta nih ciat, khawm uh hi. Mihon makaite khempeuh hong pai-in Moses kiangah a gen uh ciangin

amah in amaute kiangah, “Topa’hong thupiak hih bang ahi hi: ‘Zing ciang pen a thupi-a tawlngak ni,Topaadingin sabbath siangtho ni ahi hi. Na em dingte uh emin, na huan dingte uh huan unla, a omlai teng zingsang ciang dong koih un,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.Topa’Topa
Tua ahih ciangin amaute in Moses’ sawl bangin zingsang dong koih uh hi. Ning lo a, than zong tu lo hi.
Moses in, “Tuni-in ne un; tuni penTopaadingin Sabbath ahi hi. Tuni-in a pualamah na mu kei ding uh hi.Topa
Note in ni guk sung na khawm ding uh a, ahi zongin sabbath ni ahi a ni sagih ni-in bangmah om lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
A ni sagih ni-in a kaikhawm dingin mi pawlkhat kuan khia uh a, ahi zongin amaute in bangmah mu lo uh hi.
Topain Moses kiangah, “Ka thupiakte le ka thute zuih ding bang tanvei nial ding na hi uh hiam?Topa

Thei un!Topain note’ tungah sabbath hong piazo hi. Tua ahih ciangin ni guk ni-in amah in note tungah ni nih khom ding an hong pia hi. Note na milipun nomau’ omna ciatah om un. A ni sagih ni-in ama omna panin kuamah pai khia kei hen,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin a ni sagih ni-in mite tawlnga uh hi.
Tu-in Israel mite in a min manna ci uh hi. Tua pen nannan tang tawh kibangin a mel kang a, a limna pen khuaizu tawh a kibawl mohpheng tawh kibang hi.

Moses in, “Topa’thupiak hih bang ahi hi: ‘Egypt leitang panin note kong pai khiatpih lai-in sehnel gamah note kong vakna an na suanlekhakte un a muh theih nadingun na khang tawntungun lawhta dim khat kem un,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.Topa’
Moses in Aaron kiangah, “Beel khat la inla, tua sungah manna lawhta dim khat koih inla, na khang tawntungun a kikem dinginTopa’mai-ah koih in,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses a thupiak bangin Aaron in kep dingin Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah a koih hi.Topa
Amaute a ten theih nading uh leitang a tun mateng, kum sawmli sung Israel mite in manna ne uh a, Kanaan gamgi a tun matengun manna bek a ne uh ahi hi.
(Lawhta khat pen seu khat seh sawm suah seh khat ahi hi.)
Topa’thupiak bangin Israel mihon khempeuh Sin sehnel gam panin giahphual a ban banin sat uh a, Refidim-ah phual sat uh hi. Ahih hangin mite’ dawn ding tui om lo hi.Topa’

Tua ahih ciangin mite in Moses’ tungah mawhna zong uh a, “Tui dawn ding hong pia in,” ci uh hi. Moses in amaute kiangah, “Bang hangin kei’ tungah mawhna hong zong na hi uh hiam? Bang hanginTopaze-et na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.Topa

Ahi zongin tua munah tui duhin mite dangtak uh a, Moses’ tungah mite phunin, “Kote le ka tate uh le ka ganhingte uh dangtakin a si dingin bang hangin Egypt panin hong paipih to na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih cianginTopa’tungah Moses kiko a, “Hih mite bang cih ding ka hi hiam? Suang tawh kei hong deng dingin amaute kithawi uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah, “Israel upate pawlkhat samin mite’ mai-ah pai in. Nail na satna ciangkhut na khutin tawi-in pai in.Topa

En in, Horeb-a suangpi-ah nangma mai-ah ka ding ding hi. Nang in suangpi na sat dinga, mite in tui a dawn theih nadingin tua suang sung panin tui hong phul khia ding hi,” a ci hi. Israel upate’ muhna-ah tua bangmahin Moses gamta hi.
Israel mite’ mawhzonna le amaute inTopaze-etin, “Eite’ lakahTopaa om mah ahi hiam?” a cihna hangun, tua mun pen Massah le Meribah, ci-in min kiphuak hi.TopaTopa
Tua ciangin Amalek mite hong pai-in Israel mite tawh Refidim-ah kido uh hi.
Moses in Joshua kiangah, “Eite adingin mi teel inla, pai-in Amalek mite tawh kido in. Zing ciangin, Pasian in ka tawi dingin a hong sawl ciangkhut tawi-in mual dawnah ka ding ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in ama tungah a gen bangin Joshua gamta a, Amalek mite tawh kido uh hi. Moses, Aaron le Hur-te mual dawnah paito uh hi.
Moses in a khut a sansak lai teng Israel mite in zo a, a khut a niamsak ciangin Amalek mite in zo hi.

Ahih hangin Moses a khut kham hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in suangtum khat la-in ama nuai-ah koih uh a, tua suang tungah amah tu a, Aaron le Hur in a pang khat tuak panin ama khutte len uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin nitum mateng ama khutte kip hi.
Joshua in Amalek le ama mite namsau tawh vatmai hi.
Topain Moses kiangah, “Keimah in mun khempeuh panin Amalek mite ka phiat siangtho nading thu phawk nadingin hih thu laibu sung khatah gelh inla, Joshua kiangah hih thu genkik in,” a ci hi.Topa
Moses in biakna tau khat lamin a min dingin, “Topa, keima zawhna lim ahi hi,” ci-in phuak a,Topa
“Topa’dial sang tawi un!Topain a khang khangin Amalek mite do ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’Topa
Moses’ sungpa, Midian siampi Jethro in Moses le ama mi Israel-te adingin Pasian’ sepna,Topain Egypt panin Israel mite a pai khiatpihna thu khempeuh a za hi.Topa

Tu-in Moses’ sungpa Jethro in, Moses a sawl khit a kipanin Moses’ zi Zipporah le ama tapa nihte kem a, a khat min Gershom ahi hi. (Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Gam dangah peemta ka hi hi,” ci hi.)
Adang khat min Eliezer ahi hi. (Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, “Ka pa’ Pasian pen keimah hong huhpa hi a, Faro’ thah nading panin kei hong hon khia hi,” ci hi.)
Pasian’ mual tungah giahphual a satna sehnel gam Moses kiangah Jethro in Moses’ tapate le a zi hong puak hi.
Mi khat in Moses kiangah, “En in, na zi le a tapa nihte tawh nang kiangah na sungpa Jethro hong pai hi,” a cih ciangin
Moses zong a sungpa a dawn dingin pai khia a, zahtakna pia-in amah a nam hi. Amaute khatlekhat omzia kidong tuak uh a, puanbuk sungah a pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in a sungpa kiangahTopain Israel mite’ hangin Faro’ tung le Egypt mite’ tungah a bawlte khempeuh, lampi-ah amau’ tungah a tung haksatna khempeuh leTopain amaute a hotkhiatna thu a gen hi.TopaTopa
Egypt mite’ khut sung panin amah in amaute a khahkhiatna, Israel mite tungahTopain a hoih a bawlte khempeuh hangin Jethro lungdam hi.Topa
Jethro in, “Egypt mite le Faro’ khut sung panin note hong khah khiaTopain thupha ngah tahen.Topa

Topapen pasian dang khempeuh sangin a liatzawkna tu-in ka thei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mite tungah kiphatsakna tawh Egypt mite a gamtat lai takin amah in Egypt mite’ khutnuai panin mite khah khia hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Moses’ sungpa Jethro in Pasian’ tungah meihal biakna le biakpiakna a bawl hi. Pasian’ mai-ah Moses’ sungpa tawh an a ne khawm dingin Israel upate khempeuh le Aaron hong pai uh hi.
A zing ciangin mite’ thu a khen dingin Moses tu a, zingsang a kipan nitak dongin Moses’ kiimah mite a ding uh hi.

Mite adingin ama hihte khempeuh Moses’ sungpa in a muh ciangin amah in, “Mite a’ dinga nang’ sep hih pen a bangci ahi hiam? Bang hangin nang bek tu a, zingsang a kipan nitak dongin na kiimah mite khempeuh ding ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
Moses in a sungpa kiangah, “Pasian’ thu a kan dingin kei’ kiangah mite hong pai uh hi.
Amaute in thu a neih uh ciangin kei kiangah hong pai uh a, mi khat le a veengpa’ kikalah thu ka khen a, Pasian’ ngeina kipte le ama thukhennate amaute ka theisak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses’ sungpa Jethro in ama kiangah, “Nangma hihzia hoih lo hi.
Nang le na kiang a om mite in na zawngkhal lawh ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua nasep nang adingin gik lua hi. Nang bek in na sem khinzo kei hi.
Tu-in ka thu hong ngai in; thu kong lak ding hi. Pasian in nang hong ompih tahen. Nang pen Pasian’ mai-ah mite’ tangin pai-in, amau’ thute Pasian’ kiangah na gen ding hi.
Nangmah in ngeina kipte le thukhennate amaute na hilh dinga, amau’ lam pai nading le amau’ sep dingte amaute na theisak ding hi.

Tua tham loin, mi khempeuh lak panin Pasian a zahtak mi, a muanhuai mi le sumgolh a mudah mi, mi siamte na teel khia ding hi. Tua bang mite pen a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a uk dingin na koih ding hi.

Mite’ thu amaute khensak tawntung in. Amaute in thu liante bek nang kiangah hong puak ding uh a, ahi zongin thu neute amau mah in khen tawm ding uh hi. Tua hileh nang adingin baih zaw dinga, amaute in na vangik hong puakpih ding uh hi.
Hih bangin hih lecin Pasian in thahatna hong pia dinga, nangmah in na sem paisuak zo ding hi. Tua tham loin hih mite khempeuh zong amau’ omna-ah lungnuam takin ciah thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a sungpa’ thu ngai-in ama gen khempeuh a hih hi.
Israel mi khempeuh sung panin Moses in mipil mi siamte teel a, mite a tul, a za, a sawmnga, a sawmte tungah a ukin mite’ lutangin amaute a bawl hi.
Amaute in mite tungah a tawntungin thu khen uh hi. Amaute in thu haksate bek Moses tungah puak uh a, ahi zongin thuneute amaute in khen tawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in a sungpa ciah khiasak a, Jethro zong ama gamah a ciahkik hi.
Egypt gam panin Israel mite a pai khiat zawh kha thumna a ni masa ni-in amaute Sinai sehnel gam tung uh hi.
Refidim panin amaute ding khia-in Sinai gam a tun uh ciangin, amaute in sehnel gam tua mual mai-ah giahphual a sat uh hi.
Pasian kiangah Moses paito hi.Topain mual panin amah sam a, “Jakob’ suanlekhak Israel mite tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi:Topa
Egypt mite tungah ka bawlna le muvanlai in a kha tawh a note a puak bangin note hong pua-in keima kiangah kong paipihna na mu khin uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note in ka thu mangin ka thuciamna na zuih uhleh mite khempeuh lak panin note pen keima mi na hi ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leitung khempeuh keima a’ hi a,
note pen keima siampi nasep a sem minam le minam siangtho na hi ding uh hi. Israel mite tungah hih thute na gen ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses hong pai-in upate sam a,Topain amah a thupiak hih thute khempeuh amaute’ mai-ah a sung hi.Topa
Mi khempeuh in, “Topa’gensa khempeuh ka hih ding uh hi,” ci-in dawng khawm uh hi. Moses in mite’ thugenteTopa’tungah a gen hi.Topa’Topa’

Topain Moses tungah, “En in, nang kong hopih ciangin mite in a zak theih nading le nang zong hong up theih nadingun meii sahpi sungah nang kiangah kong pai ding hi,” a ci hi.TopaTua ciangin Moses in mite’ thugenteTopa’tungah a gen hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah, “Mite kiangah pai inla, tuni le zing ciang sungteng amaute siangthosakin, amau’ puante amau mah sawpsakin,Topa
a ni thum ni-in a baihsa-in om un. Bang hang hiam cih leh a ni thum ni-in Sinai Mual tungah mite khempeuh’ muhna-ahTopahong paisuk ding hi.Topa
Nangmah in mite adingin dalna khat a kimkotah na koih dinga, ‘Mualtungah pai loin, a gamgi na lawnkhak loh nadingun kidawm un; mual a lawng peuhpeuh kithat ding hi.

Khut peuhmah in tua mi kithat ding pa lawngkha lo dinga, suang tawh kidenglum ahih kei leh kikaplum ding hi. Ganhing hitaleh mihing hitaleh kihing khawi lo ding hi,’ na ci ding hi. Peengkul sauveipi hong kitum ciangin amaute mualtungah hong paito ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mual tung panin mite kiangah Moses paisuk a, mite siangthosak hi. Amaute in a puante uh sawp uh hi.
Amah in mite kiangah, “Ni thum ni ciangin a baihsa-in om un; numei tawh lumkhawm kei un,” a ci hi.
A ni thum ni zingsang ciangin van gingin khua phia a, mualtungah meii sahpi kai a, nakpitakin a ging peengkul kitum ahih manin giahphual a om mi khempeuh liing uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in giahphual panin Pasian a dawn dingin mite pai khiatpih a, amaute a om nading mual bulah om uh hi.
Meikhu in Sinai Mual tuamcip hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mei sung tua mualtungahTopaa kumsuk hi. A khu, meiphualpi khu bangin kahto a, a mual buppi nakpitakin kiliing hi.Topa
Peengkul aw a nak gin semsem laitakin Moses pau a, Pasian in vanging sungah amah dawng hi.
Sinai Mual dawnahTopahong paisuk hi.Topain tua mual dawnah Moses sam a, Moses zong paito hi.TopaTopa
Topain Moses kiangah, “Amaute inTopaa en dingin hong kantanin amaute tampi tak si kha ding uh ahih manin paisuk inla, mite hilh khol in.TopaTopa
Amaute’ tungahTopahehlua kha ding ahih manin,Topa’kiangah hong pai siampite zong amau mah kisiangthosak tawm hen,” a ci hi.TopaTopa’

Moses inTopa’tungah, “Sinai Mual dongah mite hong pai thei lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang mahmah in kote nong thuhilh a, ‘Mual kimkotah dalnate bawl inla, siangthosak in,’ nong ci hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain ama kiangah, “Paisuk inla, Aaron hong paipihto in. Ahih hangin amaute’ tungah amah hehlua kha ding ahih maninTopakiang dongah a pai dingin siampite le mite paisuaksak kei in,” a ci hi.TopaTopa
Tua ahih ciangin mite kiangah Moses paisukin amaute kiangah a gen hi.
Pasian in hih thute khempeuh gen a,
“Kei pen salsuahna Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpihTopana Pasian uh ka hi hi.Topa
“Keimah longal pasian dang na bia kei ding uh hi.
“A kiseek milim hitaleh, tunga vantung hitaleh, nuai-a leisung hitaleh, leinuai-a om tui sungah hitaleh a om na khat peuhpeuh a sun khat peuhpeuh note adingin na bawl kei ding uh hi.

Tuate’ mai-ah na kun kei ding uh a, tuate na bia kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah note’TopaPasian, a aam Pasian ka hi a, kei hong mudahte’ tungah pate’ mawhna tate’ tungah khang thum khang lina dongin thuk-in,Topa
ahih hangin kei hong itin ka thupiakte a zui mi a tul tampite tungah itna kip a lak pa ka hi hi.
“Topanote’ Pasian’ min a sia lamin na zang kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopain ama min a zang khialte gim pia ding hi.TopaTopa
“Sabbath ni a siangtho-a zat ding phawk un.
Ni guk sung nomau’ na semin na nasep ding khempeuh uh na hih ding uh hi.

Ahi zongin a ni sagih ni penTopanote’ Pasian’ Sabbath ni ahi hi. Tua ni-in note, na tapate, na tanute, na nasempate, na nasem nute, na ganhing uh ahi a, peemtate in ahi zongin na bangmah na sem kei ding uh hi.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh a ni guk sung tenginTopain van le lei, tuipi le tuate sunga om khempeuh bawl a, a ni sagih ni tawlnga hi. Tua ahih cianginTopain Sabbath ni thupha pia-in siangthosak hi.TopaTopa
“Topana Pasian un note hong piak leitang tungah na khan uh a sau theih nadingin na nu le na pa uh zahtak un.Topa
“Mi na that kei ding uh hi.
“Nulepa mawhna na bawl kei ding uh hi.
“Na na gu kei ding uh hi.
“Na veengte uh langkhat ah a man loin teci na pang kei ding uh hi.

“Na veengte uh inn na deihgawh kei ding uh hi. Na veengte uh zi hitaleh, ama nasem pa hitaleh, ama nasem nu hitaleh, ama bawngtal hitaleh, ama la hitaleh, na veengte a’ ahi na khat peuhpeuh na deihgawh kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in mite khempeuh in vangingte, peengkul aw le mual meikhu thu a theihtel uh ciangin, lau-in a liing uh hi. Amaute a gamla-ah ding uh a,
Moses kiangah, “Nangmah in kote kiangah thu hong gen in; kote in ka ngai ding uh hi. Ahi zongin kote si kha ding ka hih uh ciangin ko tungah Pasian hong gensak kei in,” a ci uh hi.
Moses in mite kiangah, “Lau kei un; bang hang hiam cih leh note khialkha loin amah na kihtak theih nadingun note’ tungah a laktel dingin Pasian hong pai ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Pasian’ omna meii sah nai-ah Moses a pai laitakin mite a gamla-ah a ding uh hi.
Topain Moses kiangah, “Nangmah in Israel mite tungah hih bangin na gen ding hi: ‘Vantung panin note kong hopihna note mahmah in na thei khin uh hi.Topa
Note in kei tawh nong biakkhop dingun ngun pasian-te le kham pasian-te na bawl kei ding uh hi.

Note in keima adingin lei tawh biakna tau khat bawl unla, tua tungah na meihal biaknate uh le thunuama na biaknate uh, na tuute uh le na bawngtalte uh pia un. Keima min a kiphawk nading munin ka bawlna peuhmahah note kiangah keimah hong pai-in note thupha kong pia ding hi.
Note in keima adingin suang tawh biakna tau na bawl uhleh, a kiseek suang tawh na bawl kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na nazatte uh tawh na va suk uhleh a ninsak na hi uh hi.
Tua tungah na seelsim uh a kidawk khak loh nadingin ka biakna tau tung kahtoh nading kahlei a kulin na sang bawl kei ding uh hi,’ ci in.
“Tu-in hihte pen amaute’ tungah na piak ding biakna ngeina kipte ahi hi.
Hebru mi sila khat na lei uh ciangin, amah in kum guk sung na hong sepsak dinga, a kum sagihna ciangin bangmah hong pia loin a suakta-in pai khia ding hi.
Amah guakin hong pai ahihleh amah guak mahin pai khia dinga, zi neisa-in hong pai ahihleh amah tawh a zi zong pai khia ding hi.
A topa in amah zi guan a, tua nu in amah tawh tapate ahi a, tanute ahi zongin a neih leh, a zi le a tate pen a topa a’ hi dinga, amah guakin pai khia ding hi.
Ahih hangin sila in a kitel takin genin, ‘Ka topa, ka zi le ka tate ka it hi; a suakta-in ka pai khia kei ding hi,’ a cih leh,

tua ciangin a topa in thukhente kiangah amah paipih ding hi. Amah in kongkhak ah ahi a, kongkhak khuam-ah ahi zongin amah paipih ding hi. A topa in phimpi khat tawh ama bil vuhsak dinga, amah in a nuntak tawntung ama na sepsak ding hi.
“Mi khat in a tanu sila-in a zuak ciangin, tua nu pen sila pasalte bangin pai khia lo ding hi.

A topa in ama zi dingin a sehsa tua numei in amah a lungkimsak kei leh, amah in tua nu a pa kiang mahah zuakkik ding hi. Amah, tua nu tungah citakin gamta lo ahih manin, gamdang mi khat tungah tua nu a zuak theih nading thu nei lo ding hi.
Mi khat in a tapa adingin sila numei a lei leh, amah in tanu bangin tua nu bawl ding hi.
Amah in zi dang khat a lakthuah leh, a zi masa’ annek, a puansilh, ahih kei leh lupkhop nading thuneihna khiam lo ding hi.
Amah in hih thu thumte tuanu adingin a bawl kei leh, sum hong piak kul lo, bangmah a kul loin tua nu pai khia thei ding hi.
“Mi khat satin a sisak mi peuhpeuh kithat ding hi.
Ahih hangin amah in a thah sawm hi lo a, a thah khak ahihleh, amah a tai theih nadingin note ading mun khat ka seh ding hi.
Ahih hangin mi khat in midang khat thah ding tumin a thah leh, amah na thah theih nadingun note in ka biakna tau a belhna nangawn panin amah na la teitei ding uh hi.
“Ama pa hitaleh ama nu hitaleh a sat peuhmah kithat ding hi.
“Zuak ding ahi a, sila-in neih ding ahi zongin mi a gu mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.
“Ama pa hitaleh ama nu hitaleh a samsia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.
“Mite kitawng a, a khat in adang khat suangtum khat tawh ahi a, ama khuttum tawh ahi zongin tumin, mipa a sih loh hangin lupna ngakin,
tua ciangin mipa tho zo-in ama ciangkhut tawh a vak khiatkik zawh nakleh, amah a tum pa siang ding hi. Amah in ama hun bei sungteng taang ding bek ama tungah loh dinga, amah damsiangsak ding hi.
“Mi khat in molhtum khat tawh ama sila ahi pasal hitaleh numei hitaleh satin a phualah a sih pah leh, amah gim kipia ding hi.
Ahih hangin ni khat ahi a, ni nih ahi zongin sila a nuntak leh, amah gim piak ding hi lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh sila pen ama neihsa ahih manin sila a sih ciangin amah a sumh khin ahi hi.

“Mite kitawngin numei naupaii khat liamsak a, tatolhin; ahi zongin siatna in a zuihbeh kei nakleh, tua nu’ pasal in ama tunga a cihzah tawh kituakin tua numei a liamsak mi kigam dinga, thukhente’ khenna bangin amah liau ding hi.
Siatna khatpeuh in a zuihbeh leh, tua ciangin nuntakna taang ding nuntakna,
mit taang ding mit, ha taang ding ha, khut taang ding khut, khe taang ding khe,
meikaang taang ding meikaang, liamna taang ding liamna, siatna taang ding siatna pia ding hi.
“Mi khat in ama sila ahi pasal hitaleh numei hitaleh a mit satin a suksiatkhak leh amah in tua mit’ hangin sila suaktasakin pai khiasak ding hi.
Amah in a sila ahi pasal hitaleh numei hitaleh a ha a tup khiat leh, amah in tua ha’ hangin sila suaktasakin pai khiasak ding hi.
“Bawngtal khat in pasal hitaleh numei hitaleh a ki tawh a piklup ciangin, a bawngtal kidenglum dinga, a sa kine lo ding hi. Ahih hangin bawngtal nei pa siang ding hi.

Ahih hangin a hun beisa-ah bawngtal in mi si thei a, a nei pa kihilh napi-in a khumcip kei a, tua bawngtal in pasal ahi a, numei ahi zongin a thah leh, bawngtal kidenglum dinga, a nei pa zong kithat ding hi.
Ama tung pan tatkhiatna sum a kinget leh, ama nuntakna tatkhiat nadingin ama tungah a kingen zahzah amah in pia ding hi.
Tua bawngtal in mi’ tapa ahi a, tanu ahi zongin a ki tawh a pik leh hih ngeina tawh kizui-in kigamta ding hi.
Bawngtal in sila ahi pasal hitaleh numei hitaleh khat peuhpeuh a ki tawh a pik leh, a nei pa in amau’ topa’ tungah ngun shekel sawmthum pia dinga, bawngtal kidenglum ding hi.
“Mi khat in dum honsa-in a nusia ahi a, mi khat in dum a tawh ciangin siin loin om ahi zongin, bawngtal hitaleh la hitaleh dum sungah a kiat leh,
dum nei pa in loh ding hi. Amah in a nei pa tungah sum pia dinga, ganhing luang pen ama a’ hi pah ding hi.
“Mi khat’ bawngtal in adang khat’ bawngtal liamsakin a sih leh, amaute in a hing pen zuak ding uh a, tua man hawm ding uh hi. A ganhing si pen zong amaute in hawm ding uh hi.
Tua bang hi lo a, bawngtal in mi si ngei hi, ci-in kithei napi a nei pa in a khumcip kei leh, amah in bawngtal tang ding bawngtal pia dinga, a si ganhing pen amah in tang ding hi.

“Mi khat in bawngtal ahi a, tuu ahi zongin gu a, a that a, a zuak zongin, amah in bawngtal khat tang dingin bawngtal nga, tuu khat tang dingin tuu li pia ding hi. Amah in ditkikna bawl ding hi. Amah in bangmah a neih kei leh, ama guktakna hangin amah kizuak ding hi. A kigu ganhing, bawngtal ahi a, la ahi a, tuu ahi zongin a hingin ama khut sungah a kimuh leh, amah in a zah nih pia ding hi.“Guta khat in inn vutlet a, kisatin amah a sih leh, tua sihna hangin mawhna om lo ding hi. Ahih hangin nisuah khit ahihleh tua sihna hangin mawhna om ding hi.
“Mi khat in lo khatah ahi a, leenggui lo ah ahi zongin gan tasak a, a ganhing khahin midang khat’ lo ah a tat leh, amah in ama lo le ama leenggah lo panin a piangte tawh loh ding hi.
“Mei kuangin gam kaang a, a kikhol an ahi a, a ding lai an ahi a, lo ahi zongin a kat leh, mei a kaangsak pa in a cing takin loh ding hi.
“Mi khat in a veengte kiangah sum ahi a, van ahi zongin kep ding ap a, tua mipa’ inn panin a kiguk leh, a gu pa a kimuh leh amah in a zah nih pia ding hi.
A gu pa a kimuh kei leh a veengpa’ vante amah in gu hiam, gu lo hiam cih a kitel nadingin thukhente kiangah inn nei pa in kiciamna bawl ding hi.

“Thu neihna khat peuhpeuh, bawngtal ahi a, la ahi a, tuu ahi a, puansilh ahi zongin, a mang na khat peuhpeuh, mi khat in, ‘Hih pen kei a’ hi,’ a cihna thu-ah, alang nihte’ thu pen thukhente’ mai-ah tung ding hi. Thukhente in a mawhsak mipa in a veengpa tungah a zah nih pia ding hi.
“Mi khat in ama veengte tungah la ahi a, bawngtal ahi a, tuu ahi zongin, ganhing khat peuhpeuh kep dingin a piak a, kuama muh lohin tua ganhing a si a, a liam a, a kihawl khia ahi zongin ahihleh,
amah in a veeng pa’ neihsa a gu kha hiam cih a kitheih nadingin amau tegel’ kikalahTopatawh kiciamna om ding hi. A nei pa in tua kiciamna sang dinga, amah in loh lo ding hi.Topa
Ahih hangin ama tung panin a kigu ahihleh, a nei pa tungah amah in loh ding hi.
Gamsa in a balzan ahihleh, lahtel nadingin tua ganhing paipihsak in. A kibalzan ganhing amah in loh lo ding hi.
“Mi khat in a veengte’ gan khat peuhpeuh kawm a, a nei pa om loin a liam a, a si zongin, amah in a kicingin loh ding hi.
A nei pa tawh a omkhawm ahihleh amah in loh lo ding hi. A kikawm ahihleh a kikawm bangin pai ding hi.
“Mi khat in a kidong nai lo nungak khat zolin amah tawh a lupkhop leh, amah in tua nu’ man ding moman letsong pia dinga, ama zi suak ding hi.
A numei’ pa in ama tungah tua nu a piak nop kei leh zong, tua mipa in nungak moman letsong zah numei’ pa’ tungah sum pia veve ding hi.
“Numei aisan nu na hingkhawi kei ding uh hi.
“Ganhing tawh a mawh peuhmah kithat ding hi.
“Topabek sim loh pasian dang khat peuhpeuh tungah biakna a pia mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.Topa
“Khualmi khatpeuh na bawlsia kei ding uh a, na nengniam kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note zong Egypt leitangah khual mite na hi ngei uh hi.
Meigong numei ahi a, tagah ahi zongin na gimsak kei ding uh hi.
Note in amaute na gimsak uh a, amaute keima tungah hong kiko leh, keimah in amau’ kikona ka za taktak ding hi.
Ka hehna so-in namsau tawh note kong that dinga, na zite uh meigong suakin, na tate uh tagah suak ding hi.
“Note tawh a om, a zawng keima mite khat peuhpeuh tungah sum leitawi na piak uhleh, ama tungah sum leitawi a piapa bangin na om kei ding uh a, ama tung panin a meet na dok kei ding uh hi.
Khapna ahi na veengpa’ puan silh lai na lak ngei khak leh nitum ma-in ama tungah na piakik ding hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ama silh ding tua bek hi a, tua pen ama pumpi adingin a puan neihsun ahi hi. Amah bang dang tawh lum ding ahi hiam? Amah kei tungah hong kiko leh ke’n ka za ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah in hehpihna ka nei hi.
“Thukhente na simmawh kei ding uh a, na mite uh a ukpa zong na samsia kei ding uh hi.
“Na anlakna pan uh le sathau le leenggah na suknate uh panin a leet khiate piak khiat ding na zekai kei ding uh hi.“Na tapa cilte uh keima tungah nong pia ding uh hi.
Na bawngtalte uh le na tuute uh panin zong tua bangmahin nong pia ding uh hi. Ni sagih sung a pi tawh om dinga, a ni giat ni-in kei tungah nong pia ding uh hi.
“Note pen kei’ tungah hong ki-ap mite na hi ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin gamlakah gamsate in a balzan sa peuhmah note in na ne kei ding uh a, tua bang sate uite na lot ding uh hi.
“Thuman lo na gen khia kei ding uh hi. Elna tawh teci pang dingin migilo pa tawh na kipawl kei ding uh hi.
Siatna a bawl dingin mihon na zui kei ding uh hi. Thutang a hei khia dingin mihonpi nung zui-in thu neihna-ah teci na pang kei ding uh hi.
Ama thu neihna-ah mizawng pa na langneih kei ding uh hi.
Na langneih mite’ bawngtal ahi a, a la ahi zongin a gammang na tuah uhleh ama kiangah na hawlkik ding uh hi.
Nangmah a hong mudah pa’ la a van tawh a puk na muh leh a la tawh amah na nusia kei dinga, tua la phot toh ding na huh ding hi.
Ama thu neihna-ah mizawng pa a thutang kimlai na lelsak kei ding uh hi.
A man lopi a mi mawhsak ding panin kikem unla, a dikpa le thuman pa that kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh a gilo mi ka khah kei ding hi.
Sumgolh na la kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh sumgolh in uliante’ mit tawsak a, thuman mite’ thu heikhiatsak hi.
Khualmi na nengniam kei ding uh hi. Khualmi’ lungsim na thei uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note zong Egypt gamah khualmi na hi ngei uh hi.
Note in na leitang uhah kum guk sung khai tuhin a piangte na kaikhawm ding uh hi.

Ahih hangin a kum sagihna ciangin, nomau’ mi a zawngte in a nek theih nadingin leitang tawlngasakin, lokhulin na omsak ding uh a, gamlak ganhingte in mizawngte’ nek loh teng ne thei ding uh hi. Na leenggui lote uh le na oliv lote uh zong tua bangmahin na hih ding uh hi.

Ni guk sung na nasep uh na sem ding uh hi. Ahih hangin na bawngtal le na la in tawlngakna a neih theih nading le, na nasem numei’ tapa le khual mite in thathak a ngah theih nadingin a ni sagih ni-in na tawlnga ding uh hi.
Note’ tunga kong gente khempeuh thudon un; pasian dangte’ min genin nei kei unla, na kam sung panun zong tua bangte kizasak kei un.
Kum khatin thumvei, keima adingin pawi na bawl ding uh hi.

Silngo sawh loh anlum pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Keimah in note kong thupiak bangin Abib kha sung a kisehsa hun ciangin ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua kha sungin Egypt panin note na pai khia uh hi. Khut hawmguak tawh keima mai-ah kuamah hong kilak lo ding hi.
Note in lo-a na tuh uh, na nasepna uh a gah masa, anlak pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Note in lo panin na nasepna uh a gah na kaihkhop uh kum bei ciangin an kaihkhopna pawi na bawl ding uh hi.
TopaPasian’ mai-ah pasal khempeuh kum khatin thumvei kilaak ding uh hi.Pasian
Note in silngo sawh anlum tawh keimah biakpiakna si na pia khawm kei ding uh a, a ganhing thau zong zingsang dong na omsak kei ding uh hi.
Note in na anpalte uh lakah a tung masa penTopana Pasian uh inn-ah na paipih ding uh hi.TopaNote in a pi’ nawizu tawh keelno na huan kei ding uh hi.
En un, keimah in ka bawlsa munah note hong paipih ding le lamkalah note hong cing dingin note’ mai-ah vantungmi khat ka sawl hi.
Amah thudonin ama aw ngai unla, amah lehdo kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in note’ thu palsatna hong maisak lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh keima min tawh nasem ahi hi.
Ahih hangin note in ama aw limtakin ngai-in keima gen bangin na gamtat uhleh na galte uh’ tungah gal ka hi dinga, na langte uh’ tungah lang ka hi ding hi.
Note’ mai-ah ka vantungmi pai-in Amor mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Kanaan mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite kiangah note hong paipihin, keimah in amaute ka phiat khiat ciangin,
amau’ pasian-te’ mai-ah note kun loin, tuate bia loin, amau’ gamtat bangin na gamta kei ding uh a, note in amaute lawnthal mang kiuhkeuhin amau’ milim suang khuampite na satnen gawp ding uh hi.
Note inTopana Pasian uh nong bia ding uh a, keimah in na an uh le na tui uh thupha ka pia ding hi. Keimah in note’ lak panin cinatna ka la khia ding hi.Topa
Note’ leitangah kuamah nausia om lo dinga, a ciing zong om lo ding hi. Note kong teeksihsak ding hi.
Keimah hong kikihtakna note’ mai-ah paisakin note’ phutkhak ding mi khempeuh ka kitok gawpsak dinga, na galte khempeuh uh lehhei-in note’ kiang panin ka taisak ding hi.
Note’ mai panin Hiv mite, Kanaan mite le Hit mite a hawl khia dingin note’ mai-ah tunpi ka sawl khia ding hi.
Leitung gamkhing suakin gamlak ganhingte note’ langkhat ah tampi pha kha ding ahih manin note’ mai panin kum khat sungin amaute ka hawl khia kei ding hi.
Note khangin tampi pha-in leitang na luah matengun note’ mai panin tawm tawmin amaute ka hawl khia ding hi.

Keimah in San Tuipi panin Filistia mite’ tuipi ciang le sehnel gam panin Eufratis gun ciang dongah na gamgite uh ka phut ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua gam a teeng mite note’ khut sungah kong pia dinga, note in na mai uh panin amaute na hawl khia ding uh hi.
Amaute ahi a, amau’ pasian-te tawh ahi zongin thuciamna na bawl kei ding uh hi.

Amaute in kei’ tungah note hong khialsak kha ding ahih ciangin note’ leitang tungah amaute teeng lo ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note in amau’ pasian-te na biak uhleh note’ tungah thangzak khat hong hi taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “Nang le Aaron, Nadab, Abihu le Israel upate sung pan sawmsagih tawh keima kiangah hong paito unla, a gamla panin kunin hong bia un.Topa
Topa’nai-ah Moses bek hong pai ding hi. A dangte a nai-ah hong pai lo dinga, mihonte in mual ciang dong hong neh lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Moses hong pai-inTopa’thugente khempeuh le biakna ngeinate khempeuh mite kiangah a gen hi. Mi khempeuh in aw kikhatin dawng uh a, “Topa’gensa thute khempeuh ka hih ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa’Topa’
Moses inTopa’thugente khempeuh a gelh hi. Zingsangin amah tho baih a, mual bulah biakna tau khat lamin, Israel minam sawm le nihte tawh kituakin khuam sawm le nih a phut hi.Topa’
Amah in Israel mi tangvalte sawlin, tuate in meihal biakna le thunuama biakna bawngtalteTopa’tungah pia uh hi.Topa’
Moses in a sisan kimkhat la-in, kuangte sungah koih a, sisan kimkhat biakna tau tungah a theh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in thuciamna laibu la-in, mite’ zakin tua laibu a sim hi. Amaute in, “Topa’gensa khempeuh kote in ka hih ding uh a, kote ka thumang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin Moses in sisan la-in mite’ tungah theh a, “Hih thute khempeuh tawh kizui-inTopain note tawh a bawlsa thuciamna sisan en un,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Moses le Aaron, Nadab, Abihu le Israel upate sung pan sawmsagih paito uh a,
amaute in Israel Pasian mu uh hi. Ama khe nuai-ah a sianthona van mel tawh a kibang, sapfaia suangmanpha tawh a kibawl suangphahpek bang pian om hi.
Amah in Israel mi makaite gimna ngahsak lo hi. Amaute in Pasian mu uh a, tua ciangin an ne-in tui dawn uh hi.

Topain Moses kiangah, “Keima kiang mualtungah hong paito inla, tua lai-ah ngak in. Amaute a kihilh nadingin keima gelhsa, thukham le thupiakna tawh, suangpek nang tungah kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin ama nasem pa Joshua tawh Moses kithawi uh a, Pasian’ mual tungah paito uh hi.
Amah in upate kiangah, “Note’ kiangah kong paikik matengun hih lai-ah kote hong ngak un. En un, note tawh Aaron le Hur om hi. Thu nei peuhpeuh amaute’ kiangah paisak un,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mualtungah Moses paito a, meii in mual a tuam hi.
Topa’minthanna vang pen Sinai Mual tungah kinga a, meii in ni guk sung tua mual a tuam hi. A ni sagih ni-in amah in meii lak panin Moses a sam hi.Topa’
Tu-inTopa’vangliatna vang pen Israel mite’ muhna-ah mualvum dawn a kaangtum meikuang tawh kibang hi.Topa’
Meii sungah Moses tum a, mualtungah paito hi. Moses sun sawmli le zan sawmli sung mualtungah a om hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Amaute in kei adingin biakna hong paipih nadingin Israel mite’ kiangah gen in. A pia nuam mi peuhmah tung panin kei adingin biakna na sang ding hi.
Amaute’ tung panin na san ding biakna hih bang ahi hi: Kham, ngun, sumngo,
a dum, a dupsan, a ausan puante le a kopin a kikhuk khau tawh a kigan puan hoih, keelmul,
a kisansak tuutal vunte, keelvunte, singkha sing,
meivakte ading sathau, nilh sathau ding le paknamtui dingin a namtui nate,
siampi puan le awmdal a bulh dingin onik suangte ahi hi.
Amaute’ lakah kei ka om theih nadingin kei adingin biakbuk khat amaute bawlsak in.
Biakbuk le a nazatte’ lim ding tawh kisai-in nang’ tungah kong lahte khempeuh tawh kituakin nangmah in na bawl ding hi.
“Amaute in singkha sing tawh singkuang khat bawl ding uh hi. A dung pi thum le letmat kua, a vai pi nih le letmat thum, a sanna pi nih le letmat thum hi ding hi.
Nangmah in kham citak tawh tua singkuang na zut dinga, a sung le a pua na zut ding hi. A tung kimkotah a geihual kham tawh na bawl ding hi.
Nangmah in tua singkuang adingin kham kual li sungin a singkuang khe li tungah tuate na bulh dinga, a pang khatah kual nih, a pang langkhat ah a kual nih mah na bulh ding hi.
Nangmah in singkha singzawl na sui dinga, tuate kham tawh na zut ding hi.
Singkuang puak nadingin singkuang panga kualte sungah a zawlte na khum ding hi.
Singkuang’ kualte sungah a zawlte omsuak dinga, tuate kila khia lo ding hi.
Nang’ tunga kong piak ding thuciamna nangmah in singkuang sungah na koih ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kham citak tawh hehpihna tokhom khat na bawl dinga, a dung pi thum le letmat kua, a vai pi nih le letmat thum hi ding hi.
Nangmah in kham tawh kherub nih na bawl dinga, hehpihna tokhom mong tuakah a kiseek tua kherub-te na omsak ding hi.
Mong khatah kherub khat, a mong langkhat ah kherub khat mah bawl in. Hehpihna tokhom tawh a kizomin a mong tuakah kherub na bawl ding hi.
Kherub-te in a khate uh a tungah zal ding uh a, amau’ khate tawh hehpihna tokhom liimsunin amaute khatlekhat kimaingat ding uh hi. Hehpihna tokhom lamah kherub-te’ mai nga ding uh hi.
Singkuang tungah hehpihna tokhom na koih dinga, singkuang sungah nang kong piak ding thuciamna na koih ding hi.
Hehpihna tokhom tung, thuciamna singkuang tunga om kherub nihte kikal panin nang kong hopih dinga, Israel mite adingin nang’ tungah kong piak ding thute khempeuh nang’ tungah kong gen ding hi.
“Nangmah in singkha sing tawh sabuai khat na bawl dinga, a dung pi thum, a vai pi khat le alang, a sanna pi nih le letmat thum hi ding hi.
Kham citak tawh na zut dinga, a kimkotah a geihual kham tawh na bawl ding hi.
Nangmah in khutpeek cia a zai zawl peek khat a kimkotah na bawl dinga, tua zawl peek kimkotah a geihual na bawl ding hi.
Nangmah in tua sabuai adingin kham kual li na bawl dinga, tuate pen a kiu li, a khe lite-ah na gak ding hi.
Sabuai puak nading zawlte a len dingin a zawl peek gei-ah a kualte om ding hi.
Nangmah in singkha sing zawlte bawlin kham tawh na zut dinga, hihte tawh sabuai kipua ding hi.
Paknamtui adingin a kuangdaite le a pakante, tui phih nadingin a thawl gongbakte le a kuang-ukte na bawl ding hi. Kham citak tawh tuate na bawl ding hi.
Keima mai sabuai tungah Ompihna Anlum na koih tawntung ding hi.
“Kham citak tawh meivakkhuam khat na bawl ding hi. Meivakkhuam bul le a kungte pen a kiseek nate tawh kibawl ding hi. A haite, a nunte le a paakte, tua tawh sakhat hi khawm ding uh hi.
A pang panin hiang guk meeng khia dinga, a pang khatah meivakkhuam hiang thum meeng khia-in, a pang langkhat ah meivakkhuam hiang thum mah meeng khia ding hi.

Hiang khat ciat tungah a nun le a pak a om, almond gah tawh a kibang hai thum le adang hiang khat ciat tungah a nun le a pak a om, almond gah tawh a kibang hai thum mah kibawl ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin hiang gukte meivakkhuam panin meeng khia ding hi.
A meivakkhuam tung mahmahah a nunte le a paakte tawh a om, almond bangin a kibawl hai li omin,
meivakkhuam panin hiang guk a kopte’ bulah tua tawh sakhat ahi nun khat om ding hi.
Amau’ nunte le a hiangte, sakhat hi dinga, a vekpi-in kham citak a kiseek sakhat hi ding hi.
Nangmah in ama adingin meivak sagihte na bawl dinga, ama omna mai teng khua a vaksak dingin meivakte kikoih ding hi.
A taitehte le a kuangte kham citak hi ding hi.
Kham citak tawi sawmnih le tawi khat val a gik tawh hih nazatte khempeuh kibawl ding hi.
Mualtungah nang’ tunga hong kilak hih nate pen amau’ lim ding bangin na bawl ding thei in.

“Tua tham loin a kopin a kikhuk khau hoih tawh a kigan dalna puan sawm le a dum, a dupsan le a ausan khau a kigan puan tawh biakbuk na bawl ding hi. Hoihtakin a kibawl kherub-te tawh tuate na bawl ding hi.
Dalna puan a dung pi sawmli le pi nih hi dinga, dalna puan a vai pi guk hi ding hi. Dalna puan khempeuh kikim ciat ding hi.
Dalna puan ngate khatlekhat kikhuituah ding hi.

A kikhuituah a masa dalna puan a nawlnung pen’ nawl dung sukah khaudum tawh a bilvangte na bawl ding hi. Tua bangmahin a kikhuituah a nihna dalna puan a nawlnung pen’ nawl dung suk mahah a bilvangte na bawl ding hi.
Dalna puan khat tungah bilvang sawmnga bawlin, a kikhuituah a nihna dalna puan nawlah bilvang sawmnga mah na bawl dinga, a bilvangte khatlekhat kitang ding uh hi.
Biakbuk pen bup khat a suah theih nadingin nangmah in kham kilhna sawmnga bawlin, tua kilhnate tawh dalna puan khatlekhat na kimatsak ding hi.
“Biakbuk a tung khuh nadingin keelmul tawh puante zong na bawl dinga, puan sawm le khat na bawl ding hi.
Tua puan a dung pi sawmli le nga, a vai pi guk ciat hi dinga, puan sawm le khatte kikim ding hi.
Tua puan ngate amau le amau khuituahin, puan gukte zong amau le amau mah na khuituah dinga, a gukna puan pen puanbuk mai-ah na khep ding hi.
A kikhuituah puan khat nawlah a bilvang sawmnga bawlin, a kikhuituah a nihna puan nawlnung pen nawlah a bilvang sawmnga mah na bawl ding hi.
Tua pen bup khat a suah theih nadingin nangmah in sumngo kilhna sawmnga bawlin, a bilvangte’ sungah tua kilhnate guangin, puanbuk na kimatsak ding hi.
Puanbuk puan a val khia, puan alang a val pen, biakbuk nungah kaisuk ding hi.
Puanbuk puan a dunglam, pangkhatah pi khat le alang, a pang langkhat ah pi khat le alang a val pen biakbuk a khuh dingin hih lampang le hua lampangte-ah kaisuk ding hi.
“A kisansak tuutal vunte le keelvunte tawh puanbuk khuhna khat na bawl ding hi.
“Biakbuk adingin a po to ding khuampeekte singkha sing na bawl ding hi.
A khuampeek khat a tun pi sawm le nga hi dinga, a vai pi nih le letmat thum vive hi ding hi.
A bulh nadingin a khuampeek khatah a zang nih ciat om ding hi. Biakbuk khuampeek khempeuh tua bangin na bawl ding hi.
Biakbuk khuampeekte na bawl ding hi: Leitaw lam panga dingin khuampeek sawmnih hi ding hi.
A khuampeek sawmnihte’ bulah bullen sawmli ngun tawh na bawl dinga, a zang nihte adingin khuampeek khat bulah bullen nih, a khuampeek dang khat bulah adang nihte adingin bullen nih mah hi ding hi.
Biakbuk a pang nihna lam, leilu lam panga a khuampeek sawmnihte le
ngun tawh kibawl a bullen sawmlite adingin, khuampeek khatah bullen nih, adang khuampeek khat bulah bullen nih mah hi ding hi.
Nitumna lam, biakbuk nung lam adingin khuampeek guk na bawl ding hi.
Biakbuk nung lam kiute adingin khuampeek nih na bawl ding hi.
Tuate a bul lamah kikak dinga, ahih hangin a kual masa ah a dawn kimat ding hi. A nihin tua bang hi dinga, tuate in a kiu nihte piangsak ding uh hi.
Ngun tawh kibawl amau’ bullen sawm le gukte ading a khuampeek giat pha dinga, khuampeek khatah bullen nih ciat om ding hi.
“Singkha sing, zawlin na bawl ding hi.
Biakbuk pangkhat a khuampeek ading zawl nga, biakbuk a pang langkhat a khuampeek adingin zawl nga, nitumna lam biakbuk nung lam panga a khuampeekte adingin zawl nga hi ding hi.
A zawl laita, a khuampeek kimciang a banto pen mong khat pan mong khat paisuak ding hi.
A khuampeekte kham tawh zutin, a zawlte a len dingin amau’ kualte kham tawh na bawl dinga, a zawlte kham tawh na zut ding hi.
A lim ding geelna, mualtungah nang tungah hong kilak mah tawh kizui-in biakbuk na lam ding hi.
“A dum, a dupsan, a ausan, a kopin a kikhuk khau hoih kigan tawh dalna puan khat na bawl dinga, hoihtakin a kibawl kherub-te tawh kizem ding hi.
Ngun tawh kibawl bullen lite tungah a om, kham kibawl vankhaina nei-in, kham tawh a kizut singkha khuampi lite tungah na khai ding hi.
A kilhnate-ah dalna puan khai sukin, dalna puan sung tua lai munah thuciamna singkuang na koih dinga, dalna puan in siangtho pen mun panin siangtho mun khen ding hi.
Siangtho pen mun sunga om thuciamna singkuang tungah hehpihna tokhom na koih ding hi.
Dalna puan pualamah sabuai koihin, sabuai tawh a kisan biakbuk leitaw lampangah meivakkhuam na koih dinga, leilu lampangah sabuai na koih ding hi.
“Puanbuk kongkhak dingin a dum, a dupsan, a ausan, a kopin a kikhuk khau hoih tawh a kigan, phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem kongpuankhai khat na bawl ding hi.
Kongpuankhai adingin singkha khuampi nga bawlin kham tawh na zut ding hi. A vankhainate kham hi dinga, tuate adingin sumngo bullen nga na bawl ding hi.
“Biakna tau ding singkha sing tawh bawl in. Pi sagih le alang sau-in pi sagih le alang mah na zaisak ding hi. Biakna tau a ning kikim dinga, a tun pi li le alang hi ding hi.
A kiu lite-ah ki na bawl ding hi. A kite pen a biakna tau tawh sakhat hi dinga, sumngo tawh na zut ding hi.
Ama adingin vut koih nading beelte le kawbiate, kuangte, sikkate le vutluahna peekte na bawl dinga, a nazat khempeuh sumngo tawh na bawl ding hi.
Ama adingin siklen, a vang simsiam zong sumngo tawh na bawl ding hi. Siklen tung, a kiu lite-ah sumngo kual li na bawl ding hi.
Siklen in biakna tau kimciang a batsuk theih nadingin biakna tau zawl nuai panin na bulh ding hi.
Biakna tau adingin singkha sing zawlte bawlin sumngo tawh tuate na zut ding hi.
A kipuak ciangin biakna tau pang nihte-ah a zawlte a om theih nadingin a kualte’ vang sungah a zawlte kikhum ding hi.
Singpekte tawh kuak nei-in biakna tau na bawl dinga, mual tungah nang tunga hong kilaksa bangin kibawl ding hi.
“Biakbuk tual na bawl ding hi. A tual in leitaw lam pangah pang khat adingin pi za le sawmnga a sau, a kopin a kikhuk khau hoih tawh a kigan a kikhai suk dalna puan nei ding hi.
A khuam sawmnih le a bullen sawmnih pen sumngo tawh a kibawl hi dinga, ahih hangin khuampi tunga vankhainate le a gaknate pen ngun tawh a kibawl hi ding hi.

Leilu lampang ading zong a sauna tua bangmah hi-in, a kikhai suk dalna puan pi za le sawmnga sau dinga, a khuam sawmnih le a bullen sawmnih pen sumngo tawh a kibawl hi ding hi. Ahi zongin khuampi tunga vankhainate le a gaknate pen ngun tawh a kibawl hi ding hi.
Nitumna lam pangah buktual a vailam adingin khuampi sawm le bullen sawmte tawh pi sawmsagih le nga a sau a kikhai suk dalna puan om ding hi.
A mailam, nisuahna lam buktual a vailam pi sawmsagih le nga hi ding hi.
Kongpi pang khat ading a kikhaisuk dalna puan pi sawmnih le nih le alang hi dinga, khuampi thum le bullen thumte tawh hi ding hi.
A pang langkhat ah a kikhaisuk dalna puan pen pi sawmnih le nih le alang hi dinga, khuampi thum le bullen thumte tawh hi ding hi.

Buktual a kongpi dingin a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khau a kopin a kikhuk khau hoihte tawh a kigan, phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem, pi sawmthum a sau kongpuankhai khat om dinga, tua in khuampi li le bullen li nei ding hi.
Buktual kiima khuampi khempeuh ngun tawh kibawl gakna tawh kigak dinga, a vankhainate ngun hi-in a bullente sumngo hi ding hi.
Buktual a dung pi za le sawmnga, a vai pi sawmsagih le nga, a sanna pi sagih le alang hi-in, a kopin a kikhuk khau hoih tawh a kigan a kikhaisuk dalna puan le sumngo bullente tawh hi ding hi.
Biakbuk nazat ding peuhmahte le a khetphimte khempeuh le buktual a khetphimte khempeuh sumngo tawh a kibawl hi ding hi.
“Meivak a kuangin a om tawntung theih nadingin mei a vak ding oliv gah a kisuzan, sathau siangtho, Israel mite in nang kiangah hong paipih nadingun thu na pia ding hi.

Kikhopna buk sung, thuciamna singkuang mai-a dalna puan pualamah, Aaron le ama tapate in nitak a kipan zingsang dongTopa’mai-ah vil ding uh hi. Tua pen Israel mite in amau’ khang tawntungin a zuih ding uh ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.Topa’
“Tua ciangin keima tungah siampi na a sem dingin Israel mite lak panin na sanggampa Aaron le a tapate Nadab le Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar, nangma kiangah la in.
Minthanna le hoihna tawh a kidim nadingin na sanggampa Aaron ading biakna puan siangtho na bawl ding hi.
Keima siampi nasepna-ah amah a ap theih nadingun amaute in Aaron’ puante a bawl nading, hih theihna lungsim ka guatsa, siamna a nei mite khempeuh tungah gen in.

Amaute’ bawl ding puante: Awmdal khat, siampi puan khat, puantualpi khat, sikli nei-a a gial puantungsilh khat, dialpi khat le kawnggak khat ahi hi. Keima tungah siampi na a sem ding na sanggampa Aaron le ama tapate adingin amaute in biakna puan siangthote bawl ding uh hi.
Amaute in kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk tawh a kigan puan hoihte sang ding uh hi.
“Amaute in siampi puan pen, kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh bawl ding uh a, hoihtakin a kibawl hi ding hi.
A kizop khawm theih nadingin a mong nihte-ah a kimat liangkaihna puan nih nei ding hi.
Amah a gak dingin hoihtakin a kigan tua tunga puan om pen, kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk puan hoihte tawh kibawlin, a sepna zia le a nate a kibang hi ding hi.
Nangmah in onik suang nih la-in tuate’ tungah Israel tapate’ min na gelh dinga,
amau’ suahna tawh kizui-in amau’ min gukte suang khat tungah gelhin, a omlai gukte’ min a suang dang khat tungah na gelh ding hi.
Kizepna a bawlpa in min gelhna a bawl bangin Israel tapa sawm le nihte’ minte suang nihte tungah na gelh ding hi. Tuate pen kham a zepna tawh na um ding hi.
Israel tapate phawkna suang dingin siampi puan’ liangkaih puan tungah tua suang nihte na bulh ding hi. Aaron in ama liangko nihte tungah phawkphawk dinginTopa’mai-ah amaute’ min pua ding hi.Topa’
Kham tawh kibawl a kiphut kizepna le
khau bangin a kihual, kham citak khainiang nih na bawl dinga, a kihual khainiangte pen a kiphutte’ tungah na bulh ding hi.

“Hoihtakin a kibawl thukhenna awmdal khat na bawl ding hi. Siampipuan a kibawl bangmahin na bawl ding hi. Kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk puan hoih tawh na bawl ding hi.
A ning kikimin thuap nih hi dinga, a dung letmat kua, a vai letmat kua mah hi ding hi.
Tua sungah suang gual li-in na bulh ding hi. Sardis suang, topaz suang le karbankal suang gual khat pen a gual masa hi ding hi.
A gual nihna-ah emerald suang, sapfaia suang le diamond suang hi ding hi.
A gual thumna-ah jakinth suang, agate suang le amethyst suang hi ding hi.
A gual lina-ah beryl suang, onik suang le jasper suang hi dinga, kham tawh zepna sungah tuate kibulh ding hi.
Israel tapate’ min tawh kituakin amaute’ min a omna suang sawm le nih om ding hi. Tuate pen minam sawm le nihte adingin amau’ min ciat kigelhin, min gelhna tawh kibang ding hi.
Awmdal adingin khau tawh a kibang, a kihual kham citak khainiang na bawl ding hi.
Awmdal adingin kham kual nih na bawl dinga, awmdal mongah tua kualte na bulh ding hi.
Awmdal mong a kual nihte sungah kham khau nihte na khum ding hi.
Khau mong nihte zepna tawh na zom dinga, siampi puan’ liangkaih puan mai lamah tua bangin na zom ding hi.
Kham kual nih na bawl dinga, awmdal mong nih, siampi puan tawh a kizom a sung lamah na bulh ding hi.
Kham kual nih na bawl dinga, siampi puan liangkaih nihte’ nuai a mailam, hoihtakin a kigan siampi puankhau a kizopna tung sanah na bulh ding hi.
Hoihtakin a kigan siampi puan’ khau tungah a om theih nading le siampi puan tung panin awmdal a kol theih loh nadingin amaute in siampi puan’ kualah khaudum khatin a kual tawh gakkhawm ding uh hi.

“Tua ahih cianginTopa’mai-ah phawk tawntung nadingin amaute a paipih dingin siangtho munah amah a pai ciangin, Aaron in ama lungtang tunga om thukhenna awmdal sungah Israel tapate’ min pua ding hi.Topa’

Thukhenna awmdal sungah Urim le Thummim na koih dinga,Topa’mai-ah a pai ciangin Aaron’ lungtang tungah tuate om ding hi. Tua bangin Aaron in ama lungtang tungah Israel mite’ thukhennaTopa’mai-ah pua tawntung ding hi.Topa’Topa’
“Siampi puantualpi, puan dum bek tawh na bawl ding hi.
Puan ngawng bangin a kikeek loh nadingin a ngawng kimkotah a kigan tawh a kizim, lutang thawl a vang nei ding hi.
A mongah a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute tawh a kizem mang kawlsing gah bawlin, a mong kiimah amaute’ kikalah kham siklong bawlin,
puantualpi mong kimkotah kham long le mang kawlsing gah, kham long le mang kawlsing gah cih bangin na kihelhsak ding hi.
Aaron in biakna na a sep ciangin tua puan silh dinga, amah a sih khak loh nadinginTopa’mai a siangtho munah a tum ciang le a pusuah ciangin a gingte kiza ding hi.Topa’
“Nangmah in kham citak tawh a peek khat na bawl dinga, min gelhna a kibawlte mah bangin tua tungah, ‘Topaading siangtho,’ ci-in na gelh ding hi.Topa
Tua pen, khaudum khat tawh dialpi tungah na gak dinga, dialpi mai lamah om ding hi.

Tua pen Aaron’ taltangah om dinga, Israel mite in letsong siangtho a piakna uh ahi, a siangtho biakpiakna-ah mawhna a om peuhmah Aaron in ama tungah pua ding hi.Topa’mai-ah amaute a kisan theih nadingin ama taltang tungah tua a peek om tawntung ding hi.Topa’
“A puantungsilh ding pen khau hoih tawh siik li nei, a gialin na gan ding hi. Khau hoih tawh dialpi khat na bawl dinga, phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem kawnggak khat na bawl ding hi.
“Aaron’ tapate adingin puantungsilhte, kawnggakte le lukhute na bawl dinga, minthanna le hoihna tawh a kidim nadingin tuate na bawl ding hi.
Amaute in keima tungah siampi na a sep theih nadingun na sanggampa Aaron le a tapate na silhsak dinga, amaute sathau nilhin, nasem dingin kipsakin, na siangthosak ding hi.
A ci guakin a omna uh a tuam dingin amau adingin puan hoihte tawh pheituamte na bawlsak dinga, tuate in kawng panin phei ciang ban ding hi.

Kikhopna bukah amaute a pai ciang uh ahi a, siangtho munah nasem dingin biakna tau nai-ah a pai ciang uh ahi zongin, Aaron le ama tapate in tuate a silh ding uh hi. Tua hikeileh amaute in amau tung mahah mawhna a kisuan tawm suakin si ding uh hi. Hih pen amah le ama khit ciangin a suanlekhakte adingin a om tawntung ngeina kip khat hi ding hi.
“Amaute in keima tungah siampi na a sep theih nadingun amaute na sianthosak nadingin amaute’ tungah na hih ding thute: Bawngtalno khat le a sitbaang lo tuutal nih,
le silngo sawh loh anlum, sathau a kihel silngo sawh loh mohte, sathau tawh a kizut silngo sawh loh mohphengte la in. Tuate pen mangbuhnel tawh na bawl ding hi.
Lawh khat sungah tuate koihin tuate a lawhin paipihin, a bawngtal le a tuutal nih zong na paipih ding hi.
“Kikhopna buk kongkhak ah Aaron le a tapate na paipih dinga, tui tawh amaute na sil ding hi.
Nangmah in puante la-in, puantungsilh le siampi puantualpi, siampi puan le awmdal, Aaron silhsakin, hoihtakin a kigan siampi puan gakna tawh amah na gak ding hi.
Ama lu tungah dialpi khim sakin, dialpi tungah kumpi lukhu siangtho na khusak ding hi.
Nangmah in nilh sathau la-in, ama lu tungah sungin amah na nilh ding hi.
“Tua ciangin nangmah in ama tapate paipihin, amaute, puantungsilh na silhsak dinga,
kawnggakte tawh amaute gakin, amau’ lu tungah a lukhute uh na gak ding hi. Siampi nasepna pen a kip tawntung ngeina ahih manin amau a’ hi ding hi. Tua bangin Aaron le a tapate na kipsak ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kikhopna buk mai-ah bawngtal na paipih ding hi. Aaron le a tapate in bawngtal lu tungah amau’ khut nga ding uh a,
Topa’mai, kikhopna buk kongkhak ah nangmah in a bawngtal na go ding hi.Topa’
Bawngtal sisan tawmkhat la-in na khutme tawh biakna tau kite na nuh dinga, si a omlai teng biakna tau bulah na sung khia ding hi.
A gilpi tuam a thau khempeuh le a sin tunga a utok le a kal nihte le a kal tuam a thau na la dinga, biakna tau tungah tuate na hal ding hi.
Ahih hangin bawngtal sa le a vun le a ekte, giahphual pua lamah mei tawh na hal ding hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
“Tua ciangin nangmah in tuutalte khat la-in, Aaron le a tapate in tuutal lu tungah amau’ khut nga ding uh a,
nangmah in tuutal go-in, a si la-in biakna tau kimkotah na theh ding hi.
Tua ciangin tuutal semnenin, a sungkua le a khete silin, a sabakte le a lu tawh tuate koihin,
biakna tau tungah tuutal a bupin na hal ding hi. Tua penTopa’tungah meihal biakna hi a, a gim namtui,Topa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ahi hi.Topa’Topa’
“Nangmah in tuutal adang khat na la ding hi. Aaron le a tapate in tua tuutal lu tungah amau’ khut nga ding uh a,

nangmah in tuutal go-in, a si tawmkhat la-in Aaron’ taklam bil dawn le ama tapate’ taklam bil dawnte le amau’ taklam khutpi dawnte le amau’ taklam khepi dawnte nuhin, si a omlai teng biakna tau kiimah na theh ding hi.
