Tua ciangin biakna tau tunga a om si tawmkhat le nilh sathau la-in Aaron le ama puante tung le a tapate le a puante tungah na theh ding hi. Tua ciangin amah le a puante le a tapate le a puante a siangtho hi ding hi.
“Nangmah in tuutal thau, a mei, a gilpi tuam a thau, a sin pan a utok, a kal nihte, a kal tuam a thau le a taklam phei (bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen kipsakna tuutal ahi hi)
leTopa’mai-ah a om silngo sawh loh anlum lawh sung panin anlum khat, sathau tawh a kibawl anlum bek khat le moh pheng khat na la ding hi.Topa’
Hihte khempeuh Aaron’ khut sung le a tapate’ khut sungah na koih dinga,Topa’mai-ah vei-a piak dingin na vei ding hi.Topa’

Tua ciangin amau’ khut sung panin tuate na la dinga,Topa’mai-ah a gim namtui dingin biakna tau tungah mei tawh kihal biakna banah na hal ding hi. Tua penTopa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ahi hi.Topa’Topa’
“Nangmah in Aaron a kikipsakna tuutal sa-iik la-inTopa’mai-ah vei-a piak dingin na vei ding hi. Tua pen nangma tanh hi ding hi.Topa’
“Kipsakna sa pen Aaron le ama tapate ading ahih ciangin, kipsakna tuutal panin a kipia, a kivei siampite’ tanh a phei le vei-a piak sa-iikte na siangthosak ding hi.

Tua pen Aaron le ama tapate adingin Israel mite’ tung panin a kaih tawntung ding uh ahi hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh thunuama amau’ biakna panin Israel mite in a piak ding siampite’ tanh ahi hi. Tua penTopa’tungah amau’ piak ahi hi.Topa’
“Aaron’ biakna puan siangthote pen ama sih khit ciangin a tapate’ tungah kipia dinga, amaute sathau kinilhin a kikipsak nading ahi hi.
Ama za luahin siampi na a sem a tapa in siangtho munah nasem dingin kikhopna bukah a pai ciangin ni sagih sung tuate silh ding hi.
“Nangmah in kipsakna tuutal la-in a siangtho biakna mun khatah a sa na huan ding hi.
Aaron le a tapate in kikhopna buk kongkhak ah tuutal sa le lawh sunga om anlum ne ding uh hi.

Amaute in amaute a kikipsak nading le a siangthosak dingin kilemna a kibawlna tua ante ne ding uh a, ahih hangin a pualam mi in tuate ne thei lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tuate pen a siangtho biakna an ahi hi.
Kipsakna sate khat peuhpeuh ahi a, anlum ahi zongin, zingsang ciang dong a omlai leh nangmah in a omlaite mei tawh na hal ding hi. Tuate pen biakna an siangtho ahih manin kine lo ding hi.
“Tua bangin nang kong thupiakte khempeuh tawh kituakin Aaron le ama tapate’ tungah na hih dinga, ni sagih sung tawntung amaute ki-apna na bawl ding hi.

Kilem nadingin mawhna hanga biakna-in ni simin bawngtal khat na pia ding hi. Siangthosak nadingin sathau na nilh ciang le kilemna na bawl ciangin biakna tau adingin khialhna hanga biakna khat zong na pia ding hi.
Biakna tau adingin ni sagih sung kilemna bawlin na siangthosak ding hi. Tua ciangin biakna tau a siangtho pen suak dinga, tua biakna tau a lawng peuhpeuh a siangtho suak ding hi.
“Tu-in biakna tau tungah na piak tawntung dingte hih bang ahi hi: Nisimin a kizomin kum khat a pha tuuno nihta hi ding hi.
Tuuno khat zingsang lamin na pia dinga, adang tuuno khat nitak lamin na pia ding hi.
Tuuno a masa tawh annel lawh khat le a oliv thau hai khat tawh a kihel leh tuibuah dingin leenggahzu hai khat hi ding hi.
Tuuno adang khat nitakin na pia dinga, zingsang a mah bangin a gim namtui ding,Topa’mai-ah mei tawh kihal biakna-in an tawh biakna le tuibuah tawh na pia khawm ding hi.Topa’
Nang tunga thu kong gen nading, nang tawh ka kituah nading mun,Topa’mai kikhopna buk kongkhak ah na khang tawntungun a kipia tawntung ding meihal biakna hi ding hi.Topa’
Tua lai-ah Israel mite tawh ka kituah dinga, keima vang in tua mun siangthosak ding hi.
Keimah in kikhopna buk le biakna tau ka siangthosak dinga, keima siampi na a sem dingin Aaron le a tapate zong ka siangthosak ding hi.
Israel mite lakah keimah teengin amau’ Pasian ka hi ding hi.
Amaute’ lakah keimah ka tenna hangin Egypt leitang panin amaute a pai khiatpihTopaamau’ Pasian ka hihna amaute in hong thei ding uh hi. Kei penTopaamau’ Pasian ka hi hi.TopaTopa
“Nangmah in paknamtui hal nading biakna tau khat, singkha sing tawh na bawl ding hi.
A dung pi khat le alang, a vai zong pi khat le alang mah hi ding hi. A kikim sikli nei hi dinga, a sanna pi thum hi ding hi. A kite a tak tawh sakhat hi ding hi.
Nangmah in kham citak tawh a tung le a pang kimkot le a kite na zut dinga, a kimkotah kham tawh a geihual na bawl ding hi.
Tua biakna tau adingin kham kual nih na bawl ding hi. A geihual nuai a kigal sai a pang tuakah tuate na bawl dinga, a puak nading zawlte a khum nading hi ding uh hi.
Nangmah in singkha sing tawh a zawlte na bawl dinga, kham tawh tuate na zut ding hi.
Nangmah tawh ka kituah nading mun, thuciamna tunga a om hehpihna tokhom mai, thuciamna singkuang kiangah a om dalna puan mai-ah biakna tau na koih ding hi.
Aaron in tua tungah a namtui paknamtui hal ding hi. Amah in zingsang simin meivakte a puah ciangin hal ding hi.
Aaron in nitakin zong meivakte a koih ciangin tuate hal dinga, na khang tawntungunTopa’mai-ah a namtui hi tawntung ding hi.Topa’
Tua tungah a siangtho lo paknamtui hitaleh, meihal biakna hitaleh, an tawh biakna hitaleh na pia kei ding hi. Tua tungah tuibuah na sung kei ding hi.

Aaron in kilem nadingin khialhna hanga biakna si a kite tungah kum khatin khatvei zut ding hi. Amah in na khang tawntungun kum khatin khatvei kilemna bawl ding hi. Tua penTopa’tungah a siangtho pen ahi hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite a phazah na sim ciangin amau’ lakah gimna a tun loh nadingin, a milip in a kitatkhiatna uhTopa’tungah pia ding uh hi.Topa’
Mi simna-ah a kihel mi peuhmah in biakinn shekel tawh kituakin shekel lang (shekel khatah gerah sawmnih om hi),Topa’tungah biakna-in pia ding hi.Topa’
Mi simna-ah a kihel, kum sawmnih panin a tungsiah peuhmah inTopa’tungah biakna pia ding hi.Topa’
Note ading kilemna bawl nadinginTopabiakna na piak uh ciangin a haute in shekel lang sangin a tam zaw pia lo dinga, a zawngte in a tawm zaw pia lo ding hi.Topa
Nomau adingin kilemna bawl nading,Topa’mai-ah Israel mite ka phawkna a hisak dingin Israel mite tung panin kilemna sum na la dinga, kikhopna buk nasep nadingin na zang ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Kisil nadingin sumngo kuang khat le a ngak nading zong sumngo mah tawh bawl in. Nangmah in kikhopna buk le biakna tau kikalah na koih dinga, tua sungah tui na koih ding hi.
Aaron le a tapate in a khut uh le a khe uh tua tui tawh sil ding uh hi.
Kikhopna bukah amaute a pai ciang uh ahi a,Topa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna hal dingin biakna tau nai-ah a pai ciang uh ahi zongin, amaute a sih loh nadingun amaute tui tawh kisil ding uh hi.Topa’
A sih khak loh nadingun a khut uh le a khe uh sil ding uh hi. Tua pen na khang tawntungun amaute tunga kipanin amau’ suanlekhakte tungah ngeina kip khat hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua tham loin,Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“A hoih pen a namtui nate la in. Myrrh paknamtui shekel zanga le a namtui thaksing tuazah lang, shekel zanih le sawmnga a gik le a khum a namtui paknamtui zanih le sawmnga,
biakinn shekel tawh kituakin thaksing nam khat zanga le oliv thau bung khat,
nangmah in paknamtui bawlte’ bawl mah bangin a siangtho sathau nilh dingin hihte na gawm dinga, tua pen a siangtho sathau nilh hi ding hi.
Nangmah in tua tawh kikhopna buk le thuciamna singkuang,
sabuai le a nazat khempeuh, meivakkhuam le a nazatte le paknamtui biakna tau,
meihal biakna tau a nazat khempeuh tawh, kuang le a ngakna na zut ding hi.
Tuate a siangtho pen ahih theih nadingin na siangthosak dinga, tuate a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi.
Amaute in keima tungah siampi na hong sep theih nadingun Aaron le a tapate nangmah in sathau nilhin amaute na siangthosak ding hi.
Nangmah in Israel mite kiangah, ‘Hih pen na khang tawntungun a siangtho keima sathau nilh hi ding hi.
Mi mawkmawkte’ pumpi tungah tua sathau kisung lo dinga, tua bangin a kigawm sathau dang na bawl kei ding uh hi. Tua pen a siangtho hi a, note adingin a siangtho hi ding hi.
Tua tawh a kibangin a bawl mi peuhmah ahi a, a pualam mi khatpeuh tuate a nilhsak mi peuhmah ahi zongin ama mite’ kiang panin kikhen khia ding hi,Topain ci hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.Topa
Topain Moses kiangah, “A namtui nate, stakte, onikha le galbanum, paknamtui citak tawh a namtui nate (a tamna a kikim ciatin) la inla,Topa
paknamtui bawlte’ hih bangin ci sawhin a nin baang lo, biakna paknamtui bawl in.
Nangmah in kimkhat a neu mahmahin na satnen dinga, nang tawh ka kituah nading kikhopna buk sunga thuciamna mai-ah pawlkhat na koih ding hi. Tua pen nangma adingin a siangtho pen hi ding hi.
A kigawmpih ngei teng tawh na bawl ding paknamtui pen note adingin na bawl kei ding uh hi. Tua pen note adinginTopa’tungah a siangtho hi ding hi.Topa’
Tua tawh a kibangin paknamtui a bawl mi peuhmah ama mite’ kiang panin kikhen khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Thei in; Judah minam Hur’ tapa ahi Uri’ tapa Bezalel a minin ka sam khin hi.

Lim hoihte a geel ding; kham, ngun, sumngo tawh na a bawl ding; siamna nam khempeuh ah nasep nading; bulh ding suangte seekna le singzep nasep a sem dingin vangliatna, siamna, pilna, theihna le khutsiam nasep khempeuh tawh amah ka kidimsak hi.
En in, amah tawh, Dan minam, Ahisamak’ tapa Oholiab ka seh khinzo hi. Amaute in nang kong thupiak khempeuh a bawl theih nadingun a hih thei mi khempeuh tungah siamna ka pia khinzo hi.
Amau’ sep dingte hih bang ahi hi: Kikhopna buk le thuciamna singkuang le a tunga om hehpihna tokhom le buk sung na khempeuh,
sabuai le a nazatte le a siangtho meivakkhuam le a nazatte khempeuh, paknamtui biakna tau,
le meihal biakna tau a nazatte khempeuh tawh, kuang le a ngakna,
le amau’ siampi nasep nadingin siampi Aaron’ puan siangthote le ama tapate’ puante ahi, hoihtakin a kigan puante,
le siangtho mun adingin nilh sathau le a namtui paknamtui ahi hi. Ka thupiakte khempeuh tawh kituakin nangmah in na bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: ‘Keima Sabbath ni-in note na tawlnga ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih penTopaahi keimah in note a hong siangthosak ka hihna na theih nadingun na khang tawntungun keimah le note’ kikalah lim khat hi ding hi.Topa

Sabbath ni-in note na tawlnga ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note adingin a siangtho ahi hi. Tua ni-in a tawlnga lo mi peuhmah kithat dinga, tua ni-in na a sem mi peuhmah ama mite’ kiang panin kikhen khia ding hi.
Ni guk sungin nasep kizo ding hi. Ahih hangin a ni sagih ni pen a thupi-a tawlngakna Sabbath ni hi a,Topa’tungah siangtho hi. Sabbath ni-in nasep khat peuhpeuh a sem mi peuhmah kithat ding hi.Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin a tawntung thuciamna-in amau’ khang tawntungin Sabbath tangin, Israel mite in Sabbath kem ding uh hi.

Ni guk sungtengTopain van le lei bawlin, a ni sagih ni-in amah tawlnga a, a tha dimsakkik hi. Keimah le Israel mite’ kikalah hih Sabbath ni pen lim khat hi tawntung ding hi, ci hi,’ ci in,” a ci hi.Topa
Sinai Mual tungah thugenna a man khit ciangin Pasian’ khut tawh a kigelh suangpek ahi thuciamna suangpek nihte, amah in Moses a pia hi.

Mual tung panin Moses hong tunsuk hakna mite in a theih uh ciangin, Aaron kiangah mite amau mah kikaikhawm tawmin ama kiangah, “Kithawi in; kote’ mai-ah a pai ding pasian hong bawlsak in. Egypt leitang panin eite hong pai khiatpih to Moses ahihleh bang suak khin cih i thei kei hi,” a ci uh hi.
Aaron in amaute kiangah, “Na zite, na tapate le na tanute uh bil tungah a om kham bilbahte sut khia unla, kei kiangah tuate hong paipih un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh in amau’ bil-a om kham bilbahte sutkhia-in Aaron’ kiangah tuate a paipih uh hi.

Amah in amaute’ tung panin kham saangin, sumtui sunna sungah sungin, a kisung bawngno khat bawlsak a, tua ciangin mite in, “Israel mite aw, hih pen Egypt leitang panin note hong pai khiatpih to na pasian uh!” a ci uh hi.
Aaron in hih thu a muh ciangin, amah in tua mai-ah biakna tau khat lam a, “Zing ciang penTopaading pawi bawl ni hi ding hi,” ci-in zaksakna a bawl hi.Topa
Amaute zingsangin tho baih uh a, meihal biakna pia-in thunuama biakna zong a paipih uh hi. Pawi an ne-in mite tu uh a, zu khamin numei pasal kisawk ngeingai uh hi.
Topain Moses kiangah, “Paisuk in; bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt leitang panin nangmah in na pai khiatpih toh mite amau kisiasak uh hi.Topa

Ka thupiakna lampi panin amaute kihei khia pak uh hi. Amau adingin amaute in a kisung bawngno khat bawlin, tua bia-in a tungah biakna pia uh a, ‘Israel mite aw, hih pen Egypt leitang panin note hong pai khiatpih to na pasian uh ahi hi!’ ci uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah, “Hih mite ka mu zo hi. En in, a lungkhauh mite ahi uh hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in amaute tungah ka sinso-in amaute ka beisak theih nadingin kei guak hong omsak in. Ahi zongin nang na hihleh minam lian khatin kong bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses inTopaama Pasian tungah thum a, “Topaaw, na vangliatna le na thahatna tawh Egypt leitang panin na pai khiatpih ahi nangma mite tungah bang hangin sinso ding na hi hiam?TopaTopa

Bang hangin Egypt mite in, ‘Mualtungah amaute a that ding le leitung panin amaute a beisak dingin siatna ngaihsutna tawh amah in amaute pai khiatpih hi,’ ci ding uh ahi hiam? A kihtakhuai na hehna daisak inla, na lungsim kheelin na mite tungah hih siatna tungsak kei in.

Amaute’ tungah nang mahmah kiciamin, ‘Na suanlekhakte uh vantung aksi bangin tamsakin, keimah in ka ciamsa hih leitang khempeuh na suanlekhakte uh tungah ka pia dinga, amaute in luah tawntung ding uh hi,’ na cihna na nasemte Abraham, Isaac le Israel phawk in,” a ci hi.
Tua cianginTopain a lungsim kheel a, ama mite’ tungah a tunsak ding siatna tungsak nawn lo hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Moses kihei-in, a khutsunga om thuciamna suangpek nih, a pang langnih tuakah a kigelh suangpeekte tawh mual tung panin a paisuk hi.
A peekte pen Pasian’ bawl hi a, a kigelh thute pen suangpek tungah Pasian’ gelh ahi hi.
Joshua in amaute’ kiko gamlumna a zak ciangin Moses kiangah, “Giahphual ah kido-a gamlumna om hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Moses in, “Tu-a gamlumna pen zawhna kikona aw ahi a, lelhna kikona aw ahi zongin, tua bang pawl hi lo hi. Ahih hangin tu-a ka zak pen lasakna awging ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Giahphual nai-ah amah tungin bawngno le lamna a muh phetin, Moses heh mahmah a, amah in ama khut sung panin suangpeekte lawn a, mual bulah tuate a sukham hi.
Amah in amaute’ bawlsa bawngno la-in mei tawh hal a, gawivui-in tui tungah theh a, Israel mite a tui dawnsak hi.
Moses in Aaron kiangah, “Amaute’ tungah khialhna lianpi khat na tunpih nadingin hih mite in nang’ tungah bang hong gen uh ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Aaron in, “Ka topa aw, heh lua kei in. Mite’ lungsim na theihsa ahih mah bangin amaute in siatna ngaihsun uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in keima kiangah, ‘Kote’ mai-ah a pai ding pasian hong bawlsak in. Egypt leitang panin eite hong pai khiatpih to Moses ahihleh, bang suak khin cih i thei kei hi,’ ci uh hi.

Keimah in amaute kiangah, ‘Kham a nei peuhpeuh in sut khia un,’ ka ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute in kei’ tungah hong pia uh a, keimah in mei sungah tuate ka lawn a, hih bawngno hong suak hi,” a ci hi.
Mite a tatkhialhna Moses in a muh ciangin (bang hang hiam cih leh Aaron in amau’ maizum nadingin amau’ galte’ lakah amaute takhialsak hi),
giahphual kongpi sungah Moses dinga, “Topa’lamah kua teng om na hi uh hiam? Kei’ kiangah hong pai un,” a ci hi. Levi mite khempeuh ama kiangah hong kikaikhawm uh hi.Topa’

Amah in amaute kiangah, “Israel-te’TopaPasian in hih bangin ci hi: ‘A milip in a namsau a pangah tawi-in kongpi khat pan kongpi khat, giahphual khempeuh ah pai kawikawi-in, a milip in a sanggampa, a milip in a kikholhpih pa, a milip in a veengpa that hen,’ ci hi,” ci-in a gen hi.Topa
Moses’ thugen bangin Levi mite gamta uh a, tua ni-in mihing tulthum bang si hi.
Moses in, “Note’ tungah thupha hong tun theih nadingin ama tapa le a sanggamte ciat supna thuakinTopa’na sep nadingah tuni-in note na kikipsak tawm uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’

A zingsang ciangin Moses in mite kiangah, “Note in khialhna lianpi khat na bawl khin uh hi. Tu-inTopa’kiangah kei ka pai dinga, note’ khialhna thu-ah kilemna ka va bawl thei kha ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Tua ahih cianginTopa’kiangah Moses paikikin, “Ala, hih mite in khialhna lianpi khat bawl khin uh a, amaute in amau adingin kham pasian khat bawl khin uh hi.Topa’
Ahih hangin nangmah in tu-in amau’ khialhna maisak in. Na maisak kei ding leh, hong thum ing, nangma gelhsa laibu panin keimah hong phiatmai in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hanginTopain Moses kiangah, “Kei’ tungah hong khial peuhmah, ka laibu panin ka phiat ding hi.Topa

Ahih hangin tu-in pai in; nang’ tunga kong gensa munah mite paipih in. En in, na mai-ah ka vantungmi pai ding hi. Ahi zongin ka thukkik ni ciangin amau’ khialhna amau’ tungah ka thuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Amaute in Aaron’ bawlsa bawngno bia uh ahih maninTopain mite’ tungah gimna a tungsak hi.Topa

Topain Moses kiangah, “Hih mun nusia un; Abraham, Isaac le Jakob tungah, ‘Na suanlekhakte uh tungah ka pia ding hi,’ ci-a ka ciam leitangah nangmah le Egypt leitang panin na pai khiatpih toh mite tawh hih lai panin paito un.Topa
Note’ mai-ah vantungmi khat ka sawl dinga, Kanaan mite, Amor mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite ka hawl khia ding hi.

Bawngnawi le khuaizu a luanna leitangah paito un. Ahi zongin note hong sisak kha ding ka hih ciangin note’ lakah kei kong paito kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note mi lungkhauh na hi uh hi,” a ci hi.
Mite in hih thusiate a zak uh ciangin amaute thuum uh a, kuamah kizem lo uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih lehTopain Moses kiangah, “Israel mite’ tungah hih bangin gen in: ‘Note mi lungkhauh na hi uh hi. Note’ lakah tomno khat sung hong paito leng, note kong beisak ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin note kong bawl nading ka theih nadingin note’ tung panin na kizepnate uh suah khia un,’ ci in,” ci-in gen khinzo hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite in Horeb Mual pan a kipanin amau’ kizepnate suah khia uh hi.

Israel mite in giahphual a sat simin Moses in puanbuk la-in giahphual panin a gamla pekah lam thei zel hi. Amah in tua pen kikhopna buk, ci hi.Topa’tungah thu a dong nuam mi peuhmah giahphual pualama om kikhopna bukah pai khia uh hi.Topa’
Puanbukah Moses a pai peuhpeuh ciangin mi khempeuh ding to-in, a milipin a puanbuk kong ciat uhah ding uh a, puanbuk sungah a tum khit mateng Moses’ nung en uh hi.
Puanbukah Moses a tum ciangin meii khuam hong kum sukin puanbuk kongkhak ah dinga,Topain Moses hopih hi.Topa
Puanbuk kongkhak ah meii khuam a ding a muh uh ciangin a milipin a puanbuk kong ciat uhah mi khempeuh dingto-in kun uh hi.
Tua bangin, mi khat in a lawmpa a hopih bangin maitang kituahinTopain Moses hopih zel hi. Giahphual ah Moses a ciahkik ciangin, Nun’ tapa, ama nasem tangval Joshua, puanbukah omlai hi.TopaTopa’

Moses inTopa’kiangah, “Thei in; nangmah in keima kiangah, ‘Hih mite paipihto in,’ nong ci hi. Ahih hangin kei tawh nong sawlkhop ding mi kei nong theisak nai kei hi. Ahi zongin nangmah in, ‘Na minin nang kong thei a, ka mai-ah maipha zong na mu khin hi,’ nong ci khin hi.Topa’

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang tungah kong thum hi; na muhna-ah maipha ka ngah leh keimah in nang hong thei-in, na muhna-ah maipha ka ngah theih nadingin tu-in nangma geelnate kei hong lak in. Hih minam pen nangma mite ahihna zong ngaihsun in,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah, “Nang tawh kong pai dinga, lungsim tawlngakna hun nang kong pia ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Moses in ama kiangah, “Nang nong paipih kei ding leh, hih lai panin kote hong pai khiatosak kei in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh keimah le nangma mite in nangma muhna-ah maipha ka ngahna uh bang ci-in kithei ding ahi hiam? Leitung a om mi khempeuh tungah keimah le nangma mite ka tungnunna uh pen kote tawh nang nong paikhopna hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah, “Nangma gensa hih thu mahmah keimah in ka hih ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka muhna-ah nang in maipha na ngah zo a, na minin nang kong thei hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Moses in, “Kong thum hi; na vangliatna kei hong lak in,” a ci hi.
Amah in, “Keima hoihna khempeuh na mai-ah ka paisak dinga, na mai-ah keima min, ‘Topa’ cihna ka pulak ding hi. Ka diknopna mite tungah ka dik dinga, ka hehpihnop mite ka hehpih ding hi.Topa
Ahih hangin nangmah in ka maitang na mu thei kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mi in kei hong mu leh tua mi nungta lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua banahTopain, “En in; suang tungah na din nading keima kiangah mun khat om hi.Topa
Keima minthanna vang a pai laitakin suanghawm sungah nang kong koih dinga, kei ka pai khiat mateng ka khut tawh nang kong hum ding hi.
Tua ciangin keimah in ka khut ka la khia ding hi. Nangmah in ka nung na mu dinga, ahih hangin ka maitang na mu kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah, “A masa tawh a kibangin suangpeek nih sui in. Na sukkhap a masa suangpeekte sunga om thute tuate tungah ka gelhkik ding hi.Topa
Kithawi-in Sinai Mual tungah zingsangin hong paito inla, mual dawn tua munah keima kiangah hong kilak in.
Nang tawh kuamah hong paito khawmsak kei inla, mual tung tengah kuamah omsak kei in. Tua mual mai-ah tuuhon ahi a, bawnghon ahi zongin gamtasak kei in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a masa bangin suangpeek nih a sui hi. Zingsang ciangin amah tho baihin,Topain amah a thupiaksa bangin Sinai Mual tungah paito a, a khut sungah suangpeek nih a tawi hi.Topa
Meii sungahTopakum sukin tua lai-ah Moses tawh dinga,Topain ama min a pulak hi.TopaTopa
Ama mai-ahTopapai-in,“Topa,Topa, hehpihna nei-in a dik Pasian; lungduai-in itna kip le thutakna tawh a dim;Topa“TopaTopa

mi tul tampite adingin itna kip a nei; mawhna, thu palsatna le khialhna maisakin; ahih hangin bangbang hitaleh mawhna a khahkhong ngei lo; pate’ mawhna tate’ tung le tute’ tung, khang thum khang lina dongin a thukpa,” ci-in a pulak hi.
Moses in leilak lamah a lu kunin a bia hi.

Amah in, “Tu-in na muhna-ah maipha ka muh leh,Topaaw, kong thum hi; lungkhauh mite ka hita uh zongin kote’ kiangahTopahong pai in. Kote’ mawhna le kote’ khialhna hong maisak inla, nangma mi dingin kote hong sang in,” a ci hi.TopaTopa

Topain Moses kiangah, “En in, keimah in thuciamna khat ka bawl hi. Nangma mi khempeuh’ muhna-ah, leitung khempeuh hitaleh minam khatpeuh sungah hitaleh cikmahin tua bang a kibawl ngei lo na lamdangte ka bawl dinga, note’ lakah a om mite khempeuh inTopa’nasepna mu ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ tungah kong bawl ding na pen a kihtakhuai thu ahi hi.TopaTopa’
“Tuni-a kong thupiak zui in. En in, na mai-ah Amor mite, Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite ka hawl khia ding hi.
Na paina leitangah a teeng mite tawh thuciamna bawlkha kei inla, tua pen note adingin thangzak a suahkhak loh nadingin nang mahmah kidawm in.
Nangmah in amau’ biakna taute phelin, amau’ biakna khuamte kuaitanin, amau’ Asherah milimte na phukpai ding hi.
“(Pasian dang na bia kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa, ama min Aam a hi pa pen a aam Pasian ahi hi.)Topa

Nangmah in tua leitangah a teeng mite tawh thuciamna bawlkha kei in. Amaute in amau’ pasian-te tawh paktatna bawlin amau’ pasian-te’ tungah biakna pia-in, khatpeuh in note hong sap ciangin, note in ama biakpiakna na ne kha ding uh a,
note in amau’ tanute na tapate uh adingin la-in, amau’ pasian-te tawh paktatna a bawl a tanute in amau’ pasian-te tawh na tapate uh paktatsak kha ding uh hi.
“A kisung pasian-te note adingin bawlin na bia kei ding uh hi.

“Silngo sawh loh anlum pawi na bawl ding uh hi. Abib kha, a kisehsa hun sungteng, nang kong thupiak mah bangin ni sagih sung silngo sawh loh anlum na ne ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Abib kha sungin Egypt panin note na pai khia uh hi.
“Mihing le ganhing tacil a pa khempeuh keima-a’ ahi hi.
La a tacilte tuuno khat tawh na tanh ding uh hi. Na tat kei uhleh a ngawng na kuaitan ding uh hi. Na tapa cilte khempeuh uh na tanh ding uh hi. Keima mai-ah a guakin kuamah hong kilak lo ding hi.
“Ni guk sung na na sem ding uh a, ahi zongin a ni sagih ni-in na tawlnga ding uh hi. Lokhawh hun le anlak hun sungin zong na tawlnga ding uh hi.
“Nipikalte’ pawi, mangbuh a tung masa pawi le kum bei ciangin an kaihkhop pawi na bawl ding uh hi.
“Pasal khempeuh Israel Pasian,TopaPasian’ mai-ah kum khatin thumvei kilak ding uh hi.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh note’ mai-ah minam dangte ka hawl khia dinga, na gamgite uh nomau adingin ka keek ding hi.Topana Pasian uh’ mai-ah kum khatin thumvei a kilak dingin na paitoh sungun na leitang uh mi khat peuhpeuh in a hong deihgawh khak ding lunghihmawhna om lo ding hi.Topa
“Note in silngo tawh keimah biakpiakna si na pia khawm kei ding uh a, Paisan Pawi biakpiakna zong zingsang dong na omsak kei ding uh hi.
“Note in na anpalte uh lakah a tung masa penTopana Pasian uh’ inn-ah na paipih ding uh hi.Topa“Note in keelno a pi’ nawizu tawh na huan kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah, “Hih thute gelh in. Hih thute tawh kizui-in nang le Israel tawh thuciamna khat ka bawl zo hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua lai-ah sun sawmli le zan sawmli sungTopatawh Moses om a, tua hun sungteng anletui a ne kei hi. Amah in suangpek tungah thuciamna kammalte ahi thupiak sawmte a gelh hi.Topa
A khut sungah thuciamna suangpek nih tawh Sinai Mual tung panin Moses hong paisuk ciangin, Pasian tawh amah kiho khin ahih manin a maitang vun a taan lamtak Moses in thei lo hi.
Aaron le Israel mite khempeuh in Moses a muh ciangin, a maitang vun na taang a, ama mai-ah a pai ding uh amaute lau uh hi.
Ahih hangin amaute kiangah Moses pai hi. Aaron le mihon makaite khempeuh ama kiangah hong paikik uh a, Moses in amaute hopih hi.
Tua khit ciangin Israel mi khempeuh a nai-ah hong pai uh a,Topain Sinai Mual-ah ama tunga a gen khempeuh thupiakna-in amaute tungah a pia hi.Topa
Moses in amaute tawh thugen a man khit ciangin, amah in a maitangah kiliahna puan khat a koih hi.

Ahih hanginTopatawh a kiho dingin ama mai-ah Moses a tum peuhpeuh ciangin, amah a pusuahkik mateng a kiliahna puan la khia hi. Amah hong pai khia-in ama tungah a kipia thute Israel mite kiangah a gen ciangin,Topa
Israel mite in Moses’ maitang vun a taang mu uh hi. Amah tawh a kiho dingin a pai matengin Moses in kiliahna puan tawh a maitang a khuhkik hi.
Moses in Israel mihonpi khempeuh khawmin amaute kiangah, “Hihte pen note’ hih dingTopa’hong thupiak ahi hi.Topa’
Ni guk sungin nasep kiman dinga, ahih hangin a ni sagih ni-in thupi-a tawlngakna Sabbath siangthoTopa’tungah na nei ding uh hi. Tua ni-in na khat peuhpeuh a sem peuhmah kithat ding hi.Topa’
Sabbath ni-in na tenna khempeuh uhah mei na cih kei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Moses in Israel mihonpite khempeuh tungah, “Topa’hong thupiak hih bang ahi hi:Topa’
Note inTopa’tungah biakna na pia ding uh hi. A pia nuam peuhmah inTopa’tungah biakna paipih un. Tuate in: Kham, ngun le sumngo,Topa’Topa’
a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk puan hoihte, keelmul,
a kisansak tuutal vunte le savunte; singkha sing,
meivak ading sathau, nilh sathau le a paknamtui dingin a namtui nate,
siampi puan le awmdalah bulh dingin onik suang le suang dangte ahi hi.
“Note’ lak panin siamna a nei mi peuhmah hong paisak unla,Topa’thupiaksa khempeuh bawlsak un. Tua a bawl dingte pen biakbuk,Topa’
a puanbuk le a khuhna, a vankhainate le a khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite, a bullente;
singkuang a zawlte tawh, hehpihna tokhom le kongkhak dalna puan;
sabuai a zawlte le a nazatte khempeuh tawh, Ompihna Anlum;
khuavak dingin meivakkhuam zong, a nazatte le a meivakte tawh, meivak dingin sathau;
paknamtui biakna tau, a zawlte tawh, nilh sathau le a namtui paknamtui le biakbuk kongah kongkhak ading puankhai;
meihal biakna tau, a sumngo siklen, a zawlte, a nazatte khempeuh, kuang le a ngakna tawh;
buktual a a puankhaite, a khuampite le a bullente tawh, tual kongpi ading puankhai;
biakbuk khetphimte le huang khetphimte le a khaute;
siangtho munah zat dingin limtakin a kigan puante, amau’ siampi nasep nadingin siampi Aaron ading puan siangtho le ama tapate’ puante ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel mihonpi khempeuh Moses’ omna panin pai khia uh hi.
Piak nopna lungsim a nei mi peuhmah hong pai tawm uh a, kikhopna buk le a nasep nading khempeuh le puan siangthote a zat dinginTopaading a piakte uh hong puak uh hi.Topa

Tua ahih ciangin numei, pasal hong pai uh hi. Piak nopna lungsim a neite khempeuh in tukkilhte, bilbahte, min gelhna zungbuhte le banbulhte ahi kham tawh a kibawl na namkim hong paipih uh a, a milip inTopa’tungah kham tawh piakna ap uh hi.Topa’
A dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute, puan hoih, keelmul, a kisansak tuutal vunte, ahih kei leh savun hoihte ahi zongin a nei mi peuhmah in tuate hong paipih uh hi.
Ngun ahi a, sumngo ahi zongin a pia thei peuhmah inTopa’tungah tua nate paipih uh a, nasep nadinga kimang thei ding singkha sing a nei mi peuhmah in zong hong paipih hi.Topa’
A hih thei numei khempeuh in a khut uh tawh khau khuk uh a, amau’ khuksa a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk khaute hong paipih uh hi.
Hih theih siamna a nei numei khempeuh in zong keelmul khuk uh hi.
Makaite in siampi puan le awmdal a bulh dingin onik suang le suang dangte,
meivak ding, nilh sathau ding le paknamtui dingin a namtui nate le sathau hong paipih uh hi.
Topain Moses tunga a thupiaksa nasep nadingin na khat peuhpeuh a pia nuam numei pasal Israel mi khempeuh in utthu-a biakna-inTopa’tungah hong paipih uh hi.TopaTopa’
Moses in Israel mite kiangah, “Thei un;Topain a minin Judah minam, Hur’ tapa Uri, Uri’ tapa Bezalel sam khin hi.Topa

Lim hoihte a geel ding; kham, ngun, sumngo tawh na a bawl ding; siamna nam khempeuh nasep nading, bulh ding suang seekna le singzep nasep a sem dingin amah in vangliatna, siamna, pilna, theihna le khutsiam nasep khempeuh tawh amah kidimsak hi.
Topain amah le Dan minam Ahisamak’ tapa Oholiab tungah midangte hilh siamna pia khin hi.Topa

Amah in khutsiam nasep, geelsiam nasep; a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk puanzep siam nasep; siamgat siamna le geelsiam nasep ahi zongin nasep namkim a sem dingin amaute tungah siamna a guan hi.

“Bezalel le Oholiab le biakbuk lamna-ah nasep khat peuhpeuh sep nading zia a thei dinginTopain siamna le pilna a guat mi peuhmah inTopa’thupiaksa khempeuh tawh kituakin sem ding uh hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa’
Moses in Bezalel le Oholiab leTopain nasep siamna a guat mi, nasem a pai dingin a ut mi peuhmah a sam hi.Topa
Israel mite in biakbuk sep nadingin utthu-a a piak uh nate a paipih khempeuh uh amaute in Moses’ tung panin a sang uh hi. Amaute in zingsang simin utthu-a piakna ama tungah paipih uh ahih manin,
biakbuk nasep a namkim a sem mi khempeuh amau’ nasepna ciat panin hong pai uh a,
Moses kiangah, “Topain eite’ sep dingin a hong sawl nasep nadingin a kicing ding zahval, mite in tampi hong paipih uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa

Tua ahih ciangin Moses in thu pia-in giahphual khempeuh ah thu kizasak a, “Numei hitaleh pasal hitaleh kuamah in biakbuk adingin pia thuah nawn kei un,” kici hi. Tua ahih ciangin a piak ding uh mite kikho hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ piaksa nate pen nasepna khempeuh hih nadingin kicing a, val zaw lai hi.

Nasem mite’ lak panin a hih thei mi khempeuh in puan dal sawm tawh biakbuk bawl uh hi. Tuate pen a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih le a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute tawh kibawlin hoihtakin a kibawl kherub-te tawh zem uh hi.
Tua puan a dung pi sawmli le nih, a vai pi guk ciat hi a, a puan khempeuh kikim hi.
Amaute in puan dal ngate khatlekhat khuituahin, puan adang ngate zong khatlekhat mah khuituah uh hi.

Amaute in a kikhuituah masa puan a nawlnung pen’ nawl dung sukah khau dum tawh a bilvangte bawl uh a, tua mah bangin a kikhuituah nihna puan a nawlnung’ pen nawl dung sukah zong tuate mah a bawl uh hi.
Amaute in puan khat tungah bilvang sawmnga bawlin, a kikhuituah a nihna puan nawlah bilvang sawmnga mah bawl uh a, a bilvangte khatlekhat kitang hi.
Amaute in kham kilhna sawmnga bawlin, tua kilhnate tawh a puan khatlekhat kimatsak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin biakbuk puan bupkhat a suak hi.
Amaute in biakbuk a tung khuh nadingin keelmul tawh puan dal sawm le khat a bawl uh hi.
Tua puante a dung pi sawmli le nga, a vai pi guk ciat hi a, tua puan sawm le khatte kikim hi.
Amaute in puan dal ngate khatlekhat khuituahin, a puan dang gukte zong khatlekhat mah a khuituah uh hi.
Amaute in a kikhuituah puan khat a nawlnung pen nawlah a bilvang sawmnga bawlin, puan dal a zom nawlah a bilvang sawmnga mah a bawl uh hi.
Tuate bup khat a suah theih nading, puanbuk a kimatsak dingin amaute in kilhna sawmnga sumngo tawh a bawl uh hi.
Amaute in puanbuk adingin a kisansak tuutal vunte le keel vunte tawh khuhna khat a bawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in biakbuk adingin singkha sing tawh a po to khawm ding khuampeekte a bawl uh hi.
A khuampeekte khat a tun pi sawm le pi nga hi a, a vai pi nih le letmat thum ciat ahi hi.
A bulh nadingin khuampeek khat in zang nih ciat nei a, amaute in biakbuk khuam khempeuh adingin a bawl uh hi.
Amaute in biakbuk adingin khuampeekte hih bangin bawl uh hi: Leitaw lampang adingin khuam sawmnih;
a khuampeek sawmnihte’ bulah bullen sawmli ngun tawh, a zang nihte adingin khuampeek khat bulah bullen nih le a khuampeek dang khat bulah a zang nihte adingin bullen nih mah a bawl uh hi.
Biakbuk a pang nihna lam, leilu lampang adingin amaute in khuampeek sawmnih
le ngun tawh kibawl a bullen sawmli, khuampeek khat bulah bullen nih, adang khuampeek khat bulah bullen nih mah a bawl uh hi.
Nitumna lam, biakbuk nung lam adingin amaute in khuampeek guk a bawl uh hi.
Biakbuk nung lam kiute adingin a khuampeek nih zong a bawl uh hi.
Tuate a bul lamah kikak a, ahih hangin a kual masa ah a dawn kimat hi. A kiu nihte adingin tua bangin nih a bawl uh hi.
Ngun tawh kibawl amau’ bullente tawh khuampeek giat om hi: Bullen sawm le guk om a, khuampeek khat bulah bullen nih ciat a om hi.
Amaute in singkha singzawl, biakbuk pang khat-a khuampeekte adingin nga,
biakbuk a pang langkhat a khuampeekte adingin zawl nga, nitumna lam biakbuk nung lampang a khuampeekte adingin zawl nga mah a bawl uh hi.
A khuampeekte’ kimciang takah mong khat panin mong khat dongin a zawl laita paisuaksak uh hi.
Amaute in kham tawh khuampeekte zutin, zawlte a len dingin kham tawh a kualte bawl uh a, kham tawh a zawlte a zut uh hi.
Amaute in a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih tawh dalna puan a bawl uh hi. Hoihtakin a kibawl kherub-te tawh amaute in tua dalna puan a zem uh hi.
Tua puan adingin amaute in singkha khuampi li bawl uh a, kham tawh tua khuampite a zut uh hi. A vankhainate pen kham hi a, tua khuamte adingin ngun bullen li a sung uh hi.
Amaute in puanbuk kongkhak-a dingin a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem, a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih tawh kongpuankhai khat le,
a khuampi ngate a vankhainate tawh a bawl uh hi. Amaute in tuate’ luzepnate kham tawh zutin, a gaknate kham hi a, ahih hangin a bullen ngate pen sumngo ahi hi.
Bezalel in singkha sing tawh singkuang bawl a, a dung pi thum le letmat kua, a vai pi nih le letmat thum, a sanna pi nih le letmat thum mah ahi hi.
Kham citak tawh a sung le a pua zutin, a kimkotah kham geihual khat a bawl hi.
A kiu lite adingin kham kual li, a pang khatah kual nih, a pang langkhat adingin kual nih mah a sung hi.
Singkha singzawlte zong bawl a, kham tawh tuate zutin,
singkuang puak nadingin singkuang panga kualte sungah a zawlte a khum hi.
Kham citak tawh hehpihna tokhom khat bawl a, a dung pi thum le letmat kua, a vai pi nih le letmat thum ahi hi.
Amah in sek tawh a kiseek kham tawh kherub nih, hehpihna tokhom mong tuakah a bawl hi.
Kherub khat mong khatah, kherub khat a mong langkhat ah om a, a mong nihte-ah hehpihna tokhom tawh sakhatin kherub-te a bawl hi.
Kherub-te in a khate uh tua tokhom tungah zalin, amau’ khate tawh hehpihna tokhom liimsun uh a, amaute khatlekhat kimaingat uh hi. Hehpihna tokhom lamah kherub-te’ mai a nga hi.
Amah in singkha sing tawh sabuai zong bawl a, a dung pi thum, a vai pi khat le alang, a sanna pi nih le letmat thum ahi hi.
Kham citak tawh zut a, a kimkotah kham tawh a geihual khat a bawl hi.
Khut peek cia a pha zawl khat a kimkotah bawl a, a zawl kimkotah kham geihual khat a bawl hi.
Tua sabuai adingin kham kual li sungin, a kiu li, a khe lite-ah a kualte a gak hi.
Sabuai puak nading zawlte a len dingin a zawl gei-ah a kualte om hi.
Sabuai puak nadingin singkha singzawlte bawl a, kham tawh tuate a zut hi.
Amah in sabuai tunga om ding beellekuangte, paknamtui adingin kuangdaite le pakante, tui buah nadingin kuang-ukte le thawl gongbakte, kham citak tawh a bawl hi.
Amah in kham citak tawh meivakkhuam zong a bawl hi. Meivakkhuam a bul le a kungte pen a kiseek nate tawh kibawl hi. A haite, a nunte le a paakte, meivakkhuam tawh sakhat ahi hi.
A pangte panin hiang guk meeng khia a, a pang khatah meivakkhuam hiang thum omin, a pang langkhat ah meivakkhuam hiang thum mah a om hi.

Hiang khat tungah a nun le a pak a om, almond gah tawh a kibang hai thum le adang hiang khat ciat tungah a nun le a pak a om, almond gah tawh a kibang hai thum mah kibawl hi. Tua ahih ciangin meivakkhuam panin a hiang gukte a meeng khia ahi hi.
A meivakkhuam tung mahmahah a nun le a pak tawh a om, almond gah bangin a kibawl hai li omin,
meivakkhuam panin hiang guk a kopte’ bulah tua tawh sakhat ahi nun khat om hi.
Amau’ nunte le a hiangte pen tua tawh sakhat hi a, a buppi-in kham citak a kiseek sakhat ahi hi.
A meivak sagihte le a taitehte le a kuangte kham citak a bawl ahi hi.
Amah in kham citak tawi sawmnih le tawi khat a gik tawh tua meivakkhuam le a nazatte khempeuh a bawl hi.

Amah in singkha sing tawh paknamtui biakna tau bawl a, a dung pi khat le alang, a vai pi khat le alang mah ahi hi. Tua pen a ning kikim a, a sanna pi thum hi a, a kite pen tua biakna tau tawh sakhat ahi hi.
Amah in a tungzang, a kimkota a pangte le a kite kham citak tawh a zut hi. A kimkotah kham geihual khat
le a puak nading zawlte a len dingin a pang tuak a geihual nuai takah kham kual nih a bawl hi.
Amah in singkha sing tawh a zawlte bawlin, kham tawh tuate a zut hi.
Amah in paknamtui bawlte’ gawm bangin a siangtho nilh sathau le a siangtho a namtui paknamtui zong a bawl hi.
Amah in meihal biakna tau zong singkha sing tawh bawl a, a dung pi sagih le alang, a vai pi sagih le alang mah ahi hi. A ning kikim a, a sanna pi li le alang ahi hi.
Amah in tua tau adingin a kiu lite-ah a kite a bawl hi. A kite, a tau tawh sakhat hi a, sumngo tawh a zut hi.
Biakna tau nazat khempeuh, beelte, kawbiate, kuangte, sikkate le vutluahna peekte a bawl hi. A nazat khempeuh sumngo tawh a bawl hi.
Biakna tau adingin a zawl nuai-ah, a kimciang a ban suk, a vang simsiam, sumngo siklen khat a bawl hi.
A zawlte a len dingin sumngo siklen kiu lite’ tung ading a kual li a sung hi.
Singkha sing tawh a zawlte bawl a, sumngo tawh tuate a zut hi.
A puak nadingin biakna tau pangte a om a kualte sungah a zawlte khum a, singpeekte tawh biakna tau a kuakin a bawl hi.
Amah in kikhopna buk kongkhak ah na a sem numeite’ limlangte panin sumngo tawh kisilna kuang le a ngakna a bawl hi.
Amah in buktual a bawl hi. Leitaw lampang buktual a puan kikhaite pen a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih hi a, pi za le pi sawmnga a sau hi.
A khuampite sawmnih hi a, a bullente zong sawmnih mah ahi hi. Sumngo tawh kibawl a, ahih hangin a vankhainate le a gaknate ngun ahi hi.
Leilu lampang ading zong tua bangmah ahi hi.
Nitumna lampang adingin puan kikhai sukte pi sawmsagih le pi nga hi a, a khuampite sawm hi-in, a bullente sawm mah hi a, a vankhainate le a gaknate ngun ahi hi.
A mailam, nisuahna lam adingin pi sawmsagih le pi nga mah ahi hi.
Kongpi pang khat ading puan kikhai sukte pen pi sawmnih le nih le alang hi a, khuampi thum le bullen thum tawh ahi hi.
A pang langkhat ading zong tua bangmah ahi hi. Buktual kongpi hih lam le hua lamah khuampi thum le bullen thum tawh a puan khaisukte pi sawmnih le nih le alang ahi hi.
Buktual kimkota puan kikhai sukte khempeuh pen a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih ahi hi.
Khuampite ading a bullente pen sumngo hi a, ahih hangin a vankhainate le a gaknate ngun ahi hi. A khuamluzepnate a kizutna zong ngun hi a, buktual a khuamte khempeuh ngun kibawl gakna tawh kigak hi.

Buktual kongpi puankhai pen a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem ahi hi. Buktual a kikhai sukte tawh kizui-in pi sawmthum sau-in, a vailam pi sagih le alang sang hi.
A khuampite li hi a, a bullen lite sumngo hi a, a vankhainate ngun hi a, a khuamluzepnate le a gaknate a kizutna ngun mah ahi hi.
Biakbuk le buktual kimkot ading khetphimte khempeuh sumngo ahi hi.
Hihte pen siampi Aaron’ tapa Ithamar’ vaihawmna nuai-ah Levi mite’ sep dingTopa’omna ahi biakbuk adingin Moses’ thupiakna tawh a kisim van malte ahi hi.Topa’
Judah minam Hur’ tapa ahi Uri’ tapa Bezalel inTopain Moses a thupiak khempeuh a bawl hi.Topa
A khut siam, a geel siam, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte a zem, Dan minam, Ahisamak’ tapa Oholiab in zong amah a huh hi.
Nasep nadinga a kizang kham khempeuh, biakbuk lamna-a a kizang, a kipia khamte, biakinn shekel-in talen sawmnih le kua le shekel zasagih sawmthum ahi hi.
Mi simna sungah a kihel mihonte tung panin a kingah ngunte, biakinn shekel-in talen zakhat le shekel tulkhat zasagih sawmsagih le nga ahi hi.
Mi khat ciangin beka khat (biakinn shekel-in shekel lang) pai pia a, a pia mi, kum sawmnih a pha panin a tungsiah mi kisimna a a kisim peuhmah tul zaguk le tulthum le zanga le sawmnga ahi hi.
Ngun talen za khatte pen biakbuk khuam bullente le dalna puan khuam bullente dingin sun’ ding ahi hi. Talen za khatte bullen zakhat, bullen khat ciangin talen khat ahi hi.
Amah in shekel tulkhat zasagih sawmsagih le nga pen khuampi tunga vankhai nadingin bawl a, a khuamluzepnate zutin tuate ading gakna a bawl hi.
A kipia sumngo khempeuh, talen sawmsagih le shekel tulnih le zali ahi hi.
Amah in tua tawh kikhopna buk kongkhakte adingin khuam bullente, sumngo biakna tau le a sumngo siklen le biaknatau nazat khempeuh,
buktual kimkota khuam bullente, buktual kongpi khuam bullente, biakbuk khetphimte khempeuh le buktual kimkota khetphim khempeuh a bawl hi.

Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin, siangtho munah nasep nadingin amaute in a dum, a dupsan, a ausan khaute tawh limtakin a kigan puan a bawl uh hi. Amaute in Aaron adingin biakna puan siangtho a bawl uh hi.Topa
Amaute in siampi puan pen kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh a bawl uh hi.
Hoihtakin a kigeel, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte-ah zat dingin kham peek kiseekin khau-in kizen hi.
Amaute in siampi puan adingin liangkaih puan bawl uh a, a mong nih tegel ah zom uh hi.

Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amah a gak dingin hoihtakin a kigan tua tunga puan om pen kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh kibawlin, a nate le a sepna zia a kibang ahi hi.Topa
Israel tapate a phazah tawh kizui-in, onik suangte kitat a, kham tawh a kizepna sungah a minte kigelhin, min gelh siamte’ gelh bangin kibawl hi.
Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin Israel tapate phawkna suang dingin siampi puan’ liangkaih puan tungah a bulh uh hi.Topa
Amaute in kham, a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh, siampi puan a kibawl puan bangin hoihtakin awmdal a bawl uh hi.
Tua awmdal a ning kikim a, thuap nihin kibawl a, a kikhep ciangin a dung letmat kua, a vai letmat kua mah a pha hi.
Amaute in tua sungah suang gual li bulh uh a, Sardis suang, topaz suang le karbankal suang gual khat pen a gual masa ahi hi.
A gual nihna-ah emerald suang, sapfaia suang le diamond suang ahi hi.
A gual thumna-ah jakinth suang, agate suang le amethyst suang ahi hi.
A gual lina-ah beryl suang, onik suang le jasper suang ahi hi. Kham tawh zepna sungah tua suangte khempeuh kikoih hi.
Israel tapate a phazah tawh kituakin amaute’ min a kigelhna suang sawm le nih om hi. Tua min gelhnate pen minam sawm le nih a huamin a kigelh ahi hi.
Amaute in awmdal tungah khau tawh a kibang, a kihual kham citak khainiang a bawl uh hi.
Kham tawh a kibawl zepna nih le kham kual nih bawl uh a, awmdal mong nihte-ah kham kual nihte a koih uh hi.
Amaute in awmdal mongte-ah a om kual nihte pen kham khau nihte tawh a khih uh hi.
Amaute in zepna nihte tungah khau mong nihte zom uh a, tua bangin amaute in siampi puan’ liangkaih puan tunga mai lamah a bulh uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in kham kual nih bawl uh a, siampi puan tawh a kizom a sunglam nawl, awmdal mong nihte-ah a bulh uh hi.
Amaute in kham kual nih bawl uh a, siampi puan’ liangkaih puan nihte’ nuai a mailam, hoihtakin a kigan siampipuante’ puankhau a kizopna tung takah a bulh uh hi.

Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin, hoihtakin a kigan siampi puan khau tungah a om theih nading le siampi puan tung panin awmdal a kol theih loh nadingin amaute in siampi puan’ kualte-ah khau dum khatin a kualte tawh awmdal a gak uh hi.Topa
Amaute in khau dum bek tawh a kigan siampi puantualpi zong a bawl uh hi.
A kikeek loh nadingin puantualpi ngawng pen puan ngawng vang bangin a ngawng kimkotah a zimna om hi.
Puantualpi mongte-ah amaute in a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul khaute le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoih tawh mang kawlsing gahte a bawl uh hi.
Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amaute in kham citak siklongte zong bawl uh a, puantualpi mong kimkot tunga mang kawlsing gahte’ kikalah siklongte a koih uh hi.Topa
Biak nasep nadinga puantualpi mong kimkot tungah siklong khat, mang kawlsing gah khat, siklong khat, mang kawlsing gah khat, cih bangin kihelh hi.
Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amaute in Aaron le a tapate adingin khau hoih tawh a kigan puantungsilhteTopa
le khau hoih tawh a kigan dialpi le khau hoih tawh a kigan lukhute, a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh a kibawl pheituam hoihte,
le a kopin a kikhuk a kigan puan hoihte tawh a kibawl puan kawnggak le phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem a dum, a dupsan, a ausan tuumul puante zong a bawl uh hi.
Amaute in kham citak tawh a siangtho kizepna peek khat bawl uh a, min gelhna a kibawl mah bangin tua tungah thu gelhin, “Topa’tungah siangtho,” ci uh hi.Topa’
Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amaute in a tunga dialpi tungah a gak dingin tua tungah khau dum khat a vawh uh hi.Topa
Tua bangin kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk nasep khempeuh kiman hi.Topain Moses a thupiaksa khempeuh bangin Israel mite in sem khin uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute man khin uh hi.Topa
Amaute in biakbuk, a puanbuk le a nazat khempeuh, a vankhainate, khuampeekte, a zawlte, a khuampite le a bullente;
a kisansak tuutal vunte le savun dangte tawh a kibawl khuhna le kong puankhai dalna puan;
thuciamna singkuang, a zawlte le hehpihna tokhom tawh;
sabuai le a nazat khempeuhte le Ompihna Anlum;
kham citak meivakkhuam le meivak a kibulhsa tawh a meivakte le a nazatte khempeuh le meivak ading sathau;
kham biakna tau, nilh sathau le a namtui paknamtui le puanbuk kongkhak ading kongpuankhai;
sumngo biakna tau le a sumngo siklen, a zawlte le a nazat khempeuh; kisilna kuang le a ngakna;
buktual a puan kikhaite, a khuampite, a bullente le buktual kongpi ading kongpuankhai, a khaute le a khetphimte; le kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk nasepna-ah a nazat khempeuh;
siampi nasep nadingin siangtho mun a zat ding hoihtakin a kibawl puante, siampi Aaron ading biakna puan siangthote le ama tapate’ puante, Moses kiangah a paipih uh hi.
Topain Moses a thupiaksa khempeuh tawh kituakin Israel mite in nasep khempeuh hih uh hi.Topa
Moses in nasep khempeuh vel a, amaute inTopa’thupiaksa bangin a bawl khitna a mu hi. Tua ciangin Moses in amaute thupha a pia hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Kha masa a ni masa ni-in nangmah in kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk na lam ding hi.
Tua buk sungah thuciamna singkuang na koih dinga, dalna puan tawh singkuang na dal ding hi.
Tua ciangin sabuai tumpihin a om ding bangin na koih ding hi. Meivakkhuam zong tumpihin a meivakte na bulh ding hi.
Thuciamna singkuang mai-ah paknamtui hal nadingin kham biakna tau na koih dinga, biakbuk kongkhak dingin kongpuankhai na khai ding hi.
Kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk kongkhak mai-ah meihal biakna tau koihin,
kikhopna buk le biakna tau kikalah kisilna kuang na koih dinga, a sungah tui zong na koih ding hi.
A kimkotah buktual na bawl dinga, buktual kongpi dingin kongpuankhai na khaito ding hi.
“Tua ciangin sathau la-in, biakbuk le a sunga om khempeuh na nuh dinga, biakbuk le a inn sungvan khempeuh na ap ding hi. Tua ciangin a siangtho biakna van a suak ding hi.
Nangmah in meihal biakna tau le a nazat khempeuh zong sathau nuhin biakna tau na ap dinga, tua biakna tau a siangtho pen hi ding hi.
Kisilna kuang le a ngakna zong sathau nuhin na ap ding hi.
“Tua ciangin kikhopna buk kongkhak ah Aaron le ama tapate paipihin, tui tawh amaute na sil dinga,
amah in keima tungah siampi na a sep theih nadingin puan siangthote Aaron silhsakin, amah sathau nilhin na ap ding hi.
Tua ciangin ama tapate zong paipihin puantungsilhte na silhsak dinga,

amaute in keima tungah siampi na a sep theih nadingun amaute’ pa sathau na nilh bangin amaute zong sathau na nilh ding hi. Amau’ sathau kinilhna in amau’ khang tawntungin siampi hi paisuaksak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Moses in zongTopain amah a thupiaksa khempeuh tawh kituakin a hih hi.Topa
A kum nihna a kha masa, a ni masa ni-in biakbuk kilam hi.
Moses in biakbuk lam hi. Amah in a bullente koihin, a khuampeekte phut a, a zawlte khumin, a khuampite a phut hi.
Biakbuk tungah a tungkhuhna zal a,Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin puanbuk a tung a khuh hi.Topa
Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin amah in thuciamna suangpek la-in singkuang sungah koih a, singkuang tungah a zawlte koihin, singkuang tung sanah hehpihna tokhom a nga hi.Topa
Biakbuk sungah singkuang paipihin, kongpuankhai dalna puan khai a, thuciamna singkuang a dal hi.
Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amah in biakbuk leilu lam pang, dalna puan pualam, kikhopna buk sungah sabuai koih a,Topa
Topa’mai tua sabuai tungah a om ding bangin anlum a koih hi.Topa’
Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amah in biakbuk leitaw lam pang, sabuai tawh a kigalsai-in, kikhopna buk sungah meivakkhuam koih a,Topa
Topa’mai-ah meivakte a koih hi.Topa’
Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin, amah in kikhopna buk sung, dalna puan mai-ah kham biakna tau koih a,Topa
tua tungah a namtui paknamtui a hal hi.
Amah in biakbuk kongkhak ding kongpuankhai a mun dingah a khai hi.
Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin amah in kikhopna buk ahi biakbuk kongkhak ah meihal biakna tau koih a, tua tungah meihal biakna le an tawh biakna a pia hi.Topa
Kikhopna buk le biakna tau kikalah kisilna kuang koih a, tua sungah kisil nading tui zong a koih hi.
Moses le Aaron le a tapate in amau’ khut le a khete uh tua tui tawh a sil uh hi.
Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin, kikhopna bukah amaute a pai ciang le biakna tau nai-ah a pai uh ciangin amaute kisil uh hi.Topa
Amah in biakbuk le biakna tau kiimah a buktual bawl a, buktual kongpi kongpuankhai a khai hi. Tua ahih ciangin Moses in a nasep a man ta hi.
Tua ciangin meii in kikhopna buk tuam a, biakbuk sungahTopa’minthanna vang a dim hi.Topa’
Tua ahih manin kikhopna buk sungah Moses tum thei lo hi.
A khualzin sung tawntung uh biakbuk tung panin meii a kilakkhiat toh peuhpeuh ciangin Israel mite mailam nawtin pai uh a,
ahih hangin meii a kilakkhiat kei leh a kilakkhiat ni mateng amaute pai khia lo uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a khualzin sung tawntung uh Israel mi khempeuh’ muhna-ah biakbuk tungah suninTopa’meii om a, zanin mei a om hi.Topa’
Topain Moses sam a, kikhopna buk panin amah hopihin hih bangin ci hi:Topa

“Israel mite tungah gen inla, amaute tungah hih bangin ci in: Note khatpeuh inTopa’tungah biakna na paipih uh ciangin, ganhing tawh na biakna pen bawnghon panin hitaleh tuuhon panin hitaleh na paipih ding uh hi.Topa’
“Ama biakna pen bawnghon panin meihal biakna ahihleh, amah in a sitbaang lo a pa khat pia dinga,Topa’mai-ah a kisan theih nadingin kikhopna bukkongah pia ding hi.Topa’
Amah in meihal biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga dinga, ama adingin kilemna bawl nadingin kisang ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah inTopa’mai-ah a bawngtal go ding hi. Aaron’ suan siampite in a si hong paipihin, kikhopna buk kong-a biakna tau kimkotah a si theh ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amah in meihal biakna ganhing a vun hawkin semnen dinga,
Aaron’ suan siampite in biakna tau tungah mei koihin, mei tungah a ngeina bangin sing koih ding hi.
Tua ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite in a sanente, a lutang le a thaute, biakna tau tunga om mei tunga sing tungah a ngeina bangin koih dinga,
ahih hangin a sungkuate le a khete tui tawh sil ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in mei tawh kihal biakna,Topaadingin a gim namtui, meihal biakna-in biakna tau tungah a vekpi-in hal ding hi.Topa
“Meihal biak nadingin ama letsong pen tuu hitaleh keel hitaleh a hon lak panin ahihleh, amah in a sitbaang lo a pa khat pia ding hi.
Amah inTopa’mai biakna tau tung leilu lampangah go dinga, Aaron’ suan siampite in biakna tau tung kimkotah a si theh ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amah in semnen dinga, biakna tau tunga om mei tunga sing tungah a ngeina bangin siampipa in a lutang le a thau tawh koih khawm dinga,

ahih hangin a sungkuate le a khete amah in tui tawh sil ding hi. Siampipa in a vekpi-in pia-in, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. Tua penTopaadingin a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna, meihal biakpiakna ahi hi.Topa
“Topa’tungah ama biakna pen vasa tawh meihal biakna ahihleh, amah in vakhu tawh ahi zongin, kawl vakhuno tawh ahi zongin, a biakna hong paipih ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin siampipa in biakna tau-ah paipihin a lu heektat dinga, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. Biakna tau pangah a si taak khiasak ding hi.
Amah in a tangkhai le a multe bot khia-in, vut koihna, biakna tau pang nisuahna lamah lawn khia ding hi.

Amah in a khate-in balkek dinga, ahih hangin baltat lo ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in mei tunga om sing tung, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. Tua penTopaadingin a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biakna, meihal biakna ahi hi.Topa
“Mi khatpeuh inTopa’tungah an tawh biakna hong paipih leh, ama biakpiakna pen annel hi ding hi. Amah in tua annel tungah sathau sungin, paknamtui koihin,Topa’

tua ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite kiangah paipih ding hi. Tua ciangin siampipa in annel khutdim le sathau, a paknamtui khempeuh tawh la dinga, siampipa in hih penTopaadingin a gim namtui, mei tawh biakna, phawkna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.Topa
An tawh biakna a val teng pen Aaron le a tapate ading hi ding hi. Tua penTopa’tungah mei tawh biakna sung panin a siangtho pen ahi hi.Topa’
“Nangmah in biak nadingin meibung sunga ki-em an tawh biakna na paipih ciangin, silngo sawh loh, sathau tawh a kizut mohpheng hi ding hi.
“Na biakna pen beelpei daii tunga ki-em an tawh biakna ahihleh, sathau tawh a kibawl annel hi ding hi.
Balnenin a tungah sathau na sung ding hi. Tua pen an tawh biakna ahi hi.
“Na biakna pen sikbeel daii sunga kihuan an tawh biakna ahihleh, sathau tawh a kibawl annel hi ding hi.
Nangmah in hih nate tawh a kibawl an tawh biakna,Topa’kiangah na paipih dinga, siampipa kiangah a kipaipih ciangin amah in biakna tau-ah paipih ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa in an tawh biakna panin a phawkna biakna teng la-in,Topa’tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh biakna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.Topa’
An tawh biakna a val teng pen Aaron le a tapate ading hi ding hi. Tua penTopa’tungah mei tawh biakna sung panin a siangtho pen ahi hi.Topa’
“Topa’tungah na paipih an tawh biakna pen silngo tawh kibawl lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh silngo hitaleh khuaizu hitaleh khat peuhpeuhTopa’tungah meihal biakna-in na hal kei ding hi.Topa’Topa’
Anpal tawh biakna ahihlehTopa’kiangah na paipih thei ding hi. Ahih hangin a gim namtui dingin biakna tau tungah kipia lo ding hi.Topa’
An tawh na biaknate khempeuh ci na sawh ding hi. An tawh na biakna-ah na Pasian tawh na thuciamna ci sawh loin na om kei dinga, na biakna khempeuh ci na sawh ding hi.
“Anpal tawhTopa’tungah biakna na piak leh, anpal tawh na biak nadingin a vui thak panin kila-in a kigawivui, mei-ah a kihangkeu na pia ding hi.Topa’
Nang in a tungah sathau sungin, paknamtui na buak ding hi. Tua pen an tawh biakna ahi hi.
Siampipa in phawk nadingin a kigawivui an pawlkhat, a sathau le a paknamtui khempeuh hal ding hi. Tua penTopa’tungah meihal biakna ahi hi.Topa’
“Mi khat’ biakna pen thunuama biakna ahih a, amah in a nu hitaleh a pa hitaleh bawnghon lak panin a piak leh, amah in
Tua ciangin amah in a biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk kongah go dinga, tua ciangin Aaron’ suan siampite in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
Thunuama biakna panin
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau le a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin Aaron’ suante in mei tunga om sing tunga meihal biakpiakna tau tung mahah hal ding uh hi. Tua pen
“Topa’tungah thunuama a piak ding ama biakna pen tuu le keel honte sung panin a nu hitaleh a pa hitaleh ganhing khat ahihleh, amah in a sitbaang lo pia ding hi.Topa’
Amah in biak nadingin tuuno khat a piak leh,
a biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk mai-ah go ding hi. Tua ciangin Aaron’ suante in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin thunuama biakna panin
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in
“Ama biakna keel ahihleh, amah in
a lu tungah a khut nga-in kikhopna buk mai-ah go ding hi. Tua ciangin Aaron’ suante in biakna tau kimkot tungah a si theh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sintuamte pia ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in a gim namtui dingin mei tawh kihal an tawh biakna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. A thau khempeuh
Tua pen na khang tawntungun na tenna khempeuh uhah note in a thau le sisan na nek loh nadingun a tawntungin ngeina kip hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Hih lo ding ci-inTopain a thupiakte khat peuhpeuh, mi khatpeuh in theih lohna hangin khial a, tuate khatpeuh a hihkhak leh,Topa

a khial pa pen sathau a kinilh siampipa ahih a, mite tungah tua bangin mawhna hong tut leh, ama gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin a sitbaang lo bawngtalno khatTopa’mai-ah khialhna hanga biakna-in amah piasak un.Topa’
Amah inTopa’mai kikhopna buk kongah a bawngtal paipihin, bawngtal lu tungah a khut nga dinga,Topa’mai-ah a bawngtal go ding hi.Topa’Topa’
Tua ciangin sathau a kinilh siampipa in a bawngtal si tawmkhat la-in, kikhopna bukah paipih ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in a si sungah a khutme diahin, biakbuk dalna puan maiTopa’mai-ah a si kimkhat sagih vei theh ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin siampipa in kikhopna buk sungTopa’mai-a om paknamtui biakna tau kite a si kimkhat nuhin, kikhopna bukkongah a om meihal biakna tau bulah bawngtal si a omlai teng sung khia ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amah in khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal thau khempeuh a gilpi tuam a thau le a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh tawh,
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding a sintuamte
(thunuama biakna bawngtal panin hihte a kilak mah bangin) la dinga, siampipa in meihal biakna tau tungah tuate hal ding hi.
Ahih hangin bawngtal vun le a sa khempeuh, a lutang, a khete, a sungkuate le a ek tawh,
a bawngtal buppi pua khia-in vut kibuakna, giahphual pualam mun siangtho khatah sing a kicih mei tungah amah in hal dinga, vut a kibuakna munah kihal ding hi.
“Israel mihonte khempeuh in theih lohna hangin khialhna khat gamta-in tua pen mihonte in a phawk kei a, hih lo ding, ci-inTopain a thupiakte khat peuhpeuh amaute in hihin a mawh uhleh,Topa
amau’ gamtatnasa khialhna a kitheih ciangin, khialhna hanga biak nadingin mihonte in bawngtalno khat pia-in kikhopna buk mai-ah paipih ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin mihonte’ upate inTopa’mai, bawngtal lu tungah amau’ khut nga ding uh a,Topa’mai-ah tua bawngtal kigo ding hi.Topa’Topa’
Tua ciangin sathau a kinilh siampipa in kikhopna bukah bawngtal si kimkhat paipih dinga,
a si sungah a khutme diahin dalna puan maiTopa’mai-ah sagih vei theh ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amah inTopa’mai kikhopna buk sunga om biakna tau kite tungah a si kimkhat zut dinga, kikhopna bukkongah a om biakna tau bulah si a omlai teng sung ding hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin amah in a thau khempeuh la-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.
Tua bangin a bawngtal hih ding hi. Amah in khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal a hihsa mah bangin hih zong hih ding hi. Siampipa in amau a’ dingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amaute kimaisak ding hi.
Amah in giahphual pua-ah bawngtal pua khia dinga, a masa bawngtal a hal mah bangin a hal ding hi. Tua pen mihonpi adingin khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
“Ukpa khat khialin, hih lo ding, ci-inTopaama Pasian in a thupiakte khempeuh lakah khat peuhpeuh theih lohna hangin hihkha-in a mawh ciangin,Topa
ama gamtatnasa khialhna ama tungah a va kihilh leh, amah in biakna-in a sitbaang lo keel pa khat paipih dinga,
keel lu tungah a khut nga-in,Topa’mai, meihal biakna a kigawh nading munah go ding hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin siampipa in a khutme tawh khialhna hanga biakna si tawm la-in meihal biakna tau kite nuhin meihal biakna tau bulah a si omlai teng sung ding hi.
Thunuama biakna sathaute mah bangin amah in biakna tau tungah a thau khempeuh hal ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin siampipa in ama khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.
“Hih lo ding, ci-inTopa’thupiakte khat peuhpeuh mi mawkmawk khat in theih lohna hangin hihin a khialh a, a mawh leh,Topa’
ama gamtatnasa a khialhna ama tungah a kihilh ciangin amah in a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin biak nading a sitbaang lo keel a nu khat paipih ding hi.
Amah in a khialhna hanga biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in, meihal biakna munah khialhna hanga biakna gan go ding hi.
Siampipa in a khutme tawh si tawm la-in meihal biakna tau kite nuh dinga, biakna tau bulah si a omlai teng sung ding hi.

Thunuama biakna panin a thaute a kilakkhiat mah bangin amah in a thau khempeuh la khia dinga,Topaading a gim namtui dingin siampipa in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. Siampipa in ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.Topa
“Amah in khialhna hanga biakna-in a piak dingin tuuno khat a paipih leh, a sitbaang lo a nu khat hi dinga,
khialhna hanga biakna ganhing lu tungah a khut nga-in, meihal biakna a kigawhna munah khialhna hanga biak nadingin go ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in khialhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat a khutme tawh la-in meihal biakna tau kite nuh dinga, biakna tau bulah a si omlai teng sung ding hi.

Thunuama biakpiakna panin tuuno thau a kilak khiat mah bangin amah in a thau khempeuh la khia dinga,Topa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, biakna tau tungah siampipa in hal ding hi. Siampipa in ama gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.Topa’
“Mi khatpeuh teci pang dingin a kisap ciangin a muhsa a theihsa thute gen loin a ip leh, amah in tua mawhna pua ding hi.

“Tua ahih kei leh mi khatpeuh in gamlak ganhing nin a sisa hitaleh inn ganhing nin a sisa hitaleh a bokvak a nin ganhing a sisa hitaleh, a muh lohin a nin khat peuhpeuh lawngkha-in amah a nin a suah leh, a mawh hi ding hi.
“Tua ahih kei leh amah in mihing nitna hitaleh, mu loin a lawnkhak leh, a theih ciangin a mawh hi ding hi.

“Tua ahih kei leh mi khatpeuh in a sia bawl ding hitaleh a pha bawl ding hitaleh mite a kiciam theih ngei kiciamna nam khat peuhpeuh ama kam tawh a theih lohin a kiciampak khak leh, a theih ciangin hihte khat peuhpeuhah a mawh hi ding hi.
“Hihte khat peuhpeuhah mi khat a mawh ciangin, amah in a gamtatnasa a khialhna pulak dinga,

mawhna hanga biakna-in tuuhon pan ahi a, keelhon pan ahi zongin a nu khat peuhpeuh tuu hitaleh keel hitaleh, a gamtatnasa a khialhna hanginTopa’tungah biakna paipih dinga, siampipa in a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak ding hi.Topa’

“Ahih hangin amah in tuuno khat a piak zawh kei leh a gamtatnasa a khialhna hanginTopa’tungah biakna-in vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhuno nih ahi zongin, khat khialhna hanga biakna, a khat meihal biak nadingin paipih ding hi.Topa’
Amah in siampipa tungah tuate paipih dinga, siampipa in khialhna hanga biak nading pen pia masa ding hi. Amah in a ngawng panin a lu heek dinga, ahih hangin heeksat lo ding hi.
Amah in khialhna hanga biakna si tawmkhat biakna tau pangah theh dinga, biakna tau bulah a si omlai teng taaksak ding hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.
Tua ciangin amah in ngeina kip om bangin meihal biak nadingin a khat pia ding hi. Siampipa in a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.

“Ahih hangin amah in vakhu nih ahi a, kawl vakhuno nih ahi zongin a piak zawh kei leh, amah in a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin a biakna-in annel lawh khat, khialhna hanga biak nadingin paipih ding hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna ahih manin amah in tua sungah sathau khah lo dinga, paknamtui zong hel lo ding hi.
Amah in siampipa kiangah paipih dinga, siampipa in phawkna-in khutdim khat la-inTopa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna, biakna tau tungah hal ding hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna ahi hi.Topa’
Tua bangin siampipa in hihte khat peuhpeuh a gamtatnasa a khialhna hangin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi. An tawh biakna-a mah bangin a omlai teng siampipa ading ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Mi khatpeuh in theih lohna hangin thu palsatinTopa’na a siangtho khat peuhpeuhah a khialh leh, a mawhna hanga biakna-in tuuhon sung panin a sitbaang lo tuutal khat, biakinn shekel tawh kizui-in ngun shekel-in nangmah in a man sehin, amah inTopa’kiangah paipih ding hi. Tua pen mawhna hanga biakna ahi hi.Topa’Topa’

Amah in a siangtho na a hih khialhna-ah lohkikna zong bawl dinga, seh nga-ah khat gawm behin siampipa tungah pia ding hi. Siampipa in mawhna hanga biakna tuutal tawh ama adingin kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.
“Hih lo ding, ci-inTopa’thupiakte khat peuhpeuh, mi khatpeuh in hihin a khialh leh, a theih lohna hang hitaleh zong, amah a mawh hi veve-in, ama mawhna mah pua ding hi.Topa’

Tuuhon lak pan a sitbaang lo tuutal khat, a manzah ding nangmah in seh inla, amah in mawhna hanga biak nadingin siampipa kiangah paipih ding hi. Theih lohna hanga ama gamtatnasa khialhna hangin siampipa in ama ading kilemna bawlsak dinga, amah kimaisak ding hi.
Tua penTopa’tungah khial ahih manin mawhna hanga biakna ahi hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Mi khatpeuh khialin,Topa’thu palsatin, na kepsakna thu-ah ahi zongin, khapna nate’ thu-ah ahi zongin a veengpa khemin, ahih kei leh a na sutin, a veengpa nengniamin,Topa’
tua ahih kei leh a mang na khat mu-in tua thu-ah zuau-in a man loin kiciam a, mite a khialh theih ngeina khat peuhpeuhah
khialin a mawh ciangin amah in a suhte hitaleh, a netniamna tawh a ngahte hitaleh, amah a kikemsak na hitaleh, a mang na a muh hitaleh,
a man loin a kiciamnasa na khat peuhpeuh hitaleh loh ding hi. Amah in a cingin lohin seh nga-ah khat piak beh dinga, a mawhna hanga biakna a piak ni-in a nei pa tungah pia ding hi.
Tua ciangin a mawhna hanga a biak nading, tuuhon lak pan a sitbaang lo tuutal khat,Topa’tungah a piak ding, a man ding nangma sehzah, amah in siampipa kiangah paipih ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa inTopa’mai-ah ama ading kilemna bawlsak dinga, mi khat a mawh theih ngeina khat peuhpeuhte-ah amah kimaisak ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Aaron le a tapate thu pia inla, hih bangin ci in: Hih pen meihal biakna ngeina ahi hi. Meihal biakna pen biakna tau tunga meikhuk tungah zingsang mateng zan tawntung om dinga, tua biakna tau tungah mei kikuangsak den ding hi.
Siampipa in a saihadial puan silhin, a saihadial pheituam teengin, biakna tau tungah meihal biakna mei in a kattum vutte la-in biakna tau pangah koih ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a puante suahin puan dang silh dinga, giahphual pualam a siangtho mun khatah a vutte pua khia ding hi.

Biakna tau tunga mei kikuangsak den dinga, kimitsak lo ding hi. Siampipa in zingsang simin a tungah sing cihin, meihal biakna a ngeina bangin a tungah koihin, thunuama biakna thau a tungah hal ding hi.
Biakna tau tungah mei kikuangsak tawntung dinga, kimitsak lo ding hi.
“Tua ciangin an tawh biakna ngeina hih bang ahi hi. Aaron’ suante in biakna tau mai,Topa’mai-ah pia ding uh hi.Topa’
Mi khat in, biakna tau tungah a om an tawh biakna annel khutdim khat, a sathau le a paknamtui khempeuh tawh la-in,Topaadingin a gim namtui, phawkna-in biakna tau tungah hal ding hi.Topa
Aaron le a tapate in a omlai teng ne ding uh hi. A siangtho mun khatah silngo sawh loh in ne ding uh a, kikhopna buktual sung mun khat hi ding hi.

Tua pen silngo sawhin a ki-em hi lo ding hi. Meihal biakna hong kipiakna sung panin amau’ tanh dingin ka piaksa ahi hi. Tua pen khialhna hanga biakna le mawhna hanga biakna bangin a siangtho pen ahi hi.

Na khang tawntung uha dingin thu hong kipiak mah bangin,Topa’tungah meihal biakna a kipiakna panin Aaron’ suante lakah pasal peuhmah in tuate ne thei ding hi. Tuate a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Aaron le a suante sathau a kinilh ni-inTopa’tungah hih bangin biakna kipia ding hi: An tawh biakna ngeina bangin annel lawh khat, alang zingsangin, alang nitakin pia ding hi.Topa’
Tua pen beelpei tung khatah sathau tawh kibawl ding hi. An tawh biakna mah bangin limtakin helsa le balnensa-in na paipih dinga,Topaading a gim namtui dingin na pia ding hi.Topa
Aaron’ suante sung panin amah a laih dingin sathau a kinilh siampipa in, thu a kipiaksa mah banginTopa’tungah pia dinga, a vekpi-in kihal ding hi.Topa’
Siampipa in an tawh a biakna peuhmah a vekpi-in kihal dinga, kine lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa

“Aaron le a tapate tungah hih bangin gen in: Khialhna hanga biakna ngeina hih bang ahi hi. Meihal biakna a kigawhna munTopa’mai-ah khialhna hanga biakna kigo dinga, tua pen a siangtho pen ahi hi.Topa’
Khialhna hanga biakna a pia siampipa in kikhopna buktual sung a siangtho mun khatah ne ding hi.
A sa a lawng peuhmah a siangtho suak ding hi. Puan tungah a si a kithehkhak ciangin, a siangtho mun khatah tua si a kithehkha pen kisawp ding hi.
Tua ciangin a kihuanna leibeel kisukham ding hi. Ahih hangin taaubeelin a kihuan ahihleh a beel kikiatin tui sungah kisawp siang sitset ding hi.
Siampite’ lak panin pasal peuhmah in ne thei ding uh hi. Tua in a siangtho pen ahi hi.
Ahih hangin siangtho munah kilemna bawl nadingin kikhopna buk sungah a kipaipih si a kilak khiatna, khialhna hanga biakna sa kine lo dinga, mei tawh kihal ding hi.
“Mawhna hanga biakna ngeina, a siangtho pen hih bang ahi hi.
Amaute in meihal biakna a gawhna mun uhah mawhna hanga biakna go ding uh a, biakna tau kimkotah a si kitheh ding hi.
Tua ciangin a thau khempeuh, a meithau, a gilpi tuam a thau,
a kawnga om a kal nihte a thau tawh, a kalte tawh a lakkhiat khop ding ahi a sin tuamte kipia ding hi.
Topa’tungah meihal biakna-in siampipa in biakna tau tungah hal dinga, tua pen mawhna hanga biakna ahi hi.Topa’
Siampite lakah pasal peuhmah in a siangtho mun khatah ne thei ding uh hi; tua in a siangtho pen ahi hi.
“Mawhna hanga biakna pen khialhna hanga biakna tawh kibang a, tuate ading a ngeina a kibang hi dinga, kilemna a bawlsak siampipa in tua biakna sa ngah ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh’ meihal biakna a piaksak siampipa in ama piaksak tua meihal biakna a vun ngah ding hi.
Mei bung sunga a ki-em an tawh biakna peuhmah leh sikbeel daii ahi a, beelpei tungah ahi zongin a kibawl khempeuhte, a pia siampipa in ngah ding hi.
An tawh biakna khempeuh, sathau a kihel hitaleh a kihel lo hita leh, Aaron’ suan khempeuh in a kikimin hawm ding uh hi.
“Mi khatpeuh inTopa’tungah a piak theih ding, thunuama biakna ngeina hih bang ahi hi.Topa’
Amah in lungdam kohna-in a piak leh, silngo sawh loh sathau tawh a kihel moh, silngo sawh loh mohpheng sathau tawh a kizut, annel moh sathau limtakin a kihelte, lungdam biakna tawh pia khawm ding hi.
Amah in lungdam koh nadingin thunuama ama biakpiakna tawh silngo kisawh anlum mohte ama biakna-in paipih khawm ding hi.
Amah inTopabiak nadingin tua biakna sung panin moh khat ciat pia ding a, thunuama biakna si a theh siampipa in tua moh ngah ding hi.Topa
Lungdam kohna-in thunuama ama biakpiakna a sa pen a piak ni-in kine dinga, a zingsang dong bangmah kisit lo ding hi.
“Ahih hangin ama biakpiakna pen thuciamna hanga biakpiakna ahi a, utthu-a biakpiakna ahi zongin ahihleh, amah in a biakpiakna a piak ni-in kine dinga, a omlai teng a zing ciangin kine ding hi.
Ahih hangin a ni thum ni-in biakpiakna sa a omlai teng mei tawh kihal ding hi.

A ni thum ni-in thunuama ama biakpiakna sa khat peuhpeuh a kinek leh, tua biakpiakna a piapa kisang lo dinga, tua pen ama a’ in zong kiciamteh lo ding hi. Tua sa a nin hi dinga, a ne pa in ama mawhna pua ding hi.
“A nin na khat peuhpeuh tawh a kisawhkha sa kine lo dinga, mei tawh kihal ding hi. Ahi zongin a siang mi khempeuh in a sa ne thei ding uh hi.
A nin hi napi-in thunuamaTopa’tungah biakpiakna sa a ne pa ama mipihte’ lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.Topa’

Mi khatpeuh in mihing nin hitaleh ganhing nin hitaleh a kihhuai a nin khat peuhpeuh hitaleh lawng a, tua khit ciangin thunuamaTopa’tungah biakpiakna sa a nek leh, ama mipihte’ lak panin tua mipa kihawl khia ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in: Note in bawngtal ahi a, tuu ahi a, keel ahi zongin a thau na ne kei ding uh hi.
A mawk sih ganhing thau leh gamsate in a bal gawp ganhing thaute, na dangin kizang thei dinga, ahih hangin bangbang hileh na ne kei ding uh hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ganhing thau a ne mi peuhmah ama mipihte’ lak panin kihawl khia ding hi.Topa’
Tua tham loin note in na tenna uh mun khat peuhpeuhah vasa sisan hitaleh ganhing sisan hitaleh si peuhmah na ne kei ding uh hi.
Si khat peuhpeuh a ne mi peuhmah ama mipihte’ lak panin kihawl khia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Israel mite tungah hih bangin gen in:Topa’tungah thunuama ama biakpiakna a piapa inTopa’kiangah ama biakna paipih ding hi. Thunuama ama biakpiakna paninTopa’Topa’
amah inTopa’tungah meihal biakna a khutin paipih ding hi.Topa’mai-ah vei-a biak nadingin a iik a kivei theih nadingin amah in a thau a iik tawh paipih ding hi.Topa’Topa’
Siampipa in biakna tau tungah a thau hal dinga, ahih hangin a iik pen Aaron le a suante ading hi ding hi.
Thunuama na biakpiakna panin biakna-in siampipa tungah a taklam phei na pia ding uh hi.
Aaron’ suante sung panin thunuama biakna si le a thau a piapa in a taklam phei a ngah ding ahi hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a kivei a iik le a kipia a phei pen keimah in Israel mite’ tung panin thunuama amau’ biakpiakna sung panin la khia-in, Israel mite’ tung panin a tawntungin a ngah dingun siampi Aaron le a suante’ tungah ka pia khinzo hi.
Hih pen,Topa’siampi na a sem dingin amaute a kipiak ni-in,Topa’tungah meihal biakna sung panin amau’ tungah a kipia, Aaron leh a suante’ tanh ahi hi.Topa’Topa’
Israel mite in amaute tungah a piak nadingin amaute sathau a kinilh ni-inTopain hih thu pia a, tua pen a khang tawntungun amau’ kaih ahi hi,” a ci hi.Topa

Hihte pen amau’ biaknateTopa’tungah a piak nadingun amah in Israel mite Sinai sehnel gamah a thupiak ni-inTopain Sinai Mual tungah Moses a thupiak, meihal biakna, an tawh biakna, khialhna hanga biakna, mawhna hanga biakna, ki-apna le thunuama biakna ngeina ahi hi.Topa’Topa
Topain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Aaron le amah tawh a om a tapate, a puante, a nilh sathau, khialhna hanga biakna a bawngtal, a tuutal nihte le silngo sawh loh anlum lawh la inla,
kikhopna bukkongah Israel mihonte khempeuh khawm in,” a ci hi.
Topain amah a thupiak bangin Moses in hih a, kikhopna bukkongah mihonte kikhawm hi.Topa
Moses in mihonte kiangah, “Tu-a ka hih dingte penTopain hih dingin a thupiak ahi hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Moses in Aaron le a tapate paipihin tui tawh amaute a sil hi.
Amah in a puantungsilh amah silhsak a, a kawnggak tawh gakin, a puantualpi silhsak a, a siampi puan silhsakin, siampi puan’ khau, hoihtakin a kigan tawh gak a, tua tawh ama tungah a khih hi.
Amah in ama tungah a awmdal bulhin, a awmdal sungah Urim le Thummim a koih hi.
Amah in Aaron’ lu tungah a dialpi khimsakin, a dialpi tung a mai lamah,Topain Moses a thupiak bangin amah in kham peek, a siangtho kumpi lukhu a khusak hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Moses in nilh sathau la-in, biakbuk le a sunga om khempeuh nuhin tuate a ap hi.
Amah in biakna tau tungah tuate kimkhat sagihvei thehin, biakna tau le a nazat khempeuh le kuang le a ngaknate, ap dingin sathau a nuh hi.
Amah in nilh sathau kimkhat Aaron’ tungah sung a, ap dingin amah a sathau a nilh hi.
Topain Moses a thupiak bangin, Moses in Aaron’ tapate paipih a, puantungsilhte silhsakin, kawnggak tawh amaute gak a, amau’ lu tungah lukhute a khih hi.Topa
Tua ciangin amah in khialhna hanga biakna bawngtal paipih a, Aaron le a tapate in tua bawngtal lu tungah amau’ khut nga uh hi.
Kilemna bawl nadingin Moses in a bawngtal go a, a si la-in a kiima biakna tau kite a khutme tawh nuhin, biakna tau siangthosak a, biakna tau bulah a site sung khia-in a ap hi.
A sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh le a sintuamte le a kal nihte a thau tawh la-in, biakna tau tungah tuate a hal hi.
Ahih hangin,Topain Moses a thupiak bangin a omlai a vun, a sa le a ek, amah in giahphual pualamah mei tawh a hal hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Moses in meihal biakna tuutal pia a, Aaron le a tapate in tuutal lu tungah amau’ khut nga uh hi.
Moses in tua tuutal go-in, biakna tau tung kimkotah a si theh hi.
Tuutal a kisemnen ciangin, Moses in a lu le a ki-atnente le a thau a hal hi.

Topain Moses a thupiak bangin, a sungkuate le a khete tui tawh a kisawp khit ciangin,Topa’tungah mei tawh kihal biakna a gim namtui, meihal biakna-in Moses in biakna tau tungah tuutal buppi a hal hi.TopaTopa’
Tua ciangin Moses in a tuutal dang, kipsakna tuutal pia a, Aaron leh a tapate in tuutal lu tungah amau’ khut nga uh hi.
Moses in tuutal go a, a si tawmkhat la-in Aaron’ taklam bilteep leh a taklam khutpi le a taklam khepi nuh hi.
Aaron’ tapate hong kipaipih a, Moses in amau’ taklam bilteepte le amau’ taklam khutpite le amau’ taklam khepite a si tawmkhat nuh a, a si a val laite, biakna tau tung kimkotah a theh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in a thau, a mei thau le a sungkuate tunga om a thau khempeuh le a sintuamte, a kal nihte le a thau le a taklam phei a la hi.
Topa’mai-ah a om silngo sawh loh anlum lawh sung panin amah in silngo sawh loh moh khat le sathau sawh anlum moh khat le mohpheng khat la-in, a thau tung le a taklam phei tungah tuate a koih hi.Topa’
Amah in hihte khempeuh, Aaron le a tapate’ khut sungah koih a, amaute in vei-a biakna-inTopa’mai-ah tuate a vei uh hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin Moses in amaute’ khut sung panin tuate la-in,Topa’tungah meihal biakpiakna, a gim namtui, kipsakna biakna-in biakna tau tungah meihal biakna tawh tuate a hal khawm hi.Topa’
Moses in a iik la-in vei-a biakna-inTopa’mai-ah a vei hi.Topain Moses a thupiak bangin tua pen kipsakna tuutal panin Moses’ tanh ahi hi.Topa’Topa

Tua ciangin Moses in nilh sathau kimkhat le biakna tau tunga om a si la-in, Aaron le ama tapate le amau’ puante tungah a theh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Moses in Aaron le ama tapate, a puante uh tawh a apkhawm hi.

Moses in Aaron le a tapate kiangah, “Keimah in thu hong pia-in, ‘Aaron le a tapate in ne ding uh hi,’ ka cih mah bangin, kikhopna buk kongah a sa huan unla, tua lai munah tua sa le kipsakna biakna lawh sungah a om anlum ne unla,
a sa le anlum na khamvalte uh mei tawh na hal ding uh hi.
Note hong kikipsak nading hun ni sagih sung hi ding ahih manin, note hong kikipsakna hun a cin mateng, kikhopna bukkong pua-ah ni sagih sung na pai khia kei ding uh hi.
Tuni-a kibawl bangin, note adingin kilemna bawl ding,Topain thu hong pia khin hi.Topa

Kikhopna bukkongah ni sagih sung sun le zan na om ding uh a,Topa’hong sawlte na hih ding uh hi. Tua hikeileh note na si ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang dingin keima tungah thu hong kipia hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin Aaron le a tapate in zong,Topain Moses’ tungtawnin a thupiakte khempeuh a hih uh hi.Topa
A ni giat ni-in Moses in Aaron le a tapate le Israel upate a sam hi.
