Tua bang hikeileh, amah in a beisa hunah a veengpa tawh kigal neihna nei lo ahih manin sih nading thu om lo napi-in, a hehna tawh phula nuampa in mi that khapa delhin lampi a gamlatna hangin amah pha-in a si dingin liamsak kha ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin, khuapi thum tuamkoih un, ci-in note thu a hong pia ka hi hi.

“Note inTopana Pasian uh itin, ama lampi zuih tawntungna tawh tuni-a kong gen hih thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uh a, amah in na pu na pate uh tungah a kiciam mah banginTopana Pasian un na gamgite uh hong keeksakin, na pu na pate uh piak dingin a ciam leitang note tungah hong piak leh, hih khuapi thum banah khuapi thum mah na behlap ding uh hi.TopaTopa
Tua hikeilehTopana Pasian un luah dingin note hong piak leitang tungah mawhbaang lo mi kithat kha dinga, tua mi thahna hanga mawhna note’ tungah hong tu ding hi.Topa
“Ahih hangin mi khat in a veengpa mudahin, amah pangsim a, amah satin liamsakin a sihsak a, tua mipa hih khuapi khat peuhpeuhah a tai leh,
ama khua upate in amah hong puakin hong paipih ding uh a, a sih theih nadingin phulapa tungah ap ding uh hi.
Note na nopsak theih nadingun amah hehpih loin, Israel-te sung panin mi that pa na beisak ding uh hi.
“Topana Pasian un na neih dingun hong piak leitang tungah note’ kep ding na gamhluahna sung uhah khanglui mite in a phuhsa na veengte’ gisuang na khin kei ding uh hi.Topa

“Mi khat in a hihkhak mawhna lian ahi a, khialhna khat peuhpeuh a gamtatna-ah ahi zongin tua mipa’ langah teci khat guak kicing lo dinga, teci nih ahih kei leh teci thum bang thugenna tawh mawhsakna kikipsak bek ding hi.
Elna lungsim a nei teci khat in mi khat gamta khial hi, ci-in a mawhsak leh,
thuneite a langnih tuakin, tuahun laitak a siampite le thukhente’ mai,Topa’mai-ah pai ding uh hi.Topa’
Thukhente in limtakin kan ding uh a, teci pa pen zuau teci hi-in, a man lopi-in a sanggampa a mawhsak ahihleh,
a sanggampa tungah amah in hih dinga a sawm bang teekin ama tungah na hih ding uh hi. Tua bangin note sung panin gitlohna na siangsak ding uh hi.
Tua hileh a omlai mite in za-in lau dinga, note lakah tua bang gitlohna bawlkik ngei nawn lo ding uh hi.
Amah na hehpih kei ding uh hi. Nuntakna tang ding nuntakna, mit tang ding mit, ha tang ding ha, khut tang ding khut, khe tang ding khe na hisak ding uh hi.

“Na langte uh a do dingin pai-in a sakolte, a leengte le a galkapte uh nomau-a’ sangin a tam zaw-in na muh uh hangin amaute na kihta tuan kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt gam panin note a hong pai khiatpihTopana Pasian uh note tawh hong om hi.Topa
Gal nai na tun uh ciangin siampipa a mai-ah hong pai-in mite kiangah thu genin
amaute kiangah, ‘Israel-te aw, za un. Tuni-in na langte uh a do dingin na nai uh hi. Na lungsim uh lausak kei un. Lau kei un, liing kei un, amaute kihta kei un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note tungah gualzawhna a hong pia ding, na langte uh hong dosak dingin note tawh hong kuan khawm pa penTopana Pasian uh ahi hi,’ ci ding hi.Topa
“Tua ciangin uliante in mite kiangah thu genin, ‘Inn thak lam khinin a ap nai lo kua om na hi uh hiam? Gal sungah amah si-in midang khat in a inn ap kha ding ahih manin a inn-ah ciahkik hen.
Leenggui lo kho khinin a gah a ne nai lo kua om na hi uh hiam? Gal sungah amah si-in midang khat in a gah ne kha ding ahih manin a inn-ah ciahkik hen.
A zi dingin lawm dong khinin a la nai lo kua om na hi uh hiam? Gal sungah amah si-in midang khat in tua numei la kha ding ahih manin a inn-ah ciahkik hen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“Uliante in mite kiangah thu genthuah lai-in, ‘A lau, a lungsim meidawi kua om na hi uh hiam? A lawmte meidawilawh kha ding ahih manin a inn-ah ciahkik hen,’ ci ding uh hi.
Uliante in mite kiangah thugen a man khit uh ciangin mite a makai ding kiseh ding hi.
“A do dingin khuapi khatpeuh na nai uh ciangin kilem nading thu gen masa un.
Note hong dawnna pen kilem nading lam hi-in note kongpi hong hon leh, tua sunga om mi khempeuh in note adingin aana tawh na semin, na na uh hong sepsak ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin note tawh kilemna hong bawl loin note hong do leh, note in tua khua na umcih ding uh a,
Topana Pasian un note’ khut sungah hong piak ciangin pasal khempeuh namsau tawh na that ding uh hi.Topa

Ahih hangin numeite le naupangte, ganhingte, khua sunga na dang khempeuh, a kinusiate khempeuh note adingin na la ding uh a,Topana Pasian un note hong piak ahi na langte uh vante na tang ding uh hi.Topa
Hih nai-a om minamte’ khuapi ahi lo, note kiang panin a gamla khuapi khempeuh tungah tu-a bangin na hih ding uh hi.

“Ahih hangin, amau’ pasian-te a biakna uhah a hih uh a kihhuai gamtatnate khempeuh note hong hilh theih loh nading le tua banginTopana Pasian uh tungah na khialh theih loh nadingun,Topana Pasian un luah dingin note’ tungah hong piak hih mite’ khuapi sungah mi khempeuh na hingkhawi kei ding uh a,Topana Pasian un hong thupiaksa bangin Hit mite le Amor mite, Kanaan mite le Perez mite, Hiv mite le Jebus mite, a vekpi-in amaute na susia mang ding uh hi.TopaTopaTopa

“Khuapi khat na lak theih nadingun do-in sauveipi na umcih uh hangin hei zatna tawh a singgah kungte na susia kei ding uh hi. A gahte na ne thei ding uh a, ahih hangin a kungte na phuk kei ding uh hi. Gamlak a om singkungte, note’ suk gawp dingin na gal uh hi zenzen ahi hiam?
Nek dinga kizang lo singkung hi, ci-in na theih teng bek uh note hong do khuapi a tuk mateng umcihna-in na zat dingun na phuk thei ding uh hi.
“Topana Pasian un note’ neih dingin a hong piak leitangah mi khat kithatin gamlakah lum a, a that a kitheih kei leh,Topa
na upate uh le na thukhente uh hong pai khia-in, a kithat mipa’ omna kiima khuapite a gamlatna teh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin a kithat mipa’ omna tawh a kinai pen khuapi upate in a kisin nai lo, kol a kai nai lo bawngla khat la ding uh hi.
Tua khuapi upate in a kikho nai lo, khaici a kivawh nai lo, tuiluang a omna kuam khatah a bawngla paipihsuk ding uh a, tua kuam sungah a bawngla ngawng attan ding uh hi.

Topana Pasian un Levi mi siampite ama na a sem ding leTopa’min tawh thupha a pia dingin teel khia ahih manin amaute hong pai ding uh a, kithuneihna le kitotna peuhmah amau’ thu tawh kivengsak ding hi.TopaTopa’
A kithat mipa tawh a kinai pen khuapi upate khempeuh in kuam sunga a ngawng a kitan bawngla tungah a khut uh sil ding uh a,
amaute in teci pangin, ‘Kote in hih mipa ka that kei uh a, a kithahlam zong ka thei kei uh hi.

Topaaw, na hotkhiatsa Israel mite’ mawhna hong maisak inla, mawhna nei lo mipa a kithahna hanga mawhna na Israel mihingte hong thuaksak kei in. Mi thahna hanga mawhna pan hong maisak in,’ ci ding uh hi.Topa
Topa’muhna-ah a manin na gamtat uh ciangin note lak panin mawhna nei lo mi thahna hanga mawhna tua bangin na siangsak ding uh hi.Topa’
“Na galte uh a do dingin kuan khia-in,Topana Pasian un note’ khut sungah amaute hong pia a, amaute salin na mat ciangun,Topa
salte lakah numei a melhoih khat mu-in, tua nu deihin na zi dingin na lak nop leh,
na inn-ah tua numei na ciahpih dinga, amah in a lu metin a cinte tan ding hi.

Amah in sal hihna puan suah khia-in, na inn-ah om dinga, a nu le a pa’ hangin kha khat bit sung kap ding hi. Tua khit ciangin amah na luppih thei pan dinga, nang pen ama pasal hi-in, amah pen na zi hi ding hi.
Tua ciangin, amah na deih nawn kei leh, ama utna peuhah na paisak ding hi. Ahih hangin amah daisak khin na hih manin sumin amah zuak loin, sila bangin na bawl kei ding hi.
“Mi khat in zi nih nei a, khat itin a khat mudah a, a it le a muhdah a zi tegel in ta nei tuakin, tapa a neih cil pen a muhdah nu tawh a neih ahihleh,
a tapate tungah gamhluah dingin ama neihsa a hawm ciangin, a muhdah nu’ tapa cil sangin deihzawkna hangin a it nu’ tapa pen a ta cil-in bawl thei lo ding hi.
Ama neihsa khempeuh tanh nih piakna tawh a muhdah nu’ tapa a tacil mahin sang ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua pa pen ama sung panin a piang masa pen ahih manin tacil hihna za pen ama a’ ahi hi.
“Mi khat in a lungkhauh, a langpang thei, a nu’ thu ahi a, a pa’ thu ahi zongin a mang lo, a tai hangun amau’ thu a ngai lo tapa khat a neih leh,
a nu le a pa in tua mipa manin ama khuapi upate kiang, a tenna mun kongpi-ah paipihin,
amaute in a khuapi upate kiangah, ‘Hih ka tapa uh lungkhauhin hong langpang thei a, amah in ka thu uh hong mang lo a, an hai, zu hai bek ahi hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin khuapi pasal khempeuh in suang tawh amah denglum ding uh hi. Tua bangin note’ sung panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi. Tua hileh Israel-te khempeuh in za-in lau ding uh hi.
“Mi khat in sihna thuak theih nading mawhna bawlin amah kithat a, sing tungah na khai uhleh,

zan tawntung sing tungah ama luang na omsak kei ding uh a, a ni mahin na phum ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh khuam tungah a kikhai siluang hawm pen Pasian in muhthadah sa hi.Topana Pasian un luah dingin note hong piak na leitang uh na ninsak kei ding uh hi.Topa
“Na mipihte’ bawngtal ahi a, a tuu ahi zongin a gammang na muh uhleh huh loin na om kei ding uh hi. A nei pa kiangah na ciahpihkik ding uh hi.
Amah na veeng nai uh hi lo a, a nei na theih kei uhleh, na inn uhah a gan ciahpihin a nei pa in hong zon mateng na kem ding uh a, hong zon ciangin na piakik ding uh hi.
Tua bangin a la, a puan, a mangsa na muh, na mipihte’ na a mang khat peuhpeuh na hih ding uh a, huh loin na om kei ding uh hi.
“Na mipihte’ la ahi a, a bawngtal ahi zongin lam gei-ah a kia na muh uhleh, tuate huh loin na om kei ding uh a, tuate phottohsakkikna tawh na huh ding uh hi.
“Numei in pasal puan khat peuhpeuh silh lo dinga, pasal in zong numei puan silh lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih bangin a gamta peuhmahTopana Pasian uh tungah a kihhuai ahi hi.Topa

“Vasabu khat, sing tung ahi a, leilakah ahi zongin, a no ahi a, a tui ahi zongin omin, a pi in a no a ompih ahi a, a op ahi zongin na muh khak zenzen uhleh, a pi pen a no tawh na la khawm kei ding uh hi.
A pi na khah ding uh a, a no na la thei ding uh hi. Hih bang gamtatna pen na nopsak nading uh, sauveipi na nuntak theih nading uh ahi hi.
“Na inn tung panun mi khat kia-in mi sihna hanga mawhna na inn sung uhah na tunsak khak loh nadingun inn thak na lam uh ciangin na innkhumzang uhah tangban na khung ding uh hi.
“Na leenggui lo uhah khaici nam nih na vawh kei ding uh hi. Vawh le-uh cin na vawh uh an le na leenggui lo uhah a piang khempeuh a nin suak ding hi.
“Bawngtal khat le la khat tawh lo na khokhawm kei ding uh hi.
“Samul le khau a kigankhawm puan na silh kei ding uh hi.
“Na puanza uh kiu lite tungah puanmongteep na bawl ding uh hi.
“Mi khat in zi la-in, amah a luppih khit ciangin amah mudahin,
a zumhuai gamtatna tawh tua nu mawhsakin, ‘Keimah in hih numei ka la a, amah tawh ka lupkhop ciangin ama sungah nungakna lim ka mu kei hi,’ cihna tawh tua nu tungah minsia a tut leh,
tua numei’ nu le a pa in a tanu uh’ nungakna lim a kilatna puan la khia-in upate kiang kongpi-ah paipih ding uh hi.
Numei’ pa in upate kiangah, ‘Hih mipa tungah a zi dingin ka tanu ka pia a, amah in deih nawn lo a,

“Na tanu’ sungah nungakna lim ka mu kei hi,” cihna tawh a zumhuai-in amah mawhsak hi. Ahi zongin hihte pen ka tanu’ nungakna a kilatna limte ahi hi,’ ci-in a puan lak ding hi. Amaute in khua upate mai-ah a puan phah ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua khua upate in tua mipa la-in sat ding uh hi.

Amaute in ngun shekel zakhat liausak ding uh a, a numei’ pa’ tungah tuate pia ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Israel nungak tungah minsia tun hi. Tua ciangin a numei pen ama zi mah hi dinga, a nuntak laiteng tua nu ma thei lo ding hi.
“Ahih hangin a mawhsakna thumanin, numei sungah nungakna lim a kimuh kei takpi leh,

amaute in a pa’ inn kongah a numei paipih ding uh a, ama khuapi pasalte in suang tawh amah denglum ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a pa’ inn sungah paktat gamtatna tawh Israel sungah haina tun hi. Tua bangin note’ lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.
“Mi khat, midang khat’ zi tawh a lumkhawm a kimuh leh, numei tawh a lum pa le a numei, a nih tuakun kithat ding hi. Tua bangin Israel sung panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.
“A kidongsa nungak khat om a, mi khat in khuapi sungah tua nu tuakin amah tawh a lupkhop leh,

tua khuapi kongpi-ah amau tegel na paipih ding uh a, a numei khuapi sungah a om hinapi-in mi’ huhna ngen dingin a kiko lohna hang le, tua pasal in a veengpa’ zi a va suksakna hangin, suang tawh a nihun na denglum ding uh hi. Tua bangin note’ lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.
“Ahih hangin mi khat in a kidongsa nungak khat gamlakah tuakin, mipa in tua nu buanin a luppih leh, tua numei tawh a lum mipa bek kithat ding hi.
A numei’ tungah bangmah na hih kei ding uh hi. Numei’ tungah sih nading mawhna om lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih thu pen mi khat in a veengpa do-in a thah tawh kibang hi.
Hih mipa in gamlakah numei hih ahih manin, a kidongsa numei in huhna ngen dingin a kiko hangin amah a hon ding kuamah om lo hi.
“Mi khat in a kidong nai lo nungak khat tuakin, tua numei buanin luppih a, amau tegel a kimuh leh,

numei tawh a lum pa in nungak’ pa tungah ngun shekel sawmnga pia dinga, tua numei ama zi hi ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a numei va su khin hi. A nuntak laiteng tua numei ma thei lo ding hi.
“Mi khat in a pa’ zi dangte teenpih lo dinga, a pa-a’ ahi numei tawh mawh lo ding hi.
“A ciltang a kitam ahih kei leh, a pasal na a cing lo mipaTopaading kikhopna sungah lut lo ding hi.Topa
“Zawlta peuhmah,Topaading kikhopna sungah lut lo ding hi. A suan a khak khang sawmna dong nangawninTopaading kikhopna sungah tua bang mi kuamah lut thei lo ding hi.TopaTopa
“Ammon mite ahi a, Moab mite ahi zonginTopaading kikhopna sungah lut thei lo ding uh hi. A khang sawmna dong nangawnunTopaading kikhopna sungah lut thei ngei peuhmah lo ding uh hi.TopaTopa
Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt panin na pai khiat lai-un lampi-ah anletui tawh amaute in note hong dawn lo uh a, note hong samsia dingin Mesopotamia gam Pethor khua panin Beor’ tapa Balaam cial uh hi.
Ahih hanginTopana Pasian un Balaam’ thu ngai lo hi.Topana Pasian un note hong it ahih manin,Topana Pasian un samsiatna pen note adingin thupha-in hong heisak zaw hi.TopaTopaTopa
Amaute’ nopsak nading ahi a, a daupai nading uh ahi zongin na khantawnun na hanciam kei ding uh hi.
“Edom mite khatpeuh na mudah kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute na sanggam uh ahi hi. Egypt mi khatpeuh na mudah kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amau’ gamah peemta na hi ngei uh hi.
Amaute’ sung pan a piang a khang thumna mite a kipanTopaading kikhopna sungah lut thei ding uh hi.Topa
“Na galte uh a do dingin kuanin giahphual ah na om uh ciangin, siatna nam khempeuh panin nomau na kikem ding uh hi.
Note lakah, zan sungin ama tungah thupiang hangin a siang lo mi a om leh giahphual pualamah amah pai khia dinga, giahphual sungah hong pai lo ding hi.
Ahih hangin nitak ciangin a mahmah tui sungah kisil dinga, ni a tum ciangin giahphual sungah hong pai thei ding hi.
“Giahphual pua-ah awnghawh nading mun khat na nei ding uh hi.
Na galhiamte uh banah tulzum khat na nei ding uh a, awng na hawh khit uh ciangin tua tawh lei to-in, na ek uh na vuk ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh note hong hon ding le note’ mai-a na galte uh a hong pia dinginTopana Pasian uh na giahphual laizang uhah hong pai hi. Tua ahih ciangin note lakah a kilawm lo nate a muh loh nading le note kiang panin amah a pai khiat loh nadingin na giahphual uh siangtho ding hi.Topa
“A topa’ kiang panin no kiangah a hong tai sila, a topa kiang mahah na apkik kei ding uh hi.
Na khuapite uh lak panin ama teelna mun, ama lungkim penna, note lakah note tawh amah hong teeng dinga, amah na nengniam kei ding uh hi.
“Israel ta numeite biakinn sunga a paktat pawlin om lo ding uh a, Israel tapate zong a paktat pawlin om lo ding uh hi.

A paktat nu a kiguaihna sum ahi a, a paktat pa a kiguaihna sum ahi zongin thuciamna khat peuhpeuh piakna-inTopanote’ Pasian’ inn sungah na paipih kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih tegel penTopanote’ Pasian’ tungah a kihhuai ahi hi.TopaTopa
“Na sanggampa tungah sumgum hitaleh, ankhing hitaleh, a meet ngaihsutna-in na khat peuhpeuh leitawi na pia kei ding uh hi.

Gamdang mi tungah a meetin leitawi na pia thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na sanggampa tungah a meetin leitawi na pia kei ding uh hi. Hihte pen a luah dingin na tumna uh gam sungahTopana Pasian un na sepna khempeuh uhah thupha hong piak theih nading ahi hi.Topa

“Topanote’ Pasian’ tungah thuciamna na bawl ciangun na ciamna uh tungsak loin na ommawk kei ding uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian un hong kal teekteek dinga, note tungah khialhna hong hi ding hi.TopaTopa
Ahih hangin thuciamna bawl ding pan na kikep uhleh note’ sungah khialhna om lo ding hi.
Na kam uh tawh na ciamsa uh thu penTopanote’ Pasian’ tungah nomau utthu-a na ciam uh ahih manin na kam uh panin a ging khia peuhmah na tunsak ding uh na ngaihsun ding uh hi.Topa
“Na veengpa’ leenggui lo ah na pai uh ciangin na ut zahzah uh na kham dong uh leenggah na ne thei ding uh a, ahih hangin na van sung uhah na guang kei ding uh hi.
Na veengpa’ ankungte lakah na pai uh ciangin na khut uh tawh a vuite na zut thei ding uh a, ahih hangin phiaukawi tawh na veengpa’ ankungte na at kei ding uh hi.

“Mi khat in zi la-in a teenpih ciangin, tua nu tungah kilawm lohna a om manin numei in a pasal’ mitah maipha mu lo a, amah in makna lai gelhin ama tungah pia-in ama inn panin sawl khia a, a pasal’ inn panin amah kihem khia-in,
amah pai-in midang khat’ zi va suak a,
a pasal nunung in amah deih lo leuleu a, makna lai gelhin a numei’ khut sungah koih a, a inn panin tua nu sawl khia-in, tua ahih kei leh zi dinga a la a pasal nunung a sih leh,

tua numei a hawl khia a pasal masa in, tua nu a kinitsak khit ciangin a zi dingin lakik thei nawn lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua penTopa’mai-ah kihhuaina hi a,Topanote’ Pasian un luah dingin hong piak leitang tungah mawhna na tunpih kei ding uh hi.Topa’Topa
“Mi khat in zi a neih tungin galkapte tawh kuan khia lo dinga, nasep khat peuhpeuh zong kisawl lo ding hi. A laksa a zi tawh a lungdam khawm dingin inn-ah kum khat sung mang ding hi.
“Kuamah in an gawina ahi a, an gawina suangpek a tungnung ahi zongin khapna-in la lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh khapna-in nuntakna a la suak ding hi.
“Mi khat in Israel mi a sanggamte khat gu-in, amah in sila bangin a bawl ahi a, a zuak ahi zongin a kimuh leh, tua guta pa kithat ding hi. Tua bangin note’ lak panin siatna na siangsak ding uh hi.
“Phaknatna hong tun ciangin Levi siampite in hong gen bangin na gamtat ding uh ngaihsun un. Amaute ka thupiakna bangin na gamtat nadingun na kingaihsun ding uh hi.
Egypt panin na pai khiat lai-un lampi-ahTopana Pasian un Miriam’ tungah a hihna phawk un.Topa
“Na veengte uh tungah na khat peuhpeuh leitawi na piak uh ciangin ama hong khapna a la dingin a inn-ah pai kei un.
A pualamah na ding ding uh a, leitawi na piakna mipa in nang kiangah a na khap hong paipih ding hi.
Amah mizawng ahihleh ama hong khap puan na zantaamsak kei ding uh a,
ni a tum ciangin, a puanza silhin nang thupha hong piak theih nadingin tua hong na khap ama kiangah na piakik ding uh hi. Tua penTopanote’ Pasian’ mai-ah note adingin thumanna hi ding hi.Topa
“A zawng a cimawh a kicial nasem pa, na sanggamte khat ahi a, na gam sung na khuapite sunga om peemta khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin, na nengniam kei ding uh hi.
A sep ni-in ama thaman, nitum ma-in na pia ding uh hi (bang hang hiam cih leh amah zawng a, tua bek a lungsimah om hi). Tua hikeilehTopa’tungah amah in hong khia dinga, note na mawh ding uh hi.Topa’
“Tate’ tangin pate kithat lo dinga, pate’ tangin zong tate kithat lo ding hi. Mi khempeuh ama khialhna hang bekin kithat ding hi.
“Peemta’ thu ahi a, pa nei lo mi’ thu ahi zongin tuate ading thutang na heisak kei ding uh a, meigong numei’ puan zong khapna-in na laksak kei ding uh hi.
Egypt-ah sila na hihna uh leTopanote’ Pasian in tua lai panin hong hotkhiatna na phawk ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih banga na gamtat nading uh thu kong pia hi.Topa

“Na lo ah an la-in lo lai-ah anlom na mangngilh uh ciangin a tawm dingin na paikik kei ding uh hi. Tuate pen peemta, pa nei lo le meigong numeite ading ahi hi. Hih penTopanote’ Pasian in na khut uh tawh na sepna khempeuh uhah note thupha hong piak theih nading ahi hi.Topa
Na oliv kungte uh na sat uh ciangin a hiangte na sat kikkik kei ding uh hi. Tuate pen peemta, pa nei lo le meigong numeite ading ahi hi.
Na leenggui lo panun leenggah na kaihkhop uh ciangin a sang na nung khopkik kei ding uh hi. Tuate pen peemta, pa nei lo le meigong numeite ading ahi hi.
Egypt gamah sila na hihna uh na phawk ding uh hi. Tua ahih manin hih bangin na gamtat nadingun thu kong pia hi.
“Mite kikalah thu kineihna om a, thukhen zumah amaute pai-in, thukhente in amau’ thu khensakin, a dikpa khahin a mawh pa lelsak a,
a mawh pa satna thuak dinga kilawm ahihleh, thukhen pa in amah lumsuksakin a khialhna zahin ama muhin satsak ding hi.
Sat sawmli kipia thei dinga, ahih hangin tua val hi lo ding hi. Tua hikeileh, hih sangin a tamvei zaw mi khat in sat lai leh note’ muhna-ah na sanggampa uh a kineubawl suak ding hi.
“Bawng in an a cil laitakin a muk na tuam kei ding uh hi.

“Sanggam pasalte teng khawmin, tuate khat si-in tapa a neih kei le, a sipa’ zi pen innkuan pualam khualmi tawh kiteeng lo ding hi. A pasal’ sanggampa in luppihin a zi dingin amah la dinga, ama tungah pasal’ sanggampa’ nasep sem ding hi.
Ama min Israel tungah a maiman loh nadingin tua nu in a neih masak a tapa pen a sisa a pasal’ ta-in kiseh ding hi.

Mipa in a sanggampa’ zi a laknop kei leh, upate kiang kongpi-ah a sanggampa’ zi pai dinga, ‘Ka pasal’ sanggampa in a sanggampa’ min Israel sungah a zop ding ut lo a, pasal’ sanggampa’ nasep kei tungah hong sem nuam lo hi,’ ci ding hi.
Tua ciangin mipa’ khuapi upate in amah samin thu genpih ding uh hi. Amah in, ‘Tua nu ka la nuam kei hi,’ a cih teitei leh,

upate’ omin a sanggampa’ zi ama kiangah paito-in a khe panin a khedap kaihkhiatsakin a maitang cilphih ding hi. Tua ciangin tua nu in, ‘A sanggampa’ innkuan a zomto lo mipa hih bangin kibawl tahen,’ ci khia ding hi.
Israel mite lakah ama innkuan pen, ‘A khedap a kikaih khiatsak mipa’ innkuan,’ kici ding hi.
“Mi khatlekhat a kilaii ciangin, a satpa’ kiang panin a pasal a hon khia dingin a khat pa’ zi hong pai a, a khutin a selsimte a matsak leh,
tua nu’ khut na sattansak ding uh a, amah na hehpih kei ding uh hi.
“Na ipsung uhah tawisuang nam nih, a lian le a neu, na neikhawm kei ding uh hi.
Na inn sung uhah tehna nam nih, a lian le a neu, na neikhawm kei ding uh hi.
Tawisuang a cing a man na nei ding uh a, tehna a cing a man na nei ding uh hi.Topanote’ Pasian in hong piak leitangah na khan uh a sau theih nading ahi hi.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bangin gamta-in, a thuman lote khempeuh,Topanote’ Pasian’ tungah a kihhuai ahi hi.Topa
“Egypt panin nong pai khiat lai-un lampi-ah Amalek mite in note hong bawlna,
note gimin lungkhamin na om laitakun lampi-ah a hong simna le note’ nungah a nunung khempeuh hong thahna uh phawk un; amaute in Pasian kihta lo uh hi.

Tua ahih cianginTopanote’ Pasian in note’ neih dingin gamh-in hong piak leitang tungah,Topana Pasian un na kiim uha na galte khempeuh panun tawlngakna hong piak ciangin, mun khempeuh panin Amalek mite a kiphawkna na phiatkhiat ding uh na mangngilh kei ding uh hi.TopaTopa
“Topana Pasian un luah dingin a hong piak leitangah va pai-in, tua leitang luahin a tungah na ten uh ciangin,Topa

Topana Pasian un a hong piak leitang pan a piang gah khempeuh panin a gah masa pawlkhat la-in lawh khat sungah na koih ding uh a, ama min na omsak nadingunTopana Pasian un a teelna munah na pai ding uh hi.TopaTopa

Tua hun laitakin na a sem siampipa kiangah pai-in ama kiangah, ‘Topain kote piak dingin ka pu ka pate uh tungah a ciam leitangah ka tun khitna uh tuni-inTopana Pasian kiangah kong ko uh hi,’ na ci ding uh hi.TopaTopa
“Tua ciangin siampipa in note’ khut panin a lawh hong saang dinga,Topanote’ Pasian biakna tau mai-ah koih ding hi.Topa

“Topanote’ Pasian mai-ah note in, ‘A vak kawikawi kote’ pupi pen Aram mi hi a, amah Egypt-ah paisukin tua munah a peem lai-in mi tawmno ahi hi. Tua lai-ah amah a lian, a thahat, tampi a pha minam khat a suak hi.Topa
Egypt-te in kote hong ngong bawlin hong gimsak a, kote sal bangin hong bawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin ka pu ka pate uh Pasian ahiTopaPasian’ tungah ka kiko uh a,Topain kote’ aw hong za-in, ka gimnate uh, ka sepnate uh le hong netniamnate uh a mu hi.TopaTopa
Topain a vangliatna le a thahatna, launa lianpi, lim le na lamdangte tawh Egypt panin kote hong pai khiatpih hi.Topa
Amah in hih mun hong tunpihin, bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gam hih leitang ko tungah hong pia hi.

Tua ahih ciangin en in,Topa,nangmah in kote nong piaksa leitang panin a gah a min masa kong paipih uh hi,’ na ci ding uh hi. Tua cianginTopanote’ Pasian’ mai-ah na koihsuk ding uh a,Topanote’ Pasian’ mai-ah na bia ding uh hi.Topa,TopaTopa
Topanote’ Pasian in note le na innkuanpihte uh tungah hong piak na a hoih khempeuhte hangin note le Levi mite le note lakah a om peemtate na lungdam khawm ding uh hi.Topa

“Sawm-ah-khat piak kum ahi, a kum thumna kumin, amaute in na khuapite uh sungah an ne-in, gilvahin a om theih nadingun Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote le meigong numeite tungah na piak uh, na khawhsa uh sawm-ah-khat na piak khit uh ciangin,

Topanote’ Pasian’ mai-ah, ‘Ka inn sung panin a siangtho ding teng ka tuamkoih khin hi. Tua tham loin kei nong sawlna bangin na thupiaknate khempeuh tawh kizui-in Levi mite, peemtate, pa nei lote le meigong numeite tungah ka pia khin hi. Hih tungtangah na thupiakna khat zong ka khial kei a, ka mangngilh zong om lo hi.Topa

Dahin ka kah sungin zong sawm-ah-khat ka ne kei a, ka nit sungin zong ka khen khia kei a, misite tungah zong ka pia kei hi.Topaka Pasian’ thu ka mang a, kei nong thupiakna khempeuh bangin ka hih khin hi.Topa

Vantung, nangma omna a siangtho panin hong ensuk inla, kote’ pulepate tungah bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gam na ciam mah bangin, nangma mi Israel-te le na hong piaksa leitang thupha hong pia in,’ na ci ding uh hi.Topa

“Tuni-inTopana Pasian un hih thukhamte le ngeina kipte na zuih ding uh note tungah thu hong pia hi. Tua ahih ciangin na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh na hih ding uh limtakin na ngaihsun ding uh hi.Topa
Tuni-in,Topapen note’ Pasian ahihna le note in ama lampite tawnin, ama thukhamte le ama thupiaknate le ama ngeina kipte zui-in, ama thu na man ding uh na gen khin uh hi.Topa
Tuni-inTopain note pen amah in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin ama neih ding mi na hihna uh le note in ama thupiaknate khempeuh na zuih nading uh,Topa

ama bawlsa minam dangte khempeuh sangin phatna le minthanna le pahtawina a lian zaw a ngahin hong koih nading le ama gensa mah banginTopanote’ Pasian adingin a siangtho mi na hih nading uh hong gen khin hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tu-in Moses le Israel upate in mite thu pia-in, “Tuni-a kong gen uh thupiakna khempeuh na zui ding uh hi.
Topana Pasian un note hong piak leitangah pai dingin Jordan na kantan ni-un suangtumpite na phut ding uh a, buan tawh na zut ding uh hi.Topa

Na pu na pate uh Pasian ahiTopain note tungah hong ciam mah bangin bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna leitang,Topana Pasian un note hong piakna gamah a lut dingin na galkah uh ciangin tua suangte tungah hih thute na gelh ding uh hi.TopaTopa
Jordan na galkah khit uh ciangin Ebal Mual tungah tuni-a kong thupiakna uh tawh kizui-in hih suangte na phut ding uh a, buan tawh tua suangte na zut ding uh hi.
Tua lai-ahTopana Pasian uh adingin suang kibawl biakna tau khat na bawl ding uh a, tuate tungah sik tawh a kibawl nazatte na liik kei ding uh hi.Topa
Topana Pasian uh adingin a kiseek lo suangtumte tawh biakna tau na bawl ding uh a, tua biakna tau tungahTopana Pasian uh adingin meihal biaknate na pia ding uh hi.TopaTopa
Tua ciangin thunuama biaknate na pia ding uh a, tua lai munah ne-in,Topana Pasian uh mai-ah na lungdam ding uh hi.Topa
Hih thute khempeuh tua suangte tungah a kitel takin na gelh ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Moses le Levi siampite in Israel-te khempeuh tungah, “Israel-te aw, gamdai unla ngai un: Tuni-inTopanote’ Pasian’ mi na suak uh hi.Topa
Tua ahih cianginTopanote’ Pasian’ thu mangin, tuni-a kong gen uh ama thupiaknate le ama thukhamte na zui ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa
Moses in tua ni mahin mite thuhilhin,
“Jordan na galkah khit uh ciangin mite thupha a pia dingin Gerizim Mual tungah a ding ding minamte: Simeon, Levi, Judah, Issakhar, Josef le Benjamin ahi hi.
Ebal Mual tungah hamsia a pia dingin a ding ding minamte: Reuben, Gad, Asher, Zebulun, Dan le Naftali ahi hi.
Levi mite in awging lianpi tawh Israel mite khempeuh tungah hih bangin ci ding uh hi.

“‘Topaadingin a kihhuai ahi, khutsiampa’ khut tawh a kibawl, a kiseek ahi a, a kisung ahi zongin milim bawlin, mun simthamah a koih mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in dawngin, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.Topa
“‘A nu ahi a, a pa ahi zongin a zahtak lo mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘A veengpa’ gisuang a bot khia mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Mittaw pa lam a lakkhial mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Peemta, pa nei lo le meigong numeite ading thutang a heikhiatsak mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Amah in a pa’ tungah maizumna tun ahih manin, a pa’ zi dang tawh a lumkhawm mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Ganhing khat peuhpeuh tawh nulepa mawhna a bawl mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘A nu’ tanu, a pa’ tanu, ahih kei leh a sanggamnu tawh a lumkhawm mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘A sungnu tawh a lumkhawm mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘A veengpa a thatsim mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Mawhna nei lopa thah nadingin sumgolh a la mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“‘Hih thute zuihna tawh hih thu a kipsak lo mipa in gimna ngah tahen,’ ci ding uh hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in, ‘Amen,’ ci ding uh hi.
“Note inTopana Pasian uh thu mangin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiakna khempeuh limtakin na zuih uhlehTopana Pasian un leitung minam dangte khempeuh sangin a lian zaw-in note hong bawl ding hi.TopaTopa
Topana Pasian uh thu na man uhleh hih thuphate khempeuh note tungah hong tung ding hi.Topa
“Khuapi sungah thupha ngah mi na hi ding uh a, lote-ah zong thupha ngah mi mah na hi ding uh hi.
“Note’ sung pan a piangte le na leitang uh pan a piangte le na ganhing uh pan a piang, na bawngte uh pungin na tuuhonte uh tungah thupha om ding hi.
“Na seengte uh le na annel mekna kuangte uhah thupha om ding hi.
“Na sepna khempeuh uhah thupha na ngah ding uh hi.
“Topain, note’ langah hong pang na galte uh na mai uhah lelhna thuaksak ding hi. Amaute lampi khat tawnin hong kuan ding uh a, note’ mai panin lam sagih tawnin taikeek ding uh hi.Topa
“Topain note’ ansal tung le na hihna khempeuh uhah thupha hong puak ding hi.Topana Pasian un note hong piakna leitangah amah in note tungah thupha hong pia ding hi.TopaTopa
“Note inTopana Pasian uh hong thupiaknate zui-in ama lampi na tot uhleh amah in note tungah hong ciamsa bangin ama adingin a siangtho mi dinginTopain note hong kipsak ding hi.TopaTopa
Topain note hong sapna thu midang khempeuh in thei ding uh a, amaute in note hong kihta ding uh hi.Topa

Note piak dingin na pu na pate uh tungahTopain a ciamsa gam sungah note’ sung pan a piangte, na gan khawi pan uha piangte le na leitang pan uha piangte-ahTopain note nakpitakin hong hausak ding hi.TopaTopa

Note’ leitangah ama hunin guah a zusak ding le na sepna khempeuh uh thupha a pia dinginTopain a na hoih kholna vantung note hong hon ding hi. Note in minam tampite tungah leitawi na pia ding uh a, ahih hangin note in leitawi na la kei ding uh hi.Topa

Note in tuni-a kong thugente limtakin zuihna tawhTopana Pasian uh thupiaknate mangin, tuni-a no kong thupiakna kammalte panin, pasian dangte’ na semin a bia dingin na pial kei nak-uhleh,Topain a makai-in note hong bawl dinga, mi’ nung zui-in hong bawl lo ding hi. Tunglam bekah na kah ding uh a, na nuaikiat ngei kei ding uh hi.TopaTopa

“Ahih hangin note inTopana Pasian uh thu mang loin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate le ama thukhamte khempeuh limtakin na zuih kei uhleh, hih samsiatna khempeuh note tungah hong tung dinga, note hong ban ding hi.Topa
“Khuapi sungah hong kisamsia dinga, lo ah zong hong kisamsia ding hi.
“Na lawhte uh le na annel mekna kuangte un zong samsiatna ngah ding hi.
“Note’ sung pan a piangte le na leitang uh pan a piangte, na bawngte uh le na tuuhon note uh in zong samsiatna ngah ding hi.
“Na sep na bawlna khempeuh uhah hamsia na ngah ding uh hi.
“Note inTopana nusiat uh a, na gamtatsiat uhleh, note sia-in na sih mang khit matengunTopain note tungah samsiatna, buaina, cihmawhnate hong tungsak ding hi.TopaTopa
A luah dingin na lutna uh leitang panin note hong beisak matengin note lakah pulnatna a tun nadinginTopain bawl ding hi.Topa
Topain pulnatna le cisa natna, meima nasia le a sa mahmah keutumna, huihpi’ mut gawpna le a nom tawh note hong vat gawp dinga, note na sih matengun tuate na thuak ding uh hi.Topa
Na lu tung uha om vantungte pen sumngo bangin sanin guah zu lo dinga, na nuai uha om leitung pen sik bangin sak ding hi.
Topain na gam sung uha guahte tang dingin leivui le sehnel hong zusak dinga, note na sih matengun vantung panin note tungah tuate hong kiasuk ding hi.Topa

“Topain na galte uh mai-ah note hong guallelsak ding hi. Amaute a do dingin lam khatah na kuan khawm ding uh a, amau’ mai-ah lam sagihin na taikeek ding uh hi. Leitung kumpi gamte khempeuh’ muhna-ah note a cikzethuai na hi ding uh hi.Topa
Note’ luanghawmte pen huihlak a leeng vasate khempeuh le leitunga ganhingte khempeuh’ an hi dinga, tuate a beng khia ding mihing om lo ding hi.
Topain note na damkik theih loh nading uh Egypt meimatumte le meima daite, meima lipneite le cithak tawh note hong vat gawp ding hi.Topa
Topain haina, mittawtna le lungsim buaina tawh note hong vat gawp ding hi.Topa

Mittawte in khuamial lakah khua a zawt bangin sunin khua na zawt ding uh a, na hihnate uhah na maavang kei ding uh hi. Note hong kinengniamin na tate uh hong kisut niloh dinga, note hong huh ding kuamah om lo ding hi.
“Zi dingin lawm khat na dong ding uh a, midang khat in na luppih ding hi. Inn na lam ding uh a, tua sungah na teeng kei ding uh hi. Leenggui lo na zuan ding uh a, a gah na ne kha kei ding uh hi.

Na muh tangpi-un na bawngtal uh kigo dinga, a sa na ne kha kei ding uh hi. Note’ mai panin na la uh hong kingawh laksak dinga, note kiangah hong kipiakik nawn lo ding hi. Na tuute uh na galte uh tungah kipia dinga, note hong huh ding kuamah om lo ding hi.
Na tapate uh le na tanute uh midang tungah kipia dinga, amaute ngai-in sun nilohin na mit un enin na mit uh gim ding hi. Tuate pen nomau’ tha tawh na dalzawh ding uh hi lo ding hi.
Na theih nai loh uh minam khat in na leitang panun a piangte le na nasepsa khempeuh uh ne tum dinga, note hong kinengniamin hong kisu gawp tawntung lel ding hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na mit un a muh ding nate in note hong hehsak mahmah ding hi.
Topain note na kidamsakkik theih loh ding uh a nasia mahmah meimatumte tawh na khukte uh le na khete uh meimasak gawpin, na khenuai panun na luzang dong uhah na thuak ding uh hi.Topa

“Note le na pu na pate un a theih ngei loh minam khat kiangahTopain note le note tungah na koih uh na kumpipa uh hong tunpih dinga, tua lai-ah singlesuang tawh a kibawl pasian dangte’ na na sem ding uh hi.Topa
Topain note hong pai khiatpihna mite lakah a cikzethuai, paunak le gentehna na suak ding uh hi.Topa
“Khaici tampi lo ah na tuh ding uh a, ahi zongin tawmno bek na khawm ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kauphe in ne mang ding hi.
Note in leenggah lo zuanin na puah ding uh a, ahih hangin leenggahzu dawn loin, leenggah zong na ne kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh lung in tuate ne ding hi.
Na gam sung khempeuh uhah oliv kung na nei ding uh a, ahih hangin a thau tawh note na kizut kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh na oliv gahte uh pulh ding hi.
Tanute le tapate na nei ding uh a, ahih hangin amaute pen nomau a’ hi lo ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute galmat suak ding uh hi.
Na singte khempeuh uh le, na leitang panun a piang khempeuh kauphete in tang ding uh hi.
“Note lakah a om peemtate lian semsem ding uh a, note na neu semsem ding uh hi.
Amaute in note’ tungah leitawi hong pia ding uh a, note in amaute tungah leitawi na pia kei ding uh hi. Amaute a makai hi-in, note a nungzui na hi ding uh hi.

“Amah in note hong piak thupiaknate le thukhamte zui loin,Topana Pasian uh thu mang lo na hih manun, note na sih matengun hih samsiatnate khempeuh note’ tungah hong tungin, note hong delhin hong pha ding uh hi.Topa
Note le na suanlekhakte uh tungah a tawntungin tuate pen lim le nalamdang hi ding hi.
Hih a tampi nate khempeuh om napi-in note in lungdamna le lungsim kipahna tawhTopanote’ Pasian’ na sem lo na hih manun,Topa

Topain note’ langah a hong sawl ding na galte uh’ na, gilkialna le dangtakna, pum guakin omna le na khempeuh kitangsapna tawh, na sem ding uh hi. Na galte un note hong suksiat matengin note’ ngawngah sik hakkol hong thuah ding uh hi.Topa

Topain a gamlapi leimong panin muvanlai leeng bangin a manlang, amau’ pau na theih loh uh minam, thukhualna a nei lo minam, khangham mite a zahtak lo, khangno mite tungah maipha zong a lak tuan lo minam khat, note’ langkhat ah hong paipih dinga,Topa

note na sih matengun amaute in na ganhon note uh le na leitang panun a piang gahte hong neksak ding uh hi. Amaute in note hong beisak matengun note adingin an, leenggahzu, ahih kei leh sathau, na ganhingte uh ahih kei leh na tuuhon note uh zong hong nusiat lo ding uh hi.

Na gam sung uha a om na muan uh, a sang a muanhuai na kulhpite uh a cip khit dong matengin note’ khuapite khempeuh sungah amaute in note hong umcih ding uh hi.Topana Pasian un note hong piaksa na gam sung khempeuh uhah a om na khuapite khempeuh sung uhah note hong umcih ding uh hi.Topa
“Na galte un hong umcihna le hong lungkhamsak nading ahi na lungkham hun sung uhahTopana Pasian un note a hong piaksa, na sung panun a piang na tanute uh le na tapate uh’ sate na ne ding uh hi.Topa
Note lakah a ngeksuak, a cithei pen mipa in a sanggampa, a it a zi le amah tawh a om a tate a nunung pen’ tungah an pia nuam lo ding hi.
Na khuapite khempeuh sung uhah hong umcihna le na galte un note hong lungkhamsak nading hun sungah bangmah kinei nawn lo ding ahih manin ama nek a tate’ sate kuamah in midang hawm nuam lo ding hi.

Note lakah a om a ngeksuak, a cithei pen numei, amah ngekin a ci neel lua ahih manin a khenuai tawh lei sik ding a ngaihsun ngei vet lo nu in a it a pasal, a tanute le a tapate adingin ama sung panin a piang a tate le ama sung panin a pai khia a nau-nungzuite phal lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hong umcihna le na galte un na khuapite uhah note hong lungkhamsak nading lungkhamna sungah bangmah neih lohna hangin amah in tuate nesim ding hi.
“Hih a minthang, a zahtakhuai min,Topana Pasian uh na kihtak theih nadingun hih laibu sunga kigelh hih thute limtakin zuih ding na ngaihsut kei uhleh,Topa
Topain note le na suan na khakte uh tungah nasia-in sauvei a om gimna, gimna a tuan diak le a nasia, nat saute hong tungsak ding hi.Topa
Amah in note’ kihtak Egypt natnate note’ tungah hong tungsakkik dinga, note’ tungah tuate kilawi lo ding hi.
Note na siat matengun hih thukham laibu sungah a kiciamteh lo natna le gimna khempeuh zongTopain no tungah hong tungsak ding hi.Topa
Note, vantung aksite zahin a tam na hihna sung uhah tawmno bek na pha ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian uh thu na mang kei uh hi.Topa

Topain note tungah a hong bawlna le note tampi hong phaksakna-ah nuam a sak mah bangin, note tungah siatna tunsakna le note suksiatna-ah zongTopain nuamsa dinga, a luah dingin na lutna uh leitang panin note hong kila khia ding hi.TopaTopa

“Topain leimong khat panin mong khat, mi khempeuhte lakah note hong thehthang ding hi. Tua lai-ah note le na pu na pate un a theih nai loh singlesuang tawh a kibawl pasian dangte’ na na sem ding uh hi.Topa
Hih minamte lakah oltak a nuntakna na mu kei ding uh a, kiptaka na om nading uh gam na nei kei ding uh hi.Topain tua lai-ah lungsim linna, mit gimna le nuntak tha beina hong pia dinga,Topa
na nuntakna uh lunghimawhin na om tawntung ding uh hi. Sun le zanin na lau ngitnget ding uh a, nuntak lungmuanna na nei kei ding uh hi.
Na lungsim un a kihtak launa le na mit un a muh ding nate’ hangin, zingsangin, ‘Nitak hileh!’ na ci ding uh a, nitakin, ‘Zingsang hileh!’ na ci ding uh hi.

Note na zinkik ngei nawn kei ding uh hi, ci-in kong ciam khualzinna, Egypt gamah teembaw tawhTopain note hong paipihkik ding hi. Tua lai-ah sila numei le sila pasal dingin na galte uh tungah na kizuak ding uh a, ahih hangin kuamah in note hong lei lo ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Hihte pen, Horeb-ah amaute tawh thuciamna a bawlsa banah, Israel mite tawh Moab gamah thuciamna a bawl dinginTopain Moses a sawl, a thuciamna kammalte ahi hi.Topa
Moses in Israel-te khempeuh samin amaute kiangah, “Egypt gam sung note’ mit muhah,Topain Faro’ tung le ama nasemte khempeuh le ama gam khempeuh ah a bawlna,Topa
note’ mit in a muhsa ze-etna lianpite, limte, tua nalamdang liante khempeuh na thei khin uh hi.
Ahih hangin tuni donginTopain note’ tungah a thu na tel nading uh lungsim hitaleh, na muh nading uh mit hitaleh, na zak nading uh bil hitaleh hong pia nai lo hi.Topa
Kum sawmli sung sehnel gamah note hong makaih khin hi. Note’ tung panin na puante uh sia nai lo a, na khe panun zong na khedapte uh sia nai lo hi.
Topapen na Pasian uh ahihna na theih nadingun nek ding anlum le dawn ding leenggahzu ahi a, khamtheih zu ahi zongin na ne nai kei uh a, ahi zongin na kisapna teng uh hong pia hi.Topa
Hih mun na tun uh ciangin Heshbon kumpipa Sihon le Bashan kumpipa Og, eite a do dingin hong kuan khia uh a, ahih hangin amaute i zo hi.
Amaute’ leitang i la a, Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam alangte tungah luah dingin i pia hi.
Tua ahih ciangin na hihna khempeuh uhah na daupai theih nadingun hih thuciamna kammalte khempeuh limtakin na zuih ding uh na ngaihsun ding uh hi.

“Topana Pasian un tuni-in note tawh a bawl,Topana Pasian uh thuciamna sungah na lut theih nadingun, tuni-in amah in ama mi dingin note hong kipsak theih nading le note’ tungah hong ciamna le na pu na pate uh Abraham, Isaac le Jakob tungah a kiciamna bangin, amah, note’ Pasian ahih theih nadingin, na minam lutangte uh, na upate uh, na uliante uh, Israel mi pasal khempeuh, na taneute uh, na zite uh, na giahphual uhah a om peemtate, na sing uh hong tomsakin na tui uh a hong tawisakte a kipan note khempeuh, tuni-inTopana Pasian uh mai-ah na ding uh hi.TopaTopaTopa
Hih kiciamna note bek tawh a bawl hi lo a,
tuni-in eite tawhTopai Pasian’ mai-ah a ding mite tawh a bawl mah bangin tuni-in eite tawh a om nai lo i suan i khakte tawh zong a bawl ahi hi.Topa
“Egypt gamah i tenna le note in na nawk uh minamte lakah i paina na thei uh hi.
A muhdahhuai amau’ na, singlesuang a kibawl, ngunlekham a kibawl, amaute’ lakah a om a milimte uh na mu khin uh hi.

Note lakah numei ahi a, pasal ahi a, innkuan ahi a, minam khat ahi zongin, tua minamte’ pasian a bia dinginTopai Pasian kiang panin tuni-in a lungsim a hei khia a omkhak ding kidawm un. Tua hikeileh note lakah gu a nei gah kha a gah singkung hong bang dinga, hih kiciamna kammalte za napi-in a lungsimah amah thupha kipia tawmin, ‘Ka lungsim khauhna tawh ka gamta zongin ka suakta veve ding hi,’ a ci hong om kha ding hi. Hih in mihoih le misia, a kibangin phiatkhiatna hong suaksak ding hi.Topa

Topain amah maisak lo dinga,Topa’hehna le hazatna meikhu bangin tua mipa’ langkhat ah khu zaw-in, hih laibu sunga kigelh samsiatnate ama tungah tu dinga,Topain a mun khempeuh panin ama min phiat ding hi.TopaTopa’Topa
Topain hih thukham laibu sunga a kigelh thuciam samsiatnate khempeuh tawh kizui-in gimna a thuak dingin Israel minamte khempeuh lak panin amah teng khia ding hi.Topa
“Hong khanglai ding, note’ nungah hong piang na tate uh le a gamla gam panin a hong pai gamdang mite in, tua gam’ gim ngahna leTopain a natsak cinatnate a muh uh ciangin,Topa

‘A gambup pen kaat le ci le nin a kaangtum, khai kituh lo, bangmah po lo, lopa zong a po zawh lohna mun Sodom le Gomorrah, Admah le Zeboiim bangin a kilawnthal gawp, a hehna le a sinsona tawhTopa’lot gawpte tawh kibang hi,’ ci ding uh hi.Topa’
Minam khempeuhte in, ‘Bang hanginTopain hih bangin hih gam bawl ahi hiam? Hih hehna lian, bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?’ ci takpi ding uh hi.Topa
Tua ciangin mite in, ‘Amah in Egypt gam panin a pai khiatpih lai-in amaute tawh a bawl, a pu a pate uh Pasian ahiTopa’thuciamna amaute in nusia-in,Topa’
a theih nai loh uh pasian-te le amah in amaute tungah a piak loh pasian dangte’ na va semin a biakna hang uh ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a mite tungahTopaheh mahmah a, hih laibu sunga om samsiatnate khempeuh hih leitungah tungsak hi.Topa
Topain hehna, sinsona, lungham mahmahna tawh a leitang panun amaute zunglot a, tuni-a i muh bangin amaute gam dangah hawl khia hi,’ ci ding uh hi.Topa
“Topai Pasian in hong lahkhiat loh thusim om a, ahih hangin hih thukham sunga om thute khempeuh i zuih theih nadingin hong lak khia a, eite le i suan i khakte’ zuih tawntung ding ahi hi.Topa
“Note’ mai-ah ka koih, na teel ding thu thupha le samsiatna, hih nate khempeuh note tungah hong tungin,Topain note hong hawl khiatna minamte lakah hih thute phawk kikin,Topa
Topanote’ Pasian’ kiangah note le na suan na khakte uh paikikin, na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawh tuni-a kong gen ama thute na man uh ciangin,Topa
Topana Pasian un note na ngei uh hong bangsakkikin, note tungah hehpihna hong nei dinga,Topana Pasian un note hong thehthangna mi khempeuhte lak panin note hong kaikhawmkik ding hi.TopaTopa
A kihawl khia na mite uh van mong pekah a om leh zong,Topana Pasian un tua lai panin note hong khawmin, tua lai panin amah in hong paipih ding hi.Topa
Note in na neih theih nadingun, na pu na pate uh neih leitangah,Topana Pasian un hong paipih dinga, na pu na pate uh sangin a cithei zaw a tam zaw-in note hong bawl ding hi.Topa

Note in na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawhTopana Pasian uh itin na hintheih nadingun,Topana Pasian un note le na suanlekhakte uh tungah thu man nopna lungsim hong guan ding hi.TopaTopa
Topana Pasian un hih samsiatnate khempeuh, no hong bawlsia na galte uh le na langte uh tungah tungsak ding hi.Topa
Note inTopa’thu mangkikin, tuni-a kong gen ama thupiaknate khempeuh na zui ding uh hi.Topa’

Note in hih thukham laibu sunga kigelh ama thupiaknate le ama thukhamte zui-in,Topana Pasian uh thu na man uh a, na lungsim khempeuh uh le na nuntakna khempeuh uh tawhTopana Pasian uh lamah na kihei uhleh,Topana Pasian un na sepna khempeuh uh, note’ suanlekhakte, na ganhingte uh panin a piangte le na leitang panun a piang khempeuh ah nakpitakin hong daupaisak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh na pu na pate uh tungah amah a lungkim mah bangin note tungahTopahong lungkimkik dinga, note hong daupaisak ding hi.TopaTopaTopaTopa
“Bang hang hiam cih leh tuni-a kong gen hih thupiakna pen note adingin a haksa lua hi lo a, na zuih lah ding uh zong hi lo hi.
Note in, ‘Eite in a thu za-in i sep theih nadingin kua in vantungah eite adingin hong paisakin hong laksak ding ahi hiam?’ na cihtheih nadingun vantung a om hi lo hi.
Note in, ‘Eite in a thu za-in i sep theih nadingin kua in tuipi galkhat ah hong paisakin hong laksak ding ahi hiam?’ na cihtheih nadingun tuipi gal-a om zong hi lo hi.
A thu, hong nai mahmah hi. Note in na hih theih nadingun na kamsung uh le na lungsim sung uhah om hi.
“Tuni-in na teel dingun note’ mai-ah nuntakna le a hoih na, sihna le siatna ka koih khinzo hi.

Topana Pasian uh itna, ama lampite totna, ama thupiaknate le ama thukhamte le ama ngeina kipte zuihna tawh, tuni-a no tungah kong gen ahiTopana Pasian uh thupiaknate na man uhleh, note nungta-in tampi na pha ding uh a, a luah dingin note na lutna uh leitang tungahTopana Pasian un note thupha hong pia ding hi.TopaTopaTopa
Ahih hangin na lungsim uh kihei-in, note in amah zui loin, pasian dangte a bia ding le a na a sem dingin note na kiheikhiat uhleh,
tuni-in note tungah hih thu kong gen khol hi: Note na si ding uh a, Jordan kantanin note a lut ding le a nei dingin na paina uh leitang tungah sauvei na nungta kei ding uh hi.

Tuni-in note’ langkhat ah teci a pang dingin vantung le leitung ka sam a, note’ mai-ah na teel dingun nuntakna le sihna, thupha le samsiatna ka koih hi. Tua ahih ciangin note le na suanlekhakte uh na hintheih nadingun nuntakna teel unla,

Topana Pasian uh itin, ama thu mangin, amah beel un; bang hang hiam cih lehTopain na pu na pate uh Abraham, Isaac le Jakob tungah piak dingin a kiciamsa leitangah note na tentheih nadingun tua pen note-a’ dingin nuntakna le khansauna ahi hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa
Tua ciangin Moses in Israel-te khempeuh tungah a thugen zomlai hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, “Tuni-in kei kum za le kum sawmnih ka pha ta a, keima ut bangin ka gamtang zo nawn kei hi.Topain kei kiangah, ‘Hih Jordan galkhat ah na pai kei ding hi,’ hong ci zo hi.Topa

Topana Pasian mahmah uh note’ mai-ah hong galkah ding hi. Note’ mai-ah hih minamte amah in susia dinga, note in amaute na suan khia ding uh hi.Topa’gensa bangin note’ mai-ah Joshua hong galkah ding hi.TopaTopa’
Topain amaute a suksiat lai-in, Amor kumpi Sihon le Og tung le amau’ leitang tungah a bawl bangin amaute tungah bawl ding hi.Topa
Topain note tungah amaute hong pia dinga, note kong piak thupiaknate khempeuh tawh kizui-in amaute tungah na bawl ding uh hi.Topa
Thahat unla, hang un. Lau kei unla, amaute kihta kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh note tawh hong pai pa penTopana Pasian uh ahi hi. Note hong cimawhsak lo dinga, hong nusia lo ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa

Tua ciangin Moses in Joshua samin, Israel-te khempeuh muhin ama kiangah, “Thahat inla hang in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute tungah piak dinginTopain amau’ pute pate tungah a ciamsa leitangah hih mite tawh na pai dinga, nangmah in tua leitang amaute na ngahsak ding hi.Topa
Na mai-ah a pai pa penTopaahi hi. Amah in nang hong ompih dinga, nang hong cimawhsak loin, zong hong nusia lo ding hi. Lau kei inla, lungkia kei in,” a ci hi.Topa
Moses in hih Thukham gelhinTopa’Thuciamna Singkuang a pua Levi mi siampite le upate khempeuh tungah a pia hi.Topa’
Moses in amaute thu pia-in, “Kum sagih a cin sim, a kisehsa suahtaksakna hun, buk pawi hunin,
amah in a teelna munTopana Pasian uh mai-ah a kilak dingin Israel-te khempeuh a pai uh ciangin, amau’ zakin Israel-te khempeuh mai-ah hih thukham na sim ding uh hi.Topa

Jordan galkhat ah a luah dingin na paina uh gamah na nuntak lai tengun amaute in a thu za-inTopana Pasian uh zahtak ding a theih nading le hih thukham thute khempeuh limtakin a sep theih nading le hih thu a thei nai lo amau’ tate inTopana Pasian uh zahtak ding a theih nadingun, numei, pasal le naupangte le na khuapite uh sunga om peemtate, mi khempeuh khawm un,” a ci hi.TopaTopaTopa’

Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “En in, na sih ding hun hong nai ta hi. Joshua sam inla, amah ka sawl theih nadingin kikhopna buk sungah hong om un,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Moses le Joshua pai-in kikhopna buk sungah va om uh hi.Topa
Tua ciangin meii khuam omna puanbuk sungahTopakilang hi. Meii khuam, puanbuk kong gei-ah a ding hi.Topa

Tua cianginTopain Moses kiangah, “En in, na pu na pate kiang a zuan ding na hita hi. Nang na om nawn loh ciangin hih mite pen na paina uh mite lakah a gam sung pasian-te uh tawh paktat ding uh a, amaute in kei hong nusia-in amaute tawh ka bawl ka thuciamna uh siasak ding uh hi.Topa

Tua hun ciangin amaute tungah ka sin so-in, amaute nusia-in ka mai ka seel dinga, amaute bei mang ding uh hi. Tua ni ciangin amaute in, ‘Eite’ lakah i Pasian a om loh manin hih siatnate i tungah hong tung hi lo ahi hiam?’ a cihtheih nadingun amaute tungah siatna le gimna tampi tung ding hi.
Amaute, pasian dangte lamah kihei uh ahih manin amau’ gamtatnasa siatnate khempeuh hangin tua hun ciangin ka mai ka seel taktak ding hi.
“Tua ahih ciangin hih lai gelh inla, Israel mite hilh in. Hih la, kei adingin Israel mite’ langkhat ah teci a suah theih nadingin amaute tungah hilh in.

Bang hang hiam cih leh a pu a pate uh tungah piak dinga ka kiciamna, bawngnawi le khuaizu tui bangin a luanna gamah amaute tunpih khinin, amaute in ne-in khamin a thau khit uh ciangin, pasian dangte a bia dingin kihei-in kei hong simmawhin ka thuciamna siasak ding uh hi.

Siatna le haksatnate amaute tungah a tun ciangin hih la, teci-in amaute’ langkhat ah pang ding hi (bang hang hiam cih leh a suanlekhakte un mangngilh lo ding uh hi); bang hang hiam cih leh piak dingin ka kiciam leitangah amaute ka paipih ma-in, amau’ vaihawm kholh a ngimnate uh ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni mahin Moses in hih la gelh a, Israel mite a hilh hi.

Tua cianginTopain Nun’ tapa Joshua sawlin, “Thahat inla hang in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute piak dingin ka kiciam leitang tungah Israel mite na paipih dinga, nang tawh kong om ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Moses in a bei dongin hih Thukham kammalte laibu sungah a gelh a man ciangin,
Moses inTopa’Thuciamna Singkuang a pua Levi mite thu pia a,Topa’
“Hih Thukham laibu la unla, note’ langkhat ah teci dingin a om theih nadinginTopana Pasian uh Thuciamna Singkuang gei-ah koih un.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh a lehdo mite le a lungkhauh thei mite na hihna uh ka thei hi. En un, note tawh kei a nungta khawm laipi mahin, tuni-inTopana lehdo khin uh hi. Ka sih khit ciangin bangzah takin lehdo zaw lai ding na hi uh hiam!Topa
Hih thute amaute’ bilah genin, amau’ langkhat ah teci a pang dingin vantung le leitung ka sap theih nadingin na minam upate uh le na uliante khempeuh uh kei kiangah hong khawm un.

Bang hang hiam cih leh ka sih khit ciangin note siatgamtatin, note kong sawlna lampi panin na pial taktak ding lam uh ka thei hi. Note’ sepna tawh amah hehsakin,Topa’muhna-ah a sia gamta ding na hih manun, hong pai ding hunte-ah, note’ tungah gimna hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin hih la malte a bei dongin Israel a kikhawm khempeuhte’ zakin Moses in gen a,
“Vantungte aw, ngai un,thu kong gen ding hi.Ka thugenteleitung in za hen.
Ka thuhilhte guahmal bangin zu-in,ka thugente daitui bangin kia henla,lo ngeek tunga guah phin lehankung tunga guahzu bang tahen.
Bang hang hiam cih lehTopa’min ka phat ding hi.Topa’Eite’ Pasian a liatna gen un!
“Eite’ belhTopa,a nasepna kicing a,Topa,ama sepna khempeuh thumanna ahi hi.Thumanna nei-in,mawhna a nei lo Pasian hi a,amah thutangin thuman hi.
Ama tungah amaute gamtat sia uh a,amaute’ sitbaanna hanginama tate hi nawn lo uh hi.Amaute pen a lampial,a lungsim kawi khang mite ahi uh hi.
A hai, ngaihsutna nei lo mite aw,tua banginTopathuk dingTopana hi uh hiam?Amah pen, note a hong piangsak,note hong bawlin a hong kipsak,na pa uh hi lo ahi hiam?
“A beisa hunte phawk unla,khang tampi hunte ngaihsun un.Na pate uh dong le-uh cin,hong hilh ding uh a,na upate uh dong le-uh cinhong gen ding uh hi.
Sang Pen pa inminam dangte tungah amau’ gamh pia a,mihingte a ten nading muna seh cianginvantungmi a phazah tawha kizui-in mite’ gamgi a phut hi.
Ahi zonginTopa’tanh pen ama mite hi a,Topa’Jakob’ suante pena kipia ama luah ahi hi.
“Amah in sehnel gam,huihpi nunna gam sungah amaute mu hi.Amah in amaute kawi-in kem a,ama mitnauta bangin amaute kem hi.
A bu a vil,a note tungah a kha a zap,a khate zakin a note a man,a kha tawh a note a pua muvanlai bangin
Topabek mah in amaute makaih a,Topaamaute kiangah gamdang pasian om lo hi.
“Amah in leitung a sangna-ahamaute tuangsak a,amaute ingamlak pan a piangte a ne uh hi.Suangpi paninamaute khuaizu hupsakin,meisuang tawh a kibangsuang panin sathau a nesak hi.
Bawnghon panin bawngnawi thaukhal,tuuhon panin tuunawi,tuunote le tuutalte’ thau tawh,Bashan bawnghonte le keelte,mangbuh hoih pente tawhleenggahtui san na dawn uh hi.
“Israel mite thau mahmah uh a,a lehdo thei mi suak uh hi.Note thau-in lianpi pha-in,na zol uh hi.Tua ciangin amaute a bawl Pasianamaute in nusia-in,amau a Hon khia pa thusim lo uh hi.
Amaute pen pasian dangte tawhama hazat theih nadingin gamta uh a,a kihhuai gamtatnate tawhamaute in amah hehsak uh hi.
Amaute in pasian ahi lo dawite,amau’ theih ngei loh pasian-te,hong suak nunung pasian thakte,na pu na pate un a theih ngei lohpasian-te’ tungah biakna a pia uh hi.
Note a hong Hon khia pana phawk kei uh a,note a hong suaksak Pasianna mangngilh uh hi.
“Topain tua thu thei a,Topaa tapate le a tanute inamah hehsak uh ahih manintua ama tate a nolh hi.
Amah in, ‘Amaute’ kiang paninka mai ka seel dinga,amaute’ thumongbang hong hi hiam, ka en ding hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh amautea lampial khang mite hi a,cihtakna a nei lo tate ahi uh hi.

Amaute in pasian ahi lote tawhka hazat nading hong bawl uh a,a milimte uh tawhkei hong hehsak uh hi.Tua ahih cianginmi-a a gen taak lo mite tawhamaute’ hazat theih nadingka bawl dinga,a hai mahmah minam khat tawhamaute ka hehsak ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehka hehna in mei tawhkuang a,Leinuaite’ gamdong a kuang hi.Leitung le a tunga piangte kaangtum a,mualte’ bulpite kuangsak hi.
“‘Amaute’ tungah siatna ka khol dinga,amaute’ tungahka thaltangte ka zang ding hi.
Gilkialin amaute si ding uh a,a sa mahmah meikuang legunei natna in amaute netum ding hi.Keimah in amaute a pet dinginha hiam a nei gamsateamaute a tu dingingu a nei gulte ka sawl ding hi.
Namsau in gamlakah amaute susia-in,inn sungah launa lianpi om dinga,tangval le nungak, naungek nawi nete,samkangte tawh susia khawm ding hi.
Keimah in,“Amaute gamlapi-ah ka thehthang dinga,mite lakah amaute a kiphawknaka beisak ding hi,” ka ci thei ding hi.
Amau’ langte in ngaihsun khialin,amaute in, “Eite i gualzo hi.Topain hihte khempeuh bawl lo hi,”Topahong ci kha ding uh ahih maningalte’ hong phin dingka lau hi,’ a ci hi.
“Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute, ngaihsutna a nei lo minam hi a,amaute’ sungah thu theihtelna om lo hi.
Amaute a pil hileh,hih thu theitel ding uh a,amau’ thu tawpna mu ding uh!
Amau a Hon khia pa in amaute zuakin,Topain amaute pia khia kei lehTopabangci-in mi khat inmi tulkhat delh mangin,mi nih in mi tul sawmtaisak zo ding ahi hiam?
Bang hang hiam cih leh i galte’ pasianeite’ Pasian bang hi lo a,i galte’ thungetna a mawkna ahi hi.
Amaute, Sodom le Gomorrah banginsiahuai uh a,gu nei-in a kha leenggah a gahleenggui tawh kibang uh hi.
Amau’ leenggahzu pen gulpi gu lea gupha gul gunei gu tawh kibang hi.
“Hihte kei kiangah kikholin,ka vankoihna sungahkisiincip hi lo ahi hiam?
Phulakna le thukkikna kei a’ hi a,a hun ciangin amaute puk ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamau’ gim ngah hun ding hong naita a,amau’ siat nading hong tung pah hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute’ vang a beina lesila le sila ahi lote a beina a muh cianginTopain a mite’ dikna kilangsak dinga,Topaama nasemte tungahhehpihna nei ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, ‘Amau’ pasian-te,a bukna uh suangpi,
amaute’ biakpiakna thau ne-in,leenggahzu tawh a biakna uh a dawntekoi-ah om ahi hiam?Amaute thosakin note kihuhsak unla,amaute, na kidalna uh hisak un!
‘Tu-in thei un,keimah a kici pa pen kei ka hi a,kei sim loh pasian dangkuamah om lo hi.Ka that a, ka nungtasak hi.Ka liamsak a, ka damsak hi.Ka khut sung pana hon khia zo kuamah om lo hi.
Bang hang hiam cih lehvantung lamah ka khut laamto-inka kiciam a,a nungta tawntungka hih mah bangin,
a tee ka namsau taatin,thu ka khen ciangin,ka galte tungah phu ka la dinga,kei hong mudahte ka thukkik ding hi.
Ka thaltangte si ka tawksak dinga,ka namsau in mi that ding hi.a kithatte le a kimante,kei hong langpangte,su gawp ding hi,’ a ci hi.
Topa’mite phat un,Topa’no minam dangte aw;bang hang hiam cih lehamah in a nasemte’ phu la a,alangte thuk-in,ama mite’ gam adinginkilemna a bawl hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses hong pai-in, mite’ zakin amah le Nun’ tapa Joshua in hih la malte khempeuh a sut uh hi.
Moses in Israel-te khempeuh tungah hih thute a gen a man ciangin
amaute kiangah, “Hih thu khempeuh limtakin zui unla, na tate un a zuih dingin na hilh theih nadingun tuni-a note tungah kong gen thu khempeuh na lungsim uhah koih un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh hih pen note adingin a thuneu hi loin note’ nuntakna hi a, a luah dingin Jordan galkhat na paina uh gam sungah hih thu tawh sauveipi na hing ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ni mahmahinTopain Moses kiangah,Topa
“Jerikho gallam, Moab gam sungah a om Nebo Mual, hih Abarim mualtungah kahto in. A neih dingun Israel mite tungah ka piak Kanaan gam gal et in.
Hor Mual tungah na sanggampa Aaron si-in a mite kiangah a kigawm bangin, na kahtohna mualtungah si inla, na mite kiangah pai-in kigawm in.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Zin gam, Kadesh khua gei-a Meribah tui phual, Israel mite lakah keimah nong upna na siasak a, Israel mite lakah a siangtho-in kei nong zahtak kei hi.
Tua ahih manin na mai-ah a om gam na gal muh tei dinga, ahih hangin Israel mite ka piak gam sungah nang na pai kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Hih pen, Pasian’ mi Moses in ama sih ma-in Israel mite thupha a piakna ahi hi.
Amah in,“Sinai paninTopahong pai a,TopaSinai panin eite ading hong suak khia hi.Paran Mual panin hong taang khia a,a taklam khutah meikuang tawi-in,mi siangtho tul sawmte kiang panina hong pai hi.
Hi taktak hi; amah in a mite it a,ama tungah a ki-ap mi khempeuha khut sungah om hi.Tua ahih ciangin amaute inna kalsuanna hong zui uh a,nang tung paninlamlahna ngah uh hi.
Jakob mihonte’ neih dinginMoses in kote tungahngeina khat hong pia hi.
Mite’ makaite kikhawmin,Israel minamte khempeuha kikaihkhop ciangin,ama mi Israel-te lakahTopa,kumpi a suak hi,” a ci hi.Topa,
Reuben minamte’ thu gen a,“Reuben nungta-in si kei henla,ama mite zongmi tawm hi kei tahen,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judah minamte’ thu genin,“Topaaw, Judah’ aw ngai inla,Topaa mite kiangah amah paipih in.Na khutte tawh ama ading do inla,a galte’ dona-ah a huhpa hi in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Levi minamte’ thu genin,“Levi tungah na Thummim pia inla,na midik pa tungah na Urim pia in.Massah ah na ze-et mipa,Meribah tuite-ah na kitotpih pa ahi hi.

A nu le a pa sangin nangmahhong thupi ngaihsut zaw uh a,‘Amaute ka thupi sim kei hi,’a ci pa ahi hi.Amah in a sanggamtepaaikhia-in, a tate don lo hi.Bang hang hiam cih leh Levi minamte inna thu hong mangin,na thuciamna zui uh hi.
Amaute in na ngeina kipteJakob suante hilhin,na thukhamteIsrael-te hilh ding uh hi.Amaute in na mai-ahpaknamtui hong koihin,na biakna tau tungahmeihal biakna bup hong koih ding uh hi.
Topaaw, ama nate tungahTopathupha pia inla,a khut tawh a sepnate saang in.A galte’ kawng sutan inla,a dingkik zo nawn lo dinginamah a mudahte su gawp in,” a ci hi.
Benjamin minamte’ thu genin,“Topain a it mipaTopaama kiangah nuam takin om hi.Amah in sun tawntung kemin,amaute lakah om hi,” a ci hi.
Josef minamte’ thu genin,“Topain ama leitang,Topatung lamah a omvantung letsong hoih pente,le nuai-a om a thuknate tawh,
ni hanga gah a hoih pente,le kha hanga piang a hoih pente tawh,
tanglai mualte tunga pianga hoih a limci pente le tawntung mualte’ hauhna tawh,
leitung le a tunga omletsong hoih pente lesawlbawk lakah a teengpa’ maipha tawhthupha pia tahen.Hihte khempeuh,Josef tungah tung henla,a sanggamte lakahulian ahi mipa’ lu tungah tung tahen.

A tacil, bawngtal bangin thahat a,a kite, gamsial kite tawh kibang hi.Amah in tuate tawh mite nawt dinga,leimong dongahamaute khempeuh phul ding hi.Efraim mi tul sawmte tua bang hi a,Manasseh minam tul tampite zongtua bangmah ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Zebulun minamte’ thu genin,“Zebulun aw,na pai khiatna-ah lungdam in.Issakhar aw,na puanbukte sungah lungdam in.
Amaute in a mual uhahmite sam ding uh a,amaute in tua lai-ahbiakpiakna mante pia ding uh hi.Bang hang hiam cih lehamaute in tuipi tung lesehnel sungahna manpha kiseelte ngah uh hi,” a ci hi.
Gad minamte’ thu genin,“Gad a lianin a bawlpa inthupha ngah tahen!Gad in humpinelkai banginbuk khikhe a,amah in a baan le a luzang,a balkham hi.

Amah in lei hoih penna munama adingin teel hi.Bang hang hiam cih leha ukpa’ tanh kikoihcingsak hi.Mi makaite’ ngahte mahamah zong kingahsak a,amah in Israel-te tawhTopa’thupiakna leTopa’thuman khennate a sem hi,”a ci hi.
Dan minamte’ thu genin,“Dan pen Bashan panin a diang khiahumpinelkai no ahi hi,” a ci hi.
Naftali minamte thu genin,“O Naftali, maipha tawh nuam a sa,Topa’thupha tawh a kidim,Topa’bualtuite le leitaw lam a nei pa,”a ci hi.
Asher minamte thu genin,“Asher in tapa dangte sanginthupha ngah zaw tahen.A sanggamte’ pahtak hi henla,a gam sungah oliv thau kidim tahen.
Na khuapite,sik le sumngo tawh kidal dinga,na nuntak laiteng na thahatnatua bang hi ding hi,” a ci hi.
“Israel aw,nangmah huh dinginvantungah a tuanga liatna tawh vanpi-ah a om,Pasian tawh a kibangkuamah dang om lo hi.
Tawntung Pasian pennangma omna hi a,nangmah huh dingintawntung khutte a om hi.Amah in na mai-ahgalte nawtkhia-in, ‘Susia un,’ ci hi.

Tua ahih cianginIsrael mite lungmuangin om ding uh hi.Jakob suante bekan le leenggahzu gamah om hi.Hi taktak hi, a vantungte indaitui hong khiatsuk hi.Israel aw, mi nuamsa na hi hi.Nang hong kihuhna lum lena gualzawhna lum lena gualzawhna namsau ahiTopain nang banga a hotkhiat miTopakua om ahi hiam?
Na galte in hong mai-etin,na kiangah hong pai ding uh a,amaute na tuancil ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moab zanglei panin Jerikho gal Nebo Mual, Pisgah dawnah Moses paito hi. Tua cianginTopain gam khempeuh, Gilead gam pan Dan ciang dong,Topa
Naftali gam khempeuh, Efraim le Manasseh gam, Judah gam khempeuh Nitumna Tuipi dong,
Negeb gam le nisuh kung khuapi kuam a kici Jerikho panin Zoar ciang dong a kikhung zanglei a lak hi.

Tua cianginTopain ama kiangah, “Hih gam, Abraham, Isaac le Jakob tungah kiciamin, ‘Na suanlekhakte uh tungah ka pia ding hi,’ ka cih leitang ahi hi. Na mit tawh nang kong musak khin a, ahih hangin tua lai-ah nang na pai kei ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih cianginTopa’thugenna banginTopa’nasem Moses pen Moab gamah si a,Topa’Topa’
Bethpeor galkhat, Moab gam kuamah amah kiphum hi. Ahih hangin tuhun dongin a kiphumna mun kuamah in thei lo hi.
Moses a sihin kum za le kum sawmnih pha hi. A mit maang lo a, a tha ngeina zong kiam lo hi.
Moab zanglei-ah Israel mite ni sawmthum sung Moses hangin a kah khit uh ciangin Moses hangin kahna le thumna a veng ta hi.

Tua ciangin Moses in, ama tungah a khut nga khin ahih manin Nun tapa Joshua lungsim pilna tawh a kidim hi. Tua ahih ciangin Israel mite in ama thu mangin,Topain Moses a thupiaksa bangin a gamta uh hi.Topa
Israel mite sungah Moses banginTopain maitang kimu-in a theih kamsang dang kuamah om lo hi.Topa
Egypt gam sungah Faro le a nasemte le a gam khempeuh ah a hih dinginTopain ama tungah a piak limte le na lamdangte khempeuh a nei kuamah dang om lo hi.Topa
Israel-te khempeuh muhna-ah Moses in a hih a lian vangliatna le a lauhuaite khempeuh a hih thei, amah tawh a kibang kuamah dang om lo hi.
Topa’nasem Moses a sih khit cianginTopain Moses’ nasem, Nun tapa Joshua kiangah,Topa’Topa
“Ka nasem pa Moses si ta ahih ciangin tu-in ding inla, nang le hih mite khempeuh, hih Jordan kantanin Israel mite tungah ka piak gam sungah pai un.
Moses tungah ka ciamsa bangin na khe in a sikna mun khempeuh nang tungah kong pia hi.
Sehnel gam le hih Lebanon panin gun lianpi Eufratis gun dong, ni a tumna lama Tuipi Lian lam, Hit mite’ leitang khempeuh nangma gam hi ding hi.
Na nuntak sung tawntung kuamah in na mai hong khak zo lo ding hi. Moses tawh ka om mah bangin nang tawh zong kong om ding hi. Nang kong tamasak kei dinga, kong nusia kei ding hi.
Thahat inla, hang in; bang hang hiam cih leh amaute piak dingin a pu a pate uh tungah ka ciam leitang hih mite na luahsak ding hi.

Thahat-in hang inla, ka nasem Moses in nang hong piak thukhamte khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat ding limtakin ngaihsun in. Na paina peuhah hoihtakin na lamzan theih nadingin tuate khat zong pelh kei in.

Hih thukham laibu na mangngilh ngei kei ding hi. A sunga kigelh thute khempeuh tawh kizui-in na gamtat theih nadingin sunlezanin na lung ngaingai ding hi. Tua hileh na maa vang dinga, na nasep tangtung ding hi.
Thu hong pia khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Thahat inla hang in. Lau kei inla lungkia kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh na paina peuhpeuhahTopana Pasian nang tawh hong om hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Joshua in mi makaite thu pia-in,

“Giahphual ah pai unla, mite thu pia-in, ‘Na lam-an ding uh kiging khol un; bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian un na neih dingun note hong piak leitangah pai-in a luah dingin ni thum sungin hih Jordan a galkah ding na hi uh hi,’ ci un,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Joshua in Reuben mite, Gad mite le Manasseh minam a langte tungah,
“‘Topana Pasian un note tawlngakna mun hong pia-in, hih leitang note hong pia ding hi,’ a cihnaTopa’nasem Moses in note tungah hong gen kammal phawk un.TopaTopa’

Moses in Jordan galkhat a note hong piak leitangah na zite uh, na taneute uh le na ganhingte uh a na om ding uh hi. Ahih hangin note lakah galhang mi khempeuh in hiam tawi-in Jordan kantanin na sanggamte uh mai-ah pai-in,

note hong piak banginTopain na sanggamte uh tungah tawlngakna pia-in,Topana Pasian un amaute a piak leitang amaute in zong a luah mateng uh na huh ding uh hi. Tua ciangin note’ neih leitangah ciahkikin,Topa’nasem Moses in Jordan gal ni a suahna lamah note hong piak leitang na luah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopaTopa’
Amaute in Joshua dawngin, “Kote nong thupiak khempeuh ka hih ding uh a, nong sawlna peuhpeuhah ka pai ding uh hi.
Na khempeuh ah Moses’ thu ka man uh mah bangin nangma thu zong kong mang ding uh hi. Moses a ompih mah banginTopana Pasian in nang hong ompih tahen!Topa
Na thupiakna le na thute, na thupiak peuhpeuh hong langpangin a mang lo mipa kithat ding hi. Thahat inla hang in,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Nun’ tapa Joshua in Shittim panin thukanin mi nih sawlsim a, “Pai-in gam va en unla, a diakdiakin Jerikho khua hong en un,” a ci hi. Amaute pai uh a, Rahab min nei numei paktat nu’ inn-ah tungin giak uh hi.
Jerikho kumpipa tungah, “Gam sung a en dingin Israel mi pawlkhat tu nitakin hih lai-ah hong tung zo hi,” ci-in kigen hi.

Tua ciangin Jerikho kumpipa in Rahab kiangah mi sawlin, “Na inn sunga hong tum, na kiang a hong tung mite hong pai khiatpih in; bang hang hiam cih leh gam khempeuh a en dingin amaute hong pai uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Rahab in tua mi nihte la-in na seel khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah in, “Hi mah hi, ka kiangah mi hong pai uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute koi pan hong pai uh hiam, cih ka thei kei hi.
Kulhkongpi a kikhak ding khuamial ciangin tua mite pai khia uh a, koi-ah pai uh hiam, cih ka thei kei hi. Manlangin amaute delh le-uhcin na pha kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in innkhum zangah tua mite paipih to-in innkhum zangah a koih ngei bangin a koihsa anthul kungte lakah amaute seel khin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mite in Jordan lamah ngahmun dong delh uh a, a delhte a pai khiat phetin kulhkongpi kikhak hi.
Amaute a lup ma-in innkhum zanga amaute kiangah Rahab paito-in
tua mite kiangah, “Topain note’ tungah hih leitang hong piak khitna ka thei a, note ka hong kihta mahmah uh hi. Hih gam sunga a teeng mi khempeuh note’ hangin lunggim uh hi.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt panin nong pai khiat lai-unTopain note’ mai-ah San Tuipi a kansakna le Jordan galkhat a om na suksiat mang uh Amor mite’ kumpi nihte ahi Sihon le Og tungah na bawlna uh ka za khin uh hi.Topa
Tua thu ka zak phetun ka lungsim uh bei a, note’ hangin mite’ lungsimah hanna bei hi; bang hang hiam cih lehTopana Pasian uh, tunga om vantung le nuai-a om leitungah Pasian ahi hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note tungah kong dik gamtat bangin note zong ko innkuan-ah nong dik gamtat nading uhTopa’min tawh kei tungah hong kiciam unla, a man taktak lim khat kei hong pia un.Topa’
Ka nu, ka pa, ka sanggamnute, ka sanggampate le amaute tawh a kizomte khempeuh hong hon unla, sihna panin kote hong suaktasak un,” a ci hi.

Mite in ama tungah, “Nang’ tangin kote ka si ngam uh hi. Hih ko’ thu na genkhiat kei nakleh,Topain kote tungah hih leitang hong piak ciangin nang tungah dikna le thumanna tawh kong gamta ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa
Tua ciangin amah in tawlet panin khau khat tawh amaute khaisuk hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh khuapikulh sung lampangah ama inn kilam a, khuapikulh sungah amah teeng hi.

Amah in amaute kiangah, “Mualtungah pai un. Hong delhte tawh na kituak kha ding uh hi. Hong delhte hong ciahkik mateng ni thum sung tua lai-ah bu un. Tua khit ciangin na pai nading uhah na pai thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Mite in ama kiangah, “Kote nong kiciamsak thuciamna thu tawh kisai-in ka paubaang kei ding uh hi.

En in, hih leitangah kong pai uh ciangin kote nong khaisukna hih tawlet-ah hih khauhual san na khih ding hi. Na inn sungah na nu le na pa, na sanggamte le na pa’ innkuanpihte khempeuh na khawm ding hi.

Mi khatpeuh na inn sung panin kongzing lampi-ah a pai khiat le ama sihna pen ama khialhna hang hi dinga, kote ka siang ding uh hi. Ahih hangin inn sungah nang tawh a om mi khatpeuh a kisukkhak leh, ama sihna pen kote’ khialhna hi ding hi.
Ahih hangin hih ko thute na genkhiat leh, kote nong kiciamsak thuciamna tawh kisai-in kote ka siang ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Na thugen bangun hi tahen,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in amaute sawl khia a, amaute pai khia uh hi. Amah in a khauhual san a tawlet-ah a khih hi.
Amaute pai khia-in mualtungah pai uh a, a delhte a ciahkik mateng ni thum sung om uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a delhte in lamdung khempeuh zongin bangmah mu lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin mual tung panin mi nihte paisukkik uh a, galkahin Nun’ tapa Joshua kiangah tungin amau’ tunga thupiang khempeuh a gen uh hi.
Amaute in Joshua kiangah, “Topain leitang khempeuh eite’ khut sungah hong pia taktak hi. Tua tham loin tua gam a teeng mi khempeuh eite’ hangin lungmang uh hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa
A zing ciangin Joshua tho baihin Israel mi khempeuh tawh Shittim pan ding khia-in Jordan gun tung uh a, a galkah ma-un tua munah a giak uh hi.
Ni thum a cin ciangin giahphual ah uliante pai-in
mite thu pia uh a, “Topana Pasian uh Thuciamna Singkuang Levi siampite in a puak na muh uh ciangin na omna panun ding khia-in na zui ding uh hi.Topa

Hih lamah pai ngei lo na hih manun na pai nading uh lampi tu-a bangin na thei ding uh hi. Ahi zongin note le tua Thuciamna Singkuang kikalah mun awng, pi tulthum bang om ding hi. A gei-ah pai kei un,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in mite kiangah, “Nomau mah kisiangsak tawm un; bang hang hiam cih leh zing ciangin note’ lakahTopain na lamdangte hong bawl ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Joshua in siampite kiangah, “Thuciamna Singkuang la unla, mite’ mai-ah paisuak un,” a ci hi. Amaute in Thuciamna Singkuang la-in mite’ mai-ah a pai uh hi.

Tua cianginTopain Joshua kiangah, “Moses tawh ka omkhop bangin nang tawh kong omkhop nading thu amaute in a theih nadingun Israel mite khempeuh muhna-ah tuni-in nang liatsak ding ka kipan ding hi.Topa
Thuciamna Singkuang a pua siampite thu na pia dinga, ‘Jordan tuite’ gei na tun uh ciangin Jordan tui sungah tang loin na ding ding uh hi,’ na ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in Israel mite kiangah, “Hih lai-ah hong pai unla,Topana Pasian uh thute za un,” a ci hi.Topa

Joshua in, “A nungta Pasian note lakah a omna hih thu tawh na thei ding uh hi. Amah in pel loin note’ mai panin Kanaan mite, Hit mite, Hiv mite, Perez mite, Girgash mite, Amor mite le Jebus mite hawl khia ding hi.
En un, leitung buppi’Topa’Thuciamna Singkuang note’ mai Jordan lamah pai ding hi.Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in Israel minamte sung panin nam khat pan mi khat, mi sawm le nih teel un.

Leitung buppi’TopaahiTopa’Thuciamna Singkuang a pua siampite’ khete in Jordan tui a sik ciangin Jordan tuite luang nawn lo dinga, a tunglam panin hong luangsuk tuite lomkhatin khawl ding hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa’
Tua ahih ciangin mite’ mai-ah Thuciamna Singkuang a pua siampite tawh Jordan galkah dingin a puanbuk uh panin mite ding khia-in,
Thuciamna Singkuang a puate Jordan tunga, Thuciamna Singkuang a pua siampite’ khe tui-ah a kidiah ciangin (anlak hun sung khempeuh Jordan a piau khempeuh ah let hi),

a saklam panin hong luangsuk tuite khawlin khangto a, a gamlapi, Zarethan gei-a khuapi Adamah-ah a lomin kikhol a, Ci Tuipi a kici Arabah tuipi-ah a luangsukte kikhentat siang hi. Tua ciangin Jerikho gei-ah mite galkah uh hi.
Israel-te khempeuh lei keu tungah a galkah sung, minam bup in Jordan a khen khit mateng,Topa’Thuciamna Singkuang a pua siampite Jordan gun laizang lei keu tungah ding uh hi.Topa’
A minam bupin Jordan a galkah khit uh cianginTopain Joshua kiangah,Topa
“Nam khat pan mi khat, mite lak panin mi sawm le nih teel inla,
amaute thu pia-in, ‘Siampite’ khe a dinna mun mahmah, Jordan gun laizang panin suangtum sawm le nih la unla, a galah pua-in tu nitakin na giahna uh munah koih un,’ ci in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joshua in nam khat panin mi khat, ama sehsa mi sawm le nihte Israel mite lak panin a sam hi.
Joshua in amaute kiangah, “Topana Pasian uh Thuciamna Singkuang mai Jordan laizangah pai unla, note in Israel minam phazah tawh kizui-in suangtum khat ciat la-in na liangko tung uhah pua un.Topa
Hong tung ding hunah na tate un, ‘Hih suangtumte bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?’ ci-in hong dot ciangin note’ lakah lim khat hi ding hi.

Tua ciangin amaute kiangah, ‘Topa’Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah Jordan tuite kikhentan a, Jordan a galkah laitakun Jordan tuite kikhentan hi,’ na ci ding uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin hih suangtumte pen Israel mite tungah a tawntungin phawkna hi ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’

Joshua’ thupiak bangin Israel mite gamta uh a,Topain Joshua a thupiak bangin Israel minam a phazah tawh kizui-in Jordan laizang panin suangtum sawm le nih a la uh hi. Amaute in a giahna uh munah tuate pua-in a koih uh hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Joshua in Thuciamna Singkuang a pua siampite’ khe a dinnasa mun, Jordan laizangah zong suang sawm le nih mah a phut hi. Tuni dongin tua suangte tua mun mahah omlai hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh Moses in Joshua a thupiak bangin mite tungah a gen dinginTopain Joshua a thupiak khempeuh a vekpi-in a kiman khit matengin Jordan laizangah Thuciamna Singkuang a pua siampite a ding uh hi.TopaMite nawhsa-in galkah uh hi.
Mite khempeuh a galkah khit uh cianginTopa’Thuciamna Singkuang le siampite, mite’ mai-ah na ma pai uh hi.Topa’
Moses in amaute a sawlsa bangin Israel mite mai-ah hiam tawi-in Reuben minamte, Gad minamte le Manasseh minam alangte na ma pai uh a,
mi tul sawmli bang galdo dingin hiam tawi-in a baihsa-in Jerikho zanglei lamTopa’mai-ah a pai uh hi.Topa’
Tua ni-in Israel-te khempeuh’ muhna-ahTopain Joshua liansak hi. Amaute in Moses lamdangsa-in a om uh mah bangin Joshua a nuntak sung tawntung lamdangsa-in a om uh hi.Topa
Tua cianginTopain Joshua kiangah,Topa
“Thuciamna Singkuang a pua siampite Jordan panin hong pai khiat nading thu pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joshua in siampite thu pia a, “Jordan panin hong pai khia un,” a ci hi.

Topa’Thuciamna Singkuang a pua siampite Jordan laizang panin hong pai khia-in, siampite’ khe lei keu tungah hong omtoh ciangin, a ngeina bangin amau’ munah Jordan tuite hong luangkikin a piau khempeuh a tuum hi.Topa’
Kha masa a ni sawm ni-in Jordan panin mite pai khia uh a, Jerikho nisuahna lam gamgi Gilgal-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Jordan panin a lakkhiat uh tua suangtum sawm le nihte Joshua in Gilgal-ah a phut hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Israel mite kiangah, “Hong tung ding hunah na tate un, ‘Hih suangte bang a cihnopna ahi hiam?’ ci-in hong dot uh ciangin,
‘Israel-te in lei keu tungtawnin hih Jordan kantan hi,’ ci-in na tate uh na theisak ding uh hi.

Bang hang hiam cih leh eite in i kantan khit matenginTopana Pasian un a kansak San Tuipi tungah a bawl bangin, note in na kantan khit matengunTopana Pasian un Jordan tuite note adingin kangsak hi.TopaTopa
