Tua hunin Filistia-te in Israel-te a sim dingin a galkapte khawm uh hi. Akhish in David kiangah, “Nang le na mite, kei tawh galkapte lakah a kuankhawm ding na hihlam thei in,” a ci hi.

David in Akhish kiangah, “Hoih mahmah hi; na nasem pa in bang hih thei hiam, cih na thei ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Akhish in David kiangah, “Hoih mahmah hi; khan tawntungin keimah a hong cing dingin nang kong koih ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Samuel si khin a, Israel-te khempeuh ama hangin kapin, ama khuapi Ramah-ah vui uh hi. Saul in vankahte le aisante a gam sung panin beisak hi.
Filistia-te kikhawm uh a, hong pai-in Shunem-ah giahphual sat uh hi. Saul in Israel-te khempeuh khawm a, amaute in Gilboa-ah giahphual sat uh hi.
Saul in Filistia galkapte a muh ciangin lau a, a lungsim nakpi takin liing hi.
Saul inTopatungah thu a dot ciangin,Topain mang tawh hitaleh, Urim tawh hitaleh, kamsangte tawh hitaleh dawng lo hi.TopaTopa

Tua ciangin Saul in a nasemte kiangah, “Ama kiangah pai-in ama tung pan thu ka dot theih nadingin vankahthei numei khat kei adingin hong zonsak un,” a ci hi. A nasemte in ama kiangah, “En in, Endor-ah vankahthei khat om hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Saul in a mel seelin puan dang silh a, amah le mi nih pai hi. Amaute zanin tua numei kiangah va pai uh hi. Amah in, “Kei adingin a sisate’ kha kiang pan thu hong dotsak inla, nang kiang a a min kong gen peuhpeuh kei adingin hong saptohsak in,” a ci hi.

Numei in ama kiangah, “Saul’ hihsa thu, gam sung panin vankahte le aisante a suksiatna na thei taktak hi. Tua ahih ciangin bang hangin keima sih nading a piangsak dingin kei adingin thangzak hong koih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin ama tungahTopa’min tawh Saul kiciam a, “Topaa nungta ahih mah bangin hih thu hangin nang tungah gimna hong tung het lo ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa’Topa
Tua ciangin numei in, “Kua hong sapsak ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Samuel hong sapsak in,” a ci hi.
Numei in Samuel a muh ciangin a gingin kikokhia hi. Numei in Saul kiangah, “Bang hangin kei hong khem na hi hiam? Nang, Saul na hi hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Lau kei in; kua mu na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Numei in Saul kiangah, “Leisung panin pasian khat hong pai khiato ka mu hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in tua nu kiangah, “Ama mel bangci ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua nu in, “Puteek khat hong paito a, amah in puantualpi silh hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Saul in tua pen Samuel hi, ci-in thei a, lei-ah a maikunin zahtakna a bawl hi.

Tua ciangin Samuel in Saul kiangah, “Bang hangin keimah saptohna tawh hong nawngkaisak na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Saul in dawngin, “Nakpi takin ka lungkham hi; Filistia-te in kei hong sim a, kei kiang panin Pasian kiheikhia-in kamsangte tawh ahi a, mang tawh ahi zongin hong dawng nawn lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin ka gamtat nading zia a hong gen dingin nang kong sam hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Samuel in, “Topa,nang kiang panin kiheikhia-in na gal suak khin ahih ciangin bang hangin kei thu hong dong lai na hi hiam?Topa,
Topain kei’ tungtawnin hong gensa bangin nang tungah hong hih hi.Topain na khut sung panin kumpi gam bal khia-in na veengpa David’ tungah pia khin hi.TopaTopa
Nangmah inTopa’thu ngai loin, Amalek tungah ama heh mahmahna tawh kizui-in hih lo na hih maninTopain nang tungah tuni-in hihte hong tungsak hi.Topa’Topa

Tua tham loinTopain Israel mite zong nang tawh Filistia-te’ khut sungah hong piakhawm ding hi. Zing ciangin nang le na tapate in zong kei kiang nong zuan ding uh hi.Topain Israel galkapte zong Filistia-te’ khut sungah pia ding hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa
Tua ciangin Samuel’ thugente hangin lau lua-in leilakah Saul tawnpuk pah hi. Amah in sun tawntung le zan tawntung bangmah ne lo ahih manin a tha nem mahmah hi.

Tua ciangin Saul kiangah a numei hong pai-in amah a lau mahmahna a muh ciangin tua nu in Saul kiangah, “En in, na nasem nu in na thu hong ngai zo hi. Ka luang khamin, kei tungah nong gen bangin ka gamta zo hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nang zong na nasem nu’ thu hong ngai in; na mai-ah anlum tawmkhat hong luisak in; na paina dingah na pai ciangin na thahat nadingin ne in,” a ci hi.

Amah in nial a, “Ka ne kei ding hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin tua numei tawh kopin a nasemte in ci teitei uh ahih manin amau’ cih bangin a mang hi. Tua ahih ciangin leilak panin amah tho-in lupna tungah a tu hi.
Tu-in tua numei in a inn-ah bawngno thau khat nei a, amah in manlang takin go-in, tua ciangin annel la a, a annel meekin silngo sawh loh anlum em a,
Saul le a nasemte’ mai-ah lui a, amaute in a ne uh hi. Tua ciangin amaute dingin tua zanin a pai khia uh hi.
Tu-in Filistia-te in a galkap khempeuh uh Afek-ah khawm uh a, Jezreel gam sunga om tuikhuk gei-ah Israel-te in giahphual sat uh hi.
Filistia uliante a zaza, a tultulin a pai laitakin David le a mite zong Akhish tawh a nungah pai uh hi.

Filistia galkap a ukte in, “Hih Hebru mite in hih lai-ah bang hong hih uh ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi. Akhish in Filistia galkap a ukte kiangah, “Ni tampi, kum tampi kei tawh a omkhin, Israel kumpi Saul’ nasem pa David hi a, kei kiangah hong tai a kipanin tuni dongin ama tungah mawhna ka mu kei hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin Filistia galkap a ukte ama tungah heh uh hi. Filistia galkap a ukte in ama kiangah, “Amah na koihna munah a ciahkik theih nadingin hih mipa sawlkik in. Gal kidona sungah eite’ lang hong suak kha ding ahih manin galdona sungah eite tawh amah hong kuansuk lo ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih mipa in a topa tawh kilemna bangci bawl ding ahi hiam? Hih lai-a om mite’ lutang tawh bawl ding hi lo ahi hiam?
Amaute khatlekhat in la-in sa-in laam uh a,‘Saul in a tulin that,David in a tul sawmin that,’a cih pa uh hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin Akhish in David samin ama kiangah, “Topaa nungta ahih mah bangin, nang na thuman a, hih vai-ah kei tawh hong kuan khia-in na ciah ding man ka sa hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kei kiangah nong pai a kipan tuni dong nang tungah khialhna bangmah ka mu kei hi. Ahih hangin uliante in nang hong thukim lo uh hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ciahkik in. Filistia uliante na lungkim lohsak khak loh nadingin lungkim takin ciah in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in Akhish kiangah, “Ahih hangin, keimah in bang hih ka hi hiam? Ka to kumpipa’ galte do-in ka pai theih loh nadingin nangma nasepna-ah kong tum ni a kipan tuhun dong na nasem pa’ tungah bang mu na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Akhish in David dawngin, “Nang pen keima muhna-ah Pasian’ vantungmi khat mah bangin paubaang lo na hihna ka thei hi; ahi zongin Filistia galkap a ukte in, ‘Amah pen eite tawh galphualah hong kuanto lo ding hi,’ ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nang tawh a hong pai na topa’ nasemte tawh zingsangin tho baih un. Zingsangin kipan baih unla, khua a vak phetin kihem khia un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Filistia gamah a ciahkik dingin David a mite tawh zingsang tungin ding khia uh a, Filistia-te ahihleh Jezreel khua-ah paito uh hi.
David le a mite a ni thum ni-in Ziklag hong tun uh ciangin, Amalek-te in Negeb le Ziklag na sim khin uh hi. Amaute in Ziklag zo-in mei tawh na hal uh a,
numei khempeuh le tua khua sunga om teng a neu a lianin man uh hi. Amaute in khat zong that lo uh a, ahih hangin amaute khempeuh pai khiatpih uh hi.
David le a mite khuapi a tun uh ciangin a khuapi uh mei tawh na kihalin, a zite uh, a tanute uh le a tapate uh salin a kimat khitna thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin David le amah tawh a om mite in a aw uh gingsakin a tha bei dongun kap uh hi.
David’ zi nihte, Jezreel khuami Ahinoam le Karmel khuami Nabal’ zi meigongnu Abigail zong salin kiman hi.

David nakpitakin lungkham hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh mi khempeuh a tanu a tapate uh hangin lungsim sia uh ahih manin amaute in suang tawh amah den ding gen uh hi. Ahih hanginTopaa Pasian in David thakhauhsak hi.Topa
Tua ciangin David in Ahimelek tapa Abiathar kiangah, “Siampipuan hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Abiathar in David kiangah siampi puan a paipih hi.

Tua ciangin David inTopathu dong a, “Hih mihonte ka delh ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Delh in; bang hang hiam cih leh na pha taktak dinga, na mite na hon khia zo taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin David le amah tawh a om mihing za gukte kuan khia uh a, Besor lui-ah tungin, tua lai-ah mi pawlkhat kinusia uh hi.
Ahih hangin David le mi za lite a delhin paisuak uh a, Besor lui a galkah dingin a gimlua mi zanih kinusia uh hi.
Amaute in Egypt mi khat gamlakah mu uh a, David kiangah amah paipih uh hi. Amaute in an pia uh a, amah in ne hi. Amaute in tui dawn ding zong a pia uh hi.

Theimoh khat le leenggahkeu bawk nih zong a pia uh hi. Amah in tuate a nek khit ciangin a tha hong dimkik hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh an ahi a, tui ahi zongin sun thum le zan thum ne lo dawn loin om hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Nang kuate na hi hiam? Koi pan na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Kei pen Amalek-te khat’ nasem, Egypt mi tangval khat ka hi hi. Tuma ni thum lai-in ka ci na ahih manin ka topa in hong nusia hi.
Kote in Khereth mite’ Negeb gam le Judah-te’ gam sung le Kaleb mite’ Negeb gam ka sim uh a, mei tawh Ziklag ka hal uh hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Hih mite kiangah nong paipih suk nuam ding hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Nangmah in kei nong thah lohna ding ahi a, ka topa’ khut sungah nong apkik loh nading ahi zongin Pasian’ min tawh kei tungah hong kiciam peuh lecin hih mihonte kiangah nang kong paipihsuk ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in David paipih suk hi. Filistia-te’ gam le Judah gam panin a lak uh na tampite hangin amaute gam sung khempeuh ah kithehthangin an ne, tuidawn, laamin na om uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in a zing ciang phalvak a kipan nitak dong amaute vat gawp a, kalaoh tung tuangin a tai tangval za lite sim loh amaute khat zong suakta lo uh hi.
David in Amalek-te’ laksa khempeuh ngahkik a, a zi nihte hon khia hi.
A neu a lian, tanute tapate nate ahi a, a kila khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin a kisam khat zong om lo a, David in a vekpi-in ciahpihkik hi.
David in tuuhonte le bawnghonte khempeuh zong man hi. Mite in tua ganhingte ama mai-ah hawl uh a, “David’ na lakte ahi hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin, David a zui dingin a gimlua, Besor lui-ah a kinusia mihing za nihte kiangah David tung hi. David le amah tawh a om mite a dawn dingin amaute hong kuan khia uh a, a nai a tun ciangin David in amaute hopih hi.

Tua ciangin David tawh a pai mite lak panin a gilo le mi ginalote khempeuh in, “Amaute pen eite tawh hong paisuak lo uh ahih manin, amaute in a zite le a tate uh la-in a pai khiatpih uh cih sim loh, eite’ ngahkik nate khat zong amaute i pia kei ding hi,” a ci uh hi.
Ahih hangin David in, “Ka sanggamte aw,Topain eite hong piaksa nate tua bangin na hih kei ding uh hi. Amah in eite hong kemin eite a do dinga hong pai mihonte i khut sungah hong pia khin hi.Topa
Hih thu-ah kua in no’ thu hong ngai ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh gal sungah a kuan mipa’ tanh zah mah, van a ngak mipa in tang dinga, amaute in a kibangin ngah ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ni a kipanin tuni dongin amah in Israel-te adingin thukham le biakna ngeina kipin a bawl hi.
Ziklag a tun ciangin David in Judah upa a lawmte kiangah a na lakte pawlkhat khakin, “Topa’galte’ na a kilate sung panin hih lai-ah note ading letsong a om hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Tua nate pen Bethel, Negeb gam sunga om Ramoth le Jattir,
Aroer, Sifmoth, Eshtemoa,
Karmel, Jerahmeel khuapite, Ken khuapite,
Hormah, Borashan, Athak,
Hebron sunga omte, David le a mite a pai ngeina mun khempeuhte ading ahi hi.
Filistia-te in Israel-te sim uh hi. Filistia-te’ mai-ah Israel-te tai uh a, Gilboa Mual tungah thahin tuk uh hi.
Filistia-te in Saul le a tapate pha uh hi. Filistia-te in Saul’ tapate Jonathan, Abinadab le Malkhishua a that uh hi.
Gal in nakpitakin Saul neh a, gal thaltawite in nakpitakin amah liamsak hi.

Tua ciangin Saul in a galhiam puapa kiangah, “Hih dawibia mite hong pai-in kei hong dawtletin hong mawlpih kha ding uh ahih manin na namsau dok inla, tua tawh hong dawtlet in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a galhiam puapa in hih ngam lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah lau mahmah hi. Tua ahih ciangin Saul in ama namsau la-in tua tungah puk hi.
A galhiam puapa in Saul a sihna a muh ciangin amah zong a namsau tungah kipuksuk sakin amah tawh a sikhawm hi.
Tua bangin Saul, a tapa thumte, a galhiam puapa le a mi khempeuh, a ni kikhatin a sikhawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jezreel kuam galkhat le Jordan galkhat a om Israel mite in Israel mite tai-in Saul le a tapate a sih khitna thu a zak uh ciangin amaute in a khuapite uh nusia-in tai uh ahih ciangin Filistia-te hong pai-in tuate sungah a teeng uh hi.
A zing ciangin a kithat mite’ na a la dingin Filistia-te hong pai ciangin Saul le a tapa thumte Gilboa Mual tungah a si mu uh hi.
Amaute in Saul’ lu tankhia-in a galhiam hawk khia uh a, a milimte uh le mite kiangah hih thuhoih a puak dingin Filistia gam sung khempeuh ah kamtaite a sawl uh hi.
Amaute in Ashtaroth biakinn sungah ama galhiam koih uh a, Bethshan khuakulhah ama luang a suang uh hi.
Ahih hangin Jabeshgilead ah a teeng mite in Saul’ tungah Filistia-te’ hihna a zak uh ciangin,
a hang mi khempeuh dingin zan tawntung pai uh a, Bethshan kulh tung panin Saul’ luang le a tapate’ luangte va la uh hi. Amaute in Jabesh-ah tunpihin tua lai-ah a hal uh hi.
Amaute in a guhte la-in Jabesh khua sung makeng kung nuai-ah vui uh a, ni sagih sung an a tang uh hi.
Saul a sih khit, Amalek-te a thahna panin David a ciahkik ciangin Ziklag-ah David ni nih om hi.
A ni thum ni-in, a puan kikekin a lu tungah lei omin Saul’ giahphual panin mi khat hong pai hi. David kiangah amah hong tun ciangin leilakah pukin zahtakna a bawl hi.
David in ama kiangah, “Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in David kiangah, “Israel giahphual panin kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.

David in ama kiangah, “Bangci bang ahi hiam? Hong gen in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Giahphual panin mite tai a, mi tampi zong pukin si uh hi. Saul le a tapa Jonathan zong a si hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah a gen tangvalpa kiangah, “Saul le a tapa Jonathan a sihna bangci theih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tangvalpa in, “Gilboa Mual-ah ka omkha a, tua lai munah Saul a teipi tungah kingam hi.
Saul in a nunglam hong et ciangin kei hong mu-in hong sam hi. Keimah in ka dawng a, ‘Hih lai-ah om ing,’ ka ci hi.
Saul in kei kiangah, ‘Kua na hi hiam?’ hong ci hi. Keimah in Saul ka dawng a, ‘Kei, Amalek mi ka hi hi,’ ka ci hi.
Saul in kei kiangah, ‘Ka pangah ding inla kei hong that in; bang hang hiam cih leh gimna ka thuak a, ahi zongin ka naang lai hi,’ hong ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin ama pangah dingin amah ka that hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah a tuk khit ciangin nungta zo lo taktak ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Tua ciangin a lu tungah a om kumpi lukhu le a ban tungah a om a banbulh kong la a, tuate hih lai ka topa kiangah kong paipih hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in ama puante lenin balkek a, amah tawh a om mite khempeuh in zong tua bangmahin a hih uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul, a tapa Jonathan leTopa’mi Israel-te hangin amaute thumin kap uh a, nitak dong an a tang uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gal sungah amaute si uh hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah thu a puak tangvalpa kiangah, “Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Kei pen Amalek mi peemta khat’ tapa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
David in ama kiangah, “Topa’sathau nilh pa a that dingin na khut na liik khiat ding na lau loh a bangci thu ahi hiam?” a ci hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin David in tangvalte khat samin, “Pai in; amah thatlum in,” a ci hi. Amah in tua thupuak pa sat a, amah a si hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Nangma mawhna nangma lu tungah tung tahen; bang hang hiam cih leh nangma kampau in nang’ langkhat ah teci pangin, ‘Topa’sathau nilh pa ka that khin hi,’ na ci hi,” a ci hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin Saul le a tapa Jonathan’ hangin kah la phuakin David kap a,
amah in Judah mite tungah hih kah la a kihilh nading thu a pia hi. Tua la penJashar Laibusungah kigelh hi. Amah in:Jashar Laibu
“Israel aw, na minthanna,na mual sangte tungah kithat!A vanglianpa bangci-in tuk!
Gath khua sungah gen kei in.Ashkelon kongzingah genthang kei in.Filistia numeite lungdam kha ding,dawibia numeite nuamin diang kha ding.
“No Gilboa mualte aw, daitui ahi a,guahtui ahi zongin,na tung uhah omsak kei un.Tui thukpi kilok zong omsak kei un!Bang hang hiam cih leha vanglianpa’ lum nin a,Saul’ lum, sathau kinuh lo hi.
“Jonathan’ thaltang gupha a,Saul’ namsau zong kihtakhuai hi.Jonathan’ thaltang guakkik lo a,Saul’ namsau zong hong guakkik lo hi.
“Saul le Jonathan, ki-it uh a,it-huai uh!A sih a hinin amaute kikhen lo a,muvanlai sangin zaptel zaw uh a,humpinelkai sangin thahat zaw uh hi.
“No Israel numeite aw,Saul’ hangin kap un.Puansan neel a silh,na puan tung uhahkizepna kham a suangte aw,ama hangin kap un.
“A vanglianpa bangci-in tukgalphual sungah!Jonathan aw, na mual sangte tungahnang hong kithat hi.
Nangma hangin ka lungkham hi,ka sanggam Jonathan;kei nong itna lamdang a,numei’ itna sangin lian zaw hi.
“A vanglianpa bangci-in tuk,galhiamte bangci-in sia!” a ci hi.

Hih hun khit ciangin David inTopathu dong a, “Judah khuapi khat peuhpeuhah ka paito ding hiam?” a ci hi.Topain ama kiangah, “Paito in,” a ci hi. David in, “Koi pen ah paito ding ka hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Hebron-ah,” a ci hi.TopaTopa
Tua ahih ciangin tua lai-ah David paito a, ama zi nihte, Jezreel khua mi Ahinoam le Karmel khua mi Nabal’ zi meigongnu Abigail zong a pai uh hi.
David in amah tawh a om a mite, mi khempeuh a innkuanpih ciat tawh paipihto a, Hebron khua-ah amaute a teeng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah mite hong pai-in amaute in tua lai munah Judah kumpi dingin David sathau a nilh uh hi.Amaute in David kiangah, “Saul a vuite pen Jabeshgilead mite hi,” ci-in a gen uh ciangin
Jabeshgilead mite kiangah David in kamtaite sawlin amaute kiangah, “Note in na topa uh Saul tungah thumanna lakin amah vui na hih manunTopain note thupha hong pia tahen!Topa
Tu-inTopain itna kip le thumanna note tungah hong lak tahen! Note hih bangin gamta na hih manun note tungah thuhoih kong bawl ding hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in note kithakhauhsakin hang un; bang hang hiam cih leh na topa uh Saul si a, Judah mite in amau’ tungah kumpi-in kei sathau hong nilh khin uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tu-in Ner’ tapa Abner, Saul’ galkap mangpa in Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth la-in Mahanaim ah paipih hi.
Amah in Gilead, Ashur, Jezreel, Efraim, Benjamin le Israel khempeuh tungah kumpi-in amah bawl hi.
Israel-te tungah uk dingin a kipatin Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth kum sawmli pha a, amah in kum nih sung uk hi. Ahih hangin Judah minamte in David’ nung zui uh hi.
Judah minamte tungah kumpi-in Hebron-ah David kum sagih le kha guk sung a om hi.
Ner’ tapa Abner le Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth’ nasemte Mahanaim panin Gibeon-ah pai khia uh hi.
Zeruiah’ tapa Joab le David’ nasemte pai khia-in Gibeon bual-ah amaute dawntuah uh hi. Amaute bual langkhat ah, adang khatte a bual langkhat ah tu uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abner in Joab kiangah, “Tangvalte ding sakin eite’ mai-ah kimawlsak ni,” a ci hi. Joab in, “Amaute dingsak in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute dingin galkah uh a, Benjamin le Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth adingin sawm le nih le David’ nasemte zong sawm le nih mah ahi hi.
Tua ciangin alang ciat uh lutang lenin, a namsau tawh a lang pa dawt ciat uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin amaute tukkhawm uh hi. Tua ahih manin Gibeon-ah a om tua mun pen Helkathhazzurim kici hi.
Tua ni-in galkidona nasia mahmah a, Abner le Israel mite David’ nasemte in zo uh hi.
Zeruiah’ tapa thumte, Joab, Abishai le Asahel, tua lai-ah om uh hi. Asahel pen Syria sakhi lee bangin a khe manlang hi.
Asahel in Abner delh a, amah a delh laitakin Abner a zuihna-ah pial hetloin delh paisuak hi.
Tua ciangin Abner in a nung enin, “Asahel aw, nang na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Keimah ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
Abner in ama kiangah, “Na taklamah ahi a, na veilamah ahi zongin kihei inla, tangvalte khatpeuh manin a na sut in,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin amah a zuihna panin Asahel pial lo hi.

Tua ciangin Abner in Asahel kiangah, “Keimah zuihna panin pial in; bang hangin nang lei-ah hong vat gawp ding ka hi hiam? Nang hong vat gawp leng na sanggampa Joab’ mai-ah ka maitang bangci lak ding ka hi hiam?” a cikik hi.

Ahih hangin amah lampial nuam lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin Abner in a teipi tong lamin a gil khawh a, a nungah a teipi lengsuak hi. Tua ciangin amah tukin tua phualah a si hi. Asahel tukin a sihna munah a pai mi khempeuh tang loin a ding uh hi.
Ahih hangin Joab le Abishai in Abner delh ding kipan uh hi. Ni a tum laitakin Gibeon gamlak paina lampi-a om Giah mai-ah a kikhung Ammah mual a tung uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abner a pawlpih Benjamin-te kikaikhawm uh a, amaute pawlkhat suakin mual dawn khatah a pang uh hi.

Tua ciangin Abner in Joab samin, “Mi hih bangin kithat lai ding ahi hiam? A tawpna-ah a haksat zawk nading thei lo na hi hiam? A sanggamte uh a delhna panin na mite a kihei nadingin na thupiak ding bangtan sawt lai ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in, “Pasian a nungta ahih mah bangin, hong pau lo hi lecin, a sanggamte uh a delhna panin zingsang mateng mite khawl lo taktak ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joab in peengkul tum hi. Mi khempeuh khawl a, Israel-te delh nawn loin amaute in do nawn lo uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abner le a mite Arabah kantanin tua zan tawntung pai uh hi. Amaute in Jordan kantan uh a, sun ma sungteng pai-in Mahanaim tung uh hi.
Abner a delhna panin Joab ciahkik hi. Amah in mi khempeuh a kaihkhop khit ciangin Asahel sim lohin David’ nasemte mi sawmkua le kua kisam hi.
Ahih hangin David’ nasemte in Abner a’ ahi Benjamin-te mihing zathum le sawmguk that uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Asahel la-in Bethlehem-ah a om ama pa’ hanah a vui uh hi. Tua ciangin Joab le a mite zan tawntung pai uh a, Hebron-ah khua a vak hi.
Saul’ innkuan le David’ innkuante’ kikalah sauveipi galkidona om hi. David thahat semsem a, Saul thaneem semsem hi.
Hebron-ah David’ tapate suak hi: A tacil pen Jezreel khuami Ahinoam tawh a neih Ammon ahi hi.
A ta nihna pen Karmel khua mi Nabal’ zi meigongnu Abigail tawh a neih Khileab ahi hi. A thumna pen Geshur kumpipa Talmai’ tanu Maakah’ tapa Absalom ahi hi.
A lina pen Haggith’ tapa Adonijah ahi hi. A ngana pen Abital’ tapa Shefatiah ahi hi.
A gukna pen David’ zi Eglah ta Ithream ahi hi. Hihte pen Hebron khua-ah David’ sung pan a suak ahi hi.
Saul innkuan le David innkuante a kisim sungin Saul’ innkuan sungah Abner hong thahat semsem hi.
Tu-in Saul in Aiah’ tanu Rizpah min nei zineu khat nei hi. Ishbosheth in Abner’ kiangah, “Bang hangin ka pa’ zineu luppih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Ishbosheth’ thugennate hangin Abner heh mahmah a, “Kei pen Judah mite adingin ui bang lel ka hi hiam? Keimah in na pa Saul’ innkuante, a sanggam pasalte le a lawmte tungah tuni dongin thumanna ka lak lai a, David’ khut sungah note kong pia nai kei hi. Ahi zongin tuni-in nang in numei khat lel tawh kisai-in kei nong mawhsak hi.

Saul’ innkuan panin kumpi gam khinin, Dan panin Beersheba dong Israel le Judah-te tungah David’ kumpi tokhom phuh dingTopain ama tungah a ciamsa thu David adingin ka tunsak kei taak leh Pasian in keimah Abner hong dawm kei tahen,” a ci hi.Topa
Ishbosheth in kam khatin zong Abner dawng ngam lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Abner kihta hi.

Tua ciangin Abner in Hebron-a David kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Hih gam kua in uk ding ahi hiam? Kei tawh thuciamna hong bawl in. Israel-te khempeuh nang kiangah a paipih dingin keimah kong pang ding hi,” a ci hi.

Amah in, “Pha hi; nang tawh thuciamna khat ka bawl ding hi. Ahih hangin nang’ tung panin na khat ka kisam hi. Tua pen, kei tawh a kimu dingin nong pai ciangin Saul’ tanu Mikhal nong paipih masak kei leh ka mai na mu kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Filistia-te’ vundawn za khatin ka leisa ka zi Mikhal hong pia in,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ishbosheth in mi sawlin ama pasal, Laish tapa Paltiel kiang panin amah a la hi.
Ahih hangin a pasal in amah zui-in, Bahurim paina lam tawntung ama nungah a kap hi. Tua ciangin Abner in ama kiangah, “Pai in; ciahkik in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah ciahkik hi.
Tua ciangin Abner in Israel upate tawh thu kikumin, “A beisa tawlkhat sungteng note tungah kumpi dingin David na zong uh hi.

Tu-in taksuaksak un. Bang hang hiam cih lehTopain David tungah kam ciamin, ‘Ka nasem pa David’ khut tawh Filistia-te’ khut sung pan le amau’ galte khempeuh’ khut sung panin ka mi Israel-te ka hon khia ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Abner in Benjamin-te tungah zong thu gen hi. Tua ciangin Israel-te le Benjamin-te khempeuh in tua bangin hih ding hoih hi, ci-in a ngaihsutna uh Hebron-a David’ kiangah a gen dingin Abner a pai hi.
Hebron-a David kiangah mihing sawmnih tawh Abner a pai ciangin, Abner le amah tawh a om mite adingin David in pawi khat a kham hi.

Tua ciangin Abner in David kiangah, “Amaute in nang tawh thuciamna a bawl theih nading le na deih bangin amaute khempeuh tungah na uk theih nadingin keimah dingin ka to kumpipa kiangah Israel-te khempeuh ka kaikhawm ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in Abner sawl khia a, amah zong lung nuamin a pai hi.

Tua khit phetin a galsimna panun David’ nasemte Joab tawh hong tung uh a, amaute in na tampi hong ciahpih uh hi. Ahih hangin Hebron khua sung David kiangah Abner na om nawn lo hi; bang hang hiam cih leh David in amah sawl khia khin a, amah lungnuamin ciah khinzo hi.
Joab le amah tawh a om galkap khempeuh hong tun ciangin Joab kiangah, “Kumpipa’ kiangah Ner’ tapa Abner hong pai a, lungnuam takin amah ciah khiasak khin hi,” ci-in kigen hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah Joab pai-in, “Bang hih na hi hiam? Na kiangah Abner hong pai hi. Nang in amah sawl khia-in amah a ciah khiat khitna bang thu ahi hiam?
Nang hong khem ding, na pusuahna le na sungtumna a thei ding le na hihna khempeuh a thei dingin Ner’ tapa Abner’ hong paina na thei hi,” a ci hi.
David’ omna panin Joab a pai khiat ciangin, amah in Abner’ nungah kamtaite sawl a, amaute in Sirah Tuibeem panin amah hong paipihkik uh hi. Ahih hangin David in tua thu thei lo hi.
Hebron-ah Abner hong paikik ciangin, Joab in amah tawh a kituam ho dingin kulhkongpi pamah pai khiatpih a, a sanggampa Asahel’ phulakna-in amah in a gil sun a, tua ciangin a si hi.
Tua khit, David in tua thu a zak ciangin amah in, “Ner’ tapa Abner a kithahna hanginTopa’mai-ah keimah le ka kumpi gam, a tawntungin mawhbaang lo hi.Topa’

Joab lu tung le ama innkuante khempeuh tungah tu tahen! Joab’ innkuante nin pai khia a nei mi ahi a, a phak mi ahi a, ciangkhut khun mi ahi a, namsau tawh a kithat mi ahi a, annek ding a nei lo mi tawh ahi zongin kilawi ngei kei tahen!” a ci hi.
Tua bangin Joab le a sanggampa Abishai in Abner that uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in Gibeon-a galkidona-ah a sanggampa uh Asahel thahsak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Joab le amah tawh a om mi khempeuh kiangah, “Na puan uh balkekin puanhampi silh unla, Abner’ mai-ah kap un,” a ci hi. Kumpipa David in hankuang a zui hi.
Amaute in Hebron-ah Abner vui uh a, Abner’ hanah kumpipa a kap hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh zong a kap uh hi.
Tua ciangin Abner’ hangin kumpipa in kah la-in,“Mihai pa a sih banginAbner si ding ahi hiam?
Na khutte kihen lo a,na khete kol kibulh lo hi.Mi gilote’ thah banginnang na si hi,”a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh ama hangin kapkik uh hi.

Tua ciangin ni a om lai-in an ne dingin David a zol dingin mi khempeuh hong pai uh a, ahih hangin David kiciamin, “Ni a tum matengin an ahi a, na khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin ka ciap taak leh Pasian in kei hong dawm kei tahen!” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in tua thu thei uh a, tua in amaute lungdamsak hi. Kumpipa’ sep khempeuh in mi khempeuh lungdamsak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Ner’ tapa Abner thah ding kumpipa’ deihna ahih lohlam tua ni-in mi khempeuh le Israel-te khempeuh in thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in a nasemte kiangah, “Tuni-in Israel-te sungah ulian ahi milian khat a tukna thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Sathau kinilh kumpipa hinapi-in tuni-in ka tha a nem hi. Zeruiah’ ta hih mite kei adingin haksa lua hi. Gamtatsia pa a gitlohna banginTopain thuk tahen!” a ci hi.Topa
Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth in Hebron-ah Abner a sihna thu a zak ciangin a tha kiam a, Israel-te khempeuh lungkia hi.

Saul’ tapa in galsim pawlte a makai mi nih nei hi. Khat pa’ min Baanah hi-in, adang khat pa’ min Rekhab hi a, Beeroth khua pan Benjamin mi Rimmon’ tapate ahi uh hi. (Bang hang hiam cih leh Beeroth zong Benjamin a’ in kisim hi.
Beeroth mite Gittaim-ah tai uh a, tuni dongin tua lai-ah peemta-in om uh hi.)

Saul’ tapa Jonathan in a khezaw tapa khat nei hi. Jezreel panin Saul le Jonathan’ thu hong tunin amah kum nga pha hi. Amah a cingnu in amah la-in taipih a, tua nu a nawhtaina lamin naupang kia-in a khe zaw hi. Ama min Mefibosheth ahi hi.
Tu-in Beeroth mi Rimmon’ tapate Rekhab le Baanah ding khia uh a, sun nisat hun pawlin Ishbosheth’ inn-ah a sun tawlngak laitakin hong tung uh hi.
Inn kongcing nu mangbuh a su khin hi a, a lusuk suakin ihmu hi. Tua ahih ciangin Rekhab le a sanggampa Baanah simlut uh hi.

Amaute inn sungah a tun uh ciangin a lupna deisung a lupna tungah Ishbosheth lumin a om laitakin amaute in amah satin that uh a, a lu tan uh hi. Amaute in ama lu la-in Arabah lam tawnin zan tawntung pai uh a,

Ishbosheth’ lutang Hebron-a David’ kiang tunpih uh hi. Amaute in kumpipa kiangah, “Hih lai-ah, thah dingin nang a hong zong, na gal Saul’ tapa Ishbosheth’ lutang om hi.Topain tuni-in Saul le a suanlekhakte tungah kote’ to kumpipa adingin hong thuksak hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa
Ahih hangin David in Beeroth mi Rimmon’ tapate Rekhab le a sanggampa Baanah dawngin, “Haksatna khempeuh panin ka nuntakna hong hon khiaTopaa nungta ahih mah bangin,Topa
mi khat in kei kiangah, ‘En in, Saul si hi,’ ci-in hong gen ciangin, amah thuhoih puakin kingaihsun a, ama thu puak thaman ka piakna-in amah manin Ziklag-ah ka that hi.
Migilote in a thuman mi khat ama inn sung a lupna tungah a thah ciangin note’ tungah ama phu hong la-in, leitung panin note hong susia zaw kan ding hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in a tangvalte thu pia a, tangvalte in amaute thatin a khut le a khete sattan uh a, Hebron-a bual gei-ah amaute khai uh hi. Ahih hangin amaute in Ishbosheth’ lutang la-in Hebron-a Abner’ hanah a vui uh hi.
Tua ciangin Israel minamte khempeuh Hebron-a David kiangah hong pai-in, “En in, kote pen nangma guh le nangma sa ka hi uh hi.

A beisa hunte-ah, kote tungah Saul kumpi ahih laitakin Israel-te kuan khiatpihin a ciahpih pa pen nangmah na hi hi.Topain nangma kiangah, ‘Nang pen keima mi Israel-te a cing pa hi-in, Israel-te tungah ulian na hi ding hi,’ hong ci hi,” a ci uh hi.Topa

Tua ahih ciangin Israel upate khempeuh Hebron-a kumpipa kiangah hong pai uh hi. Kumpipa David in amaute tawhTopa’mai Hebron-ah thuciamna khat bawl a, amaute in Israel-te tungah kumpi-in David sathau a nilh uh hi.Topa’
Gam uk dingin a kipatin David kum sawmthum pha a, amah in kum sawmli sung uk hi.
Hebron panin kum sagih le kha guk sung Judah gam sung uk a, Jerusalem panin kum sawmthum le thum sung Israel-te khempeuh le Judah gam a uk hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa le a mite tua gam a teeng Jebus mite a sim dingin Jerusalem-ah pai uh a, amaute in David kiangah, “Kote nong zo vet kei ding hi; mittaw le khebaite nangawn in nang hong not khia zo ding uh hi,” a ci uh hi. “Hih lai-ah David hong pai zo peuhmah lo ding hi,” ci-in ngaihsun uh hi.
Ahi zongin David in kumpipa’ khua ahi Zion munmuanhuai la hi.

Tua ciangin David in tua ni-in, “Jebus mite a vat gawp nuam peuhmah, keimah David in ka muhdah zahin a mudah mi peuhmah, tua khebaite le mittawte a sim dingin tuizawl dungah pai tahen,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin, “Mittawte le khebaiteTopa’inn sungah lut lo ding hi,” kici hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin munmuanhuai sungah David teengin David khuapi ci-in min a phuak hi. Tua ciangin David in Millo panin biakinn lamah khuapi lam hi.
David lian semsem hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Vanglian Pasian,Topain amah ompih hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Taia kumpipa Hiram in kamtaite le taamtak singte le David adingin inn khat a lamsak khutsiamte le leilesuang innlam a siamte zong a puak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Israel-te’ tungah kumpi-inTopain amah a kipsak khitna le Israel mite’ hangin ama kumpi gam a liatsakna a phawktel hi.Topa
Hebron panin hong tun khit ciangin David in Jerusalem panin zineute le zite lathuah lai a, David’ tanute le tapate piangthuah lai hi.
Jerusalem-ah a neih a tate’ min: Shammua, Shobab, Nathan, Solomon,
Ibhar, Elishua, Nefeg, Jafia,
Elishama, Eliada le Elifelet ahi hi.

Israel-te tungah kumpi-in David sathau a kinilh khitna thu Filistia-te in a zak uh ciangin David a man dingin Filistia-te khempeuh kuanto uh hi. Ahih hangin David in tua thu za-in munmuanhuai-ah paisuk hi.
Tu-in Filistia-te hong pai-in Refaim kuamsung dim uh hi.

Tua ciangin David inTopathu dongin, “Filistia-te do-in ka kuanto ding hiam? Keima khut sungah amaute na hong pia ding hiam?” a ci hi.Topain David kiangah, “Kuanto in; bang hang hiam cih leh na khut sungah Filistia-te kong pia taktak ding hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa

Tua ciangin Baalperazim-ah David hong pai-in David in tua lai-ah amaute a zo hi. Tua ciangin amah in, “Tuikhang in a phulkhap banginTopain ka mai-ah ka galte phukham hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin tua mun Baalperazim ci-in min kiphuak hi.Topa
Filistia-te in tua lai-ah a milimte uh nusia uh a, David le a mite in tuate a pua khia uh hi.
Tua ciangin Filistia-te hong kuantokik lai-in Refaim kuamsung dim khin uh hi.
David inTopathu a dot ciangin amah in, “Na kuanto kei ding hi; amaute’ nung lamah kual pai inla, lungli kungte gal panin amaute hih in.Topa
Lungli kungte’ dawnah lampaina kheging na zak ciangin na tha saan in; bang hang hiam cih leh Filistia galkapte a vat gawp dingin na mai-ahTopapai hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua cianginTopain amah a thupiak bangin David in hih a, Geba panin Gezer ciang dong Filistia-te a vat gawp hi.Topa
David in Israel-te a kiteel khia mi tul sawmthum khawmkik hi.
Tua ciangin David in kherub-te tungah a tu, VanglianTopa’min tawh a kisam Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang tua mun panin a paipihto dingin amah tawh a om mi khempeuh tawh Baalejudah-ah a pai hi.Topa’

Amaute in leeng thak khat tungah Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang pua uh a, mual tunga om Abinadab’ inn panin pai khiatpih uh hi. Abinadab’ tapate Uzzah le Ahio in leeng thak tungah Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang koihin hawl uh a, Thuciamna Singkuang mai-ah Ahio a pai hi.

Tua ciangin David le Israel mite khempeuh inTopa’mai-ah a tha neih zahun la sa-in, laiza khausai lasaknate, harp khausai lasaknate, khuangneute, kuangtuahte le daltuahte tumin lungdamin a lam uh hi.Topa’
Nakon’ ancilna mun a tun uh ciangin bawngtalte muktu ahih manin Uzzah in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang lamah a khut zanin len kha hi.
Tua ciangin Uzzah tungahTopahong sinso hi. Amah in Thuciamna Singkuang lamah a khut zan ahih manin Pasian in tua lai-ah amah vatlum a, Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang gei-ah amah si hi.Topa
Topain Uzzah gim pia ahih manin David heh hi. Tuni dongin tua mun pen Perezuzzah kici hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin tua ni-in David inTopakihta hi. Amah in, “Topa’Thuciamna Singkuang bangci-in ka kiangah hong tung thei ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.TopaTopa’
Tua ahih ciangin David khuapi sungahTopa’Thuciamna Singkuang a paipih ding David ut lo a, Gath khua mi Obededom’ inn-ah paipih hi.Topa’
Topa’Thuciamna Singkuang Gath khua mi Obededom’ inn sungah kha thum sung om a,Topain Obededom le a innkuan khempeuh thupha a pia hi.Topa’Topa

Tua ciangin Kumpi David kiangah, “Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang hanginTopain Obededom innkuan le ama neih khempeuh thupha pia hi,” ci-in kigen hi. Tua ahih ciangin David pai-in Obededom’ inn panin David khuapi-ah lungdamna tawh Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang paipihto hi.Topa
Topa’Thuciamna Singkuang a puate kal guk a suan khit ciangin amah in a puate tawlkhat khawlsakin bawngtal khat le bawngno thau khat biakna-in a pia hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin a tha neih khempeuh tawhTopa’mai-ah David lam hi. David in saihadial siampi puan khat silh hi.Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin David le Israel mi khempeuh in otna le saki tumna awging tawhTopa’Thuciamna Singkuang paipihto uh hi.Topa’

Topa’Thuciamna Singkuang David khuapi sung hong tun laitakin tawlet panin Saul tanu a zi Mikhal hong khuadak a,Topa’mai-ah Kumpi David diangin a lam mu hi. Tua nu in a lungsim sungah amah simmawh hi.Topa’Topa’

Tua ciangin amaute inTopa’Thuciamna Singkuang hong tumpih uh a, David in ama adingin a lamsak puanbuk sung ama mun dingah a koih hi. Tua ciangin David inTopa’mai-ah meihal biaknate le thunuama biaknate a pia hi.Topa’Topa’
David in meihal biaknate le thunuama biaknate a piak khit ciangin amah in VanglianTopa’min tawh mite thupha pia a,Topa’
Israel mihon buppi, mi khempeuh, numei le pasalte tungah anlum pheng khat, sa baak khat le leenggahkeu pheng khat ciat a pia hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh a inn ciat uhah a ciah uh hi.

Tua ciangin a innkuante thupha a pia dingin David a ciah hi. Ahih hangin David a dawn dingin Saul’ tanu Mikhal hong pai khia a, “Tuni-in Israel kumpipa, mi mawkmawkte khat maizum loin a guak om bangin, a nasemte’ numeite’ muhna-ah tuni-in a tangguakin omin, a mahmah bangci kipahtawi ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in Mikhal kiangah, “Topa’mi Israel-te tungah ulian dingin a hong koih dingin na pa le a innkuan khempeuhte sangin kei a hong teel zawTopa’mai ahi hi. Keimah inTopa’mai-ah lungdamna ka bawl ding hi.Topa’Topa’Topa’
Hih sangin a simmawhhuai zaw-in ka kibawl lai dinga, nangma mit bekah a ginalo ka hi ding hi. Ahih hangin nangma gen numeite in keimah hong pahtawi ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Saul’ tanu Mikhal in a sih ni dongin ta nei thei nawn lo hi.
Tu-in kumpipa ama inn sungah teenginTopain ama kiima a galte khempeuh panin tawlngakna a piak khit ciangin,Topa
kumpipa in kamsang Nathan kiangah, “Tu-in thei in; keimah taamtak inn hoih sungah ka om a, ahih hangin Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang puanbuk sungah omlai hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan in kumpipa kiangah, “Pai in; na lungsim a om khempeuh hih in; bang hang hiam cih lehTopain hong ompih hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Ahih hangin tua zan mahin Nathan kiangahTopa’thu hong tunga,Topa’
“Pai inla ka nasem pa David kiangah gen in. ‘Topain hih bangin ci hi: Ten nading biakinn khat hong lamsak ding na hi hiam?Topa
Israel mite Egypt panin ka pai khiatpih toh ni a kipan tuni dongin biakinn sungah ka om nai kei a, puanbuk sungah omin ka pai kawikawi hi.

Israel mite khempeuh tawh ka painasa mun khempeuh ah, ka mi Israel-te a cing dingin ka piak thukhente khat peuhpeuh tungah, “Bang hangin taamtak biakinn hoih hong lamsak lo na hi hiam?” ci-in kam khat beek gen ngei ka hi hiam?’ ci hi.

“Tua ahih ciangin tu-in ka nasem pa David kiangah hih bangin na gen ding hi. ‘VanglianTopain hih bangin ci hi: Ka mi Israel-te tungah ulian dingin lonona mun, tuute na zuihna panin nang kong la hi.Topa
Na paina peuhpeuhah nang tawh kong om a, na galte khempeuh ka hong zosak hi. Leitung miliante’ min khat mah bangin nang adingin min lian khat kong bawlsak ding hi.
Keimah in ka mi Israel-te adingin mun khat ka seh dinga, amau’ munah amaute teengin a kinawngkaisak nawn loh nadingin amaute ka phut ding hi. Nidanga bangin mi ngongtatte in,

ka mi Israel-te tungah thukhente ka koih khit zawh, amaute gimsak nawn lo ding hi. Na galte khempeuh panin nang tungah tawlngakna kong pia ding hi. Tua tham loinTopain nang adingin suanlekhak hong bawlsak ding nang tungahTopain gen hi.TopaTopa
Na pu na pate’ kiang na zuat ni ciangin, nangma sung panin hong suak khia ding na tapa nangma nungah ka khangsak dinga, keimah in ama kumpi gam ka kipsak ding hi.
Amah in keima min dingin biakinn khat lam dinga, keimah in ama kumpi gam tokhom a tawntungin ka kipsak ding hi.
Kei pen ama pa ka hi dinga, amah pen keima tapa hi ding hi. Amah in mawhna a bawl ciangin, keimah in mite’ ciangduai tawh amah ka thuhilh ding hi.
Ahih hangin nangma ma-a ka hepkhiat Saul’ tung panin ka lakkhiat bangin ama tung panin ka itna kip ka la khia kei ding hi.
Na suanlekhakte le na kumpi gam keima mai-ah a kip tawntungin kibawl dinga, na kumpi tokhom kip tawntung ding hi,’ ci-in gen in,” a ci hi.
Hih thute khempeuh tawh a kizui le hih maangmuhna khempeuh tawh a kizui-in Nathan in David kiangah a gen hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi David sungtuminTopa’mai-ah tu a, “TopaPasianaw, tu ciang dong hih bangin kei nong kep nadingin kei kua hi a, ka innkuan bang ahi hiam?Topa’Pasian

Hih pen nangma mitah thu neuno khat hi lai hi, TopaPasianaw. A hong tung ding sauveipi sung na nasem pa’ suanlekhakte’ thu ding na gen khin a, mailam khangte zong kei nong lak khin hi, O TopaPasian!PasianPasian
David in nang tungah bang genthuah nawn ding ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in na nasem pa na thei hi, O TopaPasian!Pasian
Nangma thuciamna bang le na lungsim tawh kizui-in na nasem pa na theihsak nadingin hih thu lian khempeuh na piangsak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin nang na lian takpi hi,TopaPasian aw. Ka bilun ka zakna uh tawh kizui-in nang tawh a kibang kuamah om lo a, nang sim loh Pasian dang om lo hi.Topa

“Ama mite’ mai-ah minam khat le a pasian-te hawl khiatna tawh ama adingin min bawlin, amaute adingin a lian a lauhuai nate hih sakin, ama mi dingin a hon khia dingin Pasian a paina na mi Israel-te, leitung minam dang kua tawh kibang ahi hiam?
Nangmah in nangma mi ahi tawntung dingin na mi Israel-te nangma adingin na kipsak hi.Topaaw, nangmah, amaute’ Pasian na suak hi.Topa
TopaPasian aw, tu-in na nasem pa le ama suanlekhakte tawh kizomin na gensa thu a tawntung dingin kipsak inla, nangma gensa bangin hih in.Topa
Tua hileh, ‘VanglianTopapen Israel-te tungah Pasian hi,’ ci-in nangma min kiliansak tawntung dinga, nangma mai-ah na nasem pa David’ suanlekhakte kumpi-in kikipsak ding hi.Topa

Bang hang hiam cih leh Israel-te’ Pasian, VanglianTopanangmah in, ‘Nangma suanlekhakte kumpi-in kong bawlsak ding hi,’ ci-in na nasem pa tungah pulakna na bawl khin hi. Tua ahih ciangin na nasem pa in nang tungah hih thungetna hong ngen ngam hi.Topa
Tu-in TopaPasianaw, nang, Pasian na hi a, na thute manin, na nasem pa tungah hih na hoih na ciam khin hi.Pasian

Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nangma mai-ah a om tawntung theih nadingin na nasem pa’ suanlekhakte thupha piak ding hong lungkim in. Bang hang hiam cih leh TopaPasianaw, nangmah in na gen khin a, nangma thupha tawh na nasem pa’ suanlekhakte thupha kipia tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.Pasian
Hih thu teng khit ciangin David in Filistia-te zo-in amaute nuaisiah a, David in Filistia-te’ khut sung panin Methegammah khua a la hi.

Tua ciangin amah in Moab mite zo a, amaute khauzang khat tawh tehin, leilakah amaute lumsak hi. Amah in thah dingin gual nih le khah dingin gual khat dim a teh hi. Tua ciangin Moab mite David’ khutnuai mite suakin siah a puak uh hi.
Zobah kumpipa Rehob’ tapa Hadadezer in Eufratis gun kiim gamte ngahkik nuamin hong kuan ahih manin David in amah do-in a zo hi.
David in ama tung panin sakol galkap tulkhat le zasagih le khe galkap tul sawmnih la hi. David in leengkai sakol khempeuh a zagui atsat a, ahih hangin leeng zakhat adingin a kicing a siit hi.
Damaskas gam a Syria mite, Zobah kumpipa Hadadezer a huh dingin hong kuan ciangin David in Syria mite tul sawmnih le tulnih a that hi.
Tua ciangin David in Damaskas gam Aram-ah khuacingte a koih hi. Syria mite David’ nasem suak uh a, siah a puak uh hi.Topain David a paina peuhpeuhah gualzawhna a pia hi.Topa
Tua ciangin David in Hadadezer’ nasemte in a puak kham kibawl lumte la-in Jerusalem-ah a paipih hi.
Hadadezer’ khuapite Betah le Berothai panin Kumpi David in sumngo tampi tak a la hi.
Hamath kumpipa Toi in David in Hadadezer’ galkap buppi a zawhna thu a zak ciangin,

amah in Hadadezer do-in a zawhna hangin amah va hopihin a lungdampih dingin Toi in Kumpi David kiangah a tapa Joram a sawl hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Hadadezer pen Toi tawh galin kido ngei zel hi. Joram in ngun, kham le sumngo tawh a kibawl nate puak hi.

Kumpi David in hihte zong, a nuaisiah minamte khempeuh Edom, Moab, Ammon mite, Filistia-te, Amalek le Zobah kumpipa Rehob’ tapa Hadadezer’ vannusiatte sung panin a ap ngun le kham tawhTopa’tungah a ap khawm hi.Topa’
David minthang semsem hi. A ciah ciangin amah in Ci Kuam-ah Edom mite tul sawm le tulgiat a that hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Edom-ah khuacingte a koih hi. Edom gam sung khempeuh ah amah in khuacingte koih a, Edom mi khempeuh David’ nasemte a suak uh hi.Topain David a paina peuhpeuhah gualzosak hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin David in Israel-te khempeuh uk a, a mite khempeuh tungah thutang le thuman a zang hi.
Zeruiah’ tapa Joab in galkapte uk hi. Ahilud’ tapa Jehoshafat thu ciamteh pa ahi hi.
Ahitub’ tapa Zadok le Abiathar’ tapa Ahimelek siampi ahi uh hi. Seraiah lai-at pa ahi hi.
Jehoiada’ tapa Benaiah in Khereth mite le Peleth mite uk uh hi. David’ tapate pen siampite ahi uh hi.
Tua ciangin David in, “Jonathan’ hangin ama tungah migitna ka lah theih nadingin Saul’ innkuan sungah mi khatpeuh a omlai hiam?” a ci hi.

Saul’ innkuan sungah Ziba min nei nasem pa khat om a, amaute in David kiangah amah sam uh hi. Kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Ziba na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Na nasem pa kei pen Ziba ka hi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Pasian’ tungah ka ciamsa bangin migitna ka lah theih nading Saul’ innkuan-ah mi khat beek omlai lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Ziba in kumpipa kiangah, “Jonathan’ tapa khat omlai hi; amah a khe zaw hi,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Amah koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ziba in kumpipa kiangah, “Lodebar-a Ammiel’ tapa Makhir’ inn-ah amah om hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi David in mi sawlin Lodebar-a Ammiel’ tapa Makhir’ inn panin amah a lasak hi.
Tua ciangin Saul’ tapa Jonathan, a ta Mefibosheth David kiangah hong pai a, maipukin zahtakna a bawl hi. Tua ciangin David in, “Mefibosheth!” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “En in, na nasem pa,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Lau kei in; bang hang hiam cih le na pa Jonathan’ hangin nangma tungah migitna kong lak dinga, na pu Saul’ leitang khempeuh nangma tungah kong piakik ding hi. Tua ciangin nangmah in ka sabuai-ah an na ne tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in zahtakna bawlin, “A sisa ui tawh a kibang kei bang lel, nong hici bawl nadingin na nasem pa bang ka hi hiam?” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Saul’ nasem pa Ziba samin ama kiangah, “Saul le a innkuan tawh a kizom khempeuh na topa’ tupa’ tungah ka pia khin hi.

Nang le na tapate le na nasemte in ama adingin lo na kho ding uh a, na topa’ tupa in annek ding a neih theih nadingin a piangte na tunpih ding uh hi. Ahih hangin na topa’ tupa Mefibosheth in keima sabuai-ah an ne tawntung ding hi,” a ci hi. Ziba in tapa sawm le nga le nasem sawmnih nei hi.

Tua ciangin Ziba in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa in nong thupiak khempeuh tawh kizui-in na nasem pa in hih ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ tapate khat bangin Mefibosheth in David’ sabuai-ah an a ne hi.
Mefibosheth in Mika min nei tapa tangval khat nei hi. Ziba’ inn-ah a teeng khempeuh Mefibosheth’ nasemte a suak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem-ah Mefibosheth teeng a, amah in kumpipa’ sabuai-ah an ne tawntung hi. Mifibosheth a khe a langnihin a zaw hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin Ammon mite’ kumpipa si a, a tapa Hanun in ama tangin uk hi.

Tua ciangin David in, “Keima tungah a pa thuman takin hong gamtat bangin Nahash’ tapa Hanun’ tungah thuman takin ka gamta ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in a pa’ hangin amah a hehnem dingin a nasemte a sawl hi. David’ nasemte Ammon mite’ gamah va tung uh hi.

Ahih hangin Ammon mite’ uliante in a topa uh Hanun kiangah, “David in nangma kiangah hehnemte hong sawl manin na pa a pahtawi hi, ci-in ngaihsun na hi hiam? David in a nasemte khuapi sung a en ding le a lawnthal dingin hong sawl hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Hanun in David’ nasemte manin a khamul uh alang ciat kiatkhiatsak a, a puan uh a laizang, a kawng ciangah atkhiat sakin amaute a sawl khia hi.

David kiangah tua thu a kigen ciangin amaute a dawn dingin amah in mi sawl hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh a mite nakpitakin maizum uh hi. Kumpipa in, “Na khamul uh a saukik mateng Jerikho-ah om unla, tua ciangin hong ciah un,” a ci hi.

Ammon mite in amaute David’ huat mi a suah khitna uh a muh uh ciangin, Ammon mite in mi sawlin Bethrehob-a Syria mite, Zobah-a Syria mite, khe galkap tul sawmnih le Maakah kumpipa’ mi tulkhat tawh le Tob mite tul sawm le tulnih a cial uh hi.
David in tua thu a zak ciangin amah in Joab le a thahat mihon khempeuh a sawl hi.
Tua ciangin Ammon mite hong kuan khia-in kulhkongpi lutna-ah galsim dingin panmun hong la uh hi. Zobah le Rehob-a Syria mite, Tob mite le Maakah-te, gamlakah amau pawl ciatin om uh hi.
Joab in a nung le a mai-ah amah a sim dingin gal in a panna a muh ciangin, amah in Israel-te’ sung pan mi pawlkhat teel khia a, Syria mite a do dingin a pangsak hi.
Ama mi a omlai teng a sanggampa Abishai’ ukna sungah koih a, Ammon mite’ langkhat ah amaute a pangsak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, “Syria mite kei adingin a hat luat leh kei nong huh ding hi. Ahih hangin Ammon mite nang adingin a hat luat le kei hong pai-in nang kong huh ding hi.
Kihangsak in; i mite ading le i Pasian’ khuapite adingin kipasalsak ni;
Tua ahih ciangin Joab le amah tawh a om mite in Syria mite a do dingin naih uh a, ama mai-ah amaute tai uh hi.
Ammon mite in Syria mite a tai a muh uh ciangin amaute zong Abishai’ mai-ah tai-in khuapi sungah lut uh hi. Tua ciangin Ammon mite a dona panin Joab ciahin Jerusalem-ah a tung hi.
Israel-te in amaute a zawhna thu Syria mite in a muh uh ciangin amau mahmah kikaikhawm uh hi.
Tua ciangin Hadadezer in mi sawlin Eufratis galkhat a Syria mite samsak hi. Hadadezer’ galkap mangpa Shobak makai-in Helam-ah amaute tung uh hi.
Hih thu David kiangah a kigen ciangin amah in Israel-te khempeuh kaikhawm a, Jordan kantanin Helam tung uh hi. David a do dingin Syria mite in na pang uh a, amah tawh kido uh hi.
Israel-te’ mai-ah Syria mite tai uh hi. David in leeng zasagih a hawl Syria mite le sakol tung tuang mi tul sawmli thatin, amau’ galkap mangpa Shobak liamsak a, tua lai-ah amah a si hi.

Hadadezer’ nasem ahi kumpite khempeuh in Israel-te in amaute a zawhna thu a muh uh ciangin, amaute in Israel-te tawh kilemna bawl uh a, amaute’ khutnuai mi a suak uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin Ammon mite a huh lai ding uh Syria mite lau ta uh hi.

Galdo dingin kumpite a kuankhiat hun tua kum khuakhal sungin David in Joab le amah tawh a om a nasemte le Israel-te khempeuh sawl a, amaute in Ammon mite su gawpin Rabbah khua umcih uh hi. Ahih hangin David Jerusalem-ah om hi.
Khatvei nitak lamin a lupna panin David tho-in kumpi innkhumzangah a pai leh innkhumzang panin amah in numei khat a kisil galmuh kha hi. A numei mel hoih mahmah hi.
David in mi sawlin tua numei’ thu kansak hi. Mi khat in, “Hih nu pen Hit mi Uriah’ zi, Eliam’ tanu Bathsheba hi lo ahi hiam?” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin David in kamtaite sawlin tua nu samsak hi. Tua nu ama kiangah hong pai a, amah in tua nu luppih hi. (Tua nu a khasim nitna panin a kisiansuah tung ahi hi.) Tua ciangin ama inn-ah a ciah hi.
Tua ciangin tua numei gai hi. Amah in mi sawlin David kiangah, “Nau ka paii hi,” ci-in gensak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Joab kiangah thu puak a, “Hit mi Uriah ka kiangah hong sawl in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Joab in David kiangah Uriah sawl hi.
Ama kiangah Uriah a tun ciangin David in Joab bangci om a, mite bangci uh a, galdona bangci mavan hiam cih dong hi.
Tua ciangin David in Uriah kiangah, “Na inn-ah ciahsuk inla tawlnga in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ inn panin Uriah pai khia a, kumpipa kiang panin letsong khat in amah zui hi.
Ahih hangin Uriah a topa’ nasemte khempeuh tawh kumpipa’ kongpi gei-ah lum a, ama inn-ah ciahsuk lo hi.
“Uriah a inn-ah ciahsuk lo hi,” ci-in amaute in David kiangah a gen uh ciangin David in Uriah kiangah, “Khualzin a hong tung hi lo na hi hiam? Bang hangin na inn-ah ciahsuk lo na hi hiam?” a ci hi.

Uriah in David kiangah, “Thuciamna Singkuang, Israel-te le Judah mite gal sungah om uh a, ka topa Joab le ka topa’ nasemte gamlakah giak uh hi. Tua ahih manin an ne tui dawn ding le ka zi tawh a lum dingin ka inn-ah ciahsuk ding ka hi hiam? Nangmah na hin mah bangin hih bang ka gamta het kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in Uriah kiangah, “Hih lai-ah tuni zong om inla, zing ciangin nang kong pai khiasak ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Uriah zong tua zan le a zing ciang Jerusalem-ah om hi.
David in amah samin ama omna-ah zu le an nesak a, amah zu khamsak hi. A nitak ciangin amah a lum dingin a topa’ nasemte tawh pai khia a, ahih hangin ama inn-ah ciahsuk tuan lo hi.
Zingsang ciangin David in Joab kiangah lai khat gelh a, Uriah khut tungah a lai khak hi.
A lai sungah, “Galsim a haksatna pen ah a madawkin Uriah koih inla, amah kivat tukin a sih theih nadingin ama kiang panin nungkik un,” ci-in a gelh hi.
Joab in khuapi a umcih ciangin mi a hangte om hi, ci-in a theihna munah Uriah a seh hi.
Khuapi mite hong kuan khia-in Joab tawh kido uh hi. Mite’ lakah David’ nasemte pawlkhat si hi. Hit mi Uriah zong kithat hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in mi sawlin galkidona thu khempeuh David kiangah a gen hi.
Amah in kamtai pa thu hilhin, “Galkidona thu khempeuh kumpipa kiangah na gen khit ciangin,
kumpipa a heh suakin amah in nangma kiangah, ‘A sim dingin khuapi-ah tua zahin a nai-in pai na hi uh hiam? Kulh tung panin hong kap ding uh thei lo na hi uh hiam?

Jerubbesheth’ tapa Ahimelek kua in that hiam? Numei khat in angawina suangpek tungnung kulh tung pan ama tungah khiatsukin Thebez-ah amah si hi lo ahi hiam? Bang hangin tua zahin kulh nai-ah pai na hi uh hiam?’ hong cih leh nangmah in, ‘Hit mi na nasem pa Uriah zong si hi,’ na ci ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kamtai pa pai a, hong tungin a gen dingin Joab in a sawl thu khempeuh David kiangah a gen hi.
Kamtai pa in David kiangah, “Mite in kote hong zothawhin gamlakah kote a do dingin hong kuan khia uh hi. Ahih hangin kote in kulhkongpi lutna dongah amaute ka notkik uh hi.
Tua ciangin thaltawite in kulh tung panin na nasemte hong kap uh a, kumpipa’ nasem pawlkhat si hi. Hit mi na nasem pa Uriah zong si hi,” a ci hi.

David in kamtai pa kiangah, “Joab kiangah hih bangin na gen in: ‘Hih thu hangin nangmah kilungkhamsak kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh namsau in koi lai panin hong vat ding cih a kima-theih lo mah ahi hi. Khuapi na simna hanciamin lumlet in,’ ci-in Joab hanthawn in,” a ci hi.
Uriah’ zi in a pasal a sihna thu a zak ciangin a pasal’ hangin kap hi.
A kahna a ven ciangin David in mi sawlin ama inn-ah tua nu lasak a, tua nu ama zi suakin, amah tawh tapa khat a nei hi. Ahih hangin David’ gamtatna thu inTopalungkim losak hi.Topa
Tua cianginTopain David kiangah kamsang Nathan sawl hi. Amah hong pai-in David kiangah, “Khuapi khat sungah mi nih om a, khat hau-in a khat zawng hi.Topa
A hau pa in tuuhon le bawnghon tampi nei hi.

Ahih hangin a zawng pa in bangmah nei lo a, a leisa tuuno a nu khat bek nei hi. Amah in tua tuuno khoi a, amah le a tate tawh khangkhawm hi. Ama an ne-in a hai panin dawn a, ama ang sungah lum a, ama adingin tanu tawh kibang hi.

Tu-in mihau pa’ inn-ah zin khat hong tunga, amah in a tuuhon ahi a, a bawnghon pan ahi zongin ama kiangah a tung khualzin pa adingin a gawh ding la nuam loin mizawng pa’ tuuno laksak a, ama kiang a a tung mipa adingin a gawhsak hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin tua mipa’ tungah David sinso mahmah hi. Amah in Nathan kiangah, “Topaa nungta ahih mah bangin hih banga a gamta mipa a sih ding kilawm hi.Topa
Amah hih bangin gamta a, amah in hehpihna nei lo ahih manin a tuuno a zah li-in loh ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Nathan in David kiangah, “Nang pen tua mipa na hi hi. Israel Pasian,Topain hih bangin ci hi: ‘Israel-te tungah kumpi-in nang sathau hong nilhin Saul’ khut sung panin nang kong hon khia hi.Topa
Keimah in na topa’ inn le na topa’ zite na khut sungah kong pia a, Israel-te le Judah mite nang kong pia hi. Hihte a tawmlua hileh tua zah nih a hong pia khin ding ka hi hi.

Ama muhna-ah a sia a gamta dingin bang hanginTopa’thu simmawh na hi hiam? Nangmah in Hit mi Uriah namsau tawh vatin, ama zi nangma zi dingin na la a, Ammon mite’ namsau tawh amah na that khin hi.Topa’
Tua ahih ciangin tu-in nangmah in kei hong simmawhin Hit mi Uriah’ zi nangma zi dingin la khin na hih manin na inn sungah namsau tawh kidona veng ngei lo ding hi,’ ci hi.

Topain hih bangin ci hi: ‘En in, keimah in nangma innkuan sung panin nangma langah siatna a piangsak ding khat ka khangsak ding hi. Na zite na muhin la-in na veengpa’ tungah ka pia dinga, amah in sun nitaang sungah na zite luppih ding hi.Topa
Bang hang hiam cih leh nangmah in a simthamin na hih hi; ahih hangin keimah in Israel-te khempeuh’ muh dingin suntangpi-in ka hih ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

David in hih thu a zak ciangin Nathan kiangah, “Topa’tungah ka khial khin hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Nathan in David kiangah, “Topain zong na khialhna hong maisak khinzo hi; nang na si kei ding hi.Topa’Topa
Ahi zongin, hih bangin gamtatna tawhTopathusim peuhmah lo na hih manin nang’ sung panin a hong piang naungek si ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin Nathan a inn-ah a ciah hi.Tua ciangin Uriah’ zi in David tawh a neih naungekTopain vat a, a ci hong na hi.Topa
Tua ahih ciangin David in naungek adingin Pasian’ tungah thum hi. David in an tangin zan tawntung leilakah a lum hi.
Tua ciangin leilak panin a phong dingin a inn sung upate ama kiangah ding uh hi. Ahih hangin amah tho lo a, amaute tawh an zong ne nuam lo hi.

A ni sagih ni-in naungek si hi. Ama kiangah, naungek si hi, ci-in a gen ding uh David’ nasemte lau uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, “Naungek a hin lai nangawnin amah i hopih hangin i thu hong ngai lo hi. Tua ahih ciangin bangci-in ama kiangah, naungek si, ci ngam ding ihi hiam? A mahmah kisusia kha ding hi,” a ci uh hi.

Ahih hangin ama nasemte a kihuauna uh David in a muh ciangin naungek si hi, ci-in a thei hi. Tua ciangin David in a nasemte kiangah, “Naungek si ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amaute in, “Amah si ta hi,” a ci uh hi.

Tua ciangin David leilak panin tho-in kisil a, sathau nilhin a puante khek a,Topa’inn-ah pai-in Pasian a bia hi. Tua ciangin ama inn-ah ciah hi. An a nget ciangin amaute in a mai-ah lui uh a, amah in a ne hi.Topa’
Tua ciangin a nasemte in ama kiangah, “Hih banga na gamtatna a bangci hiam? Naungek a hin lai-in an tangin na kap hi; ahih hangin naungek a sih ciangin tho-in an na ne zawsop hi,” a ci uh hi.

Amah in, “Naungek a hin lai-in an tangin ka kap hi; bang hang hiam cih leh, ‘Naungek a hin nadinginTopain kei hong hehpih ding hiam, hong hehpih lo ding hiam, cih kua in thei khol ahi hiam?’ ka ci hi.Topa

Ahih hangin tu-in amah si ta hi; bang hangin an tang nawn ding ka hi hiam? Amah lakik thei ding ka hi hiam? Ama kiangah kei ka pai dinga, ahih hangin kei kiangah amah hong kilehkik lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in a zi Bathsheba hehnem a, ama kiangah pai-in amah tawh a lumkhawm hi. Tua nu in tapa khat nei a, a min Solomon a phuak hi.Topain tua naupang it ahih manin,Topa
kamsang Nathan’ tungah thu puak hi.Topa’itna hangin ama min Jedidiah a phuah ding a gen hi.Topa’
Tu-in Joab in Ammon khuapi Rabbah simin a khuapi tuikhuk la hi.
Joab in David kiangah kamtaite sawlin, “Rabbah khuapi ka sim a, a khuapi tuikhuk ka la khin hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi a omlai teng kaikhawm inla, khuapi langah phual satin khuapi la in; tua hikeileh keimah in khuapi la-in keima min pua kha ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin David in mi khempeuh kaikhawmin Rabbah-ah pai a, tua khuapi simin a la hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amau’ pasian Molek lu tungah a om lukhu a laksak hi. Tua lukhu kham talen khat gik a, a sungah suangmanpha khat om hi. David’ kumpi lukhu tungah tua suangmanpha kikoih hi. Tua ciangin amah in khuapi sunga vankinusiate tampi tak pai khiatpih hi.

Amah in a sunga om mite pai khiatpihin singatnate, tuzumte le heite tawh na a sem dingin koih a, leiseek seekna-ah amaute na semsak hi. Tua bangin Ammon mite’ khuapi khempeuh a hih hi. Tua ciangin David le mi khempeuh Jerusalem-ah a ciah uh hi.
Tu-in David’ tapa Absalom in Tamar min nei sanggam numei a melhoih mahmah khat nei hi. Tawlkhat khit ciangin David’ tapa Ammon in tua nu ngai hi.
Ammon in ngailua mahmah ahih manin a sanggamnu Tamar hangin cinat lawh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh nungak le tangval kituam omsak ahih manin Ammon in tua nu a muh theih nading omtheih tuak lo hi.
Ahih hangin Ammon in David’ sanggampa Shimeah’ tapa Jonadab min nei lawmpa khat nei a, Jonadab pen mi tei mahmah khat ahi hi.

Amah in Ammon kiangah, “Kumpipa’ tapa aw, bang hangin zingsang khat khit zingsang khat thakiam semsem na hi hiam? Kei kiangah a hang hong gen lo ding na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Ammon in ama kiangah, “Ka sanggampa Absalom’ sanggamnu Tamar ka ngai hi,” a ci hi.

Jonadab in ama kiangah, “Na lupna tungah lum inla, a cina kineih in. Nangmah a veh dingin na pa hong pai ciangin ama kiangah, ‘Keimah in mu-in ama khut panin an ka nek theih nadingin ka sanggamnu Tamar hong paisakin annek ding hong piasak inla, ka muhna-ah an hong bawlsak in,’ ci in,” a ci hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Ammon lumin a cina kineih hi. Amah a en dingin kumpipa a pai ciangin Ammon in kumpipa kiangah, “Ama khut panin ka nek theih nadingin ka sanggamnu Tamar hong paisakin mohpheng nih khawng na bawlsak nading kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in inn-a Tamar kiangah mi sawlin, “Na sanggampa Ammon’ inn-ah pai-in ama ading an bawlsak in,” cisak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin a sanggampa Ammon lumin a omna mun a inn-ah Tamar pai hi. Amah in annel lom la-in meek a, ama muhna-ah mohphengte bawlin a em hi.

Tua ciangin amah in sikbeeldai la-in ama mai-ah sung khia a, ahih hangin amah in ne nuam lo hi. Tua ciangin Ammon in, “Kei kiang panin mi khempeuh sawl khia masa in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin ama kiang panin mi khempeuh pai khia hi.

Tua ciangin Ammon in Tamar kiangah, “Na khut tung panin ka nek theih nadingin inndei sungah an hong paipih in,” a ci hi. Tamar in a bawlsa mohphengte la-in inndei sung a sanggampa Ammon kiangah paipih hi.
Ahih hangin amah in a nek dingin ama kiang nai-ah a paipih ciangin, amah in tua numei lenin ama kiangah, “Hong pai in; kei tawh hong lum in ka sanggamnu aw,” a ci hi.
Amah in dawngin, “Hilo hi, ka sanggampa aw, kei hong thatang hih kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Israel sungah tua bangin kigamta lo hi. Hih bangin hai gamtat lua kei in.

Keimah in ka maizumna koi-ah seelcip zo ding ka hi hiam? Nang zong, Israel-te sungah mihai luate khat bang na hi ding hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kong thum hi, kumpipa kiangah gen in; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in nang adingin kei hong khaktan lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin amah in a thugen ngai lo hi. Amah sangin hat zaw ahih manin thatanghat thu tawh hihin amah luppih hi.
Tua ciangin Ammon in nakpitakin Tamar mudah hi. Amah in a cil-a a itna zah sangin a muhdahna lian zaw hi. Tua ahih ciangin Ammon in ama kiangah, “Ding in, pai khia in,” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin a numei in ama kiangah, “Hilo hi, ka sanggampa aw; bang hang hiam cih leh kei nong sawlkhiatna pen kei tungah nong hihsa thu sangin lian zaw hi,” a ci hi. Ahih hangin a thu ngai lo hi.
Amah in a nasem tangvalpa samin, “Ka omna panin hih numei koih khia inla, ama nungah kongkhak kalh in,” a ci hi.
Tua nu in puantualpi ban nei khat silh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa’ tanute in tua bangin puan silh hi. Tua ahih ciangin a nasem pa in tua nu koihkhia-in ama nungah kongkhak kalh hi.
Tua ciangin Tamar in a lu tungah vut koihin ama silh puantualpi bansau balkek hi. Tua ciangin a lu tungah a khut koihin pai khia a, a paikawmin a gingin a kap hi.

Tua ciangin a sanggampa Absalom in ama kiangah, “Na sanggampa Ammon in nang hong bawlsia ahi hiam? Bangbang hitaleh kilungnuamsak in, ka sanggamnu aw; amah pen na sanggampa ahi hi; hih thu na lungsimah koih kei in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin a sanggampa Absalom’ inn-ah Tamar lungzuang khawngai-in a om hi.
Kumpi David in hih thute khempeuh a zak ciangin heh mahmah hi.
Absalom in Ammon kiangah a pha ahi a, a sia ahi zongin bangmah gen vet lo hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a sanggamnu Tamar thatanghat thu tawh hih ahih manin Absalom in Ammon mudah lua mahmah hi.
Tua zawh kum nih bit khit ciangin Absalom in Efraim nai-a om Baalhazor-ah tuumul mette khawm a, Absalom in kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh sam hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah Absalom hong pai-in, “En in, na nasem pa in tuumul mette khawm hi; kumpipa le a nasemte na nasem pa tawh nong pai ding kong thum hi,” a ci hi.

Ahih hangin kumpipa in Absalom kiangah, “Hilo hi, ka tapa aw; i vekpi-in pai kei ni; pai lehang kote pen nang adingin vangik ka hi kha ding uh hi,” a ci hi. Amah in ci teitei a, ahih hangin amah pai nuam loin ama thupha a tungah a pia hi.

Tua ciangin Absalom in, “Tua bang hi lo ding ahihleh ka sanggampa Ammon kote tawh nong paisak ding kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin nang tawh amah hong pai ding ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
Ahih hangin Absalom in Ammon le kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh amah tawh a paisak mateng ci teitei hi.

Tua ciangin Absalom in a nasemte thu pia a, “Ammon in zu a kham hun phawk unla, note kiangah, ‘Ammon sat un,’ kong cih ciangin amah that un. Lau kei un; note thu hong pia khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Hang unla, thahat un,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Absalom’ nasemte in ama thupiaksa bangin Ammon hih uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh dingin a la tung ciat uhah tuangin a tai uh hi.
Amaute lamkalah a om laitakin David kiangah thu tunga, “Absalom in kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh that a, khat beek siit lo hi,” kici hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa dinga, a puante balkekin leilakah a lum hi. A kiang a om a nasemte khempeuh in zong a puan uh balkek uh hi.

Ahih hangin David’ sanggampa Shimeah’ tapa Jonadab in, “Amaute in kumpipa’ tapa tangvalte khempeuh that hi, ci-in ka topa in ngaihsun kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Ammon bek si hi. Amah in a sanggamnu Tamar thatanghat thu tawh a hih ni a kipanin Absalom’ thupiakna tawh hih thu a kiseh khol ahi hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh si hi, ci-in ka topa in ngaihsunin na lungsimah koih kei in; bang hang hiam cih leh Ammon bek si hi,” a ci hi.
Tua kikal sungin Absalom tai hi. Tua ciangin galvil tangvalpa a khuadak leh, mual pang nai Horonaim lampi panin mihon hong pai a mu hi.
Jonadab in kumpipa kiangah, “En in, kumpipa’ tapate hong tung zo hi. Na nasem pa’ gen bangin hong piang takpi hi,” a ci hi.
Amah in a thugen a man khit phetin, kumpipa’ tapate hong tungin hong kap uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa zong a nasemte khempeuh tawh nakpitakin a kap uh hi.
Ahih hangin Absalom tai-in Geshur kumpipa Ammihud’ tapa Talmai kiangah tung hi. Ni tampi sung David a tapa’ hangin a thum hi.
Absalom ahihleh Geshur-ah pai a, tua lai-ah kum thum sung a om hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Absalom ngai-in hong mahmah hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah si hi, ci-in thei khin ahih manin Ammon’ thu-ah kihehnem khin hi.
Tu-in kumpipa in Absalom a ngaihna thu Zeruiah’ tapa Joab in a phawk hi.

Tua ahih ciangin Joab in Tekoa-ah mi sawlin tua panin numei pil khat la-in ama kiangah, “Dahin a kap kineih inla, dahna lim puante silh in. Sathau nilh kei inla, misi hangin ni tampi a thum khin numei bangin gamta in.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah pai inla, hih bangin ama kiangah thu gen in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Joab in ama gen ding thute a hilh hi.
Kumpipa kiangah Tekoa numei a pai ciangin lei-ah maipukin zahtakna bawl a, “Hong huh in! Aw kumpipa,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Na lungkhamna bang om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Kalai, ka pasal si ta a, meigong numei khat ka hi hi.
Na nasem nu in tapa nih nei a, lo sungah amau tegel kitawng uh hi. Amau tegel a khen ding kuamah om lo a, khat in a khat pa satin that hi.

Tu-in ka beh buppi na nasem nu’ langah hong pangin amaute in, ‘Ama thah a sanggampa’ nuntakna tangin amah ka thah theih nadingun a sanggampa a sat mipa hong pia in,’ hong ci uh hi. Tua bangin amaute in innluah pa zong susia ding uh hi. Tua bangin amaute in a omlai ka lametna pa beisakin leitungah ka pasal’ suanlekhak a suakta omsak lo ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in tua numei kiangah, “Na inn-ah ciah in; nang tawh kisai-in thu ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Tekoa numei in kumpipa kiangah, “Ka to kumpipa aw, keima tung le ka innkuan tungah mawhna om tahen; kumpipa le a tokhom mawh peng tahen,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in, “Nang’ tungah mi khatpeuh in thu khatpeuh hong gen leh kei kiangah amah hong paipih in; amah in nang hong sukik ngei nawn lo ding hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin amah in, “Phula pa in that nawn loin, ka tapa a kisuksiat loh nadingin kumpipa inTopana Pasian’ tungah na kiciam ding kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Topaa nungta ahih mah bangin na tapa’ samzang khat zong lei-ah kia lo ding hi,” ci-in a kiciam hi.TopaTopa
Tua ciangin a numei in, “Ka to kumpipa tungah na nasem nu kam khat hong gensak in, ci-in kong thum hi,” a ci hi. Amah in, “Gen in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a numei in, “Tua ahihleh bang hangin Pasian’ mite’ langah tua bang na hih sawm na hi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh hih bang lungsim khentatna na piakna-ah kumpipa in a hawl khiatna a inn-ah a paipihkik mateng kumpipa a mahmah mawh a kipia ahi hi.

Eite khempeuh i si dinga, a kikhawmkik thei lo leilakah a bua tui tawh i kibang hi. Ahih hangin a hawl khiat pa a kipuasehin a kikoih loh nadingin lampi a zong mipa’ nuntakna Pasian in la khia lo ding hi.
Mite in kei hong lausak ahih manin tu-in ka to kumpipa kiangah hih thu a gen dingin kong pai hi. Na nasem nu in, ‘Kumpipa kiangah thu ka gen dinga, kumpipa in a nasem nu’ ngetna sem kha ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh kumpipa in za-in, Pasian’ gamh panin kei le ka tapa hong susia khawm ding mipa’ khut panin a nasem nu hon khia ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsun hi.

Na nasem nu in, ‘Ka to kumpipa’ kammal in nopsakna hong pia ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsun hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ka to kumpipa pen a pha le a sia a khen thei dingin Pasian’ vantungmi tawh kibang hi.Topana Pasian in nang hong ompih tahen!” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin kumpipa in a numei dawngin, “Nang kong dot peuhpeuh hong im kei in,” a ci hi. A numei in, “Ka to kumpipa in gen hen,” a ci hi.

Kumpipa in, “Hih thu khempeuh Joab’ vaihawmna tawh hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. A numei in dawngin, “Nang a nungta taktak na hih mah bangin ka to kumpipa aw, ka to kumpipa’ gen bang teekteek mah ahi hi. Kei hong sawl pa pen na nasem pa Joab hi a, na nasem nu’ gen dingin hih thute a hong sawl pa amah ahi hi.
Na thu paizia khek nadingin na nasem pa Joab in hih thu hih hi. Ahih hangin ka topa in leitunga om na khempeuh theih nadingin Pasian’ vantungmi pilna tawh a kibang pilna na nei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Joab kiangah, “Tu-in en in, hih thu kong pia hi; pai in, tangvalpa Absalom hong ciahpihkik in,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Joab lei-ah maipuksuk a, zahtakna bawlin kumpipa thupha a pia hi. Tua ciangin Joab in, “Kumpipa in a nasem pa’ ngetna a piakna-ah, tuni-in ka to kumpipa nangma muhna-ah maipha ka muhna na nasem pa in ka thei hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Joab dingin Geshur-ah pai a, Jerusalem-ah Absalom a ciahpih hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Ama inn-ah amah tuam tensak in; keima omna-ah amah hong pai lo ding hi,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Absalom ama inn-ah tuam tenin kumpipa omna-ah pai lo hi.
Tu-in Israel-te khempeuh sungah a melhoihna hangin Absalom zahin tua bangin phat ding kuamah om lo hi. A khenuai a kipan a luzang dongin ama tungah paubaanna om lo hi.
Amah in a sam a met ciangin (kum bei simin amah in met zel hi; a sam a gih ciangin amah in met hi), amah in a sam tawi khai a, kumpipa’ gik tehna-in shekel zanih a gik hi.
Absalom’ sung pan tapa thum le a min Tamar ahi ta numei khat a suak hi; tua nu pen a melhoih mahmah khat ahi hi.
Tua hi a, kumpipa’ omna-ah pai loin Absalom kum nih bit Jerusalem-ah teeng hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah a sawl dingin Absalom in Joab samsak hi. Ahih hangin ama kiangah Joab hong pai lo hi. Amah in a nih veina sawl a, ahih hangin Joab hong pai lo veve hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a nasemte kiangah, “En un, Joab’ lo pen keima-a’ zom hi a, tua lai-ah amah in mangbuhham nei hi; pai unla mei tawh va hal un,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Absalom’ nasemte in a lo mei tawh a hal uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joab dingin Absalom’ kiang ama inn-ah pai-in ama kiangah, “Bang hangin na nasemte in mei tawh ka lo hong halsak ahi uh hiam?” a ci hi.

Absalom in Joab dawngin, “En in, nang kiangah thu kong puak a, ‘Kumpipa kiangah nang hong sawlin, “Bang hangin Geshur panin hong pai ka hi hiam? Tua lai-ah omlai leng kei adingin hoih zaw ding hi,” ci-in a va dong dingin hih lai-ah nong pai nading kong gen hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu-in kumpipa omna-ah kei hong paisak in; kei tungah mawhna a om leh amah hong thatsak in,’ ka ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah Joab pai-in ama kiangah tua thu a gen hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in Absalom sam hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah kumpipa kiangah hong pai a, a mai lei ngatin kumpipa’ mai-ah a kun hi; tua ciangin kumpipa in Absalom a nam hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin Absalom in leeng khat le sakolte le ama mai-ah a tai ding mi sawmnga la hi.

Absalom tho baihin kulhkongpi lam gei-ah tu zel hi. Mi khatpeuh in thu khensak dingin kumpipa’ mai-ah pai nading thu a neih ciangin Absalom in amah samin, “Koi khua pan na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in, “Na nasem pa, Israel-te sungah tua minam tua khua ka hi hi,” a cih ciangin
Absalom in ama kiangah, “Thei in, na thugente hoihin man hi; ahih hangin na thu a khen dingin kumpipa in a koih mi om lo hi,” a ci hi.

Tua tham loin Absalom in, “Gam sungah kei thukhen hi leng! Thu ahi a, a hang khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin a nei mi peuhmah kei kiangah hong pai dinga, keimah in ama tungah thu a tangin ka khen ding hi,” a ci hi.
Ama tungah zahtakna a bawl dingin mi khatpeuh a nai-ah hong pai ciangin amah in a khut zan a, amah lenin a nam hi.
Tua bangin Absalom in kumpipa kiangah thu a khensak dingin a hong pai Israel-te khempeuh tungah a hih hi. Tua ahih ciangin Absalom in Israel mite’ lungsim na zo hi.
Kum li a cin ciangin Absalom in kumpipa kiangah, “Kei hong paisak inla,Topa’tungah ka ciamsa ka thuciam, Hebron-ah hong piasak in, ci-in kong thum hi.Topa’

Bang hang hiam cih leh Aram gam Geshur-ah ka om laitakin na nasem pa in thu khat ciam a, ‘Topain Jerusalem-ah kei hong paipihkik taktak lehTopa’tungah biakna ka pia ding hi,’ ka ci hi,” a ci hi.TopaTopa’
Kumpipa in ama kiangah, “Nuamtakin pai in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin amah dingin Hebron-ah a pai hi.
Ahih hangin Absalom in Israel minam khempeuh kiangah a simthamin kamtaite sawl a, “Peengkul aw na zak phetun, ‘Absalom, Hebron-ah kumpi hi!’ ci un,” a ci hi.
A kisam mi za nihte Jerusalem panin Absalom tawh a pai uh hi. Amaute lungsim hoih tawh a pai hi a, bangmah thei lo uh hi.
Absalom in biakna a piak laitakin David’ thulamlak pa, Giloh mi Ahithofel, ama khuapi Gilo panin samsak hi. Tua ciangin sawmsimna hong hat semsem a, Absalom tawh a om mite kibehlaplap hi.
Tua ciangin kamtai khat David kiangah hong pai-in, “Israel mite’ lungsim Absalom’ lamah pai khin hi,” ci-in a gen hi.

Tua ciangin David in Jerusalem-ah amah tawh a om a nasemte khempeuh kiangah, “Ding un, tai ni; tua hikeileh Absalom’ kiang panin eite’ suahtak nading om lo ding hi. Manlangin pai ni; tua hikeileh amah in eite hong pha pak dinga, eite’ tungah siatna hong tungsakin namsau tawh khuapi hong vat ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa’ nasemte in ama kiangah, “En in, ka to kumpipa in na khensat peuhpeuh a sem dingin na nasemte kiging hi,” a ci uh hi.
Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa pai khia a, ama innkuan le a ulian khempeuh in ama nung a zui uh hi. Kumpipa in inn kem dingin a zineu sawm nusia hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa pai khia a, mi khempeuh in ama nung a zui uh hi. Tua ciangin khua nawl inn tawpna-ah amaute khawl uh hi.
Tua ciangin a nasemte khempeuh in amah nawkin pai uh hi. Khereth mi khempeuh, Peleth mi khempeuh le Gath panin amah a zui mi za gukte khempeuh, kumpipa’ mai nawkin paisuak uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Gath mi Ittai kiangah, “Bang hangin nang zong kote hong zui na hi hiam? Ciahkik inla, kumpipa tawh om in; bang hang hiam cih leh nang pen gamdang mi na hi a, na inn panin gam dangah a om zong na hi hi.

Nang pen zan mah beka hong pai na hi hi. Koi lai munah kei pai ding cih thei lopi-in kote tawh a kawivak dingin nang hong bawl ding ka hi hiam? Ciahkik in, na sanggamte ciahpih in.Topain itna kip le thumanna nang’ tungah hong lak tahen,” a ci hi.Topa

Ahih hangin Ittai in kumpipa dawngin, “Topanungta-in, ka to kumpipa zong nungta ahih mah bangin, sih nading ahi a, hin nading ahi zongin ka to kumpipa a omna peuhpeuhah na nasem pa om ding hi,” a ci hi.Topa
Tua ciangin David in Ittai kiangah, “Tua ahihleh pai in, paisuak in,” a ci hi. Tua ahih ciangin Gath mi Ittai, a mi khempeuh le amah tawh a om a naupang khempeuh tawh a paisuak hi.
Tua ahih ciangin mi khempeuh a pai laitakin gam sung mi khempeuh a gingin kap khia uh a, kumpipa in Kidron lui kantanin, mi khempeuh zong gamlak lamah a paisuak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Abiathar hong paito a, Zadok zong Levi mi khempeuh tawh hong pai-in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang hong pua uh hi. Mi khempeuh in khuapi a khen khit mateng amaute in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang nga phot uh hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Zadok kiangah, “Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang khuapi sungah puakik in.Topa’maipha ka muh nakleh, amah in kei hong paipihkikin Thuciamna Singkuang le a omna mun hong musakkik ding hi.Topa’
Ahih hangin amah in, ‘Na tungah lungkimna ka nei kei hi,’ hong cih leh, en in, hih lai-ah kei ka om hi; amah in hoih a sak bangin kei tungah hong bawl hen,” a ci hi.
Kumpipa in siampi Zadok kiangah, “En in, nuamtakin nang le Abiathar, na tapa nihte Ahimaaz le Abiathar’ tapa Jonathan tawh khuapi sungah ciahkik un.
Thei in, kei kiangah thu a hong zasak dingin nang’ kiang panin thuko mi hong tun mateng gamlak tui ngahmunte-ah ka na ngak ding hi,” cithuah lai hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Zadok le Abiathar in Pasian’ Thuciamna Singkuang Jerusalem-ah puakik uh a, amaute tua lai-ah om uh hi.
Ahih hangin Oliv Mual tung kahtohna-ah David paito a, khe guak le lu tuamsa-in a paikawmin kap hi. Amah tawh a om mi khempeuh zong lu khuhsa-in a paitoh kawmun a kap uh hi.

Tua laitakin David kiangah, “Ahithofel zong mi sawmsimte lakah Absalom tawh om hi,” ci-in kigen hi. Tua ahih ciangin David in, “Topaaw, kong thum hi; Ahithofel’ thugente haina-in na heisak in,” a ci hi.Topa
Pasian a kibiakna mun mual dawnah David a tun ciangin, Arkhi mi Hushai amah a dawn dingin a puantungsilh balkeksa le a lu tungah lei baang tawh hong pai hi.
David in ama kiangah, “Nang hong zuisuak lecin kei adingin vangik na hi ding hi.

Ahih hangin khuapi sungah nang ciahkikin Absalom kiangah, ‘Aw kumpipa, kei, nangma nasem ka hi ding hi. Hun beisa sungah na pa’ nasem ka hih mah bangin tu-in nangma nasem ka hi ding hi,’ ci lecin, Ahithofel’ thugente kei adingin na zo ding hi.
Siampi Zadok le Abiathar tua lai-ah nang tawh om hi lo ahi hiam? Tua ahih ciangin kumpipa’ inn pan na zak peuhpeuh siampi Zadok le Abiathar’ kiangah gen in.
En in, amau’ tapa tegel, Zadok’ tapa Ahimaaz le Abiathar’ tapa Jonathan, amaute tawh omkhawm hi. Na zak peuhpeuh amaute’ tungtawnin kei tungah nong puak ding hi,” a ci hi.
Tua ahih ciangin Jerusalem-ah Absalom a lut laitakin David’ lawmpa Hushai zong khuapi sungah a pai hi.

David in mual dawn a khen khit tawmvei ciangin Mefibosheth nasem pa Ziba in anlum zanih, leenggah phehkeu bawk zakhat, khuakhal singgah zakhat le leenggahzu savun um khat a pua van a kivawh la nih tawh amah na dawn hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Ziba kiangah, “Bang hangin hihte hong paipih na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Ziba in dawngin, “Late pen kumpipa’ innkuante a tuan nading, anlum le khuakhal singgahte pen tangvalte’ nek ding le leenggahzu pen gamlakah a gimte’ dawn ding ahi hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in, “Na topa Saul’ tupa koi-ah om ahi hiam?” a ci hi. Ziba in kumpipa kiangah, “Amah Jerusalem-ah om hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, ‘Tuni-in Israel mite in ka pu Saul’ kumpi gam kei hong piakik ding hi,’ ci hi,” a ci hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Ziba kiangah, “En in, Mefibosheth’ neihsa khempeuh tu-in nangma a’ ahi hi,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Ziba in, “Kei, nangma nasem pa ka hi hi; ka to kumpipa’ muhna-ah maipha hong musak tawntung in,” a ci hi.
